40001001	Ñiŋ ne mu Yeesu Kiristu bonsuŋolu saataroo ti, meŋ mu Mansa Dawuda koomalankoo ti aniŋ Iburayima koomalankoo.
40001002	Iburayima le ye Isiyaaka wuluu, Isiyaaka ye Yaakuba wuluu, Yaakuba le ye Yahuuda wuluu, aniŋ a baadinkewolu.
40001003	Yahuuda le ye Peresi niŋ Sera wuluu, mennu baamaa mu Tamara ti. Peresi le ye Hesironi wuluu, Hesironi ye Ramu wuluu.
40001004	Ramu le ye Amminadabu wuluu, Amminadabu ye Nasoni wuluu, Nasoni ye Salimoni wuluu.
40001005	Salimoni le ye Bowasi wuluu, meŋ baamaa mu Rahabu ti, aduŋ Bowasi le ye Obedi wuluu, meŋ baamaa mu Ruti ti. Obedi le ye Yese wuluu.
40001006	Yese ye Mansa Dawuda wuluu. Dawuda le ye Sulemani wuluu, meŋ baamaa mu nuŋ Uriya la musoo ti.
40001007	Sulemani le ye Rehobowamu wuluu, Rehobowamu ye Abiya wuluu, Abiya ye Asa wuluu.
40001008	Asa le ye Yehosafati wuluu, Yehosafati ye Yoramu wuluu, Yoramu ye Usiya wuluu.
40001009	Usiya le ye Yotamu wuluu, Yotamu ye Ahasi wuluu, Ahasi ye Hesekiya wuluu.
40001010	Hesekiya le ye Manase wuluu, Manase ye Amoni wuluu, Amoni ye Yosiya wuluu.
40001011	Yosiya le ye Yekoniya wuluu aniŋ a baadinkewolu jamaanoo meŋ na, ì taata mutoo kono Babiloni.
40001012	Mutoo ñiŋ koolaa, Yekoniya ye Seyalitiyeli wuluu, Seyalitiyeli ye Serubabeli wuluu.
40001013	Serubabeli le ye Abiyudi wuluu, Abiyudi ye Eliyakimu wuluu, Eliyakimu ye Asori wuluu.
40001014	Asori le ye Sadoki wuluu, Sadoki ye Akimu wuluu, Akimu ye Eliyudi wuluu.
40001015	Eliyudi le ye Eleyasa wuluu, Eleyasa ye Matani wuluu, Matani ye Yankuba wuluu.
40001016	Yankuba le ye Yusufa wuluu, meŋ mu Mariyaama keemaa ti. Mariyaama le ye Yeesu wuluu, ì ka a fo meŋ ye Kiristu.
40001017	Bituŋ, ka bo Iburayima jamaanoo la ka taa Dawuda jamaanoo kaŋ, wo kaañanta jamaani taŋ niŋ naani le fee. Ka bo Dawuda jamaanoo la ka taa jamaanoo meŋ na, ì taata mutoo kono Babiloni, wo fanaa mu jamaani taŋ niŋ naani le ti. Aduŋ ka bo ì la mutoo la ka naa Kiristu la waatoo la, wo fanaa taata kaañaŋ jamaani taŋ niŋ naani le fee.
40001018	Yeesu Kiristu wuluuñaa keta teŋ ne: A baamaa Mariyaama be looriŋ Yusufa le ye ka a futuu. Janniŋ ì be kafu la, a naata je ko, konoo le be a la ka bo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo la.
40001019	A keemaa Yusufa meŋ mu moo tilindiŋo ti, maŋ lafi ka a malundi jamaa kono. Bituŋ a ye feeroo siti ka a bula kulloo kono.
40001020	Bari kabiriŋ a be ñiŋ kuwo miira kaŋ, Maariyo la malaayikoo fintita a kaŋ siiboo kono, a ko a ye ko, “Yusufa, Dawuda dinkewo, kana sila ka Mariyaama futuu, kaatu diŋo meŋ be a kono, wo sotota ka bo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo le la.
40001021	A be dinkewo le wuluu la, aduŋ i si a toolaa Yeesu la, kaatu ate le be a la moolu kiisandi la ka bo ì la junuboolu kono.”
40001022	Ñiŋ bee keta le ka Maariyo la kumoo timmandi, annabiyomoo ye meŋ fo ko:
40001023	“A juubee, sunkutoo be konoo taa la, aduŋ a be dinkewo le wuluu la. Ì be a kumandi la Immanuweli le la, meŋ kotoo mu ‘Alla be ntolu fee le.’ ”
40001024	Kabiriŋ Yusufa kuninta siinoo la, a ye Maariyo la malaayikoo la kumoo le muta. Bituŋ a naata Mariyaama katandi,
40001025	bari a maŋ a loŋ musu ti fo kabiriŋ a ye a dinkee foloo wuluu. Yusufa ye a toolaa Yeesu la.
40002001	Kabiriŋ Yeesu wuluuta Betilehemu saatewo to Yudeya bankoo kaŋ Mansa Herodi la marali waatoo la, looloo lonnaalu bota naŋ tiliboo ka naa Yerusalaamu.
40002002	Ì ko, “Yahuudoolu la mansakewo meŋ wuluuta, a be mintoo le? Ŋà a la looloo je tiliboo la le, aduŋ ǹ naata le ka a batu.”
40002003	Kabiriŋ Mansa Herodi ye ñiŋ moyi, a niyo toorata, a niŋ Yerusalaamu bee.
40002004	A ye piriisi ñaatonkoolu bee niŋ Luwaa karammoolu bendi ñoo kaŋ. A ye ì ñininkaa, Alimasiihu be wuluu la daameŋ to.
40002005	Bituŋ ì ko a ye ko, “Betilehemu le mu, Yudeya bankoo kaŋ, kaatu annabiyomoo ye a safee le ko:
40002006	‘Aduŋ ite Betilehemu, Yahuuda bankoo kaŋ, kana a miira ko, ite le dooyaata Yahuuda mansa maralilaalu kono. Kaatu maralilaa be bo la ite kono le, meŋ be n na moolu kanta la, Banisirayilankoolu.’ ”
40002007	Wo to le Herodi ye ñiŋ looloo lonnaalu kumandi kulloo kono. A ye ì ñininkaa, looloo fintita waati jumaa le faŋo la.
40002008	Aduŋ a ye ì kii ka taa Betilehemu, a ko ì ye ko, “Ali taa, dindiŋo ñini kendeke, aduŋ niŋ ali ye a je, ali si naa a fo n ye, fo m fanaa si taa ka a batu.”
40002009	Kabiriŋ ì ye mansa la kumoo moyi, ì taata ì la siloo la. Ì be taa kaŋ waatoo meŋ na, ì naata looloo je, ì ye meŋ je nuŋ tiliboo la. A be taa kaŋ ì ñaato, fo a taata loo dulaa ñiŋ kunto, dindiŋo be daameŋ.
40002010	Biriŋ ì ye looloo je, ì jusulaata ka seewoo baake.
40002011	Ì dunta buŋo kono, ì ye deenaanoo niŋ a baamaa Mariyaama je. Bituŋ ì sujudita ka a batu. Wo to le ì naata ì la kufoolu yele ka soorifeŋolu dii a la, mennu mu sanoo ti, cuuraayi munkoo aniŋ miiri munkoo.
40002012	Wo koolaa ì naata taa ì la bankoo kaŋ sila doo la, kaatu ì ye dandalaaroo soto ì la siiboo kono le ko, ì kana muru Herodi yaa.
40002013	Kabiriŋ looloo lonnaalu taata, Maariyo la malaayikoo fintita Yusufa kaŋ siiboo kono, a ko a ye ko, “Wuli, i ye deenaanoo niŋ a baamaa borindi ka taa Misira. I si sabati jee, fo janniŋ m be a fo la ali ye muru naŋ, kaatu Herodi pareeta le ka dindiŋo ñini ka a faa.”
40002014	Wo to le a wulita, a ye dindiŋo niŋ a baamaa taa ka taa Misira bankoo kaŋ wo suutoo la.
40002015	Aduŋ ì sabatita jee fo Herodi la saayaa koolaa. Ñiŋ keta le, fo Maariyo la kumoo si timma, annabiyomoo ye meŋ fo ko: “Ka bo Misira, ŋa n dinkewo kili.”
40002016	Kabiriŋ Herodi ye a je ko, ñiŋ looloo lonnaalu ye a neenee le, a kamfaata baake. Wo to le a ye yaamaroo dii ka kambaanendiŋolu bee faa, mennu siyo be sanji fula ka taa wo ye duuma la, Betilehemu saatewo kono aniŋ wo maafaŋo bee to. A ye ñiŋ bendi waatoo le fee, a ye meŋ loŋ ka bo wo looloo lonnaalu bulu.
40002017	Wo ye kumoo le timmandi, Annabilayi Yeremiya ye meŋ fo ko:
40002018	“Kumboo kaŋo moyita Rama le, saŋakumboo aniŋ woosii baa. Raheli be a diŋolu kumboo kaŋ. A balanta ka sabari, kaatu ì te keriŋ kotenke.”
40002019	Kabiriŋ Herodi faata, Maariyo la malaayikoo fintita Yusufa kaŋ siiboo kono Misira bankoo kaŋ,
40002020	a ko a ye ko, “Wuli! I ye dindiŋo niŋ a baamaa taa, ali ye muru Banisirayila bankoo kaŋ, kaatu mennu ye a kata ka dindiŋo faa, wolu faata le.”
40002021	Wo to le a wulita, a ye dindiŋo niŋ a baamaa taa ka muru Banisirayila bankoo kaŋ.
40002022	Bari kabiriŋ a ye a moyi ko, Arikelawus le be maraloo la Yudeya a faamaa Herodi noo to, a silata ka taa jee. A naata dandalaaroo soto siiboo kono, bituŋ a taata Kalilee tundoo kaŋ.
40002023	A sabatita saatewo to, ì ka a fo daameŋ ye Nasareti, fo annabiyomoolu la kumoo si timma ko: “A be kumandi la Nasaretinkoo le la.”
40003001	Wo waatoo la, Yaayaa Batiseerilaa naata Yudeya keñewuloo kono, ka ñiŋ kawandi ko,
40003002	“Ali tuubi, ali ye ali koo dii ali la junuboolu la, kaatu Arijana mansabaayaa sutiyaata naŋ ne.”
40003003	Yaayaa le mu moo ti, Annabilayi Yesaya ye meŋ na kumoo fo nuŋ ko: “Moo kumakaŋo be sari kaŋ keñewuloo kono: ‘Ali mbeedoo parendi Maariyo ye, ali a la silandiŋolu tembendi.’ ”
40003004	Yaayaa la duŋ feŋolu dadaata niŋ ñonkometiyo le la, aduŋ a la teesitiraŋo mu kulujuloo le ti. A la domoroo mu kuntiŋolu le ti, aniŋ liyo.
40003005	Bituŋ moolu ka taa a kaŋ ka bo Yerusalaamu, Yudeya, aniŋ tundoolu bee mennu be Yoridani Boloŋo dandaŋo la.
40003006	Mennu ye i tuubiseyi ì la junuboolu la, a ye wolu batisee Yoridani Boloŋo kono jee.
40003007	Bari kabiriŋ a ye Farisewolu niŋ Sadusewolu jamaalu je, ì ka naa batisewo la, a ko ì ye ko, “Alitolu daŋari koorewo, jumaa le ye ali dandalaa ka bori kamfaa ma, meŋ ka naa?
40003008	Ali daajikoo yitandi, meŋ mu tuubi tooñaa ti.
40003009	Ali kana a miira ali faŋ ye ko, ali mumu mu Iburayima le ti. Ŋa a fo ali ye, Alla si ñiŋ beroolu taa noo le ka ì ke Iburayima koomalankoolu ti.
40003010	Saayiŋ teeraŋo be laariŋ yirisuloolu to le fokabaŋ. Wo kamma la yiri-wo-yiri meŋ maŋ diŋ betoo diŋ, wo be kuntu la le, aduŋ a be fayi la dimbaa kono le ka jani.
40003011	Tooñaa, n ka ali batisee niŋ jiyo le la ka a yitandi ko, ali tuubita le. Bari meŋ ka naa nte noo kaŋ, wo le la kuwo warata ka tambi nte la. M maŋ jari ka hani a la samatoolu samba. Ate be ali batisee la niŋ Noora Kuliŋo le la aniŋ dimbaa.
40003012	A la feerilaŋo be a buloo kono le, aduŋ a be kesoolu niŋ fuufulewolu bo la ñoo to le. Wo to le a be a la kesoolu ke la buntuŋo kono, bari a be fuufulewolu jani la dimbaa le la, meŋ buka faa noo.”
40003013	Wo to le Yeesu naata ka bo Kalilee ka taa Yoridani Boloŋo to. A naata Yaayaa yaa fo a si a batisee.
40003014	Bari Yaayaa ye a ñaato kuntu le, a ko a ye ko, “Nte suulata, ite ye nte batisee. Saayiŋ, ite si naa nte kaŋ ñaadii le?”
40003015	Bari Yeesu ye a jaabi ko, “A ke n ye saayiŋ. A beteyaata ntolu to le ka Alla la lafoo bee ke a ñaama.” Wo to le a naata soŋ.
40003016	Kabiriŋ Yeesu batiseeta, a fintita naŋ jiyo kono doroŋ, saŋo yeleta. A naata Alla la Nooroo je jii la a kaŋ ko puraa.
40003017	Bituŋ kumakaŋo naata bo saŋo santo ko, “Ñiŋ ne mu n Kanu Dinkewo ti, n jusoo laata meŋ na kuwo la baake.”
40004001	Wo to le Alla la Nooroo ye Yeesu kenkeŋ keñewuloo kono fo Ibiliisa si a marisa.
40004002	Bituŋ a sunta fo tili taŋ naani aniŋ suuto taŋ naani. Wo koolaa konkoo ye a muta.
40004003	Wo to le marisarilaa naata, a ko a ye ko, “Niŋ a ye a tara, ite le mu Alla Dinkewo ti, ñiŋ beroolu yaamari ka ke mbuuroo ti.”
40004004	Bari Yeesu ye a jaabi ko, “A be safeeriŋ ne ko: ‘Moo buka baluu noo mbuuroo dammaa la, a ka baluu kuma-wo-kuma le la, Alla ye meŋ fo!’ ”
40004005	Wo koolaa Ibiliisa ye a samba Saatee Senuŋo to, a ye a londi Alla Batudulaa Buŋo turoo kaŋ santo.
40004006	Bituŋ Ibiliisa ko a ye ko, “Niŋ a ye a tara, ite le mu Alla Dinkewo ti, i faŋ fayi duuma, bayiri a be safeeriŋ ne ko: ‘A be a la malaayikoolu yaamari la ka i kanta, fo i siŋo kana taki bere la.’ ”
40004007	Wo to le Yeesu ko a ye ko, “A be safeeriŋ ne fanaa ko: ‘Ali kana Maariyo ali la Alla kotobo.’ ”
40004008	Ibiliisa naata a samba kotenke konko jaŋ baa santo. A ye duniyaa mansamarali bankoolu bee la waroo niŋ ñiiñaa yitandi a la.
40004009	Bituŋ a ko Yeesu ye ko, “M be ñinnu bee dii la i la le, niŋ i sujudita n ye aniŋ i ye m batu.”
40004010	Bituŋ Yeesu ko a ye ko, “Taa jana, Seetaanoo! A be safeeriŋ ne ko: ‘Ali si sujudi Maariyo ali la Alla ye, aniŋ ali si ate doroŋ batu.’ ”
40004011	Wo koolaa le Ibiliisa ye a bula. Bituŋ malaayikoolu naata ka a maakoyi.
40004012	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye a moyi ko, ì ye Yaayaa soroŋ bunjawoo kono, a naata muru Kalilee.
40004013	A naata sawuŋ ka bo Nasareti, a taata sabati Kapanawumu saatewo to, baa dandaŋo la Sebuluni niŋ Nafutali tundoolu naanewo to.
40004014	Ñiŋ keta le ka Annabilayi Yesaya la kumoo timmandi ko:
40004015	“Sebuluni tundoo aniŋ Nafutali tundoo, ka taa baa maafaŋo la, Yoridani Boloŋo kara doo la, Kalilee bankoo, moolu be sabatiriŋ daameŋ to, mennu maŋ ke Yahuudoolu ti.
40004016	Moolu mennu be siiriŋ diboo kono, ì naata mala baa je. Maloo malata moolu kaŋ ne, mennu be siiriŋ banku dibiriŋo kaŋ, saayaa niiniyo koto.”
40004017	Ka bo wo waatoo la Yeesu ye a dati ka kawandoo ke ko, “Ali tuubi, ali ye ali koo dii ali la junuboolu la, kaatu Arijana mansabaayaa sutiyaata naŋ ne.”
40004018	Kabiriŋ Yeesu be taama kaŋ Kalilee Baa daala, a ye kee fula je, Simoni, ì ka meŋ kumandi Pita la, aniŋ Anduru, a baadiŋo. Ì be jalafayoo le la baa kono, kaatu ì mu ñeemutalaalu le ti.
40004019	Bituŋ a ko ì ye ko, “Ali n nooma, aduŋ m be ali ke la moomutalaalu le ti.”
40004020	Wo loodulaa to doroŋ, ì ye ì la jaloolu bula jee ka a nooma.
40004021	Ka bo wo to a taata, a ye baadimmaa fula koteŋ je, mennu mu Yankuba niŋ Yohana ti, Sebede dinkewolu. Ì niŋ ì faamaa Sebede le tarata kuluŋo kono, ì be jaloolu dadaa kaŋ. Bituŋ Yeesu ye ì kumandi.
40004022	Wo loo niŋ baroo teema ì ye ì la kuluŋo niŋ ì faamaa tu jee, ì ye a nooma.
40004023	Wo to le Yeesu taata Kalilee tundoo muumewo bee kaŋ. A tarata karandiroo la ì la diina bendulaalu to. A ka Alla la mansabaayaa kibaari betoo le kawandi. A ye kuuraŋ siifaa bee kendeyandi aniŋ saasaa siifaa bee.
40004024	A la kuwo kibaaroo janjanta Siriya tundoo bee kaŋ. Bituŋ moolu naata ka kuurantoolu bee samba a ye naŋ, mennu ye saasaa siifaa jamaa soto waraŋ dimoo, ì niŋ seetaanitoolu, wayitoolu aniŋ namatoolu, aduŋ a ye ì kendeyandi le.
40004025	Kafu baa ye a nooma ka bo Kalilee aniŋ Dekapolis kono, Yerusalaamu, Yudeya aniŋ ka taa fo ka tambi Yoridani kara doo la.
40005001	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye kafu baa je, a taata konkoo santo, a siita duuma, aduŋ a la saayiboolu naata a kaŋ.
40005002	Bituŋ a ye karandiroo dati ka a fo ì ye ko:
40005003	“Barakoo be moolu ye, mennu maŋ wasa Nooroo la, ì ye meŋ soto, kaatu ì taa le mu Arijana mansabaayaa ti.
40005004	“Barakoo be moolu ye, mennu ka woosii, kaatu ì be sabarindi la le.
40005005	“Barakoo be moolu ye, mennu ye i fammajii, kaatu ì be duniyaa keetaa la le.
40005006	“Barakoo be moolu ye, mennu konkota aniŋ ì mindoota tiliŋo kamma la, kaatu ì be wasa la le.
40005007	“Barakoo be moolu ye, mennu ye balafaa soto, kaatu balafaa le be yitandi la ì la.
40005008	“Barakoo be moolu ye, mennu sondomoolu seneyaata, kaatu ì be Alla je la le.
40005009	“Barakoo be kayira sabatindilaalu ye, kaatu ì be kumandi la Alla la dindiŋolu le la.
40005010	“Barakoo be moolu ye, ì ka mennu toorandi tiliŋo kamma, kaatu ì taa le mu Arijana mansabaayaa ti.
40005011	“Barakoo be alitolu ye, niŋ moolu ye ali neŋ ka ali toorandi aniŋ ka kuu jawu siifaa bee laa ali kaŋ faniyaa kono nte la kuwo kamma la.
40005012	Ali seewoo aniŋ ali ye jusulaa, kaatu ali la joo be wara la Arijana kono le. Ì ye annabiyomoolu toorandi wo ñaa kiliŋo le ñaama, mennu naata ali ñaa.
40005013	“Alitolu le mu duniyaa la koo ti. Bari niŋ koo foota a la kuniyaa la, a be ke noo la koo ti ñaadii le kotenke? A maŋ nafaa soto fo ka a fayi banta, daameŋ moolu siŋolu be dori la a kaŋ.
40005014	“Alitolu le mu duniyaa la maloo ti. Saatewo meŋ be looriŋ konkoo kaŋ, wo te maabo noo la muumeeke.
40005015	Moolu buka lampoo mala ka a ke booloo koto, bari ì ka a ke lampu looraŋo le kaŋ. Wo to le a ka maloo dii moolu bee la, mennu be buŋo kono.
40005016	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la ali la maloo si mala moolu ñaatiliŋo la, fo ì si ali la kebaara kendoolu je, aniŋ ì si horomoo niŋ jayiroo dii ali Faamaa la, meŋ be Arijana.
40005017	“Ali kana a miira ko, nte naata le ka Musa la Luwaa niŋ annabiyomoolu la karandiroo buruka. Hanii, m maŋ naa ka wolu buruka, bari n naata le ka ì timmandi.
40005018	Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, janniŋ saŋo niŋ bankoo be yeemaŋ na, hani harafu kiliŋ waraŋ tombi kiliŋ te yeemaŋ na Luwaa to, fo kuwolu bee ye timma.
40005019	Moo-wo-moo meŋ ye hani yaamarindiŋ kiliŋ tiñaa ñiŋ Luwaa kono, aduŋ a ye doolu karandi a la, wo maarii le la makaamoo be dooyaa la moolu bee ti Arijana mansabaayaa kono. Bari moo-wo-moo meŋ ye ñiŋ yaamaroolu nooma, aduŋ a ye doolu karandi wo la, wo maarii le la makaamoo be wara la Arijana mansabaayaa kono.
40005020	“Ŋa a fo ali ye le, fo niŋ ali la tiliŋo tambita Luwaa karammoolu niŋ Farisewolu taa la, niŋ wo nte ali te duŋ na Arijana mansabaayaa kono.
40005021	“Ali ye a moyi le nuŋ, a fota ǹ na moo foloolu ye ko, ‘Ali kana moo faa’, aduŋ ‘moo-wo-moo meŋ ye moofaa ke, wo maarii ñanta kiitindi la le.’
40005022	Bari saayiŋ m be fo la alitolu ye, moo-wo-moo meŋ kamfaata a baadiŋo kamma, wo maarii ñanta kiitindi la le. Aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ye a baadiŋo neŋ, wo maarii ñanta taa la luwaa ñaatiliŋo la le. Aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ko a baadiŋo ye ko, ‘Ite toolee’, wo maarii ñanta duŋ na Jahannaba dimbaa kono le.
40005023	Wo kamma la, niŋ i be i la sadaa bo la sadaajanidulaa to, aduŋ i hakiloo bulata i baadiŋo la, meŋ be jusuboriŋ i kamma,
40005024	wo to i la sadaa tu laariŋ sadaajanidulaa ñaatiliŋo la jee. Taa, i niŋ i baadiŋo ye diyaa foloo, wo to le i si naa ka i la sadaa bo.
40005025	“I si tariyaa ka kuwolu tembendi i niŋ i kuyaañoo teema taamasiloo kaŋ, janniŋ ali be futa la kiitiidulaa to. Niŋ wo nte, a be i dii la kiitiikuntulaa la le, aduŋ wo be i dii la kantarilaa la le, aduŋ wo be i dundi la bunjawoo kono le.
40005026	Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, i te finti la jee muk, fo niŋ i ye i la alimaanoo bee joo.
40005027	“Ali ye a moyi le nuŋ, a fota ko: ‘Ali kana jeenoo ke.’
40005028	Bari saayiŋ m be a fo la ali ye, moo-wo-moo meŋ ye musoo juubee, a hameta ka a laañooyaa, wo maarii ye jeenoo ke le a sondomoo kono fokabaŋ.
40005029	Niŋ i bulubaa ñaa ka i marisa ka junuboo ke, a lokoti banta, i ye a fayi jana! Ka foo i suufu kiliŋ na, wo le fisiyaata diina i baloo bee ye fayi Jahannaba kono.
40005030	Aduŋ niŋ i bulubaa buloo ka i marisa ka junuboo ke, a kuntu i bala, i ye a fayi jana! Ka foo i suufu kiliŋ na, wo le fisiyaata diina i baloo bee ye taa Jahannaba kono.
40005031	“A fota le nuŋ fanaa ko: ‘Moo-wo-moo ye a la musoo bula, a si futuubaŋ kayitoo dii a la.’
40005032	Bari saayiŋ m be a fo la ali ye, moo-wo-moo ye a la musoo bula, a maŋ ke ko a la musoo ye jeenoo le ke, wo maarii be a dundi kaŋ jeenoo le to. Aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ye bulamusoo futuu, wo ye jeenoo le ke.
40005033	“Ali ye a moyi le nuŋ, a fota ǹ na moo foloolu ye ko, ‘Ali kana i kali faniyaa kaŋ, bari ali ñanta ali la kaloolu timmandi la Maariyo ye le.’
40005034	Bari saayiŋ m be a fo la ali ye, ali kana i kali muumeeke. Ali kana i kali Arijana la, kaatu jee le mu Alla la mansasiiraŋo ti,
40005035	waraŋ duniyaa la, kaatu wo mu Alla la siŋ looraŋo le ti. Ali kana i kali Yerusalaamu la, kaatu jee mu Mansa Baa le la saatewo ti,
40005036	waraŋ ali kuŋo la, kaatu ali te hani kuntiña kiliŋ findi noo la, waraŋ ka a koyindi.
40005037	Ali be meŋ fo la, a si seneyaa. Ali la ‘haa’ si ke ‘haa’ ti, ali la ‘hanii’ ye ke ‘hanii’ ti. Feŋ-wo-feŋ tambita ñinnu la, wo bota Seetaanoo le bulu.
40005038	“Ali ye a moyi le nuŋ, a fota julujoo la kuwo to ko: ‘Ñaa niŋ ñaa le mu, ñiŋo niŋ ñiŋo.’
40005039	Bari saayiŋ m be a fo la ali ye, ali kana i joo moo jawoo la. Niŋ moo ye i bulubaa tamoo fadi, i si i maraa tamoo fanaa dii a la.
40005040	Aduŋ niŋ moo lafita i samane la ka i la dendikoo taa, wo to i si i la waramboo fanaa dii a la.
40005041	Aduŋ niŋ moo ye i diyaakuyaa duŋ dunoo la kilomeetari kiliŋ na, i niŋ a si taa fo kilomeetari fula ñoŋ na.
40005042	Moo so, meŋ ye i daani, aduŋ kana balaŋ moo la, meŋ ye fuuroo ke i bulu.
40005043	“Ali ye a moyi le nuŋ, a fota ko: ‘I siiñoo kanu, i ye i jawoo koŋ.’
40005044	Bari saayiŋ m be a fo la ali ye, ali ali jawoolu kanu, aduŋ ali si duwaa moolu ye, mennu ka ali toorandi.
40005045	Ka bo niŋ wo siloo la, ali si naa ke ali Faamaa diŋolu ti, meŋ be Arijana. A ka a la tiloo mala moo jawoolu niŋ moo betoolu kaŋ ne, aduŋ a ka samaa jindi tilindiŋolu niŋ tilimbaloolu bee le kaŋ.
40005046	Niŋ ali ye moolu kanu, mennu ye ali kanu, ali ye muŋ joori le soto wo to? Fo hani duwaañoolu buka wo kuu kiliŋo le ke baŋ?
40005047	Aduŋ niŋ ali ye ali baadiŋolu doroŋ kontoŋ, ali ye muŋ ne ke ka tambi doolu la? Fo Alla lombaloolu buka wo kuu kiliŋo le ke baŋ?
40005048	Wo kamma la, ali ñanta timma la le ko ali Faamaa meŋ be Arijana, timmata ñaameŋ.”
40006001	“Ali ali hakiloolu tu, ali kana ali la diina kuwolu ke moolu ñaa la, fo ì si ali je. Niŋ ali ye wo ke, ali te joori soto la ali Faamaa bulu, meŋ be Arijana.
40006002	Wo kamma la, niŋ i be sadaa dii la, kana footaŋo fee ka a kankulaa ko bunaafayoolu ka a ke ñaameŋ ì la diina bendulaalu kono, aniŋ siloolu kaŋ taariŋ, fo moolu si ì jayi. Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, wo doroŋ ne mu ì la joo ti.
40006003	Bari niŋ i be sadaa bo la, kana soŋ, i maraa buloo ye a loŋ, i bulubaa buloo be meŋ ke kaŋ.
40006004	I si a je, i la sadaaboo si tara suturoo kono. Aduŋ i Faamaa meŋ ka jeroo ke suturoo kono, be i joo la le.
40006005	“Aduŋ niŋ ali be duwaa la, ali kana ke ko bunaafayoolu, mennu ka lafi ka loo aniŋ ka duwaa ke ì la diina bendulaalu to aniŋ mbeedi kuŋolu to, fo moolu si ì je. Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, wo doroŋ ne mu ì la joo ti.
40006006	Bari niŋ ite be duwaa la, taa i la konoto buŋo kono, i ye bundaa tawuŋ aniŋ i ye i Faamaa daani, meŋ be suturoo kono. Aduŋ i Faamaa meŋ ka jeroo ke suturoo kono, be ite joo la le.
40006007	Aduŋ duwaa kono ali kana kuma kenseŋolu fo ko Alla lombaloolu ka a ke ñaameŋ. Wolu ye a miira le ko, ì la duwaalu be jaabi la niŋ ì la kuma jamaalu le la.
40006008	Wo kamma la, ali kana ke ko wo moolu. Ali Faamaa ye a loŋ ne, ali suulata meŋ na fokabaŋ, janniŋ ali be a daani la.
40006009	Wo to ali ñanta duwaa la teŋ ne: M̀ Faamaa meŋ be Arijana, Allamaa i too senuŋo horoma la.
40006010	I la mansabaayaa si naa, i la lafoo si ke duniyaa kono ko a be Arijana kono ñaameŋ.
40006011	Domoroo dii ǹ na luŋ-wo-luŋ.
40006012	Yamfa ǹ na junuboolu la, ko m̀ fanaa yamfata moolu ye ñaameŋ, mennu ye kuu kuruŋo ke ntolu la.
40006013	Aduŋ kana ǹ dundi marisa kuwo kono, bari i si m̀ bondi Seetaani bulu. Kaatu ite le taa mu mansabaayaa ti, semboo aniŋ waroo fo abadaa. Amiin.
40006014	“Wo kamma la, niŋ ali yamfata moolu ye, mennu ye kuu kuruŋolu ke ali la, wo to ali Faamaa meŋ be Arijana, fanaa be yamfa la ali ye le.
40006015	Bari niŋ ali maŋ yamfa moolu la junuboolu la, wo to ali Faamaa fanaa te yamfa la ali la junuboolu la.
40006016	“Niŋ ali sunta, ali kana ali ñaadaalu faliŋ ka ke ko niŋ ali be bataariŋ ne. Bunaafayoolu ka a ke wo le ñaama ka a yitandi moolu la ko, ì be sundiŋ ne. Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, wo doroŋ ne mu ì la joo ti.
40006017	Bari niŋ i sunta, tuloo maa i kuŋo la, aniŋ i ye i ñaadaa kuu.
40006018	Kana i faŋ yitandi moolu la ko, i be sundiŋ ne. Ì Faamaa meŋ be suturoo kono, wo doroŋ si a loŋ. Aduŋ i Faamaa meŋ ka jeroo ke suturoo kono, a be i joo la le.
40006019	“Ali kana naafuloo maabo ali faŋolu ye ñiŋ duniyaa kono, daameŋ tumboolu niŋ komoŋo be ì tiñaa la, aniŋ daameŋ suŋolu be duŋ na ka ì suuñaa.
40006020	Bari ali ali la naafuloo maabo ali faŋolu ye Arijana kono, daameŋ tumboolu waraŋ komoŋo te ì tiñaa la, sako suŋolu si duŋ ka ì suuñaa.
40006021	Kaatu i la naafuloo be daameŋ, i sondomoo fanaa ka tara wo le to.
40006022	“Ñaa le mu baloo la lampoo ti. Wo kamma la, niŋ i ñaa diyaata, i baloo bee be faa la niŋ maloo le la.
40006023	Bari niŋ i ñaa maŋ diyaa, wo to i baloo bee be faa la niŋ diboo le la. Niŋ a ye a tara, maloo meŋ be i kono mu diboo le ti, wo diboo la semboo be ke la ñaadii le?
40006024	“Moo te maarii fula batu noo la, fo a si doo koŋ, a ye doo kanu, waraŋ a si doo buuñaa, a ye jutu doo la. Ali te Alla niŋ naafuloo batu noo la waati kiliŋ.
40006025	“Wo kamma la m be a fo la ali ye, ali kana jaakali ali la baluuñaa to, ali be meŋ domo la waraŋ ali be meŋ miŋ na. Aduŋ ali kana jaakali ali baloo la kuwo to, ali be meŋ duŋ na ali bala. Fo baluwo le maŋ kummaayaa domoroo ti baŋ, aniŋ fo baloo le maŋ kummaayaa feetoofatoo ti baŋ?
40006026	Ali kunoolu juubee, mennu ka tii foñoo kono: Ì buka fiiroo ke sako katiroo, waraŋ ka siimaŋo kafu ñoo kaŋ buntuŋo kono, bari hani wo ali Faamaa meŋ be Arijana, ka ì daañini le. Fo alitolu le maŋ kummaayaa wolu ti baŋ?
40006027	“Jumaa le be ali kono, meŋ si hani waati kiliŋ kafu noo a faŋo siyo kaŋ ka bo niŋ jaakaloo la?
40006028	Muŋ ne ye a tinna ali ka jaakali feetoofatoo la kuwo to? Ali firi ñiimaalu juubee, ì ka faliŋ kunkoo kono ñaameŋ. Ì buka dookuwo ke, waraŋ daaroo.
40006029	Bari hani wo, m be a fo la ali ye, hani Mansa Sulemani niŋ a la fankoo niŋ ñiiñaa bee, a maŋ feetoofata ka tambi ñiŋ firi kiliŋ na.
40006030	Niŋ Alla ka kunkukono ñaamoolu feetoofata teŋ, mennu be baluuriŋ bii, saama ì ye fayi ka ì jani, fo a te alitolu feetoofata la ka tambi wolu la baŋ? Alitolu moo lanna dooyaariŋolu!
40006031	“Wo kamma la, ali kana jaakali ka a fo ko, ‘M be muŋ ne domo la?’ waraŋ ‘M be muŋ ne miŋ na?’ waraŋ ‘M be muŋ ne duŋ na?’
40006032	Alla lombaloolu ka tu ñiŋ feŋolu le bee ñini la. Bari ali Faamaa meŋ be Arijana, ye a loŋ ne ko, ali suulata ñinnu bee la le.
40006033	Ali Alla la mansabaayaa ñini foloo, aniŋ a la tiliŋo, bituŋ ali si naa ñiŋ feŋolu bee fanaa soto.
40006034	“Wo to, ali kana jaakali saama la kuwo la, kaatu saama be a faŋ topatoo la le. Tili-wo-tili niŋ a fansuŋ bataa le mu, meŋ be kaañaŋ na a fee.”
40007001	“Ali kana moo kiitindi fo ali fanaa kana kiitindi.
40007002	Kaatu ali ye moo koteŋolu kiitindi ñaameŋ, ali fanaa be kiitindi la wo le ñaama, aduŋ ali ye a ke moolu ye ñaameŋ, a be ke la ali fanaa ye wo le ñaama.
40007003	Muŋ ne ye a tinna i ka kolomandiŋo je i baadiŋo ñaa kono, bari i buka yirikuntoo je i faŋo ñaa kono?
40007004	Waraŋ ite si a fo noo i baadiŋo ye ñaadii le, ‘M batu, ŋa kolomandiŋo bondi i ñaa kono’, wo ye a tara, yirikuntoo be i faŋo ñaa kono?
40007005	Ite bunaafayoo! Yirikuntoo bondi i faŋo ñaa kono foloo, wo koolaa i la jeroo si seneyaa ka kolomandiŋo bondi i baadiŋo ñaa kono.
40007006	“Ali kana feŋ senuŋolu dii wuloolu la, kaatu ì be ali boyinkaŋ na le, aduŋ ali kana ali la pemoolu fayi seewoolu ye, kaatu ì be ì dori la ì siŋolu la le.
40007007	“Ali daaniroo ke, aduŋ a be dii la ali la le. Ali ñinindiroo ke, aduŋ ali be a je la le. Ali konkondiroo ke, aduŋ bundaa be yele la ali ye le.
40007008	Kaatu moo-wo-moo meŋ ye daaniroo ke, wo be a soto la le. Moo-wo-moo, meŋ ye ñinindiroo ke, wo be a je la le. Aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ye konkondiroo ke, bundaa be yele la a ye le.
40007009	Kee jumaa le be alitolu kono, niŋ a dinkewo ye a ñininkaa mbuuroo la, a be beroo dii la a la,
40007010	waraŋ niŋ a ye a ñininkaa ñewo la, a be saa dii la a la?
40007011	Alitolu jawuyaata ñaa-wo-ñaa, ali ye a loŋ ne, ali ñanta soorifeŋ betoolu mennu dii la ali diŋolu la. Wo to siiñaa jelu le ali Faamaa meŋ be Arijana, be feŋ betoolu dii la moolu la, mennu ye a daani!
40007012	“Kuu ke moo la, meŋ si kuŋ i to. Ñiŋ ne mu Musa la Luwaa kotoo ti, aniŋ annabiyomoolu la karandiroo.
40007013	“Duŋ niŋ bundaa deteriŋo la! Kaatu bundaa doo fanuta le, aduŋ a siloo sooneeyaata le, meŋ ka taa kasaaroo kono, aduŋ mennu ka duŋ a la, ì siyaata le.
40007014	Bari bundaa meŋ deteta, aduŋ a siloo maŋ sooneeyaa, wo ka taa baluwo le kono, aduŋ dantaŋ doroŋ ne ka a je.
40007015	“Ali ali hakiloo tu annabiyomoolu to, mennu maŋ tara tooñaa kaŋ. Ì ka naa ali kaŋ ne ko saajiyolu, bari ì konoto be ko suluu konkoriŋolu.
40007016	Ali be ì suutee la ì maañaalu le la. Fo moolu ka wayini yiridiŋ ñatoolu kati ŋaniŋ suŋo bala le baŋ, sako ì si sooto diŋolu kati ŋaniŋolu bala?
40007017	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la yiri kendoo bee ka diŋ betoo le bondi, bari yiri jawoo ka diŋ jawoo le bondi.
40007018	Yiri kendoo buka diŋ jawoo bondi noo, aduŋ yiri jawoo fanaa buka diŋ kendoo diŋ noo.
40007019	Yiri-wo-yiri meŋ maŋ diŋ kendoo bondi, a be kuntu la le ka fayi dimbaa kono.
40007020	Wo to ali be wolu suutee la ka bo ì diŋolu le la.
40007021	“A maŋ ke ko, moo-wo-moo meŋ ka a fo n ye, ‘M Maarii, m Maarii’, be duŋ na Arijana mansabaayaa kono le, bari meŋ ka m Faamaa la lafoo ke, meŋ be Arijana.
40007022	Wo luŋo la, moo jamaa be a fo la n ye, ‘M Maarii, m Maarii, fo m̀ buka kiilaariyaa kumoolu fo nuŋ ite too le la baŋ? Fo m̀ buka seetaani jawoolu bayi nuŋ ite too le la baŋ? Aduŋ fo m̀ buka kaawakuu jamaalu ke ite too le la baŋ?’
40007023	Bari m be a koyindi la ì la le ko, ‘Nte nene maŋ ali loŋ. Ali bo m bala, alitolu kuu jawu kelaalu.’
40007024	“Wo kamma la, moo-wo-moo meŋ ye n na ñiŋ kumoolu moyi, aduŋ a ye ì muta, wo ka munta le ko kee ñaamendiŋo, meŋ ye a la buŋo loo beroo kaŋ.
40007025	Sanjiyo naata busa wo buŋo kaŋ, waamoo woyita a kaŋ, aniŋ turubaadoo ye a fee, bari hani wo a maŋ boyi, kaatu a be looriŋ beroo le kaŋ.
40007026	Bari moo-wo-moo meŋ ye n na ñiŋ kumoolu moyi, aduŋ a maŋ ì muta, wo ka munta le ko toolewo, meŋ ye a la buŋo loo keñoo kaŋ.
40007027	Sanjiyo naata busa wo buŋo kaŋ, waamoo woyita a kaŋ, aniŋ turubaadoo ye a fee, a naata boyi piram!”
40007028	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye ñiŋ kumoolu baŋ fo la, kafoo jaakalita a la karandiroo la,
40007029	kaatu a ka ì karandi le ko kantiyo, a buka a ke ko ì la Luwaa karammoolu.
40008001	Kabiriŋ Yeesu jiita naŋ konkoo santo, kafu baa ye a nooma.
40008002	Wo to le balajawutoo naata a kaŋ, a ñoyita a ye. A ko a ye ko, “M Maariyo, i si n seneyandi noo le i la lafoo kaŋ.”
40008003	Wo to le Yeesu ye a buloo tiliŋ, a ye a maa. Bituŋ a ko, “N lafita le. Kendeyaa!” Wo loodulaa kiliŋo to, a la balajawoo bee seneyaata a bala.
40008004	Yeesu naata a fo a ye ko, “I hakiloo tu, kana ñiŋ kuwo fo hani moo kiliŋ ye. Bari taa, i faŋ yitandi piriisoo la, aniŋ i ye sadaa bondi, Annabilayi Musa ye meŋ yaamari, ka ke moolu ye seedeyaa ti ko, i seneyaata le.”
40008005	Kabiriŋ Yeesu dunta Kapanawumu saatewo kono doroŋ, kelediŋ kuntiyo naata a kaŋ ka a daani ko,
40008006	“M Maariyo, n na dookuulaa kuuranta le fo a buka taama noo. A be laariŋ suwo kono, a niŋ dimi baa.”
40008007	Bituŋ Yeesu ko a ye ko, “M be naa le ka a kendeyandi.”
40008008	Bari kelediŋ kuntiyo ye a jaabi ko, “M Maariyo, nte maŋ jari ite ye naa nte la buŋo kono. Kumoo fo doroŋ, aduŋ n na dookuulaa be kendeyaa la le.
40008009	Kaatu nte fanaa be kantiyolu le koto, aduŋ ŋa kelediŋolu soto n koto le. Niŋ n ko meŋ ye ‘Taa’, a ka taa le. Niŋ n ko doo ye, ‘Naa’, a ka naa le. Aduŋ niŋ ŋa n na dookuulaa yaamari meŋ na, a ka wo le ke.”
40008010	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye ñiŋ moyi, a jaakalita. A ko moolu ye mennu be a nooma ko, “Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, hani Banisirayila kono, m maŋ ñiŋ ñoŋ lanna siifaa je jee.
40008011	Aduŋ m be a fo la ali ye, moo jamaa be bo la naŋ tiliboo aniŋ tilijiyo la. Ì niŋ Iburayima, Isiyaaka aniŋ Yaakuba be sii la le ka domoroo ke Arijana mansabaayaa kono.
40008012	Bari moolu mennu ñanta tara la Alla la mansabaayaa kono, wolu be fayi la banta le diboo kono, kumboo niŋ nimisoo be daameŋ.”
40008013	Wo to le Yeesu ko kelediŋ kuntiyo ye ko, “Taa, a be ke la i ye le ko i laata a la ñaameŋ.” Aduŋ dookuulaa kendeyaata wo waati kiliŋo le la.
40008014	Kabiriŋ Yeesu dunta Pita la buŋo kono, a ye Pita bitammusoo tara laariŋ, a niŋ balakandoo.
40008015	Yeesu ye a buloo maa doroŋ, balakandoo ye a bula. A wulita ka a jiyandi.
40008016	Wo wulaaroo la, ì ye seetaanitoo jamaalu samba a ye naŋ. A ye seetaani jawoolu bayi niŋ kumoo le la, aniŋ a ye kuurantoolu bee kendeyandi.
40008017	Ñiŋ keta le fo Annabilayi Yesaya la kumoo si timma ko: “Ate faŋo le ye ǹ na kuuraŋolu taa, aniŋ a ye ǹ na jankaroolu samba.”
40008018	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye moo jamaa je kururiŋ a la, a ye yaamaroo dii ka teyi baa kara doo la.
40008019	Wo to le Luwaa karammoo naata, a ko a ye ko, “Karammoo, nte be i nooma la le, i taata daa-wo-daa.”
40008020	Bituŋ Yeesu ko a ye ko, “Kunkuwuloolu ye dinkoolu soto le, ì ka tara daameŋ to. Aduŋ kunoolu fanaa ye ñaŋolu soto le, ì ka tara daameŋ to. Bari Moo Dinkewo maŋ hani dulaa soto, a be a kuŋo laa la daameŋ.”
40008021	A la saayibe doo ko a ye ko, “M Maarii, nte bula foloo, ŋa taa m faamaa baadee.”
40008022	Bari Yeesu ko a ye ko, “N nooma! Furewolu bula, ì ye ì ñoŋ furewolu baadee.”
40008023	Kabiriŋ Yeesu bulata kuluŋo kono, a la saayiboolu ye a nooma jee.
40008024	Bituŋ foño baa naata wuli baa kono, fo jiibaliŋolu lafita kuluŋo tunendi la. Bari wo waatoo la Yeesu be siinoo le la.
40008025	Ì naata ka a kuniŋ, ì be a fo kaŋ, “M̀ Maarii, ǹ kiisa! M̀ be kasaara kaŋ ne.”
40008026	Wo to le a ko ì ye ko, “Ali ka muŋ ne sila? Alitolu moo lanna dooyaariŋolu!” Bituŋ a wulita, a ye foñoo niŋ baa baliŋolu jalayi. Wo to le ì tenkunta tek.
40008027	Bituŋ saayiboolu jaakalita, ì ko, “Muŋ moo siifaa le mu ñiŋ ti, fo hani foñoo niŋ baajiyo ka a la yaamaroo muta?”
40008028	Kabiriŋ Yeesu futata baa kara doo la Kerasene tundoo kaŋ, a niŋ seetaanitoo fula benta. Ì ka bo berehuwolu le kono, ì ka moolu baadee daameŋ to. Ì saŋarata baake le, fo a ye a tinna, moo buka tambi noo niŋ wo siloo la.
40008029	Ì wuurita santo ko, “I be muŋ ne ke la ntolu la, ite Alla Dinkewo? Fo i naata jaŋ ne ka ntolu toora, janniŋ waatoo be sii la baŋ?”
40008030	Seewu kooree baa le tarata nuŋ daañinoo la ì ñaato jee.
40008031	Bituŋ seetaani jawoolu ye a daani, ì ko, “Niŋ i ye m̀ bayi banta, wo to i si m̀ bayi wo seewu koorewo kono.”
40008032	Aduŋ a ko ì ye ko, “Ali taa!” Ì naata finti ka duŋ seewoolu kono. Aduŋ seewu koorewo bee borita ka jii konkoo jindaa la, ì naata joloŋ baa kono. Ì bee faata jiyo kono jee.
40008033	Bituŋ seewu kantalaalu borita, ì taata saatewo kono. Ì ye kuwo bee saata, aniŋ meŋ keta seetaanitoolu la.
40008034	Aduŋ saatee moolu bee naata ka Yeesu benduŋ. Kabiriŋ ì ye a je, ì ye a daani, fo a si bo ì la tundoo kaŋ.
40009001	Wo to le Yeesu dunta kuluŋo kono, a teyita ka taa baa kara doo la. A naata a fansuŋ saatewo to.
40009002	Ì ye namatoo doo naati a kaŋ, meŋ be laariŋ basoo kaŋ. Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye ì la lannoo je, a ko namatoo ye ko, “N dinkewo, i jusoo bambandi. I la junuboolu yamfata le.”
40009003	Luwaa karammoo doolu tarata jee, ì kumata ko, “Ñiŋ kewo ka tooñeeri kumoolu le fo.”
40009004	Bayiri Yeesu ye ì la miiroolu loŋ ne, a ko ì ye ko, “Muŋ ne ye a tinna ali ka kuu jawoo miira ali sondomoolu kono?
40009005	Fo ñiŋ ne maŋ sooneeyaa ka a fo, ‘I la junuboolu yamfata le’, diina ka a fo, ‘Wuli, i ye taama’?
40009006	Bari ali si a loŋ ko, Moo Dinkewo ye kaŋo soto ñiŋ duniyaa kono le ka yamfa junuboolu la.” Bituŋ a ko namatoo ye ko, “Wuli, i la basoo sika, i ye taa suwo kono.”
40009007	Wo to le a wulita, a taata suwo kono.
40009008	Kabiriŋ moolu ye ñiŋ je, ì faata niŋ Alla ñaasilaŋo la, aduŋ ì naata ka Alla jayi, meŋ ye ñiŋ ñoŋ semboo dii hadamadiŋolu la.
40009009	Kabiriŋ Yeesu be tambi kaŋ, a ye kee doo le je, meŋ too mu Matiyu ti. A be siiriŋ ì la duwaañibuŋo to. Bituŋ a ko a ye ko, “N nooma!” Aduŋ a wulita, a ye a nooma.
40009010	Wo koolaa, kabiriŋ Yeesu be domoroo la Matiyu la buŋo kono, duwaañi jamaalu niŋ junubelaalu naata ka sii Yeesu niŋ a la saayiboolu fee jee ka domoroo ke.
40009011	Kabiriŋ Farisewo doolu ye ñiŋ je, ì ko a la saayiboolu ye ko, “Muŋ ne ye a tinna ali karammoo niŋ duwaañoolu niŋ junubelaalu ka domoroo ke ñoo kaŋ?”
40009012	Bari Yeesu ye ì la kumoolu moyi le, a ko ì ye ko, “Moo kendeyaariŋolu maŋ suula jaaralilaa la, bari mennu kuuranta.
40009013	Ali taa a karaŋ, ñiŋ kotoo mu meŋ ti: ‘N na lafoo mu balafaa le ti, a maŋ ke sadaa ti.’ Kaatu nte maŋ naa ka moo tilindiŋolu kumandi, bari junubelaalu.”
40009014	Wo to le Yaayaa la saayiboolu naata Yeesu kaŋ, ì ko a ye ko, “Muŋ ne ye a tinna ntolu niŋ Farisewolu ka suŋ, bari ite la saayiboolu buka suŋ?”
40009015	Bituŋ Yeesu ko ì ye ko, “Fo maañoobitilaalu si woosii noo baŋ, niŋ maañootiyo be ì fee? Bari luŋolu be naa la le, luŋo meŋ maañootiyo be bo la ì bulu. Wo to le ì be suŋ na.
40009016	Moo buka bayi kutoo lenkelaa waramba kotoo bala, kaatu lenkelaa ka bo waramboo bala le, aduŋ a be faroo warandi la baake le.
40009017	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, wayini kutoo buka ke sufura kotoolu kono. Niŋ wo keta, sufuroolu be feteŋ na le, wayinoo be boŋ na le, aduŋ sufuroolu be tiñaa la le. Wayini kutoo ka ke sufura kutoolu le kono, fo ì bee kana tiñaa.”
40009018	Kabiriŋ Yeesu be ñiŋ kumoolu fo kaŋ ì ye, maralilaa doo naata. A ñoyita a ñaatiliŋo la ka a fo a ye ko, “N dimmusoo faata saayiŋ-saayiŋ ne. Bari naa, i ye i buloo doroŋ laa a kaŋ, a be baluu la le.”
40009019	Bituŋ Yeesu niŋ a la saayiboolu wulita, ì ye a nooma.
40009020	Ì taatoo musoo doo le naata niŋ a kooma la. Yeleboŋ kuuraŋo le be a la fo sanji taŋ niŋ fula. A ye Yeesu la waramboo tuloo maa.
40009021	A ye ñiŋ ne fo a faŋ ye ko, “Niŋ ŋa hani a la waramboo doroŋ maa, m be kendeyaa la le.”
40009022	Bituŋ Yeesu ye a kooma juubee, a ye a je, aduŋ a ko a ye ko, “N dimmusoo, i jusoo bambandi. I la lannoo ye i kendeyandi le.” Wo loo niŋ baroo teema musoo kendeyaata.
40009023	Kabiriŋ Yeesu futata maralilaa la buŋo to, a ye footaŋ feelaalu je, aniŋ moo jamaalu, mennu be woosii kaŋ, ì niŋ maakaŋ baa.
40009024	A ko ì ye ko, “Ali taa banta! Sunkutundiŋo maŋ faa, a be siinoo le la.” Bituŋ ì naata jele a la.
40009025	Biriŋ ì ye moolu fintindi banta, Yeesu dunta, a ye sunkutundiŋo buloo muta. Bituŋ sunkutundiŋo wulita.
40009026	Ñiŋ kibaaroo naata janjaŋ wo tundoo bee kaŋ.
40009027	Yeesu bota jee doroŋ, finkintee fula ye a nooma. Ì be wuuri kaŋ ka a fo ko, “Dawuda Dinkewo, balafaa soto ǹ ye!”
40009028	Kabiriŋ Yeesu dunta buŋo kono, wo finkintewolu naata a kaŋ. Bituŋ Yeesu ye ì ñininkaa ko, “Fo alitolu laata le ko, nte si ali ñaalu yelendi noo baŋ?” Ì ye a jaabi ko, “Haa, Maariyo!”
40009029	Wo to le a ye ì ñaalu maa, a ko ì ye ko, “A si ke ali ye ali la dankeneyaa kaŋ.”
40009030	Bituŋ ì ñaalu yeleta. A naata ì dandalaa baake ko, “Ali kana soŋ, hani moo ye a loŋ.”
40009031	Bari kabiriŋ ì fintita, ì ye a kibaaroo janjandi wo tundoo bee kaŋ.
40009032	Kabiriŋ wolu be finti kaŋ ka taa, ì ye mumunewo samba Yeesu ye naŋ, seetaani jawoo be meŋ na.
40009033	Kabiriŋ a ye seetaani jawoo bayi a bala, mumunewo naata diyaamu. Moolu jaakalita, ì be a fo kaŋ, “Ñiŋ ñoŋo nene maŋ ke Banisirayila kono muk.”
40009034	Bari Farisewolu ko, “A ka seetaani jawoolu bayi niŋ Ibiliisa semboo le la!”
40009035	Wo koolaa Yeesu taata saatee baalu niŋ saateeriŋolu bee to. A ye karandiroo ke ì la diina bendulaalu to, aniŋ a ye Alla la mansabaayaa kibaari betoo kawandi. A ye kuuraŋ siifaa bee kendeyandi aniŋ saasaa siifaa bee.
40009036	Kabiriŋ a ye kafoo je, a balafaata ì ye, kaatu ì be bataariŋ ne aniŋ ì jikilateyita. Ì ka munta le ko saajiyolu, mennu maŋ kantarilaa soto.
40009037	Wo to le a ko a la saayiboolu ye ko, “Katiroo be siyaariŋ ne, bari dookuulaalu le maŋ siyaa.
40009038	Wo kamma la, ali duwaa ka Katiritiyo daani, fo a si dookuulaalu kii naŋ a la katiroo la.”
40010001	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye a la saayibe taŋ niŋ fuloo kumandi, a ye kaŋo dii ì la ka seetaani jawoolu bayi aniŋ ka kuuraŋ siifaa bee kendeyandi, aniŋ saasaa siifaalu bee.
40010002	Wo kiilaa taŋ niŋ fuloo toolu mu ñinnu le ti: Foloo-foloo, Simoni, ì ka meŋ kumandi Pita la, a baadiŋo Anduru, aniŋ Yankuba meŋ mu Sebede dinkewo ti, aniŋ a baadiŋo Yohana,
40010003	Filipi, Batolomeyu, Tomas, aniŋ Matiyu meŋ mu duwaañoo ti, aniŋ Yankuba meŋ mu Alifeyu dinkewo ti, aniŋ Tadeyu,
40010004	Simoni Kanaaninkoo, aniŋ Yudas Isikariyoti meŋ naata Yeesu jamfaa.
40010005	Yeesu ye ñiŋ kee taŋ niŋ fuloo le kii, aniŋ a ye ì yaamari ko, “Ali kana taa moolu kono, mennu maŋ ke Yahuudoolu ti. Ali kana duŋ hani Samariya saatee kiliŋ kono,
40010006	bari ali si taa Banisirayilankoolu yaa, mennu ka munta ko saajii filiriŋolu.
40010007	Niŋ ali be taa kaŋ, ali si ñiŋ kumoo kawandi ko, ‘Arijana mansabaayaa sutiyaata naŋ ne.’
40010008	Ali kuurantoolu kendeyandi, ali ye furewolu wulindi saayaa kono, ali ye balajawutoolu seneyandi, aniŋ ali ye seetaani jawoolu bayi. Ali maŋ feŋ bo ñiŋ kaŋo kunna, wo to ali fanaa kana feŋ kaniŋ a kunna.
40010009	Ali kana sani kodoo, kodiforoo waraŋ jaawaloo bula ali la jifoolu kono.
40010010	Ali kana kufu samba ali la taamasiloo kaŋ, waraŋ dendika fulanjaŋo, samatoolu waraŋ taamaraŋ dokoo, kaatu dookuulaa le jarita a la joo la.
40010011	Niŋ ali dunta saatee-wo-saatee kono, ali si ñininkaaroo ke, meŋ si ali jiyaa noo. Aduŋ ali si sabati jee fo janniŋ ali be taa la.
40010012	Niŋ ali be duŋ na buŋo kono, ali si kontondiroo ke ko, ‘Kayiroo be ali fee.’
40010013	Niŋ wo bunkononkoolu ye ali jiyaa, wo to ali la kayiroo si naa wolu kaŋ. Bari niŋ ì maŋ ali jiyaa, wo to ali la kayiroo si muru ali kaŋ.
40010014	Niŋ moo-wo-moo maŋ ali danku, waraŋ a maŋ a tuloo loo ali la kumoolu la, ali si ali siŋolu konkoŋ, niŋ ali be bo la wo buŋo kono waraŋ wo saatewo to.
40010015	Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, kiitiiluŋo be sooneeyaa la Sodomu niŋ Komora saatewolu le ye ka tambi wo saatewo la, meŋ balanta alitolu ma.
40010016	“Ali a kalamuta ko, m be ali kii kaŋ banta le ko saajiyolu, mennu be suluwolu kono. Wo kamma la ali si feere ko woloo, aniŋ ali si sooneeyaa ko puraa.
40010017	Ali ali hakiloo tu moolu to, kaatu ì be ali samba la kiitiyolu to le, aniŋ ì be ali karawaasi la ì la diina bendulaalu kono le.
40010018	Ì be ali samba la ì la maralilaalu ñaatiliŋo la le, aniŋ mansoolu, nte la kuwo kamma, fo ali si ke n seedoolu ti ì ye, aniŋ moolu ye, mennu maŋ ke Yahuudoolu ti.
40010019	Niŋ ì ye ali muta, ali kana dewuŋ, ali be meŋ fo la waraŋ ali be a fo la ñaameŋ, kaatu niŋ wo waatoo siita, kumoo be dii la ali la le, ali ñanta meŋ fo la.
40010020	Kaatu a maŋ ke ko, alitolu le be diyaamu la, bari ali Faamaa la Nooroo, wo le be diyaamu la ka bo niŋ alitolu la.
40010021	“Baadiŋo be a baadiŋo jamfaa la le ka a faa, faamaa fanaa be a diŋo ke la wo le ñaama. Dindiŋolu be muriti la ì wuluulaalu ma le ka a tinna, ì ye ì faa.
40010022	Moolu bee le be ali koŋ na nte too kamma la. Bari moo meŋ wakiilita fo labandulaa to, wo maarii le be kiisa la.
40010023	“Niŋ ì ye ali toorandi saatee kiliŋ to, ali bori, ali ye taa saatee doo to. Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, janniŋ ali ka Banisirayila saatewolu bee baŋ, Moo Dinkewo be muru la naŋ ne.
40010024	Karandiŋo la kuwo maŋ wara a karammoo ti, waraŋ joŋo la kuwo ye wara a maarii ti.
40010025	Niŋ karandiŋo keta ko a karammoo, wo be a wasa la le, joŋo ye wasa, niŋ a keta ko a maariyo. Niŋ ì ye suutiyo kumandi Belisibul la, wo to ì be a la dimbaayaa kumandi la too le la meŋ jawuyaata wo ti.
40010026	“Wo kamma la, ali kana sila moolu la. Feŋ te muuriliŋ, meŋ te wura la. Feŋ te maaboriŋ, meŋ te loŋ na.
40010027	Nte ka meŋ fo ali ye diboo kono, ali si wo fo maloo kono. Aduŋ ali ye dumburoo meŋ moyi ali tuloolu la, ali si wo kankulaa kankaraŋo santo.
40010028	Ali kana sila moolu la, mennu si balajaatoo faa noo, bari ì te niyo faa noo la. Bari ali si sila Alla la, meŋ si niyo niŋ balajaatoo bee kasaara noo Jahannaba kono.
40010029	Fo jaataliŋ fula buka waafi koparoo la baŋ? Bari hani wo, hani kiliŋ te boyi la bankoo to, niŋ a maŋ ke ali Faamaa la lafoo ti.
40010030	Hani ali kuntiñoolu bee yaateeta le.
40010031	Wo to ali kana sila! Alitolu la nafaa le warata ka tambi jaataliŋ jamaalu la.
40010032	“Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye nte la kuwo seedeyaa moolu ñaatiliŋo la, nte fanaa be wo maarii la kuwo seedeyaa la m Faamaa ñaatiliŋo la le, meŋ be Arijana.
40010033	Bari niŋ moo-wo-moo balanta nte ma moolu ñaatiliŋo la, nte fanaa be balaŋ na wo maarii ma le m Faamaa ñaatiliŋo la, meŋ be Arijana.
40010034	“Ali kana a miira ko, nte naata kayiroo le naati ñiŋ duniyaa kono. Nte maŋ naa ka kayiroo naati, bari hawusaroo.
40010035	Kaatu nte naata le ka kewo niŋ a faamaa kuntundi, ka dimmusoo niŋ a baamaa kuntundi, aniŋ ka futuumusoo niŋ a bitammusoo kuntundi.
40010036	Aduŋ moo fansuŋ dimbaayaalu be ke la a jawoolu le ti.
40010037	Wo kamma la moo meŋ ye a faamaa waraŋ a baamaa kanu ka tambi nte la, wo maarii maŋ jari ka ke n na saayiboo ti. Aduŋ moo meŋ ye a dinkewo waraŋ a dimmusoo kanu ka tambi nte la, wo maarii maŋ jari ka ke n na saayiboo ti.
40010038	Moo meŋ maŋ a la yiribantambiloo bataa duni ka n nooma, wo maarii maŋ jari ka ke n na saayiboo ti.
40010039	Moo meŋ ye a niyo tankandi, wo maarii be foo la a la le, bari moo meŋ foota a niyo la nte la kuwo kamma, wo maarii be a soto la le.
40010040	“Moo meŋ ye ali jiyandi, wo ye nte le jiyandi, aduŋ moo meŋ ye nte jiyandi, wo maarii ye Alla le jiyandi, meŋ ye nte kii.
40010041	Moo meŋ ye annabiyomoo jiyandi, kaatu a mu annabiyomoo le ti, wo be annabiyomoo la joo le soto la. Aduŋ moo meŋ ye moo tilindiŋo jiyandi, kaatu a mu moo tilindiŋo le ti, wo be moo tilindiŋo la joo le soto la.
40010042	Moo-wo-moo meŋ ye hani jii sumaa pootoo dii ñiŋ domandiŋolu hani kiliŋ na, kaatu a mu n na saayiboo le ti, tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, wo te foo la a la joo la muk.”
40011001	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye yaamaroolu dii a la saayibe taŋ niŋ fuloo la fokabaŋ, a tententa saatewolu to karandiroo niŋ kawandoo la wo tundoo kaŋ.
40011002	Biriŋ Yaayaa ye a moyi bunjawoo kono, Kiristu be meŋ ke kaŋ, a ye a la saayiboolu kii a kaŋ
40011003	ka a ñininkaa ko, “Fo ite le mu wo ti baŋ, meŋ ñanta naa la, waraŋ fo ǹ si doo koteŋ batu?”
40011004	Wo to le Yeesu ye ì jaabi ko, “Ali muru Yaayaa kaŋ. Ali ye a fo a ye, ali ye kuwolu mennu moyi, aniŋ ali ye mennu je:
40011005	Finkintewolu ñaalu yeleta, namatoolu taamata, balajawutoolu kendeyaata, tulu sukiriŋolu ye moyiroo ke, furewolu wulita, aniŋ kibaari betoo kawandita fuwaaroolu ye.
40011006	Barakoo be moo le ye, meŋ maŋ hakili fula soto nte la kuwo to.”
40011007	Kabiriŋ Yaayaa la saayiboolu be muru kaŋ, Yeesu ye a dati ka Yaayaa la kuwo fo kafoo ye ko, “Ali taata muŋ ne juubee keñewuloo kono? Fo baakintoo le mu baŋ, foñoo ka meŋ jiijaa?
40011008	Ali taata muŋ ne juubee? Fo kewo meŋ ye duŋ feŋ ñiimaalu duŋ baŋ? Ali ye a loŋ ne ko, feetoofata ñiimaa dunnaalu be mansabuŋolu le kono.
40011009	Ali taata muŋ ne juubee? Ka annabiyomoo juubee baŋ? Haa, m be a fo la ali ye, a tambita annabiyomoo faŋo la le.
40011010	Ñiŋ ne la kuwo be safeeriŋ ko: ‘A fele, ŋa n na kiilaa kii ite ñaato le, meŋ be i la siloo parendi la i ye.’
40011011	“Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, moo nene maŋ soto hadamadiŋolu kono, meŋ na kuwo warata ka tambi Yaayaa Batiseerilaa la. Bari hani meŋ na kuwo dooyaata moolu bee ti Arijana mansabaayaa kono, wo le la kuwo warata ka tambi Yaayaa la.
40011012	Ka bo Yaayaa Batiseerilaa la luŋolu la ka naa fo saayiŋ, Arijana mansabaayaa toorata jawuke, aduŋ moo saŋarariŋolu lafita ka a buusi.
40011013	Musa la Luwaa niŋ annabiyomoolu la kitaaboolu bee ye kiilaariyaa kumoo fo le ka naa fo Yaayaa la naa,
40011014	aduŋ niŋ ali be soŋ na wo la: Ate le mu Eliya ti, meŋ ñanta naa la.
40011015	Meŋ ye tuloo soto, a si a moyi.
40011016	“N si ñiŋ jamaanoo misaali muŋ ne la? A ka munta le ko dindiŋolu mennu be siiriŋ marisewo to, ì be ì tuluŋñoolu kumandi kaŋ
40011017	ko, ‘Ŋà footaŋo fee ali ye le, bari ali maŋ i doŋ. Ŋà saŋo woosii, bari ali maŋ kumboo!’
40011018	Kaatu Yaayaa naata le, a buka domoroo ke, sako a si i miŋ, aduŋ ì ko, ‘A ye seetaani jawoo le soto.’
40011019	Moo Dinkewo naata le, a ka domoroo ke, a ka i miŋ, silaŋ ì ko, ‘A juubee, konomoo le mu, aniŋ dolominnaa, duwaañoolu niŋ junubelaalu teeroo!’ Bari ñaameŋo ka suutee ka bo niŋ a la baara kuwolu le la.”
40011020	Wo to le Yeesu ye a dati ka saatewolu jalayi, a ye a la kaawakuu jamaalu ke daameŋ, kaatu ì maŋ tuubi ì la junuboolu la.
40011021	A ko, “Kooroo be alitolu Korasininkoolu ye! Kooroo be alitolu Betisayidankoolu ye! Kaatu kaawakuwolu mennu keta nuŋ ali la saatewolu kono, niŋ a ye a tara, wolu keta Tire niŋ Sidoni saatewolu le kono, tennuŋ ì banta booto funtoolu duŋ, ì ye seebuutoo maa, ka ì la tuuboo yitandi.
40011022	Bari m be a fo la ali ye, kiitiiluŋo la, kuwo be sooneeyaa la Tire niŋ Sidoni le ye ka tambi alitolu la.
40011023	Aduŋ alitolu Kapanawumunkoolu, fo alitolu be duŋ na Arijana kono le baŋ? Hanii, alitolu be fayi la Jahannaba le kono, kaatu kaawakuwolu mennu keta nuŋ alitolu yaa, niŋ a ye a tara, wolu keta nuŋ Sodomu le, tennuŋ a be tara la looriŋ ne fo bii.
40011024	Wo kamma la, m be a fo la ali ye, kiitiiluŋo be sooneeyaa la Sodomu le ye ka tambi alitolu la.”
40011025	Wo waatoo la, Yeesu ye a bankee ko, “M Faamaa, saŋo niŋ bankoo Maariyo, ŋa i jayi, kaatu i ye ñiŋ kuwolu maabo moo ñaamendiŋolu niŋ londitiyolu la, aduŋ i naata wolu yitandi dindiŋ mereŋolu la.
40011026	Tooñaa, m Faamaa, ñiŋ ne beteyaata i fee.
40011027	“M Faamaa ye kuwolu bee duŋ nte le bulu. Moo maŋ Dinkewo loŋ fo a Faamaa doroŋ, aniŋ moo maŋ Faamaa loŋ fo a Dinkewo doroŋ, aniŋ Dinkewo be moo meŋ tomboŋ na ka a londi a Faamaa la.
40011028	Ali naa nte kaŋ, alitolu bee mennu ye bataa soto aniŋ duni kuliŋo. M be ali dahandi la le.
40011029	Ali n na yookoo duni aniŋ ali kuwolu karaŋ m bulu, kaatu ŋa tenkuŋo niŋ fammajiyo soto n sondomoo kono le, aduŋ ali niyolu be dahaa la le.
40011030	Kaatu n na yookoo sooneeyaata le, aduŋ n na dunoo maŋ kuliyaa.”
40012001	Loobula Luŋ doo le la, Yeesu be tambi kaŋ siimaŋ kunkoolu la. Konkoo be a la saayiboolu la. Bituŋ ì ye a dati ka siimaŋ tinsoolu buusi ka ì domo.
40012002	Farisee doolu ye wo je, ì ko a ye ko, “A juubee, i la saayiboolu ka kuwo ke, Luwaa ye meŋ haraamuyandi ka a ke Loobula Luŋo la!”
40012003	A ko ì ye ko, “Fo ali nene maŋ a karaŋ, Mansa Dawuda ye meŋ ke, kabiriŋ konkoo ye a muta, a niŋ a taañoolu?
40012004	A dunta Alla Batudulaa Buŋo kono ñaameŋ ka mbuuru senuŋo domo, piriisoolu doroŋ ñanta meŋ domo la, aduŋ Luwaa ye wo haraamuyandi ate ye le aniŋ a taañoolu.
40012005	Waraŋ fo ali nene maŋ a karaŋ Luwaa kono ko, piriisoolu mennu be Alla Batudulaa Buŋo kono dookuwo la Loobula Luŋo la, ì ye Loobula Luŋo luwaa tiñaa le, bari a maŋ ke kuu jawoo ti?
40012006	Bari m be a fo la ali ye, moo le be jaŋ, meŋ na kuwo warata ka tambi Alla Batudulaa Buŋo la.
40012007	Niŋ ali ye a loŋ, muŋ ne mu ñiŋ kumoo kotoo ti, ‘N na lafoo mu balafaa le ti, a maŋ ke sadaa ti,’ wo to ali te moolu tuumi la, mennu maŋ feŋ ke.
40012008	Moo Dinkewo le mu Loobula Luŋo Maariyo ti.”
40012009	Yeesu bota jee, a taata ì la diina bendulaa to.
40012010	Kewo doo tarata jee, meŋ buloo faata. Bituŋ ì ye Yeesu ñininkaa, fo ì si a tuumi noo ko, “Fo Luwaa sonta le baŋ ka moo kendeyandi Loobula Luŋo la?”
40012011	A ye ì jaabi ko, “Moo jumaa le be alitolu kono, niŋ a ye saajii kiliŋ soto, aduŋ wo naata boyi dinkoo kono Loobula Luŋo la, a te a muta la ka a bondi jee?
40012012	Wo to, siiñaa jelu le hadamadiŋo la kuwo tambita saajiyo la? Wo kamma la Luwaa sonta le ka kuu betoo ke Loobula Luŋo la.”
40012013	Bituŋ a ko kewo ye ko, “I buloo tilindi!” Kewo ye a buloo tilindi, aduŋ a seyita a ñaama, ko doo be ñaameŋ.
40012014	Farisewolu fintita banta ka jamfaa siti a kamma, ì be a faa la ñaameŋ.
40012015	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye ñiŋ kuwo kalamuta, a bota jee. Moo jamaa ye a nooma, aduŋ a ye ì la saasaatoolu bee kendeyandi.
40012016	A ye ì dandalaa ko, ì kana soŋ moo-wo-moo ye a la kuwo moyi.
40012017	Ñiŋ ye Annabilayi Yesaya la kumoo le timmandi ko:
40012018	“N na dookuulaa fele, ŋa meŋ tomboŋ, n kanuntewo, n niyo seewoota meŋ na kuwo to. M be n na Nooroo jindi la a kaŋ ne, aduŋ a be kiitii tilindiŋo bankee la bankoolu kaŋ ne.
40012019	A te sonkoo ke la waraŋ ka wuuri, sako moo si a kaŋo moyi mbeedoolu kaŋ.
40012020	A te ñaama kala nukujiriŋo kati la, aduŋ a te saraba siisiiriŋo faa la, fo niŋ a ye kiitii tilindiŋo timmandi.
40012021	Bankoolu be ì jikoo loo la a too le kaŋ.”
40012022	Wo to le ì ye seetaanitoo samba Yeesu kaŋ, meŋ finkita, aduŋ mumunewo le fanaa mu. A ye a kendeyandi. A diyaamuta, a ye jeroo ke fanaa.
40012023	Bituŋ moolu bee jaakalita, ì ko, “Kori ñiŋ ne maŋ ke Dawuda Dinkewo ti?”
40012024	Bari kabiriŋ Farisewolu ye a moyi, ì ko: “Ñiŋ kewo ka seetaani jawoolu bayi Belisibul la semboo le la, meŋ mu seetaani jawoolu la kuntiyo ti.”
40012025	Bari Yeesu ye ì la miiroolu loŋ ne. A ko ì ye ko, “Mansakundaa-wo-mansakundaa meŋ ye a faŋ talaa ka ñoo kele, a ka kasaara le. Aduŋ saatewo waraŋ dimbaayaa, meŋ ye a faŋ talaa ka ñoo kele, wo te loo noo la.
40012026	Niŋ seetaanoo ka seetaanoo bayi, a ye a faŋ ne talaa. Wo to a la mansayaa be loo la ñaadii le?
40012027	Aduŋ niŋ nte ka seetaani jawoolu bayi ka bo niŋ Belisibul le la, wo to alitolu dinkewolu ka ì bayi ka bo niŋ jumaa le la? Wo kamma la itolu le be ke la ali kiitindilaalu ti.
40012028	Bari niŋ n ka seetaani jawoolu bayi niŋ Alla la Nooroo le la, wo to Alla la mansabaayaa naata ali kaŋ ne.
40012029	“Fo moo si duŋ noo kee sembemaa la buŋo kono ka a la sotofeŋolu buusi a la, fo niŋ a ye wo kee sembemaa siti foloo? Wo to le a si a la sotofeŋolu buusi noo a la.
40012030	“Moo meŋ maŋ tara m fee, wo balanta nte ma le. Aduŋ meŋ niŋ nte maŋ kafuroo ke ñoo ma, wo ka a janjaŋ ne.
40012031	Wo kamma la m be a fo la ali ye, yamfoo be ke la junuboolu bee la le, aniŋ tooñeeroolu, bari ka Noora Kuliŋo tooñee, wo nene te yamfa la.
40012032	Moo-wo-moo meŋ ye kuma jawoo fo ka balaŋ Moo Dinkewo ma, wo be yamfa la le. Bari moo-wo-moo meŋ ye kuma jawoo fo ka balaŋ Noora Kuliŋo ma, wo te yamfoo soto la muk, ñiŋ jamaanoo kono waraŋ laakira.
40012033	“Niŋ yiroo beteyaata, a diŋo be beteyaa la le, bari niŋ yiroo maŋ beteyaa, a diŋo te beteyaa la. Bayiri yiroo ka loŋ a diŋo le la.
40012034	Alitolu daŋari koorewo! Alitolu moo jawoolu si kuma betoo fo noo ñaadii le? Sondomoo be faariŋ meŋ na, daa ka wo le fo.
40012035	Moo betoo ka kuu betoolu le fintindi ka bo a sondomoo kono, meŋ be faariŋ beteyaa la. Aduŋ moo jawoo ka kuu jawoolu le fintindi ka bo a sondomoo kono, meŋ be faariŋ jawuyaa la.
40012036	Ŋa a fo ali ye, kiitiiluŋo la moolu be kiitindi la kuma kenseŋ-wo-kuma kenseŋ na le, ì ye meŋ fo ì daa la.
40012037	Kaatu i la kumoolu le be i tilindi la, aduŋ i la kumoolu le be i halaki la.”
40012038	Luwaa karammoo doolu niŋ Farisewolu ko Yeesu ye ko, “Karammoo, n lafita taamanseeroo le je la ite bulu.”
40012039	Bari a ye ì jaabi ko, “Ñiŋ jamaani jawoo meŋ jenketa Alla ma, a ka taamanseeroo le ñini. Bari taamanseeri te yitandi la a la, fo Annabilayi Yunusa la taamanseeroo doroŋ.
40012040	Ko Yunusa tarata ñee baa konoo kono tili saba aniŋ suuto saba, wo ñaa kiliŋo la, Moo Dinkewo be tara la bankoo kono fo tili saba aniŋ suuto saba.
40012041	Ninewenkoolu niŋ ñiŋ jamaanoo be wuli la kiitiiluŋo la, aduŋ ì be ñiŋ jamaanoo tuumi la. Kaatu itolu tuubita ì la junuboolu la le ka bo niŋ Yunusa la kawandoo la. Aduŋ a juubee, meŋ na kuwo warata Yunusa ti, a fele.
40012042	Seba musumansoo niŋ ñiŋ jamaanoo be wuli la kiitiiluŋo la le, aduŋ a be ñiŋ jamaanoo tuumi la, kaatu a bota naŋ kabiriŋ duniyaa daŋo to ka Mansa Sulemani la ñaameŋo lamoyi. Aduŋ a juubee, meŋ na kuwo warata Sulemani ti, a fele.
40012043	“Niŋ seetaani jawoo bota moo kono, a ka taa dulaa jaaroolu le to ka sabatidulaa ñini, bari a buka a soto.
40012044	A si naa a fo a faŋ ye ko, ‘M be muru la n na buŋo to le, m bota naŋ daameŋ.’ Aduŋ niŋ a naata, a si a tara kenseŋyaariŋ, a be fitariŋ aniŋ a be temberiŋ fanaa.
40012045	Bituŋ a si taa ka seetaani jawu woorowula naati, mennu jawuyaata ka tambi ate faŋo la. Ì ye duŋ a kono ka sabati jee. Wo maarii alihaali labaŋo le ka jawuyaa ka tambi foloo la. Ñiŋ jamaani jawoo fanaa be ke la wo le ñaama.”
40012046	Kabiriŋ Yeesu be diyaamu kaŋ moolu ye, a baamaa niŋ a doomaalu be looriŋ banta. Ì lafita ka diyaamu a ye.
40012047	Bituŋ kewo doo ko a ye ko, “A juubee! I baamaa niŋ i doomaalu be looriŋ banta, ì lafita ka diyaamu i ye.”
40012048	Bari Yeesu ye a jaabi ko, “Jumaa le mu nte baamaa ti, aniŋ jumaalu le mu m baadiŋolu ti?”
40012049	Bituŋ a ye a buloo coodi a la saayiboolu la, aduŋ a ko, “M baamaa niŋ m baadiŋolu fele jaŋ.
40012050	Moo-wo-moo meŋ ka m Faamaa la lafoo ke, meŋ be Arijana, wo le mu m baadinkewo ti, m baarimmusoo aniŋ m baamaa.”
40013001	Wo luŋ kiliŋo la, Yeesu fintita buŋo kono, a taata sii baa daala.
40013002	Moo jamaa kuruta a la. Wo kamma la a bulata kuluŋo kono ka sii jee. Kafoo bee naata loo baa daala.
40013003	Yeesu ye feŋ jamaa fo ì ye mansaaloo kono. A ko, “Fiirilaa kiliŋ ne taata fiiroo la.
40013004	Kabiriŋ a be fiiroo la, kese doolu jolonta moolu la tambidulaa to. Bituŋ kunoolu naata, ì ye ì domo.
40013005	Kese doolu jolonta beroolu le kaŋ, ì maŋ banku jamaa soto daameŋ. Ì falinta tariyaake, kaatu bankoo maŋ siyaa jee.
40013006	Kabiriŋ tiloo malata, ì norota, aduŋ baawo ì suloolu maŋ jamfa bankoo kono, ì naata jaa.
40013007	Kese doolu jolonta ŋaniŋolu kono. Kabiriŋ ŋaniŋolu menta, ì ye ì dete, ì faata.
40013008	Bari kese doolu jolonta banku betoo le kaŋ. Ì naata diŋ, doolu siidulaa keme, doolu taŋ wooro aniŋ doolu taŋ saba.
40013009	Meŋ ye tuloo soto, a si a moyi.”
40013010	Bituŋ saayiboolu naata Yeesu kaŋ, ì ko a ye ko, “Muŋ ne ye a tinna i ka diyaamu ì ye niŋ mansaaloolu la?”
40013011	A ye ì jaabi ko, “Arijana mansabaayaa kulloolu diita alitolu la le ka ì loŋ, bari ì maŋ dii itolu la.
40013012	Moo meŋ ye feŋ soto, doo be dii la wo le la, aduŋ a be jamaa baa le soto la. Bari moo meŋ maŋ feŋ soto, a ye meŋ faŋo soto, wo be buusi la a la le.
40013013	Kaatu ì ka juubeeroo ke le, bari ì buka jeroo ke. Ì ka lamoyiroo ke le, bari ì buka moyiroo ke, sako ì si fahaamuroo ke.
40013014	Annabilayi Yesaya la kumoo timmata ì la kuwo to le, a ye meŋ fo ko: ‘Ali be lamoyiroo ke la le, bari ali te a fahaamu la. Ali be juubeeroo ke la le, bari ali te feŋ je la.
40013015	Kaatu ñiŋ moolu sondomoolu bee jaata le. Ì buka moyiroo ke noo baake ì tuloolu la, aduŋ ì ye ì ñaalu biti le. Niŋ wo nte, ì be jeroo ke la ì ñaalu la le, ì ye moyiroo ke ì tuloolu la, aduŋ ì be fahaamuroo ke la ì sondomoolu la le ka naa muru nte kaŋ, fo n si ì kendeyandi.’
40013016	“Bari barakoo be alitolu ñaalu niŋ ali tuloolu ye le, kaatu ali ye jeroo ke le, aniŋ ali ye moyiroo ke le fanaa.
40013017	Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, annabiyomu jamaa aniŋ moo tilindiŋolu hameta ka kuwolu je, ali ye mennu je, bari ì maŋ ì je. Aduŋ ì hameta ka kuwolu moyi, ali ye mennu moyi, bari ì maŋ ì moyi.
40013018	“Saayiŋ, ali fiirilaa la mansaaloo kotoo lamoyi.
40013019	Niŋ moo meŋ ye mansabaayaa kumoo moyi, aduŋ a maŋ a fahaamu, Seetaanoo si naa a buusi a la, meŋ fiita a sondomoo kono. Ñiŋ ne mu kesoo ti, meŋ jolonta moolu la tambidulaa to.
40013020	Meŋ jolonta beroolu kaŋ, wo ka moo la kuwo le yitandi, meŋ ye kumoo moyi, aduŋ wo loo niŋ baroo teema a seewooriŋo ye a muta.
40013021	Bari bayiri kumoo maŋ suloo duŋ a sondomoo kono, a si muña fo waatindiŋ. Niŋ bataa niŋ koleyaa kuwolu naata a kaŋ kumoo kamma la, jee niŋ jee doroŋ, a si badali.
40013022	Meŋ jolonta ŋaniŋolu kono, wo ka moo la kuwo le yitandi, meŋ ye kumoo moyi, bari duniyaa la bataa kuwolu niŋ naafuloolu ñaaboo ye kumoo dete a kono. Bituŋ kumoo maŋ naa nafaa soto.
40013023	Bari meŋ jolonta banku betoo kaŋ, wo ka moo la kuwo le yitandi, meŋ ye kumoo moyi, aduŋ a ye a fahaamu. Wo kesoo le ka faliŋ ka diŋolu bondi, doolu siidulaa keme, doolu siidulaa taŋ wooro aniŋ doolu siidulaa taŋ saba.”
40013024	Yeesu ye mansaali doo fanaa fo ì ye, a ko, “Arijana mansabaayaa ka munta le ko kewo, meŋ ye siimaŋ kese betoolu fii a la kunkoo kono.
40013025	Bari moolu be siinoo kaŋ waatoo meŋ na, a jawoo naata, a ye ñaamoolu fii a la fiifeŋolu kono. Bituŋ a taata.
40013026	Kabiriŋ fiifeŋolu falinta aniŋ ì ye tinsoolu bondi, ñaamoolu fanaa naata finti ì kono.
40013027	Bituŋ kunkutiyo la dookuulaalu naata, ì ko a ye ko, ‘Alifaa, fo i maŋ siimaŋ kese betoolu le fii i la kunkoo kono baŋ? Saayiŋ a ye ñaamoolu soto ñaadii le?’
40013028	A ye ì jaabi ko, ‘N jawoo le ye ñiŋ ke!’ Bituŋ dookuulaalu ko a ye ko, ‘Fo i lafita le, ŋà taa ì wutu baŋ?’
40013029	Bari a ko, ‘Hanii, kaatu niŋ ali be ñaamoolu wutu kaŋ, ali be siimaŋolu fanaa wutu la ñoo la le.
40013030	Ali ì bee bula, ì ye meŋ ñoo la fo katiri waatoo. Katiri waatoo la, m be a fo la katirilaalu ye le, ì si ñaamoolu foloo kafu ñoo ma, ì ye ì siti ka ì jani. Bari ì si siimaŋo kafu ñoo ma n na buntuŋo kono.’ ”
40013031	Yeesu ye mansaali doo fanaa fo ì ye ko, “Arijana mansabaayaa ka munta le ko mutaari kesoo, kewo ye meŋ taa, a ye a fii a la kunkoo kono.
40013032	Ate le dooyaata fiifeŋ kesoolu bee ti, bari niŋ a falinta, ate le ka naa wara ka tambi naaki fiifeŋolu bee la. A ye naa ke yiroo ti fo kunoolu ye naa, ì ye ñaŋolu laa a buloolu kaŋ.”
40013033	Yeesu ye mansaali doo fanaa fo ì ye ko, “Arijana mansabaayaa ka munta le ko leweñoo, musoo ye meŋ taa, a ye a niŋ fariña paani saba nooni, leweñoo ye ñiŋ fariñoo bee selendi.”
40013034	Bituŋ Yeesu ye ñiŋ kuwolu bee fo moolu ye mansaaloolu le kono. A maŋ feŋ fo ì ye, meŋ maŋ tara mansaaloo kono.
40013035	Ñiŋ keta le ka annabiyomoo la kumoo timmandi ko: “M be diyaamu la niŋ mansaaloolu le la. M be kuwolu le bankee la, mennu be maaboriŋ, kabiriŋ duniyaa daa waatoo la.”
40013036	Wo to le Yeesu ye kafoo bula jee, a taata buŋo kono. Bituŋ a la saayiboolu naata a kaŋ ka a fo a ye, “Ñiŋ kunkukono ñaamoo la mansaaloo firiŋ ǹ ye.”
40013037	A ye ì jaabi ko, “Moo meŋ ye kese betoolu fii, wo le mu Moo Dinkewo ti.
40013038	Kunkoo mu duniyaa le ti, aduŋ kese betoolu mu Alla la mansabaayaa diŋolu le ti. Ñaamoo mu Seetaani noomalankoolu le ti.
40013039	Jawoo meŋ ye ì fii, wo mu Seetaanoo le ti. Katiri waatoo mu duniyaa bandulaa le ti, aduŋ katirilaalu mu malaayikoolu le ti.
40013040	Ko ñaamoo kafuta ñoo ma ka jani dimbaa kono ñaameŋ, a be ke la wo le ñaama duniyaa labandulaa to.
40013041	Moo Dinkewo be a la malaayikoolu kii la naŋ ne, aduŋ ì be moolu mennu ka moo doolu duŋ junuboo to, aniŋ junubelaalu kafu la ñoo ma le, ka ì bee bondi a la mansabaayaa kono.
40013042	Malaayikoolu be ì fayi la fuuri dimbaa wuleŋo le kono, kumboo niŋ nimisoo be daameŋ.
40013043	Bituŋ moo tilindiŋolu si malamala ko tiloo ì Faamaa la mansabaayaa kono. Meŋ ye tuloo soto, a si a moyi.
40013044	“Arijana mansabaayaa ka munta le ko naafuloo meŋ be maaboriŋ kunkoo kono. Kabiriŋ kewo ye a je, a naata a maabo kuu jee. A niŋ seewoo taata, a ye a la sotofeŋolu bee waafi, bituŋ a ye wo kunkoo saŋ.
40013045	“Arijana mansabaayaa ka munta le ko safaarilaa meŋ be pemoo ñini kaŋ.
40013046	Kabiriŋ a ye pemoo je, meŋ nafaa warata baake, a taata a la sotofeŋolu bee waafi, bituŋ a ye a saŋ.
40013047	“Arijana mansabaayaa ka munta le fanaa ko jaloo, ì ye meŋ fayi baa kono. A ye ñee siifaa bee muta.
40013048	Kabiriŋ a faata, kewolu naata a saba tintoo kaŋ. Ì siita ka ñee betoolu bondi ka ì ke keraŋolu kono, ì ye kaatibaloolu fayi.
40013049	A be ke la wo le ñaama duniyaa labandulaa to. Malaayikoolu be naa la ka moo jawoolu bondi moo tilindiŋolu kono,
40013050	aduŋ ì be ì fayi la fuuri dimbaa wuleŋo le kono, kumboo niŋ nimisoo be daameŋ.”
40013051	Wo to le Yeesu ye ì ñininkaa ko, “Fo ali ye ñiŋ bee fahaamu le baŋ?” Ì ye a jaabi ko, “Haa.”
40013052	Bituŋ a ko ì ye ko, “Luwaa karammoo-wo-Luwaa karammoo meŋ keta Arijana mansabaayaa la saayiboo ti, a ka munta le ko koridaatiyo, meŋ ka feŋ kutoolu niŋ feŋ kotoolu fintindi ka bo a la maaboridulaa.”
40013053	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye ñiŋ mansaaloolu baŋ fo la, a bota jee.
40013054	A taata a fansuŋ saatewo to. A ye karandiroo ke ì la diina bendulaa to fo moolu jaakalita. Ì ko, “Ñiŋ kewo ye ñiŋ ñaameŋo niŋ semboo soto mintoo le ka ñiŋ kaawakuwolu ke?
40013055	Fo ñiŋ maŋ ke wo kapintaa dinkewo ti baŋ? Fo a baamaa maŋ ke Mariyaama le ti, aniŋ fo a doomaalu maŋ ke Yankuba, Yusufa, Simoni niŋ Yudas le ti baŋ?
40013056	Fo a baarimmusoolu bee maŋ tara m̀ fee jaŋ baŋ? Wo to ñiŋ kewo ye ñiŋ bee soto mintoo le?”
40013057	Wo kamma la ì balanta a ma. Bari Yeesu ko ì ye ko, “Annabiyomoo maŋ dasa horomoo la fo a fansuŋ saatewo to, aniŋ a fansuŋ dimbaayaa kono.”
40013058	Ì la lannabaliyaa kamma la, a maŋ kaawakuu jamaa ke jee.
40014001	Wo waatoo la Mansa Herodi naata Yeesu la darajoo kibaaroo moyi.
40014002	A ko a la dookuulaalu ye ko, “Ñiŋ mu Yaayaa Batiseerilaa le ti. A wulita saayaa kono le. Wo le ye a tinna a ye semboo soto ka ñiŋ kaawakuwolu ke.”
40014003	Bayiri a ye yaamaroo dii le nunto ko, ì ye Yaayaa muta, ì ye a sitiriŋo soroŋ bunjawoo kono. A ye ñiŋ ke Herodiyas la kuwo le kamma, meŋ mu a kotoomaa Filipi la musoo ti,
40014004	kaatu Yaayaa ka a fo Herodi ye le nuŋ ko, “Luwaa maŋ soŋ, i ye i kotoo la musoo taa a bulu ka a futuu.”
40014005	Herodi lafita le nuŋ ka Yaayaa faa, bari a maŋ haañi moolu la, kaatu wolu ye Yaayaa muta annabiyomoo le ti.
40014006	Bari kabiriŋ Herodi be a wuluu luŋo juura kaŋ, Herodiyas dimmusoo ye i doŋ luntaŋolu ñaatiliŋo la, meŋ keta niidiyaa kuu baa ti Herodi ye.
40014007	Wo kamma la a ye kaloo niŋ laahidoo ke ko, a be feŋ-wo-feŋ dii la a la le, a ye meŋ daani a bulu.
40014008	Sunkutoo baamaa ye a sukusuku, fo a naata ka Herodi daani ko, “Yaayaa Batiseerilaa kuŋo dii n na palaatoo kaŋ jaŋ.”
40014009	Mansa sunuta ñaa-wo-ñaa, bari a la kaloo niŋ luntaŋolu kamma la a ye a yaamari ko, a ñanta dii la le.
40014010	Bituŋ a ye yaamaroo dii ka Yaayaa kuŋo kuntu bunjawoo kono,
40014011	aduŋ ì ye a kuŋo samba palaatoo kaŋ sunkutoo ye. A naata a samba a baamaa ye.
40014012	Wo koolaa Yaayaa la saayiboolu naata ka furewo samba, ì ye a baadee. Wo to le ì taata ka a fo Yeesu ye.
40014013	Kabiriŋ Yeesu ye ñiŋ moyi, a bota jee. A dunta kuluŋo kono ka taa dulaa kiideeriŋo to. Bari kabiriŋ moolu ye wo moyi, ì ye a nooma siŋo la ka bo ì la saatewolu to.
40014014	A be futa kaŋ baa kankuŋo la doroŋ, a ye kafu baa je. A balafaata ì ye, aduŋ a ye ì la kuurantoolu kendeyandi.
40014015	Kabiriŋ wulaaroo siita, a la saayiboolu naata a kaŋ ka a fo a ye ko, “Jaŋ mu dulaa kiideeriŋo le ti, aduŋ suwo kuuta le. Wo kamma la moolu bula, ì ye taa saatewolu kono ka domoroo saŋ ì faŋolu ye.”
40014016	Yeesu ko ì ye ko, “Ì maŋ suula ka taa. Ali faŋo si domoroo dii ì la.”
40014017	Bari saayiboolu ye a jaabi ko, “Mbuuru kuŋ luulu doroŋ ne be m̀ bulu jaŋ, aniŋ ñee muru fula!”
40014018	Bituŋ a ko, “Ali ì samba n ye naŋ jaŋ.”
40014019	Wo to le a ye kafoo yaamari ka sii ñaamoo kaŋ. A ye mbuuru kuŋ luuloo niŋ ñee muru fuloo taa. A ye santo juubee, a ye Alla daani ka domoroo barakandi. Wo koolaa, a ye mbuuru kuŋolu kuntu, a ye ì dii saayiboolu la. Bituŋ saayiboolu ye ì dii moolu la.
40014020	Aduŋ ì bee ye domoroo ke, fo ì konoo faata. Bituŋ saayiboolu ye sinsiŋ taŋ niŋ fula le fandi mbuuru kuntu toolu la, mennu tuta jee.
40014021	Moolu, mennu ye domoroo ke, wolu mu kee wuli luulu ñoŋ ne ti, mennu niŋ musoolu niŋ dindiŋolu maŋ kiliŋ.
40014022	Wo koolaa doroŋ, Yeesu ye saayiboolu yaamari ka bula kuluŋo kono ka taa a ñaato baa kara doo la. Bituŋ a naata kafoo bula, ì taata.
40014023	A la kafoo bulariŋ koolaa, a faŋo taata konkoo santo ka duwaa. Kabiriŋ wulaaroo siita, ate doroŋ ne tarata jee.
40014024	Wo waatoo la, kuluŋo jamfata baake tintoo la le. Jiibaliŋolu be a busa kaŋ, aduŋ foñoo maŋ ì diyaa.
40014025	Duntuŋ kumoo maafaŋo la Yeesu naata ì kaŋ, a be taama kaŋ baajiyo kaŋ.
40014026	Kabiriŋ saayiboolu ye a je taama kaŋ jiyo kaŋ, ì silata baake le, ì ko, “Mañamafeŋ kaawakuuyaariŋo le mu!” Aduŋ ì wuurita santo silaŋo kamma la.
40014027	Bari wo loo niŋ baroo teema, a diyaamuta ì ye ko, “Ali kijoo kana fara, nte le mu, ali kana sila.”
40014028	Bituŋ Pita ye a jaabi ko, “M Maarii, niŋ ite le mu, n yaamari ka taama baajiyo kaŋ ka naa i yaa.”
40014029	Yeesu ko a ye, “Naa!” Wo to le Pita fintita kuluŋo kono, a taamata jiyo kaŋ ka naa Yeesu kaŋ.
40014030	Bari kabiriŋ a ye foñoo la waroo je, a silata. A datita ka tuneŋ, a wuurita ko, “M Maarii, n kiisa!”
40014031	Wo loo niŋ baroo teema Yeesu ye a buloo ŋaaba ka a muta. A ko a ye ko, “Ite lanna dooyaariŋo, muŋ ne ye a tinna i ye hakili fula soto?”
40014032	Ì dunta kuluŋo kono doroŋ, foñoo tenkunta.
40014033	Bituŋ mennu be kuluŋo kono sujudita a ye ka a batu. Ì ko, “Tooñaa, ite le mu Alla Dinkewo ti!”
40014034	Kabiriŋ a niŋ a la saayiboolu teyita, ì jiita Kennesareti tundoo le la.
40014035	Jee moolu naata a suutee, ì ye kiilaa kii wo tundoo bee kaŋ. Bituŋ ì ye kuurantoolu bee naati a ye.
40014036	Ì ye a daani, fo kuurantoolu si a la waramba tuloo doroŋ maa. Aduŋ mennu bee ye a maa, ì kendeyaata le.
40015001	Wo to le Farisewolu niŋ Luwaa karammoolu naata Yeesu kaŋ ka bo Yerusalaamu. Ì ko a ye ko,
40015002	“Muŋ ne ye a tinna ite la saayiboolu ka alifaalu la aadoo tiñaa? Ì buka ì buloolu kuu, janniŋ ì be domoroo ke la.”
40015003	Bituŋ Yeesu ye ì jaabi ko, “Alitolu duŋ, muŋ ne ye a tinna ali ka Alla la Luwaa tiñaa ali la aadoolu kamma la?
40015004	Kaatu Alla ko, ‘I faamaa niŋ i baamaa horoma’, aduŋ ‘Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye kuma jawoo fo a faamaa waraŋ a baamaa ma, wo maarii ñanta le ka faa.’
40015005	Bari alitolu ko, moo si a fo noo a faamaa waraŋ a baamaa ye le ko, ‘Nte ye meŋ-wo-meŋ soto, n ñanta meŋ dii la ali la, ŋa wo bee dii Alla le la sadaa ti.’
40015006	Wo to alitolu ka moolu karandi ñiŋ ne la ko, moo maŋ ñaŋ na a faamaa waraŋ a baamaa horoma la. Wo to ali ye Alla la kumoo soosoo le ali la aadoo kamma la.
40015007	Alitolu bunaafayoolu! Annabilayi Yesaya ye tooñaa le fo, kabiriŋ a ye ali la kuwo fo ko:
40015008	‘Ñiŋ moolu ka m batu ì daalu doroŋ ne la, bari ì sondomoolu jamfata n na le.
40015009	Ì ka m batu kensenke le, kaatu ì la karandiroo mu yaamaroolu le ti, hadamadiŋolu ye mennu dadaa.’ ”
40015010	Wo to le Yeesu ye moolu kumandi a faŋ kaŋ, a ko ì ye ko, “Ali ì lamoyi aniŋ ali ye n na kumoolu fahaamu.
40015011	Meŋ dunta moo daa kono, wo buka moo kosondi, bari meŋ bota moo daa kono, wo le ka moo kosondi.”
40015012	Wo to le saayiboolu naata a kaŋ ka a fo a ye ko, “Fo ite maŋ a loŋ ko, Farisewolu ye i la ñiŋ kumoo muta kasi le ti, kabiriŋ ì ye a moyi?”
40015013	Bituŋ a ye ì jaabi ko, “Niŋ m Faamaa meŋ be Arijana, maŋ fiifeŋ-wo-fiifeŋ tutu, wo fiifeŋo be wutu la le.
40015014	Ali ì tu jee. Itolu mu finkintewolu le ti, mennu ka finkintewolu kenkeŋ. Niŋ finkintewo ye finkintewo kenkeŋ, ì bee be boyi la dinkoo kono le.”
40015015	Bituŋ Pita ye a jaabi ko, “Ñiŋ mansaaloo firiŋ ǹ ye.”
40015016	Bituŋ a ko ì ye ko, “Fo hani saayiŋ ali fanaa dasata fahaamuroo la le baŋ?
40015017	Fo ali maŋ a loŋ baŋ, feŋ-wo-feŋ, meŋ dunta daa kono, wo ka tambi konoo le kono, aniŋ a ye finti banta?
40015018	Bari feŋolu mennu ka bo daa kono, wolu le ka bo sondomoo kono, aduŋ wolu le ka moo kosondi.
40015019	Kaatu miira jawoolu ka bo sondomoo le kono, moofaa, jeenoo, laañooyaa tuluŋo, suuñaaroo, seedenduriyaa aniŋ tooñeeroo.
40015020	Ñinnu le mu kuwolu ti, mennu ka moo kosondi. Bari ka domoroo ke i bulu kuubaloo la, wo buka moo kosondi.”
40015021	Bituŋ Yeesu bota jee, a taata Tire niŋ Sidoni tundoo kaŋ.
40015022	Kanaaninka musoo doo le naata Yeesu kaŋ ka bo wo maafaŋo la. A sarita santo ko, “M Maariyo, Dawuda Dinkewo, balafaa soto n ye. Seetaani jawoo le be n dimmusoo la, aduŋ a ye a toorandi baake le.”
40015023	Bari Yeesu maŋ a jaabi hani kuma kiliŋ na. Wo to le a la saayiboolu naata a kaŋ, ì ye a daani ko, “A bayi, a ye taa, kaatu a be sari kaŋ ntolu nooma le.”
40015024	A ye ì jaabi ko, “Alla ye n kii Banisirayilankoolu doroŋ ne kaŋ, mennu ka munta ko saajii filiriŋolu.”
40015025	Bari musoo naata, a sujudita Yeesu ye, aduŋ a ko, “M Maariyo, m maakoyi!”
40015026	A ye a jaabi ko, “A maŋ beteyaa ka dindiŋolu la mbuuroo taa ka a fayi wulundiŋolu ye.”
40015027	Bari musoo ko a ye ko, “Haa, m Maariyo, bari wulundiŋolu fanaa ka mbuuru kuntoolu domo le, mennu jolonta ì maarii la domori taabuloo koto.”
40015028	Wo to le Yeesu ye a jaabi ko, “Ite musoo, i la lannoo warabaata le! A si ke ko ite lafita a la ñaameŋ.” Aduŋ a dimmusoo kendeyaata wo waatoo faŋo le la.
40015029	Bituŋ Yeesu bota jee, a taata Kalilee Baa to. A seleta konkoo kaŋ ka sii jee.
40015030	Aduŋ moo jamaa naata a kaŋ ì niŋ namatoolu, lanjuurutoolu, finkintewolu, mumunewolu aniŋ doo koteŋ jamaa. Ì ye ì bee samba naŋ Yeesu ñaatiliŋo la, aduŋ a ye ì kendeyandi.
40015031	Kabiriŋ moolu ye a je, mumunewolu diyaamuta, lanjuurutoolu kendeyaata, namatoolu taamata, aniŋ finkintewolu ye jeroo ke, ì jaakalita, aduŋ ì ye Banisirayila la Alla jayi.
40015032	Wo to le Yeesu ye a la saayiboolu kumandi, a ko ì ye ko, “M balafaata ñiŋ moo jamaa ye le, kaatu ì tarata nte fee le fo tili saba, aduŋ saayiŋ ì maŋ feŋ soto, ì be meŋ domo la. M maŋ lafi ka ì niŋ konkoo bula, kaatu ì si ketu noo siloo kaŋ ne.”
40015033	Bituŋ saayiboolu ko a ye ko, “M̀ be mbuuru kuŋ jamaa bo la mintoo le ñiŋ dulaa kiideeriŋo to ka ñiŋ moo jamaa bee domorindi?”
40015034	Bituŋ Yeesu ye ì ñininkaa ko, “Ali ye mbuuru kuŋ jelu le soto?” Ì ko a ye ko, “Woorowula aniŋ ñee muru dantaŋ.”
40015035	Wo to le a ye moolu yaamari ka sii bankoo to.
40015036	A ye mbuuru kuŋ woorowuloo niŋ ñee muroolu taa. A ye tenturoo dii Alla la, a ye ì kuntu, a ye ì dii saayiboolu la. Bituŋ saayiboolu ye ì dii moolu la.
40015037	Aduŋ ì bee ye domoroo ke fo ì konoolu faata. Wo to le ì ye sinsiŋ woorowula fandi mbuuru kuntoolu la, mennu tuta jee.
40015038	Moolu mennu ye domoroo ke, ì taata kaañaŋ kee wuli naani le fee, mennu niŋ musoolu niŋ dindiŋolu maŋ kiliŋ.
40015039	Wo to le a ye moolu bula ka seyi. A dunta kuluŋo kono, a naata Makadani tundoo kaŋ.
40016001	Bituŋ Farisewolu niŋ Sadusewolu naata Yeesu kaŋ ka a kotobo. Ì ye a ñininkaa, fo a si kaawakuwo yitandi ì la ka bo Arijana ka a ke taamanseeroo ti.
40016002	Bari a ye ì jaabi ko, “Niŋ wulaaroo siita, ali ka a fo le ko, ‘Minaayoo be fisiyaariŋ ne, kaatu saŋo baloo be wuleeriŋ ne.’
40016003	Aduŋ soomandaa ali ka a fo le ko, ‘Bii foñoo be wara la le, kaatu saŋo baloo be wuleeriŋ ne, aduŋ a finta le fanaa.’ Alitolu ka saŋo muluŋo le taamanseeroo suutee noo, bari ali buka waatoolu la taamanseeroo suutee noo.
40016004	Ñiŋ jamaani jawoo meŋ maŋ tiliŋ Alla ye, a ka taamanseeroo le ñini. Bari taamanseeri te dii la a la, niŋ a maŋ ke Annabilayi Yunusa la taamanseeroo ti.” Wo to le a ye ì tu jee, a taata.
40016005	Kabiriŋ saayiboolu futata baa kara doo la, ì ñinata ka mbuuroo samba ñoo la.
40016006	Yeesu ko ì ye ko, “Ali koroosiroo ke, ali ali hakiloo tu Farisewolu niŋ Sadusewolu la leweñoo to.”
40016007	Bituŋ ì ye ñiŋ kumoo kacaa ñoo ye ko, “Ǹ niŋ mbuuru le maŋ naa, wo le ye a tinna a ye ñiŋ kumoo fo.”
40016008	Bari Yeesu ye ì la kumoolu loŋ ne, a ko ì ye ko, “Alitolu moo lanna dooyaariŋolu! Muŋ ne ye a tinna ali ka a kacaa ñoo ye ko mbuuroo maŋ soto?
40016009	Fo ali maŋ fahaamuroo ke hani saayiŋ? Fo ali hakiloo maŋ bula wo mbuuru kuŋ luuloo la baŋ, kee wuli luuloo ye meŋ domo? Wo koolaa, ali ye sinsiŋ jelu le fanaa fandi mbuuru kuntu toolu la, mennu tuta jee?
40016010	Waraŋ wo mbuuru kuŋ woorowuloo, kee wuli naanoo ye meŋ domo? Wo koolaa, ali ye sinsiŋ jelu le fandi mbuuru kuntu toolu la, mennu tuta jee?
40016011	Muŋ ne ye a tinna ali maŋ ñiŋ fahaamu ko, nte maŋ tara mbuuroo la, kabiriŋ n ko, ali ali hakiloo tu Farisewolu niŋ Sadusewolu la leweñoo to?”
40016012	Wo to le saayiboolu naata a fahaamu ko, a maŋ a fo ko, ì ñanta ì hakiloo tu la mbuuru leweñoo le to, bari Farisewolu niŋ Sadusewolu la karandiroo.
40016013	Kabiriŋ Yeesu naata Sisareya-Filipi tundoo la, a ye a la saayiboolu ñininkaa ko, “Moolu ko, Moo Dinkewo mu jumaa le ti?”
40016014	Bituŋ ì ye a jaabi ko, “Doolu ko, ite mu Yaayaa Batiseerilaa le ti, doolu ko, Annabilayi Eliya, aniŋ doolu ko, Annabilayi Yeremiya waraŋ annabiyomu doo.”
40016015	A ko ì ye ko, “Bari alitolu duŋ ko, nte mu jumaa le ti?”
40016016	Bituŋ Simoni Pita ye a jaabi, “Ite le mu Alimasiihu ti, Alla baluuriŋo Dinkewo.”
40016017	Bituŋ Yeesu ko a ye ko, “Barakoo be ite Simoni ye, Yunusa dinkewo, kaatu hadamadiŋo maŋ ñiŋ yitandi ite la, bari m Faamaa, meŋ be Arijana.
40016018	Aduŋ m be a fo la i ye, ite mu Pita le ti. M be n na kafoo loo la ñiŋ beroo le kaŋ, hani saayaa semboo te wo kafoo tiñaa noo la.
40016019	M be Arijana mansabaayaa caaboolu dii la ite le la. Feŋ-wo-feŋ i be meŋ siti la ñiŋ duniyaa kono, a be siti la Arijana kono le fanaa. Aduŋ feŋ-wo-feŋ, i be meŋ firiŋ na ñiŋ duniyaa kono, a be firiŋ na Arijana kono le fanaa.”
40016020	Wo to le a ye saayiboolu dandalaa kendeke ko, ì kana a fo moo-wo-moo ye ko, ate le mu Alimasiihu ti.
40016021	Ka bo wo waatoo la, Yeesu ye a dati ka a yitandi a la saayiboolu la ko, a ñanta taa la Yerusalaamu le, aniŋ a be toora la baake le alifaalu bulu, piriisi ñaatonkoolu aniŋ Luwaa karammoolu. Aduŋ a ko fanaa, a be faa la le, bari a be wulindi la saayaa kono le tili sabanjaŋo la.
40016022	Wo to le Pita ye a samba kara la ka a jalayi ko, “Hee m Maarii, Allamaa wo kumoolu buruka la! Ñiŋ maŋ ñaŋ na ke la i la muumeeke!”
40016023	Bari Yeesu ye a ñaa tiliŋ a la, a ko a ye ko, “Seetaanoo, jenke n ñaato! Ite mu kalewo le ti n ye, kaatu i la miiroolu maŋ tara looriŋ Alla la kuwolu kaŋ, bari hadamadiŋolu la miiroolu le mu.”
40016024	Wo to le Yeesu ko a la saayiboolu ye ko, “Moo-wo-moo meŋ lafita nte nooma la, wo si a faŋo la hame kuwolu bee bula jee. A ye a la yiribantambiloo sika, a ye n nooma.
40016025	Kaatu moo-wo-moo meŋ lafita ka a faŋo niyo tankandi, wo be foo la a la le. Bari moo-wo-moo meŋ foota a niyo la nte la kuwo kamma la, wo be a niyo soto la le.
40016026	Moo be muŋ nafaa le soto la, niŋ a ye duniyaa feŋolu bee soto, bari a naata foo a niyo la? Moo si a niyo kumakaa noo muŋ feŋ ne la?
40016027	Moo Dinkewo niŋ a la malaayikoolu be naa la le, a niŋ a Faamaa la kallankeeyaa. Bituŋ a be moo-wo-moo joo la a la baara kuwolu la le.
40016028	Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, moo doolu le be looriŋ jaŋ, mennu te saayaa nene la, fo niŋ ì ye Moo Dinkewo je naa kaŋ a la mansabaayaa kono.”
40017001	Tili wooro koolaa, Yeesu ye Pita samba, Yankuba, aniŋ Yohana meŋ mu Yankuba doomaa ti. Bituŋ a niŋ ì taata konko jaŋo santo, ì dammaalu tarata daameŋ.
40017002	A muluŋo naata yelema ì ñaa la jee. A ñaadaa be malamala kaŋ ko tiloo, aduŋ a la duŋ feŋolu be ñeliñeli kaŋ ko maloo.
40017003	Jee niŋ jee Musa niŋ Eliya fintita ì kaŋ, ì niŋ Yeesu be diyaamoo la.
40017004	Wo to le Pita ko Yeesu ye ko, “M Maarii, a beteyaata ntolu fee le ka tara jaŋ. Niŋ i lafita, nte be jembereŋ saba loo la jaŋ ne. Kiliŋo ye ke ite taa ti, kiliŋo ye ke Musa taa ti, aniŋ kiliŋo ye ke Eliya taa ti.”
40017005	A be diyaamu kaŋ doroŋ, minaayi koyiriŋo fer ye ì muuri. Kumakaŋo naata bo wo minaayoo kono ko, “Ñiŋ ne mu n Kanu Dinkewo ti, n jusoo laata meŋ na kuwo la baake. Ali i lamoyi a la.”
40017006	Biriŋ saayiboolu ye ñiŋ moyi, ì boyita ka biti ì ñaadaalu kaŋ, aduŋ ì silata baake.
40017007	Wo to le Yeesu naata ì kaŋ ka ì maa, aduŋ a ko ì ye ko, “Ali wuli, ali kana sila.”
40017008	Ì ye ì kuŋolu wuli ka juubeeroo ke, ì maŋ moo je fo Yeesu dammaa.
40017009	Ì be jii kaŋ konkoo santo waatoo meŋ na, Yeesu ye ì yaamari ko, “Ali kana a fo moo-wo-moo ye, ali ye meŋ je, fo niŋ Moo Dinkewo wulindita saayaa kono.”
40017010	Wo to le saayiboolu ye a ñininkaa ko, “Muŋ ne ye a tinna Luwaa karammoolu ka a fo ko, Eliya le ñanta naa la foloo?”
40017011	A ye ì jaabi, “Tooñaa, Eliya le be naa la foloo, aduŋ a be kuwolu bee murundi la ì noo to le.
40017012	Bari m be a fo la ali ye, Eliya naata le fokabaŋ. Moolu maŋ a suutee, ì ye kuu jawu siifaa bee ke a la, ko ì lafita a la ñaameŋ. Moo Dinkewo fanaa be toora la wo le ñaama ì buloo kono.”
40017013	Wo to le saayiboolu naata a fahaamu ko, a ka Yaayaa Batiseerilaa le la kuwo fo ì ye.
40017014	Kabiriŋ ì futata kafoo ma, kewo doo le naata Yeesu kaŋ. A ñoyita a ñaatiliŋo la ka a fo a ye ko,
40017015	“M Maariyo, balafaa soto n dinkewo ye. Wayoo le be a la, aduŋ a ka a toora baake le. Jamaa-jamaa a ka a boyindi dimbaa le kono, waraŋ jiyo kono.
40017016	Ŋa a samba i la saayiboolu kaŋ ne, bari ì maŋ a kendeyandi noo.”
40017017	Bituŋ Yeesu ye jaabiroo ke ko, “Alitolu jamaani lannabaloo, jamaani jenkeriŋo! Nte ñanta tara la ali fee fo waati jumaa le la? Nte ñanta muña la ali ye fo waati jumaa le la? A samba n ye naŋ jaŋ.”
40017018	Wo to le Yeesu ye seetaani jawoo jalayi, aduŋ a fintita kambaanendiŋo kono. Wo loo niŋ baroo teema a kendeyaata.
40017019	Bituŋ saayiboolu dammaa naata Yeesu kaŋ ka a ñininkaa ko, “Muŋ ne ye a tinna m̀ maŋ a bayi noo?”
40017020	A ko ì ye ko, “Ali la lanna dooyaa le ye a saabu. Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye ko, hani ali la lannoo kaañanta mutaari kesoo le fee, niŋ ali ko ñiŋ bere konkoo ye ‘Wutu jaŋ, i ye taa jana!’ a be taa le, aduŋ feŋ te ke la kebaloo ti ali ye.
40017021	Bari ñiŋ seetaani jawu siifaa ka finti duwaa niŋ suŋo doroŋ ne la.”
40017022	Kabiriŋ ì benta ñoo kaŋ Kalilee tundoo kaŋ, Yeesu ko ì ye ko, “Moo Dinkewo be duŋ na moolu bulu le,
40017023	aduŋ ì be a faa la le, bari a be wulindi la saayaa kono le tili sabanjaŋo la.” Bituŋ saayiboolu niyo kuyaata baake.
40017024	Kabiriŋ ì naata Kapanawumu saatewo to, moolu mennu ka denaari fula naamoo kafu ñoo ma, ì naata ka Pita ñininkaa ko, “Fo ali karammoo ka Alla Batudulaa Buŋo naamoo joo le baŋ?”
40017025	A ye ì jaabi ko, “Haa.” Kabiriŋ a dunta buŋo kono, Yeesu foloo diyaamuta a ye ko, “Simoni, ite ye muŋ ne miira? Duniyaa mansoolu ka juutiyolu niŋ naamoo kaniŋ jumaa le bulu, bankudiŋolu bulu baŋ, waraŋ fo luntaŋolu?”
40017026	Pita ye a jaabi, “Luntaŋolu le mu.” Wo to le Yeesu ko a ye ko, “Wo to bankudiŋolu tankata jooroo ma le.
40017027	Bari fo a kana ke ì bala kasi ti, taa baa to, i ye dooliŋo fayi. I be ñee foloo meŋ muta la, i ye a daa yele, i be kodicoroosoo tara la jee. A taa, i ye a joo ite niŋ nte ye.”
40018001	Wo waatoo la saayiboolu naata Yeesu kaŋ ka a ñininkaa ko, “Jumaa le la kuwo warata Arijana mansabaayaa kono?”
40018002	Wo to le Yeesu ye dindiŋo kumandi, a ye a londi ì teema.
40018003	A ko ì ye ko, “Tooñaa, m be a fo la ali ye, fo niŋ ali sondomoolu falinta ka ke ko dindiŋolu be ñaameŋ, niŋ wo nte ali te duŋ na Arijana mansabaayaa kono.
40018004	Moo-wo-moo meŋ ye a fammajii ko ñiŋ dindiŋo, wo maarii le la kuwo warata moolu bee ti Arijana mansabaayaa kono.
40018005	Aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ye ñiŋ ñoŋ dindiŋo jiyandi nte too la, wo ye nte le jiyandi.
40018006	“Moo-wo-moo meŋ ye a tinna, ñiŋ domandiŋolu kono, mennu laata nte la, hani kiliŋ ye junuboo ke, a be fisiyaa la wo maarii fee le faŋ, ka tuurilaŋ bere baa siti a kaŋo la, ka a niŋ wo fayi baa diinondiŋo kono.
40018007	Kooroo be duniyaa moolu ye marisaroo la kuwolu to, mennu be keriŋ! Ñiŋ marisa kuwolu ñanta naa la le, bari kooroo be moo le ye, meŋ ye wo marisa kuwolu saabu.
40018008	“Niŋ i buloo waraŋ i siŋo ka i marisa ka junuboo ke, a kuntu, i ye a fayi jana. A fisiyaata, i lanjuururiŋo ye duŋ badaa-badaa baluwo kono, diina i niŋ bulu fuloo waraŋ i siŋ fuloo ye fayi badaa-badaa dimbaa kono.
