50004003	Aduŋ ite Sisikos, ŋa i daani ka ñiŋ musoolu maakoyi ko n dookuuñoo tilindiŋolu. Ì jarita wo la le, kaatu ì ye kata baa le ke n na dookuwo to kibaari betoo ye, ì niŋ Kelementi niŋ n na dookuuñoo koteŋolu mennu toolu be safeeriŋ baluwo kitaaboo kono.
50004004	Ali kali tu seewooriŋ Maariyo kono! Aduŋ m be a fo la kotenke, ali seewoo!
50004005	Ali sooneeyaa moolu bee ye kendeke, fo ì bee si ali la sooneeyaa loŋ. Maariyo sutiyaata naŋ ne!
50004006	Ali kana ali niyo toorandi jaakaloo la, bari ali si ali la suuloolu bee fo Alla ye, duwaa niŋ daaniroo kono, ali niŋ tenturoo.
50004007	Wo to le Alla la kayiroo meŋ warata ka tambi hadamadiŋolu la fahaamuroo bee la, a be ali sondomoolu niŋ ali la miiroolu kanta la Kiristu Yeesu kono le.
50004008	Labaŋo la, baadiŋolu, ali ali hakiloolu fandi niŋ kuu-wo-kuu la, meŋ mu tooñaa ti, meŋ mu horomoo ti, meŋ tilinta, meŋ seneyaata, meŋ kanunteeyaata, meŋ hiinanteeyaata, aniŋ meŋ jarita jayiroo la.
50004009	Ali ye kuu-wo-kuu karaŋ waraŋ soto m bulu, ali ye meŋ moyi n na, waraŋ je n na, ali bula wo nooma. Aduŋ Alla meŋ ka kayiroo dii, si tara ali fee.
50004010	Nte seewoota Maariyo kono baake le ko, labaŋo la, siloo yeleta alitolu ye le ka n na suulakuwolu topatoo, ko ali ka a ke nuŋ ñaameŋ. A ye waati sii le, ali maŋ siloo soto ka a ke, hani ali lafita a la.
50004011	N te ñiŋ fo kaŋ ka n na suuloolu yitandi ali la, kaatu n na kuwolu be laariŋ ñaa-wo-ñaa, n dalita le ka wasa.
50004012	Ŋa dasoo loŋ ne, aduŋ ŋa sotoo fanaa loŋ ne. Nte ye ñiŋ kulloo loŋ ne ka tara wasariŋ daa-wo-daa aniŋ waati-wo-waati. N ka tara wasariŋ ne, niŋ n konoo be faariŋ, aniŋ niŋ konkoo be n na. N ka tara wasariŋ ne, niŋ ŋa jamaa baa soto, aniŋ niŋ ŋa domandiŋ soto.
50004013	N ka kuwolu bee ke noo ka bo niŋ ate le la, meŋ ka n sembentuŋyaa.
50004014	Bari hani wo, alitolu ye kuu kendoo le ke ka n na bataa talaa.
50004015	Alitolu Filipinkoolu faŋolu ye a loŋ ne ko, biriŋ foloodulaa to, alitolu doroŋ ne mu Yeesu la kafoo ti, mennu niŋ nte ka deŋ diiroo niŋ sotoo la. Wo keta le tumoo meŋ na, ŋa kibaari betoo kawandi alitolu fee, bituŋ n naata Makedoniya tundoo bula.
50004016	Tooñaa, hani kabiriŋ m be Tesalonika saatewo kono, ali ye maakoyiroo kii n kaŋ ne, aduŋ wo maŋ ke siiñaa kiliŋ doroŋ ti.
50004017	M maŋ ñiŋ fo ka soorifeŋolu kaniŋ ali bulu, bari n lafita le ali la tinewo si lafaa-lafaa laalaa, ali la beteyaa kamma Alla la karoo la.
50004018	Ŋa a seedeyaa ko, ŋa feŋo bee soto le, ŋa jamaa baa le soto. Ali la ñiŋ soorifeŋolu, Epaforoditus ye mennu samba naŋ, ì tambita n na suuloolu la le, aduŋ n wasata le. Ì keta ko sadaa seera feŋ diimaa meŋ ka Alla seewondi.
50004019	Aduŋ n na Alla, fanka jamaa be meŋ bulu, a be ali la suuloolu bee topatoo la le, ko Kiristu Yeesu la semboo niŋ waroo be ñaameŋ.
50004020	Tenturoo niŋ jayiroo be n na Alla ye, m̀ Faamaa, fo abadaa. Amiin.
50004021	Ali moo senuŋolu bee kontoŋ n ye, mennu mu Kiristu Yeesu taalu ti.
50004022	Baadiŋolu mennu bee be nte fee jaŋ, ì be ali kontoŋ na, sako mennu be dookuwo la Rooma mansakewo la koridaa to.
50004023	Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la hiinoo ye tara ali la nooroo fee.
51001001	Nte Pawulu, Kiristu Yeesu la kiilaa ka bo niŋ Alla la lafoo la, n niŋ m̀ baadiŋo Timoti
51001002	be ali kontoŋ na, alitolu mennu mu m̀ baadiŋolu ti, Kolosa saatewo kono jee. Alitolu mu moo senuŋolu le ti, mennu fanaa laata Kiristu la. Hiinoo niŋ kayiroo be ali fee ka bo Alla bulu, m̀ Faamaa.
51001003	Ǹ ka tu Alla tentu la le, m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu Faamaa, niŋ m̀ be duwaa kaŋ ali ye,
51001004	baawo ŋà ali la lannoo moyi le Kiristu Yeesu kono, aniŋ ali ye kanoo meŋ soto moo senuŋolu bee ye.
51001005	Ñinnu bee be looriŋ ali la jikoo la kuwo le kaŋ, meŋ be pareeriŋ ali ye Arijana kono. Ali naata kibaaroo moyi ñiŋ jikoo le la kuwo to nuŋ, kibaaroo meŋ mu tooñaa kumoo ti, aniŋ kibaari betoo.
51001006	Ñiŋ kibaaroo futata ali ma le ko a futata duniyaa tonkoŋ naanoo bee to ñaameŋ, ka diŋ betoo diŋ, aniŋ ka yiriwaa. A keta wo le ñaama alitolu kono ka bo wo luŋo faŋo la, ali ye a moyi le ka a fahaamu, meŋ mu Alla la hiinoo ti tooñaa kono.
51001007	Ali naata ñiŋ tooñaa la kuwo karaŋ Epafaras le bulu, meŋ mu ǹ kanuntee dookuuñoo ti. Ate mu Kiristu la dookuulaa le ti ali ye, meŋ foroyaata.
51001008	Ate le ye ǹ kalamutandi ali la kanoo la, ali ye meŋ soto Noora Kuliŋo kono.
51001009	Wo kamma la, kabiriŋ luŋo meŋ na ŋà ali la kuwo moyi, m̀ maŋ n dahaa duwaa la ali ye. Ǹ ka tu Alla daani la le, fo ali si faa a la lafoo londoo la, aniŋ ñaameŋo niŋ fahaamuroo, a la Nooroo ka mennu dii.
51001010	Wo siloo la, ali si baluuñaa soto, meŋ jarita Maariyo ñaatiliŋo la, aniŋ meŋ be a kontaani la baake. Ali la kebaara betoolu bee si barakoo soto, aniŋ ali ye yiriwaa Alla loŋo kono.
51001011	-
51001012	Allamaa ali ye bambaŋ niŋ semboo bee la, ko a la waroo be kaawakuuyaariŋ ñaameŋ, fo ali si muñoo niŋ wakiiloo soto kuwolu bee kono, aduŋ ali si m̀ Faamaa tentu niŋ seewoo la. Ate le ye ali ke keetaalaalu ti a la moo senuŋolu la keetaa to Arijana kono, maloo be daameŋ.
51001013	Ate le ye m̀ bondi diboo semboo bulu, a ye ǹ samba a Kanu Dinkewo la mansabaayaa to,
51001014	meŋ ye n kumakaa, a ye ǹ na junuboolu kafari.
51001015	Ate le mu Alla jebaloo sawuroo ti, ate le sotota daaroo bee ñaa.
51001016	Ka bo niŋ ate le la, feŋolu bee daata, fo ì be saŋ fatoolu le kono baŋ, waraŋ duniyaa kono, fo ì ka je le baŋ, waraŋ ì buka je, fo ì mu mansoolu le ti baŋ, sembetiyolu, maralilaalu waraŋ kantiyolu. Feŋolu bee daata ka bo niŋ ate le la, aduŋ ì daata ate le ye.
51001017	Janniŋ feŋ-wo-feŋ ka daa, ate be sotoriŋ ne nuŋ fokabaŋ, aduŋ feŋolu bee be mutariŋ ñoo bala ate le kono.
51001018	Ate le mu kuŋo ti baloo ye, meŋ mu a la kafoo ti. Ate le mu feŋolu bee foloo ti, ate le foloo wulita ka bo saayaa kono, fo a si ke foloo ti feŋ-wo-feŋ to.
51001019	Alla faŋo kontaanita le ko, a la timmoo ye tara ate kono.
51001020	Ka bo niŋ ate le la, Alla ye a faŋo niŋ feŋolu bee diyandi, fo ì be saŋ fatoolu le kono baŋ, waraŋ duniyaa kono jaŋ. Alla ye a la kayiroo dii ka bo niŋ ate le yeloo la, meŋ bonta yiribantambiloo kaŋ.
51001021	Ali sondomoolu jamfata Alla la le nuŋ, aduŋ ali la miiroolu ye ali ke a jawoolu le ti fo ali tuta kuu jawu baaroo la.
51001022	Bari saayiŋ, Alla ye a niŋ ali diyandi le ka bo niŋ Kiristu balajaatoo la, meŋ faata, fo ali si yitandi Alla ñaatiliŋo la ko moo senuŋolu mennu maŋ sootaaroo soto, aduŋ ì te tuumi noo la.
51001023	Wo be ke la le, niŋ ali foroyaata lannoo kono, aduŋ ali ye bambaŋ wakiiloo kono fo ali kana ali la jikoo bula kibaari betoo la kuwo to, ali ye meŋ moyi nuŋ. Ñiŋ kibaari betoo kawandita duniyaa bee le ye, aduŋ nte Pawulu naata ke wo le dookuulaa ti.
51001024	Saayiŋ, n seewoota n na tooroolu kono le ali la kuwo kamma. Niŋ feŋ ñanta kafu la Kiristu la tooroolu to a baloo ye, m be a timmandi la m balajaatoo le kono. A baloo ñiŋ, wo mu a la kafoo le ti,
51001025	n keta dookuulaa ti meŋ ye. Alla faŋo le ye n londi ñiŋ dookuwo to alitolu la kuwo kamma la, fo n si ali kalamutandi a la kumoo la timmarinke.
51001026	Wo kumoo la kuwo tarata maaboriŋ kulloo kono jamaanoolu la waati jaŋ koomanto, bari saayiŋ a ye a lankenema a la moo senuŋolu ye le.
51001027	Alla ye wolu le tomboŋ fo ì si wo kulloo la kallankeeyaa niŋ fankoo loŋ, aniŋ ka a futandi moolu ma, mennu maŋ ke Yahuudoolu ti. Aduŋ a kulloo fele: Kiristu be baluuriŋ alitolu kono le, ate meŋ mu ǹ na jikoo ti ka duŋ kallankeeyaa kono.
51001028	Ntolu ka ate le la kuwo bankee ka moo-wo-moo dandalaa, aniŋ ka moo-wo-moo karandi ñaameŋo bee la, fo ǹ si moo-wo-moo yitandi ko, ì menta Kiristu kono le.
51001029	Ñiŋ daliiloo le ye a tinna, n ka dookuwo ke kendeke, aduŋ n ka a kata baake niŋ sembe baa le la, a ye meŋ ke n kono ka bo niŋ a la kaawakuwo la.
51002001	N lafita ali ye a loŋ, n na kata kuwolu be warariŋ ali ye ñaameŋ, aniŋ mennu be Lawodiseya saatewo kono, aniŋ baadiŋ koteŋolu bee mennu nene maŋ nte je ì ñaa la.
51002002	N ka ñiŋ katoo ke le fo ì niyo si laa, aniŋ ì ye tara kambendiŋ ka ke kiliŋ ti kanoo kono, fo ì si fankoo bee soto, meŋ mu fahaamuroo ti dankeneyaa kono, aniŋ ì si Alla la kulloo loŋ meŋ mu Kiristu ti.
51002003	Ñaameŋo niŋ londoo fankoo bee be maaboriŋ ate Kiristu le kono.
51002004	M be ñiŋ fo kaŋ ali ye le, fo moo-wo-moo kana ali neenee noo niŋ neeneeri kumoolu la.
51002005	Hani nte faŋo maŋ tara maabeeriŋ ali kono ñaa-wo-ñaa, bari nooroo kono, m be ali fee jee le, aduŋ n seewoota ka a je ko, ali be lookuuriŋ aniŋ ali be bambandiŋ ali la lannoo to Kiristu kono.
51002006	Baawo ali sonta Kiristu Yeesu ma le ka ke ali Maariyo ti, wo to ali baluu ko moolu mennu mu a taalu ti.
51002007	Ali suloolu duŋ a kono, ali ye loo bambandinke a kono, fo ali si yiriwaa lannoo kono, ko ì ye ali karandi a la ñaameŋ. Ali faa niŋ tenturoo la.
51002008	Ali ali hakiloo tu fo moo-wo-moo kana ali joŋyandi yinkaroo niŋ neeneeri kuma kenseŋolu la, mennu ka tara dendiŋ hadamadiŋolu la aada kuwolu la, aduŋ ì maŋ soto ka bo niŋ Kiristu la, bari ñiŋ duniyaa semboolu.
51002009	Alla mankutoo be Kiristu kono le, a timmariŋo, hadamadiŋyaa kono,
51002010	aduŋ ali naata baluu timmariŋo soto ate le kono. Ate le mu alihawaa maralilaalu niŋ sembetiyolu bee la kuntiyo ti.
51002011	Ate le kono, ali naata sunna fanaa. Wo sunnoo maŋ ke hadamadiŋ buloo la, bari ali sunnata Kiristu le la, kabiriŋ ali ye ali la daajika kotoo wura ali bala,
51002012	aduŋ ali niŋ a naata baadee ñoo la batisoo kono. Ali niŋ a naata wulindi ñoo la fanaa wo batisoo kono, ka bo niŋ lannoo la ali ye meŋ soto Alla la semboo to, ate faŋo meŋ ye Kiristu wulindi ka bo saayaa kono.
51002013	Ali faata le nuŋ ali la junuboolu kamma la, aniŋ ali daajika kotoo, ali ye meŋ soto sunnabaliyaa kono. Bari Alla naata ali niŋ Kiristu balundi le, a yamfata ǹ na junuboolu bee la.
51002014	Alla ye ǹ na julu kotoolu safeeroo tuutuu le, mennu tarata ǹ kaŋ, ì niŋ luwaa meŋ ye ǹ tuumi. A ye wo juloo kayitoo landi kara la le, a ye a pempeŋ Kiristu la yiribantambiloo kaŋ.
51002015	Ka bo niŋ wo siloo la, a ye maralilaalu niŋ sembetiyolu la kelejooraŋolu buusi ì bulu le, a ye ì bee malundi kenebaa to, kaatu a ye ì noo ka bo niŋ Kiristu la yiribantambiloo le la.
51002016	Wo to, ali kana soŋ, moo-wo-moo ye ali tuumi feŋolu la, ali ka mennu domo, ali ka mennu miŋ, waraŋ Kari Kuta Juurali luŋo, waraŋ Loobula Luŋo, waraŋ juurali luŋ koteŋolu.
51002017	Ñinnu mu niiniyo doroŋ ne ti kuwolu to, mennu be naa la, bari ì la kuwo tooñaa tarata Kiristu le kono.
51002018	Ali kana soŋ, moo-wo-moo ye ali daa bondi kañeerifeŋo ñoosaboo to. Wo moo siifaalu ka fantoorandoo le kummaayandi, a niŋ malaayika batoo, aduŋ ì ka kibiri ì la jeroolu la le. Ì la faŋ waroo tambita le, bari a maŋ daliila soto, kaatu a bee be dendiŋ ì la hadamadiŋyaa miiroolu le la.
51002019	Ì maŋ tara dendiŋ Kiristu la kotenke, meŋ mu kuŋo ti balajaatoo ye. Ate le ka balajaatoo domorindi, aduŋ a ye cokoolu niŋ fasoolu dii a la le ka a suufoolu muta ñoo bala. Ka bo wo siloo le la, balajaatoo ka meŋ, a ye yiriwaa ko Alla ye a yiriwandi ñaameŋ.
51002020	Baawo alitolu niŋ Kiristu faata ñoo la le fo ali niŋ ñiŋ alihawaa semboolu si kuntu, wo to, muŋ ne ye a tinna ali ka baluu hani ka bii ko moolu, mennu mu ñiŋ duniyaa taalu ti? Muŋ ne ye a tinna ali ka soŋ ñiŋ duniyaa la yaamaroolu ma, mennu be ko,
51002021	“Ali kana ñiŋ muta! Ali kana wo nene! Ali kana wo doo maa”?
51002022	Ñinnu bee mu hadamadiŋolu la yaamaroolu le ti, ka bo ì la miiroolu niŋ ì la karandiroolu la. Ì be dendiŋ suula feŋolu le la mennu ka labaŋ tiñaa la.
51002023	Tooñaa, ñiŋ yaamaroolu ka munta le ko ñaameŋo, kaatu ì ka baturi koleŋo le kummaayandi, aniŋ fantoorandoo meŋ buka balajaatoo kaari, bari ì maŋ nafaa soto ka hadamadiŋyaa la hame kuwolu mara.
51003001	Baawo ali niŋ Kiristu wulindita ñoo la le, ali ali sondomoolu loo kuwolu kaŋ, mennu be Arijana kono, Kiristu be siiriŋ daameŋ Alla bulubaa karoo la.
51003002	Ali ali hakiloolu loo kuwolu kaŋ, mennu be Arijana kono, bari ali kana ì loo ñiŋ duniyaa kuwolu kaŋ,
51003003	kaatu ali faata le, aduŋ ali la baluwo niŋ Kiristu be maaboriŋ Alla fee le.
51003004	Kiristu meŋ mu ǹ na baluwo ti, a be finti la le ka muru naŋ, wo to le alitolu fanaa niŋ a be finti la ñoo la, kallankeeyaa kono.
51003005	Wo kamma la, feŋ-wo-feŋ mu ñiŋ duniyaa hame kuwo ti ali la baluwo kono, ali ì bee bula ka kasaara: Laañooyaa tuluŋo, seneyaabaliyaa, balajaatoo la hame kuu jawoo, ŋaniya jawoo aniŋ hadumoo meŋ mu jalambatoo ti.
51003006	Ñiŋ kuwolu le ye a tinna, Alla la kamfaa baa be naa la moolu kaŋ, mennu maŋ soŋ a ma.
51003007	Alitolu tarata taama kaŋ ñiŋ siloolu le la nuŋ, biriŋ ñiŋ kuwolu ye ali mara.
51003008	Bari saayiŋ, ali ñiŋ kuwolu bee bula, mennu be ko kamfaa, jusuboo, kuruŋyaa, aniŋ tooñeeroo. Aduŋ kuma nooriŋo kana bo ali daa kono.
51003009	Ali kana faniyaa fo ñoo ye, baawo ali ye ali daajika kotoo wura ali bala le, a niŋ a kebaaroolu.
51003010	Ali naata daajika kutoo duŋ, meŋ be tu la ali kutayandi la ali Daamansoo sawuroo la, fo ali si fahaamuroo soto Alla la kuwo to kendeke.
51003011	Ñiŋ kuwo la karoo la, fataŋ-fansoo te baadiŋolu teema, fo Yahuudoo le mu baŋ, waraŋ Jirisinkoo, sunnariŋo waraŋ sunnabaloo, fo bantalankoo le mu waraŋ wulakono moo, fo joŋo le mu waraŋ foroo, kaatu Kiristu mu feŋo bee le ti ì bee ye, aduŋ a be baluuriŋ ì bee le kono.
51003012	Wo to, alitolu mennu mu Alla la tomboŋ moo senuŋolu niŋ kanuntewolu ti, ali ali la daajika kutoo duŋ, meŋ mu balafaa ti, mooyaa, fammajiyo, sooneeyaa aniŋ muñoo.
51003013	Ali muña ñoo ye, aduŋ niŋ moo ye feŋ soto ka a baadiŋo tuumi, ì si yamfa ñoo ye. Ko Maariyo yamfata alitolu ye ñaameŋ, ali fanaa si yamfa ñoo ye wo ñaama.
51003014	Wo feŋolu bee kunto, ali kanoo duŋ, meŋ ye feŋolu bee siti ñoo bala kambeŋ timmariŋo kono.
51003015	Aduŋ ali si Kiristu la kayiroo bula, a ye ali sondomoolu mara. Tooñaa, ali kumandita wo kayiroo le to ka ke balajaata kiliŋ ti. Ali tenturoo dii niŋ ali sondomoo bee la.
51003016	Ali Kiristu la kumoo bula, a ye baluu kendeke ali kono. Ali ñoo karandi, ali ye ñoo yaamari niŋ ñaameŋo bee la. Ali jabuuroolu laa, jayiri suukuwolu aniŋ suukuu senuŋolu. Ali si ì laa niŋ tenturoo la ali sondomoolu kono.
51003017	Aduŋ niŋ ali be kuu-wo-kuu ke la, fo diyaamoo kono waraŋ kebaaroo to, ali si a bee ke Maarii Yeesu too la, aduŋ ali si tenturoo dii Alla la, m̀ Faamaa, ka bo niŋ ate la.
51003018	Musoolu, ali soŋ ali keemaañolu ma, ko a ñanta ñaameŋ Maariyo kono.
51003019	Kewolu, ali ali la musoolu kanu, aduŋ ali kana saŋara ì kaŋ.
51003020	Dindiŋolu, ali soŋ ali wuluulaalu ma kuwolu bee to, kaatu wo le ka Maariyo seewondi.
51003021	Faalu, ali kana ali la dindiŋolu kamfandi ka ì jikilateyindi.
51003022	Joŋolu, ali soŋ ali la duniyaa kuntiyolu ma kuwolu bee to. Ali kana soŋ ì ma doroŋ niŋ ì ñaalu be ali kaŋ. Moolu mennu lafita ka hadamadiŋolu kontaanindi, wolu ka a ke wo le ñaama, bari alitolu mu Maariyo ñaasilannaalu le ti, wo to ali soŋ ì ma niŋ ali sondomoo bee la.
51003023	Ali be dookuu-wo-dookuu ke kaŋ, ali a ke ali ŋaniyoo bee la ko ali ka a ke Maariyo le ye, a maŋ ke hadamadiŋolu ti.
51003024	Ali ye a loŋ ne ko, Maariyo be ali joo la keetaafeŋo le la, meŋ be pareeriŋ a yaa. Ali be Maarii Kiristu le batu kaŋ!
51003025	Kuu kuruŋ kelaalu be joo soto la ì la kuu kuruŋolu to le. Alla buka moo-wo-moo faasaa.
51004001	Kuntiyolu, ali ali la joŋolu muta tiliŋo kono, ali ye ì la ñantoolu dii ì la a ñaama. Ali kana ñina ko, alitolu fanaa ye Kuntiyo soto Arijana kono le.
51004002	Ali tu duwaa la, aduŋ ali si koroosiroo ke a kono, ali niŋ tenturoo.
51004003	Ali si duwaa ntolu fanaa ye, fo Alla si bundaa yele n ye ka a la kumoo kawandi, aniŋ ka moolu kalamutandi Kiristu la kulloo la. Wo kuwo le kamma la, m be bunjawoo kono.
51004004	Ali duwaa, fo nte si kumoo kawandi seneyaarinke, ko n ñanta a ke la ñaameŋ.
51004005	Niŋ ali be moolu kono, mennu maŋ ke Yeesu noomalankoolu ti, ali si maa kuu ñaameŋo la. Niŋ siloo yeleta ali ye ka kuu betoo ke, ali si a waatoo taa kuu.
51004006	Ali la diyaamoo si tu sooneeyaariŋ. Kuma betoolu si a diyandi ko koo ka domoroo diyandi ñaameŋ. Aduŋ ali si a loŋ, ali ñanta moo-wo-moo jaabi la ñaameŋ.
51004007	Tikikus be n na kuwolu bee saata la ali ye le. Ate mu m̀ baadiŋ kanuntewo le ti, dookuulaa tilindiŋo, aniŋ ǹ kafuñoo maakoyirilaa Maariyo la dookuwo kono.
51004008	M be a kii kaŋ ali kaŋ ñiŋ daliiloo faŋo le kamma la fo ali si a loŋ, ntolu be ñaameŋ, aduŋ a si ali sondomoolu wakiilindi fanaa.
51004009	M be a niŋ Onesimus le kii kaŋ naŋ ali yaa, meŋ mu m baadiŋ tilindiŋo ti, aniŋ m baadiŋ kanuntewo. Ate mu ali faŋolu la moo le ti. Ì be kuwolu bee fo la ali ye le, mennu keta jaŋ.
51004010	M mooñoo bunjawutonkoo Aristakus be ali kontoŋ na, aniŋ Maaka, meŋ mu Barinabas sanawumaa ti wuluwo to. Ali ye yaamaroolu soto Maaka la kuwo to le fokabaŋ. Wo kamma la, niŋ a naata ali kaŋ, ali si a jiyaa.
51004011	Yeesu, ì ka meŋ kumandi Yustus la, fanaa be ali kontoŋ na. Ñinnu doroŋ ne mu Yahuudoolu ti jaŋ, nte dookuuñoolu kono Alla la mansabaayaa ye. Ì keta n ye wakiilindirilaalu le ti.
51004012	Epafaras meŋ mu ali faŋolu la moo ti, aniŋ Kiristu Yeesu la dookuulaa, be ali kontoŋ na. A ka tu duwaa la ali ye le doroŋ a sondomoo bee la, fo ali si meŋ ka yiriwaa ali la lannoo kono, aniŋ ali si dankeneyaa kendeke Alla la lafoo bee to.
51004013	Nte faŋo mu seedoo le ti a la kuwo to ko, a ye dookuwo ke alitolu ye baake le, aniŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye, mennu be Lawodiseya aniŋ Hiyerapolis saatewolu to.
51004014	Ǹ kanuntee jaaralilaa Luka be ali kontoŋ na, aniŋ Demas.
51004015	Ali baadiŋolu kontoŋ n ye, mennu be Lawodiseya. Ali Nimfa fanaa kontoŋ n ye, aniŋ Yeesu la kafoo meŋ ka beŋ a yaa.
51004016	Niŋ ñiŋ leetaroo karanta ali ye, ali si a kata fo a si karaŋ Yeesu la kafoo fanaa ye, meŋ be Lawodiseya. Ali si Lawodiseyankoolu fanaa la leetaroo karaŋ.
51004017	Ali a fo Arikipus ye, nte ko, “I hakiloo tu, i ye dookuwo timmandi, Maariyo ye meŋ dii i la!”
51004018	Nte, Pawulu le ye ñiŋ kontondiroo safee ali ye m faŋo buloo la. Ali kana ñina ko, m be sitiriŋ neejoloo le la. Alla la hiinoo ye tara ali fee.
52001001	Nte Pawulu, Silas aniŋ Timoti be Yeesu la kafoo moolu kontoŋ na, mennu be Tesalonika saatewo kono aniŋ mennu bee mu m̀ Faamaa Alla taa ti, aniŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu. Hiinoo niŋ kayiroo be ali fee.
52001002	Ǹ ka tu Alla tentu la le doroŋ ali bee la kuwo kamma la, niŋ m̀ be duwaa la.
52001003	Ǹ hakiloolu ka tu bula la ali la m̀ Faamaa Alla ñaatiliŋo la le. M̀ buka ñina ali la dookuwo la lannoo kono, ali la kata kuwolu kanoo kono, aniŋ jiki bambandiŋo, ali ye meŋ soto m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la kuwo to.
52001004	M̀ baadiŋolu, Alla ye mennu kanu, ŋà a loŋ ne ko, Alla le ye ali tomboŋ,
52001005	baawo kibaari betoo, ǹ ka meŋ kawandi, a maŋ naa ali kaŋ kumoolu doroŋ na, bari semboo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo, wolu niŋ dankeneyaa timmariŋo. Alitolu ye a loŋ ne, m̀ be baluuriŋ ali kono ñaameŋ ali la kuwo kamma la.
52001006	Bituŋ ali naata ntolu niŋ m̀ Maariyo la kuwo nikiŋ. Ali be tooroo kono ñaa-wo-ñaa, ali ye kumoo muta seewoo kono, seewoo meŋ naata ka bo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo la.
52001007	Wo naata a tinna le ali keta misaaloo ti Yeesu noomalankoolu bee ye, mennu be Makedoniya aniŋ Akaya tundoolu kaŋ.
52001008	Ka bo alitolu la Maariyo la kumoo naata futa dulaalu bee to. A maŋ ke Makedoniya niŋ Akaya doroŋ ti, bari moolu ye a loŋ ne daa-wo-daa, ali ye lannoo meŋ soto Alla la kuwo to. Wo to, a maŋ jari ntolu ye feŋ fo wo to,
52001009	kaatu ì faŋolu le ye kuwolu fo, ali ye m̀ buuñaa ñaameŋ biriŋ ǹ naata ali yaa. Ì ye a fo le, ali ye ali koo dii jalaŋolu la ñaameŋ ka naa Alla kaŋ, ka a batu, meŋ mu Alla baluuriŋo niŋ Alla tooñaa ti.
52001010	Ì ye a fo le fanaa, alitolu be a Dinkewo la naa batu kaŋ ñaameŋ ka bo saŋo santo. Alla ye ate le wulindi ka bo saayaa kono. Ate le mu Yeesu ti, meŋ ka ǹ kanandi Alla la kamfaa baa ma, meŋ ka naa.
52002001	Baadiŋolu, alitolu faŋolu ye a loŋ ne ko, ǹ na naa ali yaa, a maŋ ke kenseŋ ti.
52002002	Ntolu ye bataa baa le soto Filipi saatewo kono nuŋ, ì ye ǹ toorandi, aduŋ ì ye m̀ malundi ko ali ye a loŋ ñaameŋ, bari wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, Alla ye m̀ fatiyandi le ka a la kibaari betoo kawandi ali ye balannaa baalu ñaa la.
52002003	Ǹ na maaneeneeroo buka bo faniyaa karandiroo kono waraŋ seneyaabaliyaa, sako neeneeroo.
52002004	Wo noo to, ǹ diyaamuñaa ka yitandi le ko, Alla ye ǹ tomboŋ ne ka kibaari betoo kawandi, a ye meŋ karafa m̀ ma. M̀ buka diyaamu ka moolu seewondi, bari ka Alla seewondi, meŋ ka ǹ sondomoolu kotobo.
52002005	Ali ye a loŋ ne ko, ntolu niŋ neeneeri kumoolu nene maŋ naa ali kaŋ, sako ka m̀ faŋolu yelemandi ali ye hadumoo kamma la. Alla le mu ǹ seedoo ti.
52002006	M̀ maŋ jayiri ñini moolu bulu, aduŋ m̀ maŋ a ñini alitolu fanaa bulu waraŋ moo koteŋolu. M̀ maŋ feŋ daani ali bulu,
52002007	hani ŋà siloo soto ka a ke, kaatu m̀ mu Kiristu la kiilaalu le ti. Wo noo to ǹ tarata hadamayaariŋ ali fee le ko musu dimbaa ka a diŋolu topatoo ñaameŋ.
52002008	Ǹ na kanu baa sotoo ali ye, wo le ye a tinna m̀ maŋ paree ka Alla la kibaari betoo doroŋ kawandi ali ye, bari ka m̀ faŋolu fanaa dii ali la, kaatu ali naata ke ǹ ye kanuntewolu le ti.
52002009	Baadiŋolu, tooñaa ali ye ǹ na katoo niŋ ǹ na bataa loŋ ne. Ǹ ka tu dookuwo la le, suutoo niŋ tiloo, fo ǹ kana moo-wo-moo batandi ali kono, ǹ na Alla la kibaari betoo kawandoo tumoo la ali ye.
52002010	Alitolu niŋ Alla le mu seedoolu ti, ǹ ka maa ñaameŋ alitolu Yeesu noomalankoolu kono, ǹ jankuta aniŋ ǹ tilinta ñaameŋ, aduŋ m̀ maŋ sootaaroo soto ali kono.
52002011	Ali ye a loŋ ne ko, ŋà ali meŋ-wo-meŋ yaamari le ko faa ka a diŋolu yaamari ñaameŋ.
52002012	Ŋà ali wakiilindi aniŋ ŋà ali dandalaa, fo ali si baluuñaa betoo soto Alla ñaatiliŋo la, meŋ ye ali kumandi a la mansabaayaa niŋ kallankeeyaa kono.
52002013	M̀ fanaa ka tu Alla tentu la le ko, biriŋ ali ye Alla la kumoo moyi ntolu la, ali maŋ a muta ko hadamadiŋ kumoo, bari ali ye a muta le ko Alla la kumoo. Tooñaa, a mu wo le ti, aduŋ a ka dookuwo fanaa ke alitolu Yeesu noomalankoolu kono le.
52002014	Wo to baadiŋolu, alitolu keta Alla la kafoo nikinnaalu le ti, mennu laata Kiristu Yeesu la Yudeya tundoo kaŋ. Itolu toorata Yahuudoolu bulu le ko ali fansuŋ moolu ye ali toorandi ñaameŋ.
52002015	Itolu le ye Maarii Yeesu faa, aniŋ annabiyomoolu, aduŋ ì ye ntolu fanaa bayi ì la saatewolu kono. Ì ka Alla kamfandi, aduŋ ì ka balaŋ moolu bee ma.
52002016	Ì ye ntolu bali le ka diyaamu moolu ye, mennu maŋ ke Yahuudoolu ti, fo wolu kana kiisoo soto. Ì ka ñiŋ kuwolu le ke, waati-wo-waati ì la junuboolu ka tu kafu la le. Bari labaŋo la, Alla la kamfaa baa naata ì kaŋ ne.
52002017	Baadiŋolu, hani m̀ faamata ali je la fo waatindiŋ, ǹ hakiloo be ali kaŋ ne. Ali la kuwo ye m̀ meeyaa baake le, m̀ be ñaaniriŋ ali jewo la le ñaa niŋ ñaa la.
52002018	M̀ be lafiriŋ ne ka naa ali yaa. Tooñaa, nte Pawulu, m be lafiriŋ ne ka naa ali yaa, ŋa feeroolu siti le siiñaa jamaa, bari Seetaanoo le ka ǹ na siloo baayi.
52002019	M̀ Maarii Yeesu naa waatoo la, muŋ ne be ke la ǹ na jikoo ti, ǹ na seewoo aniŋ ǹ na kibiroo kañeerinaafoo to, a ñaatiliŋo la, niŋ a maŋ ke alitolu ti?
52002020	Alitolu le mu ǹ na horomoo niŋ seewoo ti.
52003001	Labaŋo la, biriŋ m̀ maŋ a muña noo kotenke, ǹ naata soŋ, ǹ dammaalu ye tu Atene saatewo kono,
52003002	bituŋ ŋà Timoti kii ali kaŋ. Ate mu m̀ baadiŋo le ti, aniŋ Alla la dookuulaa ka Kiristu la kibaari betoo janjandi. Ŋà a kii ali kaŋ ne, fo a si ali bambandi ali la lannoo kono, aniŋ ka ali wakiilindi
52003003	fo ali la ñiŋ toora kuwolu kana moo-wo-moo la lannoo lanjuuru. Alitolu faŋolu ye a loŋ ne ko, ñiŋ toora kuwolu mu ǹ taalu le ti.
52003004	Kabiriŋ ntolu be ali fee nuŋ, ŋà ñiŋ fo ali ye le ko, fo ǹ si toora, aduŋ saayiŋ a naata ke wo le ñaama, ko ali ye a je ñaameŋ.
52003005	Wo daliiloo le kamma la, biriŋ m maŋ a muña noo kotenke, ŋa Timoti kii ali kaŋ ka a loŋ, ali la lannoo be ñaameŋ. N tarata silandiŋ ne nuŋ ko, marisarilaa ye ali marisa baake le, ǹ na dookuwo keta kenseŋo ti.
52003006	Bari saayiŋ, Timoti futata ka bo naŋ ali yaa, aduŋ a ye kibaari kendoo le fo ntolu ye ali la lannoo niŋ kanoo la kuwolu to. A ye ñiŋ fanaa fo le ko, ali hakiloo ka tu ntolu kaŋ ne, aduŋ ali be hameriŋ ne ka ǹ je ko m̀ fanaa be hameriŋ ali jewo la ñaameŋ.
52003007	Baadiŋolu, ǹ na ali la ñiŋ lannoo la kuwo moyoo, wo le ye ǹ sabarindi ǹ na niikuyaalu niŋ ǹ na tooroolu bee kono.
52003008	Ǹ naata dahaa ǹ na baluwo kono le saayiŋ, baawo ŋà a moyi le ko, ali be bambandiŋ Maariyo la kuwo to le.
52003009	Ǹ si muŋ tenturu siifaa le dii noo Alla la ali la kuwo to? Ǹ te a tentu noo la a ñaama wo seewoo to, ŋà meŋ soto ali la kuwo to a ñaatiliŋo la.
52003010	Ǹ ka duwaa baake le, suutoo niŋ tiloo la, fo ǹ si ali je noo kotenke ñaa niŋ ñaa la, aniŋ ka kuwolu timmandi, ali dasata mennu la lannoo to.
52003011	Ñiŋ ne mu ǹ na duwaa ti ko, m̀ Faamaa Alla faŋo aniŋ m̀ Maarii Yeesu si ǹ na siloo parendi ka naa ali yaa.
52003012	Allamaa Alla ye ali la ñoo kanoo kafu, ali ye jarabi ñoo kanoo la, aniŋ moo koteŋolu kanoo, ko ntolu ye ali kanu ñaameŋ.
52003013	Ka bo niŋ ñiŋ siloo la, Alla si ali sondomoolu bambandi fo ali kana sootaari soto, aniŋ ali ye seneyaa m̀ Faamaa Alla ñaatiliŋo la, niŋ m̀ Maarii Yeesu naata kotenke, a niŋ a la moo senuŋolu bee.
52004001	Baadiŋolu, m̀ be ali daani kaŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu too la ka baluu niŋ baluuñaa la meŋ ka Alla seewondi. Wo mu baluuñaa le ti, ali ye meŋ karaŋ nuŋ ntolu bulu, aduŋ tooñaa, ali be baluuriŋ wo le ñaama. Wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, m̀ be ali wakiilindi la ka ali la katoo kafu,
52004002	kaatu ali ye yaamaroolu loŋ ne, ŋà mennu dii ali la ka bo niŋ Maarii Yeesu la.
52004003	Alla la lafoo mu ñiŋ ne ti ko, ali si ke a la moo senuŋolu ti, aduŋ ali si fata laañooyaa tuluŋo ma.
52004004	Alitolu meŋ-wo-meŋ ñanta a faŋo mara la le, ali si baluu seneyaa niŋ horomoo kono.
52004005	Ali maŋ ñaŋ na ali balajaatoo la hame kuu jawoolu nooma la ko jaahiloolu, mennu maŋ Alla loŋ.
52004006	Alla lafita le fanaa ko, moo-wo-moo kana landatamboo ke ka a mooñoo nakari ñiŋ kuwo la. Maariyo be i joo la wo moo siifaalu to le wo kuwolu bee la. Ŋà ñiŋ fo ali ye le nuŋ, ka ali dandalaa kendeke.
52004007	Alla maŋ ntolu kumandi ka ke moo seneyaabaloolu ti, bari ka ke moo senuŋolu ti.
52004008	Wo kamma la, niŋ moo-wo-moo balanta ñiŋ yaamaroo ma, wo maarii maŋ balaŋ hadamadiŋo ma, bari Alla, meŋ ye a la Noora Kuliŋo dii ali la.
52004009	Bari baadiŋ kanoo la kuwo to, m̀ maŋ suula ka feŋ safee ali ye wo to, baawo Alla ye alitolu faŋolu karandi le ka ñoo kanu.
52004010	Tooñaa le mu ko, ali ye baadiŋolu bee le kanu, mennu be Makedoniya tundoo kaŋ, bari m̀ be ali wakiilindi la ka ñoo kanu hani ka tambi nunto la.
52004011	Ali si baluu tenkundiŋo soto meŋ mu ali ye horomoo ti. Ali si ali fansuŋ haajoo muta, aduŋ ali si dookuwo ke ali buloolu la ko ŋà ali yaamari nuŋ a la ñaameŋ.
52004012	Wo to le ali be ke la horoma moolu ti hani moolu kono, mennu maŋ ke Yeesu noomalankoolu ti, aduŋ ali te tara la jikiriŋ moo koteŋ na.
52004013	Baadiŋolu, m maŋ lafi ali ye tu lombaliyaa kono ǹ na moolu la kuwo to, saayaa ye mennu muta, i si a je, ali te sunu la ko doolu mennu maŋ jikoo soto.
52004014	Baawo ǹ laata le ko, Yeesu faata le, aduŋ a wulita le ka bo saayaa kono, wo to ǹ laata ñiŋ na le fanaa ko, moolu mennu faata lannoo kono, Alla be wolu wulindi la le Yeesu la naa waatoo la fo ì si baluu ñoo la.
52004015	Kaatu ǹ ka Maariyo la ñiŋ kumoo bankee ali ye le ko, ntolu mennu be baluuriŋ saayiŋ fo Maariyo la naa tumoo la, ǹ te taa la moolu ñaato, mennu faata.
52004016	Niŋ Alla la kumandiroo keta, malaayika kuntiyo sarita aniŋ Alla la footaŋo kumata, wo waatoo la Maariyo faŋo le be jii la naŋ ka bo saŋo santo. Aduŋ mennu faata Kiristu noomalankayaa kono, wolu le foloo be wuli la.
52004017	Wo koolaa, ntolu mennu be baluuriŋ jaŋ, ǹ niŋ ì be kafu la ñoo ma minaayoolu kono le ka Maariyo benduŋ alihawaa kono. Bituŋ ǹ si tara Maariyo fee fo abadaa.
52004018	Wo to ali ñoo sabarindi niŋ ñiŋ kumoolu la.
52005001	Baadiŋolu, m̀ maŋ suula ka safeeroo ke waatoolu niŋ luŋolu la kuwo to,
52005002	baawo a koyita ali faŋolu la le ko, Maariyo la luŋo be naa la le ko suŋo ka naa suutoo la ñaameŋ.
52005003	Niŋ moolu ko, “Kayiroo niŋ tenkuŋo le be keriŋ,” bituŋ waati kiliŋ doroŋ, kasaaroo si boyi ì kaŋ ko tiŋo ka boyi musukonomaa kaŋ ñaameŋ, moo te kana noo la a ma.
52005004	Bari baadiŋolu, alitolu maŋ tara diboo kono, wo luŋo te ali tereŋ noo la ko suŋo.
52005005	Alitolu bee mu maloo diŋolu le ti, aniŋ tiloo diŋolu. M̀ maŋ ke suutoo taa ti, sako diboo.
52005006	Wo to, ali ǹ kana siinoo ko moo koteŋolu ka a ke ñaameŋ, bari ali ŋà tu ǹ ñaa la, ŋà soobeeyaa kendeke.
52005007	Kaatu moolu mennu ka siinoo, wolu ka siinoo suutoo le la, aduŋ moolu mennu ka siira, wolu ka siira suutoo le la.
52005008	Bari ntolu mennu mu tiloo taa ti, ali ŋà soobeeyaa. Ali ŋà lannoo niŋ kanoo duŋ ko sisi tankandiraŋo, aduŋ ka jikoo soto kiisoo la kuwo to, ali ŋà wo ke ǹ na tankandirilaŋ naafoo ti.
52005009	Alla maŋ ǹ tomboŋ fo ǹ taa si ke a la kamfaa baa ti, bari a ye ǹ tomboŋ ne ka kiisoo soto ka bo niŋ m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la.
52005010	A faata ǹ ye le, fo m̀ be baluuriŋ baŋ, waraŋ m̀ faata, bari ǹ niŋ a si baluu noo ñoo la, niŋ a muruta naŋ.
52005011	Wo kamma la, ali ñoo sabarindi, ali ye ñoo bambandi, ko ali be a kaŋ ñaameŋ.
52005012	Baadiŋolu, m̀ be ali daani kaŋ ko, ali si moolu buuñaa, mennu be dookuwo la ali fee, aniŋ mennu marata ali ma Maariyo too la, aniŋ ì ka ali yaamari.
52005013	Ali horoma baa dii ì la kanoo kono, ì la dookuwo kamma la. Ali tara kayiroo kono ñoo fee.
52005014	Baadiŋolu, m̀ be ali wakiilindi la, ali si moolu dandalaa, mennu maŋ lafi dookuwo la. Ali jooteentuŋolu wakiilindi, ali ye moolu maakoyi mennu lamfuta, aduŋ ali si ke muñalaa ti moolu bee ye.
52005015	Ali a je ko, moo-wo-moo kana kuu jawoo joo kuu jawoo la, bari ali si hame ka kuu betoo ke ñoo ye, aniŋ moolu bee.
52005016	Ali seewoo waati-wo-waati,
52005017	ali kana i dahaa duwaa la.
52005018	Ali Alla tentu kuu-wo-kuu to, kaatu wo le mu a la lafoo ti ali ye, Kiristu Yeesu kafuñooyaa kono.
52005019	Ali kana balaŋ Noora Kuliŋo ma,
52005020	aduŋ ali kana jutu kiilaariyaa kumoolu la,
52005021	bari ali kuwolu bee kisikisi. Ali si i deŋ kuu betoo la.
52005022	Ali fata kuu jawoo siifaa bee ma.
52005023	Allamaa Alla faŋo meŋ ka kayiroo dii, a ye ali muumewo seneyandi. Allamaa ali la nooroolu, ali niyolu aniŋ ali balajaatoolu bee ye tanka sootaari sotoo ma, fo janniŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu be naa la.
52005024	Ate meŋ ka ali kumandi, a foroyaata le, aduŋ a be wo ke la le.
52005025	Baadiŋolu, ali duwaa ǹ ye.
52005026	Ali baadiŋolu bee kontoŋ niŋ sumburu senuŋo la.
52005027	M be ali yaamari la kendeke Maariyo too la, ali si ñiŋ leetaroo karaŋ baadiŋolu bee ye.
52005028	M̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la hiinoo ye tara ali fee.
53001001	Nte Pawulu, Silas aniŋ Timoti be Yeesu la kafoo moolu kontoŋ na, mennu be Tesalonika saatewo kono aniŋ mennu bee mu m̀ Faamaa Alla taa ti, aniŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu.
53001002	Hiinoo niŋ kayiroo be ali fee ka bo m̀ Faamaa Alla bulu, aniŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu.
53001003	Baadiŋolu, a be beŋ na le, a mu hani ñantoo le ti ntolu kaŋ, ka Alla tentu ali la kuwo to waati-wo-waati, kaatu ali la lannoo be yiriwaa kaŋ baake le, aduŋ ali kiliŋ-kiliŋ naa la ñoo kanoo be kafu kaŋ ne.
53001004	Wo kamma la, m̀ faŋolu ka kibiri ali la kuwo la le Alla la kafoolu kono, kaatu ali ye wakiiloo niŋ lannoo meŋ soto, aduŋ ali ka muña tooroolu niŋ bataa kuwolu bee kono le.
53001005	Wo le ye a yitandi koyirinke ko, Alla ka a la kiitiyo kuntu tiliŋo le kono fo ali si jari ka duŋ Alla la mansabaayaa kono, ali be toora kaŋ meŋ kamma.
53001006	Baawo a koyita le ko, Alla tilinta le, aduŋ moolu mennu ka ali batandi, a be wolu joo la niŋ bataa kuwolu le la.
53001007	Alla be dahaa dii la alitolu le la, mennu toorandita, aduŋ a be dahaa dii la m̀ fanaa la le. Ñiŋ ne be ke la, niŋ Maarii Yeesu fintita naŋ ka bo saŋo santo, a niŋ a la malaayika sembemaalu.
53001008	Ì be naa la dimbaa mala baa kataŋo kono ka moolu joo yankankatoo la, mennu maŋ Alla loŋ, aniŋ ì maŋ m̀ Maarii Yeesu la kibaari betoo muta.
53001009	Kuluuroo be laa la wo moolu kaŋ ka bo niŋ badaa-badaa kasaaroo la. Ì te futa la Maariyo ñaatiliŋo la, ì ye jamfa a la waroo kallankeeyaa la.
53001010	Wo be ke la le luŋo meŋ na, Kiristu be naa la ka horomoo soto ka bo a la moo senuŋolu bulu, aniŋ ka jayiroo soto moolu bulu, mennu laata a la. Alitolu faŋolu be ì kono le, kaatu ali laata ǹ na seedeyaa la le.
53001011	Wo kamma la, ntolu te n dahaa la duwaa la ali ye. Ǹ ka ǹ na Alla daani le fo a si ali jarindi a la kumandiroo la, aduŋ fo ali la hame betoolu aniŋ dookuwo lannoo kono bee si timma ka bo niŋ a la semboo la.
53001012	Wo siloo la, m̀ Maarii Yeesu too si horoma ka bo niŋ ali la baluwo la, aniŋ alitolu fanaa si horoma ate kono ka bo niŋ ǹ na Alla la hiinoo la, aniŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu.
53002001	Baadiŋolu, saayiŋ ŋà kumoo soto m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la naa kuwo to le, aniŋ ǹ na kafuñoomoo ka a benduŋ. M̀ be ali daani la,
53002002	ali kana tariyaa piwu la, waraŋ ka bara, niŋ ali ye kibaaroo moyi ko, Maariyo la luŋo siita le fokabaŋ. Ali sondomoolu kana toora, hani niŋ wo kumoo bota niŋ kiilaariyaa kumoo le la, aniŋ kuma koteŋ, waraŋ leetaroo, ì ko, meŋ bota ntolu bulu.
53002003	Ali kana soŋ, moo ye ali neenee sila-wo-sila la, kaatu wo luŋo te naa la, fo niŋ muriti baa keta foloo, aniŋ Luwaantaŋo fintita naŋ. Ate mu kasaaroo diŋo le ti,
53002004	meŋ ka balaŋ feŋ-wo-feŋ na, moolu ka mennu batu. A ka a faŋ sikandi le ka tambi feŋolu bee la, a be hani sii la Alla Batudulaa kono le ka a fo ko, ate le faŋo mu Alla ti.
53002005	Ali hakiloolu maŋ bula baŋ, ŋa ñiŋ kuwolu fo ali ye le nuŋ, biriŋ m be ali fee?
53002006	Aduŋ ali ye a loŋ ne, meŋ be a mutariŋ hani saayiŋ. Bari niŋ a la waatoo siita, a be finti la le.
53002007	Tooñaa, luwaantaŋyaa semboo be dookuwo ke kaŋ kulloo kono le fokabaŋ, bari meŋ ye a muta kooma hani saayiŋ, wo ñanta bondi la le foloo.
53002008	Wo koolaa le, wo Luwaantaŋo be finti la moolu kaŋ, aduŋ m̀ Maarii Yeesu be a faa la niŋ a daa foñoo le la, a be a kasaara la a la naa semboo niŋ waroo le la.
53002009	Wo Luwaantaŋo niŋ Seetaanoo la semboo bee le ka naa, wo niŋ neeneeri taamanseeroolu niŋ neeneeri kaawakuwolu.
53002010	Moolu bee mennu be kasaara la, a be ì neenee la niŋ neeneeri jawu siifaa bee le la, kaatu ì balanta le ka tooñaa kanu, meŋ si ì kiisa.
53002011	Wo kamma la, Alla ye neeneeri sembemaa baa le kii ì kaŋ, fo ì si laa faniyaa la.
53002012	Wo to le, mennu maŋ laa tooñaa la, bari ì ka niidiyaa soto tilimbaliyaa kono, ì bee be halaki la.
53002013	Bari baadiŋolu, Maariyo ye mennu kanu, a mu ñantoo le ti ntolu ye ka Alla tentu alitolu la kuwo to, kaatu a ye ali tomboŋ ne biriŋ foloodulaa to ka kiisoo soto. Ñiŋ kiisoo naata le, biriŋ Nooroo ye ali seneyandi, aniŋ ali laata tooñaa la.
53002014	Alla ye ali kumandi ñiŋ ne to ka bo niŋ kibaari betoo la, ǹ ka meŋ kawandi, fo alitolu fanaa si m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la kallankeeyaa soto.
53002015	Wo to baadiŋolu, ali loo bambandinke, aduŋ ali si tenteŋ ka karandiroolu muta, ŋà ali karandi mennu la, fo ǹ daakumoolu le mu baŋ, waraŋ leetaroo.
53002016	M̀ Faamaa Alla ye ntolu kanu le, aduŋ a hiinanteeyaata le ka badaa-badaa sabarindiroo niŋ jiki betoo dii ǹ na. Ǹ ka ate le niŋ m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu daani,
53002017	ka ali sondomoolu sabarindi, aniŋ ka ali sondomoolu bambandi, fo ali ye meŋ-wo-meŋ ke aniŋ ali ye kuma-wo-kuma fo, si barakoo soto.
53003001	Baadiŋolu, labaŋo la m̀ be ali daani la ka duwaa ǹ ye fo Maariyo la kumoo si janjaŋ katabake, aniŋ ka horoma baa soto ko a keta ali kono ñaameŋ.
53003002	Ali duwaa fanaa fo ǹ si tanka moo kuruŋolu niŋ moo jawoolu ma, kaatu a maŋ ke ko, moolu bee le ye lannoo soto.
53003003	Bari Maariyo foroyaata le, a be ali bambandi la le, aduŋ a be ali tankandi la Seetaanoo ma le.
53003004	Ŋà dankeneyaa soto Maariyo kono le ali la kuwo to ko, ali be kuwolu le ke kaŋ, ŋà ali yaamari mennu la, aniŋ ali be tenteŋ na le ka wo kuwolu ke.
53003005	Allamaa Maariyo ye ali sondomoolu tilindi Alla la kanoo kaŋ, aniŋ ka wakiili ko Kiristu wakiilita ñaameŋ.
53003006	Baadiŋolu, saayiŋ m̀ be ali yaamari la kendeke m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu too la ko, ali jamfa baadiŋ-wo-baadiŋ na, meŋ maŋ lafi dookuwo la, aduŋ a maañaa niŋ karandiroo maŋ taa ñoo la, ali ye meŋ soto ntolu bulu.
53003007	Kaatu alitolu faŋolu ye a loŋ ne, ali ñanta ntolu la simfaa nooma la ñaameŋ. M̀ maŋ ke dookuubaloolu ti, kabiriŋ m̀ be ali fee,
53003008	aduŋ m̀ maŋ moo-wo-moo le la domoroo domo, m̀ maŋ feŋ joo meŋ kunna. Ǹ keta katalaa baa le ti ǹ na dookuwo kono suutoo niŋ tiloo, fo ǹ kana ke dunoo ti moo-wo-moo ye ali kono.
53003009	A maŋ ke ko, m̀ maŋ siloo soto ka maakoyiroo kaniŋ ali bulu, bari ŋà ñiŋ ke le, fo ǹ si misaaloo dii ali la, ali be meŋ nooma la.
53003010	Hani kabiriŋ m̀ be ali fee, ŋà ñiŋ yaamaroo dii ali la le ko: Niŋ moo meŋ buka dookuwo ke, wo maarii kana domoroo ke.
53003011	Ŋà ñiŋ fo, kaatu ŋà a moyi le ko, moo doolu le be alitolu kono jee, mennu maŋ soŋ dookuwo la. Ì bulu buka tara mutariŋ feŋ na, bari yaayoo doroŋ ka ì daa bula wandi kuwolu to.
53003012	M̀ be wo moo siifaalu dandalaa la, aniŋ ka ì yaamari kendeke Maarii Yeesu Kiristu too la ka ì la dookuwo ke tenkuŋo kono ka feŋ soto, ì be ì daañini la meŋ na.
53003013	Baadiŋolu, ali kana bataa kuu bete kewo la.
53003014	Niŋ moo-wo-moo balanta yaamaroolu la, ŋà mennu fo ñiŋ leetaroo kono, ali si ali hakiloo tu wo maarii to. Ali niŋ a kana kafu ka kuu ke, fo a si malu.
53003015	Hani wo, ali kana a muta ko ali jawoo, bari ali si a dandalaa ko ali baadiŋo.
53003016	Allamaa Kayiroo Maariyo faŋo ye kayiroo dii ali la waatoo bee la, aniŋ kuwolu bee to. Maariyo ye tara ali bee fee.
53003017	Nte, Pawulu le ye ñiŋ kontondiroo safee ali ye m faŋo buloo la. Ñiŋ ne mu taamanseeroo ti n na leetaroolu bee kono, n ka safeeroo ke wo le ñaama.
53003018	M̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la hiinoo ye tara ali bee fee.
54001001	Nte Pawulu, Kiristu Yeesu la kiilaa ka bo niŋ Alla la yaamaroo la, meŋ mu ǹ na Kiisandirilaa ti, aniŋ Kiristu Yeesu, meŋ mu ǹ jikoo ti,
54001002	m be ite Timoti kontoŋ na, n dinkee tooñaa lannoo kono. Hiinoo, balafaa aniŋ kayiroo be i fee, ka bo Alla bulu, m̀ Faamaa, aniŋ Kiristu Yeesu, m̀ Maariyo.
54001003	M be i daani la ko ŋa a ke nuŋ ñaameŋ, kabiriŋ m be taa kaŋ Makedoniya, i si tu Efesus saatewo kono, fo i si moo doolu dandalaa, ì kana karandiri ke, meŋ niŋ karandiri tooñaa maŋ ke kiliŋ ti.
54001004	I si a fo ì ye, ì kana tara tuukuriŋ taaliŋ kenseŋolu niŋ bonsuŋ saatari bambaloo kaŋ, mennu ka ñoosaboo naati, bari ì buka Alla la dookuwo yiriwandi, meŋ be dendiŋ lannoo la.
54001005	Ǹ na yaamaroo la daliiloo mu kanoo le ti, meŋ ka bo sondome senuŋo kono, sondometantaŋ betoo, aniŋ lanna tooñaa.
54001006	Doolu jenketa wo kuwolu la le, aduŋ ì ye ì ñaa tiliŋ kuma kenseŋ foo la.
54001007	Ì be hameriŋ ka ke Luwaa karammoolu ti, bari ì ka kuwolu mennu fo, waraŋ ì ka mennu bambandi, ì maŋ ì fahaamu hani domandiŋ.
54001008	Ŋà a loŋ ne ko, Luwaa beteyaata le, niŋ moo ye a taamandi a ñaama.
54001009	Ŋà ñiŋ fahaamu le ko, a maŋ londi moo tilindiŋolu ye, bari a londita luwaantaŋolu niŋ luwaa tiñaalaalu le ye, allantaŋolu niŋ junubelaalu, aniŋ seneyaabaloolu niŋ moo kosoriŋolu ye. A londita moolu le ye, mennu ka ì wuluulaalu faa, aniŋ moofaalaalu,
54001010	laañooyaa tulunnaalu, luutikankewolu, moo suuñaalaalu, faniyaa folaalu, aniŋ moolu mennu ka i kali faniyaa kaŋ, aniŋ mennu ka kuu-wo-kuu ke, meŋ niŋ karandiri tooñaa maŋ taa ñoo la.
54001011	Alla meŋ jarita jayiroo bee la, a ye ñiŋ karandiri tooñaa karafa m ma kibaari betoo le kono, meŋ ye a la semboo niŋ waroo yitandi.
54001012	N ka Kiristu Yeesu tentu le, m̀ Maariyo meŋ ye n sembentuŋyaa, kaatu ate ye m muta moo foroyaariŋo le ti, aduŋ a ye n tomboŋ a la dookuwo le ye.
54001013	A ye ñiŋ ke nte ye le, hani n keta tooñeeri kumafolaa ti nuŋ ñaa-wo-ñaa, toorandirilaa aniŋ fitinamoo. Bari balafaa diita n na le, kaatu ŋa wo ke lombaliyaa niŋ lannabaliyaa le kono.
54001014	M̀ Maariyo la hiinoo warata nte kaŋ ne, n naata lannoo niŋ kanoo soto Kiristu Yeesu kono.
54001015	Tooñaa kumoo fele, meŋ jarita ka muta: Kiristu Yeesu naata duniyaa kono le ka junubelaalu kiisa, aduŋ nte le mu junubelaalu bee kuntonkoo ti.
54001016	Bari balafaa diita n na ñiŋ daliiloo le kamma la, fo Yeesu Kiristu si a la muñoo bee yitandi nte kono, junubelaalu bee kuntonkoo, aduŋ n na kuwo si ke misaaloo ti moolu bee ye, mennu be naa laa la ate la ka badaa-badaa baluwo soto.
54001017	Jayiroo be badaa-badaa Mansoo le ye, meŋ buka faa, aduŋ moo buka a je. Horomoo niŋ jayiroo be ate Alla kiliŋo le ye fo abadaa. Amiin.
54001018	N dinkewo Timoti, ŋa ñiŋ yaamaroo le dii i la, meŋ niŋ kiilaariyaa ñaatokumoolu taata ñoo la, mennu fota i kunto nuŋ. Wo kumoolu nooma ka kele betoo kele,
54001019	i kana sondometantaŋ betoo niŋ lannoo bula. Moo doolu ye ñinnu fayi le, wo le ye a tinna ì la lannoo kasaarata.
54001020	Himeneyu niŋ Alesanda be wo moolu le kono, ŋa ì dii Seetaanoo la ka ì kuluu, fo ì kana tooñeeroo ke kotenke.
54002001	Foloo-foloo, ŋa yaamaroo dii le ka daaniroo niŋ duwaa ke, ka duwaa moolu ye, aniŋ ka tenturoo ke moolu bee la kuwo to,
54002002	sako mansoolu niŋ kantiyolu, fo ǹ si baluu noo kayiroo niŋ tenkuŋo kono, ǹ niŋ horomoo, Alla la siloo la.
54002003	Wo le beteyaata, aduŋ kuu le mu, Alla ǹ na Kiisandirilaa sonta meŋ na,
54002004	ate meŋ hameta, moolu bee ye kiisoo soto, aniŋ ka londi koyoo soto tooñaa to.
54002005	Kaatu Alla kiliŋ ne sotota, aduŋ teemafolaa kiliŋ ne sotota Alla niŋ hadamadiŋolu teema. Wo mu Kiristu Yeesu le ti, hadamadiŋo
54002006	meŋ ye a faŋo dii kumakaaraŋo ti moolu bee ye. Ate mu seedoo le ti, meŋ diita nuŋ a waatoo faŋo la.
54002007	Wo kamma la, nte tombonta kawandilaa niŋ kiilaa le ti. Ŋa tooñaa le fo, m maŋ faniyaa fo! Nte tombonta ka moolu mennu maŋ ke Yahuudoolu ti, karandi tooñaa niŋ lannoo la kuwo le la.
54002008	Wo to, niŋ Kiristu la kafoo moolu benta daa-wo-daa, n lafita le, kewolu si ì bulu senuŋolu wulindi santo ka duwaa, kamfaabaliyaa niŋ soosooribaliyaa kono.
54002009	Aduŋ musoolu la karoo la, n lafita le, ì kana ì paree faŋ yitandoo kamma la, bari ì si ì paree horomoo kono, meŋ niŋ kuwolu si taa ñoo la. Ì kana ì faŋolu ñarandi niŋ deberi ñarandi feŋolu la, waraŋ sanoo, pemoolu, aniŋ sitifeŋ daa koleŋolu la.
54002010	Bari ì ñanta ì faŋolu ñarandi la niŋ kebaara betoolu le la, mennu beteyaata musoolu ye, mennu la seedeyaa ka Alla horoma.
54002011	Musoo si karaŋ deyoo niŋ fammajiyo bee kono.
54002012	Nte maŋ soŋ, musoo ka karandiroo ke, waraŋ ka kaŋo soto kewo kaŋ. A ñanta deyoo le muta la.
54002013	Kaatu Adama le foloo daata nuŋ, wo koolaa Hawa.
54002014	Aduŋ Adama maŋ neenee nuŋ, bari musoo le neeneeta, aduŋ a naata ke luwaa tiñaalaa ti.
54002015	Hani wo, musoo be kiisa la le ka bo niŋ diŋ wuluwo la, niŋ a tententa lannoo kono, kanoo, seneyaa aniŋ faŋ kaañaŋo.
54003001	Tooñaa kumoo fele: Niŋ moo-wo-moo lafita ka ke kantarilaa ti Yeesu la kafoo ye, a lafita dookuu betoo le la.
54003002	Kantarilaa ñanta ke la moo le ti, meŋ maŋ sootaaroo soto. A ñanta ke la kewo le ti, meŋ foroyaata a la musoo ma. A maŋ ñaŋ na ke la landatambi moo ti, a ñanta a faŋ muta la le. A ñanta ke la hakilimaa le ti, moo meŋ ka luntaŋolu jiyaa aniŋ meŋ ka karandiroo ke noo.
54003003	A maŋ ñaŋ na ke la dolominnaa waraŋ fitinamoo ti, bari a ñanta sooneeyaa la le. A kana ke sonkamoo ti, sako kodilandiyo.
54003004	A ñanta a faŋo la dimbaayaalu mara noo la le. A ñanta a diŋolu kuluu la fammajiyo niŋ buuñaaroo siloo bee le la.
54003005	Niŋ meŋ maŋ a faŋo la dimbaayaalu mara noo, a be Alla la kafoo topatoo noo la ñaadii le?
54003006	Kantarilaa maŋ ñaŋ na ke la Yeesu noomalanka kutoo ti, niŋ wo nte a si a faŋ wara noo le, a ye boyi halakoo kono ko Ibiliisa.
54003007	A ñanta seedeyaa betoo le soto la moolu fanaa kono, mennu maŋ ke Yeesu noomalankoolu ti, fo a kana bula malu kuwo kono, aniŋ Ibiliisa la kutindiŋo.
54003008	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, maakoyirilaalu ñanta soobeeyaa la le, ì maŋ ñaŋ na ke la neŋ fula tiyolu ti, dolo jamaa minnaalu, waraŋ mennu ka tinewo ñini tapaleeyaa kono.
54003009	Lannoo la kuwo meŋ tarata kulloo kono nuŋ, ì ñanta a muta kuu la le, fo ì sondomoo te ì tuumi noo la feŋ na.
54003010	Ì ñanta kotoboroo soto la le foloo. Niŋ ì ye ì faŋolu yitandi ko, ì maŋ sootaaroo soto, bituŋ ì si naa maakoyirilaa dookuwo ke.
54003011	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, niŋ musoolu le mu, ì ñanta jari la buuñaa la le, ì maŋ ñaŋ na ke la kajafirilaalu ti, ì ñanta soobeeyaa la le, ì ye foroyaa feŋolu bee to.
54003012	Maakoyirilaa kewolu ñanta ke la moolu le ti, mennu foroyaata ì la musoolu ma, ì ye ì diŋolu mara kuu, aniŋ ì la dimbaayaa bee.
54003013	Moolu mennu ka ì la maakoyiri dookuwo ke kuu, ì be too betoo le soto la ì faŋolu ye, aduŋ ì be fatiyaa la le doroŋ ì la lannoo to Kiristu Yeesu kono.
54003014	N jikita le ko, a te mee la, m be naa la i kaŋ jee. Hani wo, m be ñiŋ yaamaroolu safee kaŋ i ye le,
54003015	fo niŋ m meeta, i si a loŋ, moolu ñanta maa la ñaameŋ Alla la dimbaayaa kono, meŋ mu Alla baluuriŋo la kafoo ti, tooñaa la samasiŋo, aniŋ fondamaŋo.
54003016	A koyita le ko, ǹ na lannoo kulloo warata le: A naata hadamadiŋyaa le kono, a la tiliŋo yitandita ka bo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo le la. Malaayikoolu le ye a je, a la kuwo kawandita nasiyoŋolu kono. Lannoo keta a la kuwo to ñiŋ duniyaa kono, a wulindita ka taa santo, kallankeeyaa kono.
54004001	Noora Kuliŋo ye a fo seneyaarinke le ko, luŋ labaŋolu kono, doolu be lannoo bula la le, ì ye neeneeri nooroolu nooma, aniŋ seetaani jawoolu la karandiroolu.
54004002	Ñiŋ kuwolu karandirilaalu mu bunaafayoolu niŋ faniyaa folaalu le ti, mennu sondometantaŋolu kasaarata ko nee kandoo ye mennu keremu.
54004003	Ì ye futuwo haraamuyandi le, aduŋ ì ka domori feŋ doolu kasiyandi, Alla ye mennu daa fo lannamoolu mennu ye tooñaa loŋ si ì domo, ì niŋ tenturoo.
54004004	Baawo Alla ye feŋ-wo-feŋ daa, wo beteyaata le. Wo to moo maŋ ñaŋ na balaŋ na feŋ na, bari a si a muta niŋ tenturoo la.
54004005	I ye a je le ko, Alla la kumoo niŋ duwaa le ye wo domori feŋo seneyandi.
54004006	Niŋ i ye ñiŋ yaamaroolu fo baadiŋolu ye, i be ke la Kiristu Yeesu la dookuulaa betoo le ti, meŋ ka i daañini niŋ lannoo kumoolu la, aniŋ karandiri betoo, i bulata meŋ nooma.
54004007	Fata taaliŋ fuuriŋolu ma, mennu niŋ Alla la siloo maŋ taa ñoo la, bari i faŋo kuluu ka yiriwaa Alla la siloo kaŋ.
54004008	Balajaata kuluuroo ye nafaa soto le domandiŋ, bari ka yiriwaa Alla la siloo kaŋ, wo ye nafaa soto kuwolu bee le to, kaatu a ye laahidoo soto, saayiŋ baluwo ye le, aniŋ baluwo ye, meŋ be naa la.
54004009	Wo le mu tooñaa kumoo ti, meŋ jarita ka muta!
54004010	Wo to, ntolu ka dookuwo niŋ katoo ke baake le, kaatu ŋà ǹ jikoo loo Alla baluuriŋo le kaŋ, meŋ mu moolu bee la Kiisandirilaa ti, sako mennu laata a la.
54004011	Wolu le mu kuwolu ti, i ñanta yaamaroo dii la mennu to, aduŋ i si moolu karandi ì la.
54004012	Kana soŋ, moo-wo-moo ye jutu i la, i la dindiŋyaa kaŋ. Bari i si ke misaaloo ti lannamoolu ye kumoolu to, maañaa, kanoo, lannoo aniŋ seneyaa.
54004013	Janniŋ m be naa la, i si tu tuukuriŋ Alla la kumoo karaŋo la moolu ye, kawandoo, aniŋ karandiroo.
54004014	Kana i ñaa kaasi Alla la soorifeŋo la, meŋ be i kono. A diita i la le ka bo niŋ kiilaariyaa ñaatokumoo la, biriŋ alifaalu la kafoo ye ì buloolu laa i kaŋ.
54004015	Kana i dahaa ñiŋ dookuwo la, i si tu tuukuriŋ wo kaŋ, fo moo-wo-moo si i la yiriwaa je.
54004016	I faŋo koroosi, aniŋ i la karandiroo. Ñiŋ kuwolu muta bulu fula la, kaatu niŋ ì ye wolu ke, i be i faŋo tankandi la le, aniŋ moolu mennu ye i la kumoolu moyi.
54005001	Kana keebaa dooyaa, bari i si a yaamari ko i faamaa. Fondinkewolu yaamari ko i baadiŋolu,
54005002	musu keebaalu ko i baamaalu, aniŋ foromusoolu ko i baarimmusoolu, seneyaa bee kono.
54005003	Furuyaamusoolu buuñaa, mennu maŋ maakoyilaa soto.
54005004	Niŋ furuyaamusoo ye diŋolu soto, waraŋ mamariŋolu, ì ñanta meŋ foloo karaŋ na, wo le mu ka ì faŋo la dimbaayaalu topatoo ko Yeesu noomalankayaa hakoo be ñaameŋ. Dindiŋolu ñanta ì wuluulaalu la ñiiñaa juloo joo la le, kaatu wo le beteyaata Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
54005005	Furuyaamusu tooñaa, meŋ kiliŋ tuta, a ye a jikoo loo Alla kaŋ, aduŋ a ka tu tuukuriŋ duwaa niŋ daaniroo la, suutoo aniŋ tiloo.
54005006	Bari furuyaamusoo meŋ be baluuriŋ niidiyaa kono, wo faata le, hani a be baluuriŋ ñaa-wo-ñaa.
54005007	Wo kuwo bambandi ì ma fo moo kana ì tuumi noo feŋ na.
54005008	Bari niŋ moo-wo-moo maŋ a la moolu topatoo, sako a faŋo la dimbaayaa, wo maarii ye a koo dii a la lannoo la le, aduŋ ate le jawuyaata ka tambi lannabaloo la.
54005009	Furuyaamusoolu toosafewo to, musu too kana safee jee, fo niŋ a ye sanji taŋ wooro soto, aniŋ a foroyaata taalaa ma, a keemaa.
54005010	Aduŋ a ñanta seedeyaa betoo fanaa soto la a kebaaroolu to le: A ye ke moo ti, meŋ ye a diŋolu kuluu kuu, a ye luntaŋolu jiyaa, a ye Alla la moo senuŋolu siŋolu kuu, a ye moolu maakoyi, mennu be bataa kono, aduŋ a ye a faŋo dii dookuu betoo bee la.
54005011	Kana furuyaamusu dindiŋolu too safee, kaatu niŋ ì balajaatoo la hame kuwolu naata ì kaŋ, ì be jamfa la Kiristu la le, aduŋ ì be lafi la le ka futuu kotenke.
54005012	Niŋ wo keta, kiitiyo laata ì kaŋ ne, kaatu ì ye ì la laahidi foloo bula le.
54005013	Aduŋ fanaa, ì be dali la le ka naafa, niŋ ì be yaayi la taariŋ ka bo buŋ ka taa buŋ. A maŋ ke wo dammaa ti, bari ì be ke la koomakumarilaalu ti le, aniŋ moolu mennu ka ì daa bula wandi kuwolu to, ì ka kuwolu fo le, ì maŋ ñaŋ na mennu fo la.
54005014	Wo le ye a tinna n lafita, furuyaamusu dindiŋolu ye futuu, ì si diŋolu wuluu, ì ye ì la suwo kono topatoo, ì kana siloo dii ǹ jawoolu la ka kuma jawoo fo m̀ ma.
54005015	Furuyaamusu dindiŋ doolu jenketa le fokabaŋ, ì bulata Seetaanoo nooma.
54005016	Niŋ Yeesu noomalanka musoo ye furuyaamusoolu soto a la dimbaayaalu kono, a ñanta ì maakoyi la le, fo wo dunoo kana laa Yeesu la kafoo kaŋ. I si a je, wolu si doo koteŋolu maakoyi noo, mennu maŋ maakoyilaa soto.
54005017	Alifaalu mennu ka Yeesu la kafoo ñaatonkayaa kuu, wolu jarita horomoo niŋ buuñaa la le ko siiñaa fula, sako mennu la dookuwo mu kawandoo aniŋ karandiroo ti.
54005018	Kaatu Alla la kumoo be safeeriŋ ne ko, “Ali kana ninsoo daa siti, niŋ a be siimaŋ toñonkoo la.” Aduŋ a fota le fanaa ko, “Dookuulaa jarita a la joo la le.”
54005019	Kana soŋ, kaŋo ye laa alifaa la, fo niŋ wo kuwo loota seede fula waraŋ seede saba la seedeyaa la.
54005020	Mennu maŋ junube kewo bula, ì jalayi kenebaa to baadiŋolu bee ñaatiliŋo la, fo doo koteŋolu si sila wo kuu siifaalu kewo la.
54005021	M be i yaamari la kendeke Alla niŋ Kiristu Yeesu ñaatiliŋo la, aniŋ malaayika tombondiŋolu, ñiŋ kuwolu ke faasaaribaliyaa kono, i kana feŋ ke kara kiliŋ na.
54005022	Kana koronto ka i buloo laa moo kaŋ ka a kerekere Alla la dookuwo ye. Kana duŋ wandi junuboolu kono, bari i si tu seneyaariŋ.
54005023	Kana jiyo doroŋ miŋ, bari i si wayinoo domandiŋ miŋ i konoo la kuwo kamma la, baawo a ka i maa le waati niŋ waati.
54005024	Moo doolu la junuboolu jeta koyirinke le, aduŋ ì be finti la kiitiyo to juuna le, bari doolu la junuboolu be finti la ñaato doroŋ ne.
54005025	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, moo doolu la kebaara betoolu jeta koyirinke le, bari hani mennu maŋ finti foloo, wolu te tu la maaboriŋ kulloo kono.
54006001	Baadiŋolu mennu bee be joŋyaa yookoo koto, ì ñanta ì la kuntiyolu horoma la le, ì ye ì buuñaa, fo moo-wo-moo kana jutu Alla too niŋ ǹ na karandiroo la.
54006002	Niŋ ì ye kuntiyolu soto, mennu fanaa mu baadiŋ Yeesu noomalankoolu ti, ì maŋ ñaŋ na wo ke la siloo ti ka jutu ì la. Wo noo to, ì si katoo kafu ì la dookuwo to ñinnu ye, mennu mu ì baadiŋ kanuntewolu ti. Ñiŋ kuwolu karandi, i ye ì bambandi kendeke.
54006003	Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye karandiri koteŋ ke, aduŋ a maŋ soŋ m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la kuma kendoolu la, mennu ka soto niŋ Alla la siloo la,
54006004	wo maarii mu faŋ wara moo le ti, meŋ maŋ feŋ-wo-feŋ loŋ. A ye hame jawoo le soto ka soosooroo ke, aniŋ ñoosaboo kumoolu to. Wolu le ka kiiliyaa saabu, talaaroo, tooñeeroo aniŋ sobi jawoo,
54006005	aduŋ ì ka moolu dundi ñoo la le, mennu hakiloolu nakarita, ì maŋ tara tooñaa kaŋ kotenke. Wo moolu ye a miira le ko, Alla la siloo mu naafulu ñiniraŋo le ti.
54006006	Tooñaa, Alla la siloo mu naafulu baa le ti, niŋ a niŋ wasoo ka taa ñoo la.
54006007	Ǹ niŋ feŋ maŋ naa ñiŋ duniyaa kono, aduŋ ǹ niŋ feŋ te taa la.
54006008	Wo to, niŋ ŋà ǹ na domoroo niŋ feetoofatoo soto, ali ŋà wasa wolu la.
54006009	Bari moolu mennu lafita ka fanka, ì be boyi la marisa kuwo niŋ kutindiŋo kono le. Ì be bula la hame siifaa jamaa le nooma, mennu ka moolu duŋ hakilintaŋyaa niŋ mantooroo kono, aduŋ labaŋo la ì be duŋ na tiñaaroo niŋ kasaaroo le kono.
54006010	Kaatu kodilandiyaa le mu kuruŋyaa bee suloo ti. Moo doolu mennu la hame kuwo keta kodoo ti, wolu jenketa lannoo siloo la le, aduŋ ì ye ì faŋolu dimindi jawuke niŋ niikuyaa jamaa le la.
54006011	Bari ite meŋ mu Alla la moo ti, bori ñiŋ kuwolu ma. I si hame tiliŋo la, Alla ñaasilaŋo, lannoo, kanoo, wakiiloo aniŋ mooyaa.
54006012	Lannoo la kele betoo kele, ì ye badaa-badaa baluwo muta ì bulu fuloo la. Wo mu baluwo le ti, i kumandita meŋ to, biriŋ i ye i faŋo dii a la, ka bo niŋ i la seedeyaa betoo la, seede jamaa ñaatiliŋo la.
54006013	M be i yaamari la bambandinke Alla ñaatiliŋo la, baluwo bee ka bo meŋ bulu, aniŋ Kiristu Yeesu ñaatiliŋo la, meŋ ye seedeyaa betoo ke Pontiyus Payileti ñaatiliŋo la,
54006014	ñiŋ yaamaroo muta sootaaribaliyaa kono fo moo kana i tuumi noo feŋ na. A muta fo m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la finti naŋ waatoo la,
54006015	Alla faŋo ye meŋ londi. Ate Alla kiliŋo le mu Sembetiyo ti, meŋ jarita jayiroo bee la, Mansoolu la Mansoo aniŋ Maariyolu Maarii.
54006016	Ate dammaa le buka faa. A be sabatiriŋ mala baa le kono, hadamadiŋo te sutiyaa noo la meŋ na. Moo nene maŋ a je, aduŋ moo nene te a je noo la. Horomoo niŋ semboo be ate le ye, fo abadaa. Amiin.
54006017	Moolu mennu fankata ñiŋ duniyaa kono, wolu dandalaa fo ì kana ì faŋ wara, waraŋ ka ì jikoo loo naafuloolu kaŋ, jiki te mennu la kuwo to. Wo noo to, ì si ì jikoo loo Alla kaŋ, meŋ ye ǹ na suuloolu bee topatoo siyaarinke ǹ na seewoo ye.
54006018	Fankamaalu wakiilindi baara bete kewo la: Ì ye diiroo ke kendeke ì fansuŋ lafoo kaŋ,
54006019	aduŋ ñaato siniŋ wo le be ke la fondamaŋ bambandiŋo ti ì ye, fo ì si baluu tooñaa soto noo.
54006020	Ite Timoti, kuwo meŋ karafata i ma, i si wo kanta kendeke. Fata allantaŋyaa diyaamu kenseŋo ma, aniŋ soosooroo kuwolu to, ì ka mennu kumandi londoo la, bari a maŋ ke wo ti muumeeke.
54006021	Baadiŋ doolu jenketa le ka a nooma, aduŋ labaŋo la, ì foota ñiŋ lannoo siloo la le. Alla la hiinoo ye tara ali fee.
55001001	Nte Pawulu, Kiristu Yeesu la kiilaa ka bo niŋ Alla la lafoo la, baluwo laahidoo kawandilaa, meŋ sotota Kiristu Yeesu kono,
55001002	m be ite, Timoti, kontoŋ na, n kanu diŋo. Hiinoo, balafaa aniŋ kayiroo be i fee ka bo Alla, m̀ Faamaa bulu, aniŋ Kiristu Yeesu, m̀ Maariyo.
55001003	Niŋ m be duwaa la waati-wo-waati, n hakiloo ka tu bula la i la kuwo la le suuto tili, aduŋ n ka Alla tentu i la kuwo la le, n ka meŋ batu sondome senuŋo kono ko m mumuñolu ye a ke nuŋ ñaameŋ.
55001004	Niŋ n hakiloo bulata i ñaajiyolu la, n ka hame le ka i je, fo n si faa niŋ seewoo la.
55001005	N hakiloo bulata i la lanna soobeeyaariŋo fanaa la le, lanna kiliŋo meŋ tarata nuŋ i mamamusoo Loyis aniŋ i baamaa Yunise kono. Aduŋ n dankeneyaata le ko, wo lannoo le be ite fanaa kono saayiŋ.
55001006	Wo to, ŋa i hakiloo bulandi Alla la soorifeŋo la, i ye meŋ soto, biriŋ ŋa m buloo laa i kaŋ: I si a yiriwandi ka mala ko dimbaa,
55001007	kaatu a maŋ ke jooteeyaa nooroo ti, Alla ye meŋ dii ǹ na, bari semboo, kanoo aniŋ faŋ mutoo nooroo.
55001008	Wo to, kana malu ka seedeyaa ke m̀ Maariyo la kuwo to, aduŋ kana malu nte la, meŋ keta bunjawutonkoo ti a la kuwo kamma la. Kafu m ma ñiŋ tooroolu kono Yeesu la kibaari betoo kamma la, Alla be i sembentuŋyaa la le.
55001009	A ye ǹ kumandi niŋ kumandiri senuŋo le la, a ye ǹ kiisa, aduŋ wo maŋ ke ka bo niŋ ǹ na kebaaroolu la, bari a faŋo la daliiloo kaŋ ne mu, aniŋ a la hiinoo. A ye ñiŋ hiinoo dii ǹ na ka bo niŋ Kiristu Yeesu le la janniŋ jamaanoolu be dati la,
55001010	bari saayiŋ wo hiinoo naata yitandi ka bo niŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa Kiristu Yeesu la fintinaŋo le la. A ye saayaa semboo buruka le, a ye baluwo niŋ saayaabaliyaa naati maloo to ka bo niŋ kibaari betoo la.
55001011	Ñiŋ mu kibaari betoo le ti, Alla ye n tomboŋ ka ke meŋ kawandilaa ti, kiilaa aniŋ karandirilaa.
55001012	Wo daliiloo kamma la, n ka toora ñiŋ kuwolu la. Bari n te malu la muk, kaatu ŋa ate loŋ ne, n laata meŋ na, aduŋ n dankeneyaata le ko, a ye meŋ karafa m ma, a be a kanta la le fo a naa luŋo la.
55001013	Kuma kendoolu, i ye mennu moyi nte la, wolu ke misaaloo ti, ka baara wolu la lannoo niŋ kanoo kono, i ye meŋ soto ka bo niŋ Kiristu Yeesu la.
55001014	Kuu betoo meŋ karafata i ma, a muta ka bo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo la maakoyiroo la, meŋ be sabatiriŋ ǹ kono.
55001015	I ye a kalamuta le ko, moolu mennu bee bota Asiya tundoo kaŋ, wolu ye ì koo dii n na le. Fikelus niŋ Herimokenes be wolu le kono.
55001016	Allamaa Maariyo ye balafaa dii Onesiforus la dimbaayaalu la, kaatu a ye n jusulandi le siiñaa jamaa, aduŋ a maŋ malu n na kuwo la, hani m be sitiriŋ neejoloo la ñaa-wo-ñaa.
55001017	Biriŋ a naata Rooma, a ye n ñini le fo a ye n je.
55001018	Allamaa a ye balafaa soto Maariyo bulu Kiristu naa luŋo la. A koyita ite faŋo la le, a ye m maakoyi nuŋ ñaameŋ Efesus saatewo kono.
55002001	Wo to ite n dinkewo, loo bambandinke hiinoo kaŋ, meŋ be Kiristu Yeesu kono.
55002002	I ye kuwolu mennu moyi nte la seede jamaa ñaatiliŋo la, i si wolu dii moolu la mennu tilinta, aduŋ ì si moo koteŋolu karandi noo fanaa.
55002003	Ite fanaa si i niyo taa tooroolu kono ko Kiristu Yeesu la kelediŋ kendoo.
55002004	Kelediŋ-wo-kelediŋ meŋ be tara la a la dookuwo la, wo buka haaji soto, meŋ maŋ ke a la dookuwo ti, kaatu a ka tu tuukuriŋ a la kuntiyo le jusulandoo la.
55002005	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, ñoodaŋ borilaa buka a la kañeerinaafoo soto, fo niŋ a ye ñoodaŋ boroo luwaalu ke a ñaama.
55002006	Senelaa meŋ ye dookuu baa ke, wo le ñanta katiroo la talaari foloo soto la.
55002007	I miira kuwolu la, ŋa meŋ fo! Maariyo le be fahaamuroo dii la i la, kuwolu bee to.
55002008	I hakiloo bulandi Yeesu Kiristu la, Mansa Dawuda koomalankoo, meŋ wulindita ka bo saayaa kono ko kibaari betoo, n ka meŋ kawandi, ye a la kuwo yitandi ñaameŋ.
55002009	Wo kibaari betoo la kuwo le ye a tinna nte be toora kaŋ. M be sitiriŋ neejoloo la ko kuu kuruŋ kelaa. Bari Alla la kumoo, wo te siti noo la!
55002010	Wo kamma la, n ka wakiili kuwolu bee le la moo tombondiŋolu la kuwo kamma la, fo ì fanaa si kiisoo soto Kiristu Yeesu kono, aniŋ a la badaa-badaa kallankeeyaa.
55002011	Tooñaa kumoo fele: Niŋ ǹ niŋ ate faata ñoo la, ǹ niŋ a be baluu la ñoo la le fanaa.
55002012	Niŋ ǹ wakiilita, ǹ niŋ a be maraloo ke la ñoo la le. Niŋ m̀ balanta ate ma, a fanaa be balaŋ na m̀ ma le.
55002013	Niŋ m̀ maŋ foroyaa, ate ka tu foroyaariŋ ne, kaatu a te balaŋ noo la a faŋo ma.
55002014	Baadiŋolu hakiloo bulandi ñiŋ kuwolu la, i ye ì dandalaa baake Maariyo ñaatiliŋo la ka fata ñoosaboo la kumoolu to, meŋ buka kuu betoo saabu, bari kasaaroo doroŋ moolu ye, mennu ka a moyi.
55002015	I la katoo bee ke ka ke dookuulaa ti, meŋ na foroyaa lonta Alla ñaatiliŋo la, aduŋ a te malu la, bari a ka tooñaa kumoo karandi a ñaama.
55002016	Fata diyaamu fuuriŋolu ma, mennu niŋ Alla la siloo maŋ taa ñoo la, kaatu ì ka moolu la allantaŋyaa le lafaa-lafaa laalaa,
55002017	aduŋ ì la kumoo be ke la le ko kuuraŋ jawu maaboriŋo, meŋ ka janjaŋ baloo kono. Himeneyu niŋ Filetus be wo moolu le kono,
55002018	mennu jenketa tooñaa siloo la. Ì ko, saayaakoolaa wulindiroo keta le fokabaŋ. Ì la wo karandiroo be baadiŋ doolu la lannoo kasaara kaŋ ne.
55002019	Bari Alla la fondamaŋ bambandiŋo te maamaŋ noo la, a be notoriŋ ñiŋ kumoolu le la: “Maariyo ye moolu loŋ ne, mennu mu a taa ti.” Aduŋ “moo-wo-moo meŋ ka Maariyo too kumandi, wo ñanta a koo dii la tilimbaliyaa la le.”
55002020	Keraŋolu mennu ka tara koridaa baa kono, bee buka dadaa sanoo niŋ kodiforoo doroŋ na, bari doolu be jee mennu dadaata yiroo la aniŋ pootoo. Doolu mu buuñaarilaŋo le ti, doolu maŋ ke buuñaarilaŋo ti.
55002021	Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye a faŋ seneyandi feŋolu to, mennu maŋ ke buuñaarilaŋolu ti, a maarii be ke la keraŋo le ti daliila buuñaariŋo ye. A seneyandita le, aduŋ a ye nafaa soto koridaatiyo ye le, a parendita dookuu betoo siifaa bee ye le.
55002022	Bori fondinkeeyaa hame jawoolu ma, i ye tiliŋo ke i la natoo ti, lannoo, kanoo aniŋ kayiroo, i niŋ moolu mennu ka Maariyo kumandi sondome senuŋo kono.
55002023	Fata ñoosaba fuuriŋolu ma, mennu mu tooleeyaa ti, kaatu i ye a loŋ ne ko, wolu ka sonkoo le wuluu.
55002024	Maariyo la dookuulaa maŋ ñaŋ na ke la sonkamoo ti, bari a ñanta sooneeyaa la moolu bee le fee. A ñanta ke la moo le ti, meŋ si karandiroo ke noo, aniŋ meŋ ka muña a mooñoo ye.
55002025	Moolu mennu balanta a ma, a ñanta ì la boyidaa yitandi la ì la mooyaa le kono. Tumandoo Alla si siloo dii wolu la le ka tuubi fo ì si naa tooñaa loŋ,
55002026	aduŋ ì si kana noo Ibiliisa ma, meŋ ka ì tu mutoo kono a la kutindiŋo la fo ì si ate la lafoo ke.
55003001	I si ñiŋ kalamuta ko, luŋ labaŋolu kono, waati koleŋolu be naa la le.
55003002	Moolu be ì faŋolu doroŋ ne kanu la, ì be ke la kodilandiyolu le ti, faŋ wara moolu, kibirilaalu, tooñeeri kumafolaalu, wuluulaa soosoolaalu, wasabaloolu aniŋ seneyaabaloolu.
55003003	Ì te kanoo soto la, aduŋ ì te paree la ka yamfa, bari ì be ke la kajafirilaalu le ti. Ì be ke la faŋ mutabaloolu le ti, ì be saŋara la le, aduŋ ì be kuu betoo bee koŋ na le.
55003004	Ì be ke la jamfantuŋolu niŋ hakilitubaloolu le ti, aduŋ ì be faa la niŋ faŋ waroo le la. Ì be niidiyaa le kanu la ka tambi Alla la.
55003005	Ì ka munta le ko Alla ñaasilannaalu, bari ì maŋ soŋ a la semboo ma. Fata wo moo siifaalu ma!
55003006	Ì doolu ka feeretoo duŋ wandi buŋolu kono le ka musu lamfuriŋolu filindi niŋ ì la kumoolu la. Wo musoolu la junuboolu dunoo be laariŋ ì faŋolu le kaŋ, ì la hame kuwo le ka ì mara.
55003007	Ì ka tu karandiri kutoo le nooma la waati-wo-waati, bari ì nene maŋ naa tooñaa loŋ noo.
55003008	Ko Yannes niŋ Yamberes balanta Annabilayi Musa ma nuŋ ñaameŋ, ñiŋ karandirilaalu fanaa ka balaŋ tooñaa ma wo le ñaama, baawo ì hakiloolu nakarita le, ì maŋ lanna tooñaa soto.
55003009	Bari ì te jamfabaa la, kaatu ì la tooleeyaa be waañaari la moolu bee ye le, ko a keta Yannes niŋ Yamberes la ñaameŋ.
55003010	Saayiŋ, ite meeta m fee le, i ye n na karandiroo loŋ ne, m maañaa to, ŋa natoo meŋ soto n na baluwo ye, n na lannoo, n na muñoo, n na kanoo, aniŋ n na wakiiloo.
55003011	I ye tooroolu niŋ bataalu loŋ ne, mennu keta nte la Antiyoki saatewo kono, Ikoniyumu aniŋ Listara. Moo te wo tooroolu la jawuyaa fo noo la! Bari hani wo, Maariyo ye n kanandi wo kuwolu bee kono le.
55003012	Tooñaa, moo-wo-moo meŋ lafita ka baluu Alla la siloo la Kiristu Yeesu kono, wo maarii be toora la le.
55003013	Bari moo jawoolu niŋ neeneerilaalu la kuruŋyaa ka tu jawuyaa la le doroŋ, ì ka tu doolu neenee la le, aduŋ ì faŋolu ka tu neeneeroo le kono.
55003014	Bari ite, Timoti, i si tu bambandiŋ kuwolu kono, i ye mennu karaŋ nuŋ, aduŋ i laata ì la. Kana wo kuwolu bula, baawo i ye a loŋ ne, i ye ì karaŋ mennu bulu.
55003015	Biriŋ i la dindiŋyaa waatoo la, i ye Kitaabu Senuŋolu loŋ ne. Wolu le ka ñaameŋo dii i la, ka i taamandi noo ka kiisoo soto, ka bo niŋ lannoo la Kiristu Yeesu kono.
55003016	Kaatu Kitaabu Senuŋo bee safeeta ka bo niŋ Alla la Nooroo le la, aduŋ a ye nafaa soto karandiroo to le, jalayiroo, kuluuroo, aniŋ nindiroo baluu tilindiŋo ye.
55003017	Wo siloo la, Alla la moolu bee buloo si koyi Alla la dookuwo to, ì si jooraŋolu soto, mennu ñanta baara betoo bee to.
55004001	M be i yaamari la bambandinke Alla niŋ Kiristu Yeesu ñaatiliŋo la, meŋ be kendoolu niŋ furewolu kiitindi la, niŋ a fintita naŋ, a niŋ a la mansabaayaa:
55004002	Kumoo kawandi i ye paree waatoo bee la, fo sooneeyaa tumoo le mu, waraŋ koleyaa. Moolu sondi kumoo la, i ye ì jalayi, aniŋ i ye ì wakiilindi fanaa karandiri betoo la, i niŋ muña baa.
55004003	Waatoo be naa le, moolu te karandiri tooñaa muña noo la meŋ na. Wo noo to, ì be ì fansuŋ karandirilaalu kafu la ì ma, mennu la karandiroo diyaata ì tuloolu ye.
55004004	Ì be ì koo dii la tooñaa kumoo moyoo la le ka bula taaliŋolu nooma.
55004005	Bari ite, i si loo bambandinke, i ye wakiili bataa la. I la kibaari betoo kawandoo dookuwo ke a ñaama, i ye i la dookuwo bee timmandi.
55004006	Nte la waatoo ka naa baŋ ne, n yeloo be boŋ na le ko miŋ feŋ sadaa, ka ñiŋ duniyaa bula.
55004007	Ŋa kele betoo le kele, ŋa n na ñooseeyaa boroo ke le fo labandulaa to, aduŋ ŋa n na lannoo muta kuu le.
55004008	Saayiŋ, kañeerinaafoo meŋ mu moo tilindiŋolu taa ti, a be pareeriŋ nte ye le Maariyo fee, meŋ mu kiitindirilaa tilindiŋo ti. Wo maŋ ke n dammaa ye, bari moolu bee mennu ye Kiristu la fintinaŋo kanu.
55004009	I la katoo bee ke ka futa m ma tariyaake.
55004010	Demas ye nte bula le ka taa Tesalonika saatewo to, kaatu a ye ñiŋ duniyaa niidiyaa kuwolu le kanu. Keresens taata Kalatiya tundoo le kaŋ, aduŋ Titus taata Dalimatiya.
55004011	Saayiŋ, Luka doroŋ ne be nte fee jaŋ. I niŋ Maaka ye naa ñoo la, kaatu a la maakoyiroo ka n nafaa baake le n na dookuwo kono.
55004012	Ŋa Tikikus kii Efesus saatewo to le.
55004013	I naatoo n na waramboo samba naŋ, ŋa meŋ karafa Karipus ma Torowas saatewo to. Kitaaboolu fanaa samba naŋ, sako mennu safeeta kuloo bala.
55004014	Jaawali numoo Alesanda ye kuu jawoo baa le ke nte la. Maariyo be a joo la wo kebaaroolu la a ñaama le.
55004015	I hakiloo tu a la kuwo to, kaatu a balanta nuŋ ǹ na kumoolu ma jawuke le.
55004016	N na faŋ tankandi foloo nuŋ kiitiyo ñaatiliŋo la, moo-wo-moo le maŋ loo m fee. Ì bee ye m bula le. Allamaa Alla ye yamfa ì ma wo kuwo to.
55004017	Bari Maariyo le loota m fee, a ye n sembentuŋyandi ka a la kibaaroo kawandi timmarinke fo moolu bee si a moyi, mennu maŋ ke Yahuudoolu ti. Aduŋ a ye n kanandi jatoo daa ma le.
55004018	Maariyo be n kanandi la kuu jawoolu bee ma le, a be n samba la tankoo kono a la mansabaayaa to, Arijana. Tenturoo niŋ jayiroo be ate le ye fo abadaa. Amiin.
55004019	Pirisilla niŋ Akila kontoŋ n ye, aniŋ Onesiforus la dimbaayaalu bee.
55004020	Erastus tuta Korinti saatewo le kono, aduŋ ŋa Torofimus tu kuurandiŋ Miletus saatewo to le.
55004021	I la katoo bee ke ka naa, janniŋ sumayaa waatoo be sii la. Yubulus be i kontoŋ na, aniŋ Pudens, Linus, Kalawudiya, aniŋ baadiŋolu bee.
55004022	Maariyo ye tara i la nooroo fee. A la hiinoo ye tara ali fee.
56001001	Nte Pawulu, Alla la dookuulaa aniŋ Yeesu Kiristu la kiilaa, m be ite, Titus, kontoŋ na. N loota ka Alla la tomboŋ moolu la lannoo yiriwandi, aniŋ ka ì maakoyi ka londi koyoo soto tooñaa to, meŋ sotota Alla la siloo kaŋ.
56001002	Wo tooñaa le ka jikoo dii ì la badaa-badaa baluwo to. Alla meŋ buka faniyaa fo, ate le ye laahidoo dii wo kuwo to, janniŋ jamaanoolu be dati la,
56001003	aduŋ saayiŋ wo laahidoo naata yitandi a waatoo la le, a la kumoo kono. Wo kumoo kawandoo karafata nte le ma, ko Alla, ǹ na Kiisandirilaa, ye a yaamari ñaameŋ.
56001004	M be ite, Titus, kontoŋ na, meŋ mu n dinkee tooñaa ti lanna kiliŋo kono. Hiinoo niŋ kayiroo be i fee ka bo Alla bulu, m̀ Faamaa, aniŋ Kiristu Yeesu, ǹ na Kiisandirilaa.
56001005	Ñiŋ daliiloo faŋo le ye a tinna, ŋa i tu Kireti jooyoo to, fo i si kuwolu tembendi jee, mennu tuta, aniŋ ì si alifaalu londi Yeesu la kafoo ye saatewolu kono taariŋ, ko ŋa i yaamari a la ñaameŋ.
56001006	Alifaa ñanta ke la kewo le ti, meŋ maŋ sootaaroo soto, aniŋ meŋ foroyaata a la musoo ma. A diŋolu ñanta ke la lannamoolu le ti, moo te mennu tuumi noo la faŋ mutabaliyaa la, waraŋ yaamari mutabaliyaa.
56001007	Yeesu la kafoo la kantarilaa mu Alla la dookuulaa kuntiyo le ti. Wo to, a ñanta ke la moo le ti, meŋ maŋ sootaaroo soto. A maŋ ñaŋ na ke la faŋ wara moo ti, moo jusu sutuŋo, dolominnaa, waraŋ fitinamoo. A maŋ ñaŋ na tinewo ñini la tapaleeyaa kono,
56001008	bari a ñanta ke la moo le ti, meŋ ka luntaŋolu jiyaa, aniŋ meŋ ye kuu betoolu kanu. A ñanta ke la hakilimaa le ti, meŋ tilinta, a seneyaata, aniŋ a ka a faŋ muta noo.
56001009	A ñanta tooñaa kumoo muta la niŋ a bulu fuloo le la, ko a karandita ñaameŋ. Wo to le a be doolu yaamari noo la bambandinke niŋ karandiri tooñaa la, aduŋ a si moolu la boyidaa yitandi ì la, mennu balanta wo kumoo la.
56001010	Moo jamaa le be jee, mennu be marabaliyaa kono, ì ka doolu neenee ì la kuma fuuriŋolu la. Ñinnu siyaata le sako wo Yahuudoolu kono, mennu ye sunnoo kuwo kummaayandi.
56001011	Ì daalu ñanta soroŋ na le, kaatu ì be dimbaayaalu muumewo le la lannoo kasaara kaŋ niŋ karandiroo la, ì maŋ ñaŋ na meŋ ke la. Ì ka a ke tinewo le kamma, meŋ maŋ bo niŋ tiliŋo la.
56001012	Moo kiliŋ meŋ bota ì faŋolu kono, ì la annabiyomoo, ye ñiŋ ne fo nuŋ ko: “Kiretinkoolu ye i tuuku faniyaa foo le la, ì mu beeyaŋ jawu baalu le ti, konomoolu, ì baloo diyaata ì ye.”
56001013	Wo seedeyaa mu tooñaa le ti ì la kuwo to! Wo kamma la, ì jalayi kendeke fo ì si muru naŋ lannoo sila kendoo kaŋ.
56001014	Ì kana tara tuukuriŋ kotenke Yahuudoolu la taaliŋ kenseŋolu la, aniŋ moolu la luwaalu, mennu ye ì koo dii tooñaa la.
56001015	Feŋo bee seneyaata moo le ye, meŋ seneyaata, bari feŋ maŋ seneyaa moo kosoriŋolu niŋ lannabaloolu ye, kaatu ì hakiloolu niŋ ì sondomoolu bee nakarita le.
56001016	Ì ka a fo le ko, ì ye Alla loŋ ne, bari ì ka balaŋ a ma niŋ ì la kebaaroolu le la. Ì mu jutunnamoolu le ti, aniŋ yaamari mutabaloolu mennu nene buka kuu betoo ke noo.
56002001	Bari ite si kuwolu karandi ko karandiri kendoo ye ì landi ñaameŋ.
56002002	Keebaalu ñanta ke la hakilimaalu le ti, ì ye soobeeyaa, ì maŋ ñaŋ na ke la landatambi moolu ti, bari ì ñanta ì faŋ muta la lannoo la sila kendoo le kaŋ, kanoo aniŋ wakiiloo.
56002003	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, musu keebaalu yaamari ka daajika betoo soto ko Alla ñaasilannaalu. Ì maŋ ñaŋ na ke la kajafirilaalu ti, waraŋ ka ke doloo la joŋolu ti, bari ì ñanta ke la kuu betoo le karandirilaa ti.
56002004	Ì si foromusoolu nindi ka ì keemaañolu niŋ ì diŋolu kanu,
56002005	ì ye ke hakilimaalu ti, mennu seneyaata, aniŋ ka ì la suwo kono topatoo kuu. Ì ñanta beteyaa la le, aniŋ ka soŋ ì keemaañolu ma. Niŋ wo keta, moo-wo-moo te kuma jawoo fo noo la Alla la kumoo ma.
56002006	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, i si fondinkewolu yaamari ka ì faŋolu muta kuu.
56002007	I faŋ yitandi kuwolu bee kono misaaloo ti kebaara betoolu to. I si tiliŋ, aniŋ i ye soobeeyaa i la karandiroo kono.
56002008	Kuma kendoolu fo, mennu te muta noo la kasi ti, fo i balannaalu si malu, aduŋ ì kana kuma jawu soto, ì be meŋ fo la m̀ ma.
56002009	Joŋolu yaamari ka soŋ ì la kuntiyolu ma, aniŋ ka ì jusulandi feŋolu bee kono. Ì maŋ ñaŋ na ì la kuntiyolu soosoo la,
56002010	waraŋ ka hani ì la feŋolu suuñaa. Wo noo to, ì ñanta maañaa betoo le soto la, meŋ si ì la timmoo yitandi foroyaa to. Ka bo niŋ wo siloo la, karandiroo Alla la kuwo to, meŋ mu ǹ na Kiisandirilaa ti, si moolu ñaabo.
56002011	Alla la hiinoo meŋ ka kiisoo dii, naata yitandi moolu bee le la.
56002012	Wo hiinoo le ka ǹ kuluu ka m̀ fatandi allantaŋyaa niŋ ñiŋ duniyaa niidiyaa kuwolu bee ma. A ka ǹ kuluu le ka baluu faŋ mutoo niŋ tiliŋo kono, Alla la siloo kaŋ ñiŋ duniyaa kono,
56002013	m̀ be ǹ na jikoo la timmoo batu kaŋ daameŋ. Wo jikoo la timmoo mu Yeesu Kiristu la fintinaŋo le ti, meŋ na kallankeeyaa jarita jayiroo bee la. Ate le mu ǹ na Alla ti meŋ warata, aniŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa,
56002014	meŋ ye a faŋo dii ka ǹ kumakaa ka bo ǹ na junuboolu bee kono, fo a si ǹ seneyandi a faŋo ye ka ke moolu ti, mennu ka hame kuu bete kewo la.
56002015	Ñiŋ kuwolu bankee, yaamaroo aniŋ jalayiroo ke niŋ i la kantiiyaa bee la. Kana soŋ, moo-wo-moo ye jutu i la.
56003001	Baadiŋolu hakiloo bulandi ka soŋ mansakundaa maralilaalu niŋ kantiyolu ma. Ì ñanta wolu la yaamaroolu muta la le, ì ye i wura dookuu tilindiŋo bee ye.
56003002	Ì kana kuma jawoo fo moo-wo-moo ma, waraŋ ka sonka, bari ì si sooneeyaa, aniŋ ka hadamayaa yitandi moolu bee la.
56003003	Baawo ntolu faŋolu keta nuŋ toolewolu le ti, aniŋ yaamari mutabaloolu, mennu neeneeta ka sila tilindiŋo bula. Balajaatoo la hame jawoolu niŋ niidiyaa kuu siifaa jamaa le ye ǹ joŋyandi, meŋ ye a tinna, ǹ tarata baluuriŋ jawuyaa niŋ kiiliyaa kono. Ì ye ǹ koŋ ne nuŋ, aniŋ ŋà ñoo koŋ.
56003004	Bari kabiriŋ Alla, ǹ na Kiisandirilaa, la beteyaa aniŋ a la kanoo naata yitandi,
56003005	a ye ǹ kiisa le. A maŋ a ke ǹ na kebaara tilindiŋolu kamma la, bari a la balafaa. A ye ǹ kuu le ka wuluu baluu kutoo kono, a ye ǹ kutayandi, ka bo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo la,
56003006	a ye meŋ jindi ntolu kaŋ siyaarinke ka bo niŋ Yeesu Kiristu la, ǹ na Kiisandirilaa.
56003007	A ye wo ke le, fo ǹ si tiliŋo soto ka bo niŋ a la hiinoo la, aduŋ ǹ si ke noo keetaalaalu ti badaa-badaa baluwo to, m̀ be jikiriŋ meŋ na.
56003008	Ñinnu mu tooñaa kumoo le ti. N lafita le, i ye ñiŋ kuwolu bambandi moolu ma, mennu laata Alla la, fo ì si ì hakiloo tu ka baara betoolu ke. Ñiŋ kuwolu beteyaata baake le, aduŋ ì ye nafaa soto moolu bee le ye.
56003009	Fata ñoosaba fuuriŋolu ma, bonsuŋ saataroolu, sonkoolu aniŋ keloolu Musa la Luwaa la kuwo to, kaatu ì maŋ nafaa soto, bari ì mu kuu kenseŋolu le ti.
56003010	Moo meŋ ka talaaroo saabu kafoo kono, a dandalaa ko siiñaa fula. Wo koolaa, i ye fata a ma.
56003011	Ite si ñiŋ kalamuta ko, wo moo siifaa hakiloo nakarita le. A mu junubekelaa le ti, aduŋ a ye a faŋ halaki le fokabaŋ.
56003012	M be Atemas waraŋ Tikikus kii la i kaŋ naŋ ne. Niŋ wo futata ì ma, i la katoo bee ke ka naa nte yaa tariyaake Nikopolis saatewo to, kaatu ŋa ñiŋ feeroo le landi ko, m be sabati la jee le to sumayaa waatoo la.
56003013	I la katoo bee ke ka luwaa lonnaa Senas niŋ Apollos la taamasiloo tariyandi, aduŋ i si a je ko, ì te dasa la feŋ na.
56003014	Ǹ na moolu fanaa si karaŋ ka ì faŋolu dii baara bete kewo la, aniŋ ka maakoyiroo ke suuloo waatoolu la, ì kana tu nafantaŋyaa kono kotenke.
56003015	Moolu bee be i kontoŋ na, mennu be nte fee jaŋ. Moolu bee kontoŋ n ye, mennu ye ǹ kanu lannoo kono. Alla la hiinoo ye tara ali bee fee.
57001001	Nte Pawulu meŋ keta bunjawutonkoo ti Kiristu Yeesu la kuwo kamma la, n niŋ m̀ baadiŋo Timoti be ite, ǹ dookuuñoo Filemoni kontoŋ na, meŋ mu ǹ kanuntewo ti.
57001002	M̀ be m̀ baarimmusoo Apafiya kontoŋ na, m̀ mooñoo kelediŋo Arikipus, aniŋ Yeesu la kafoo meŋ ka beŋ ite, Filemoni yaa.
57001003	Hiinoo niŋ kayiroo be ali fee ka bo Alla bulu, m̀ Faamaa, aniŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu.
57001004	N ka n na Alla tentu i la kuwo la le waati-wo-waati, niŋ n hakiloo bulata i la n na duwaa kono.
57001005	Ŋa i la kanoo moyi le, i ye meŋ soto Alla la moo senuŋolu bee ye, aniŋ i la lannoo Maarii Yeesu kono.
57001006	N ka tu duwaa la le, fo ǹ na kafuñooyaa lannoo kono si dookundi beteke, ka londoo soto feŋ betoo bee to, ŋà meŋ soto Kiristu kono.
57001007	M baadiŋo, i la kanoo keta seewoo kuu baa le ti n ye, aniŋ wakiilindiroo, kaatu i ye Alla la moo senuŋolu jusulandi le.
57001008	Wo kamma la, n si fatiyaa noo le Kiristu kono ka i yaamari kendeke ka kuwo ke, i ñanta meŋ ke la,
57001009	bari wo noo to, ŋa i daani le kanoo la kuwo kamma la. Nte Pawulu meŋ mu bunjawutonkoo ti Kiristu Yeesu la kuwo kamma la, n na keebaayaa kaŋ m be i daani la.
57001010	M be i daani kaŋ n na dindiŋo Onesimus le ye, n naata ke meŋ faamaa ti lannoo kono, n na taroo bunjawoo kono jaŋ.
57001011	Koomanto, a maŋ nafaa soto ite ye, bari saayiŋ, a ye nafaa baa le soto ite niŋ nte ye.
57001012	M be a kii kaŋ naŋ i kaŋ ne, ka muru i yaa, m be n jusukuŋo faŋo le kii kaŋ naŋ.
57001013	Ka a muta m fee jaŋ, ka loo n ye ite loodulaa to, wo be ke la n ye seewoo le ti, fo a si ke m maakoyilaa ti n na soroŋo wucoo kono kibaari betoo kamma la.
57001014	Bari m maŋ lafi ka kuu-wo-kuu ke, m maŋ i kalamutandi meŋ na, fo i la beteyaa kana ke diyaakuyaa kuwo ti i kaŋ, bari a si ke i faŋo la lafoo ti.
57001015	Tumandoo ñiŋ daliiloo le ye a tinna, a jamfata i la fo waatindiŋ, fo a si naa tara i fee fo abadaa.
57001016	A te tara la i fee kotenke ko joŋo, bari meŋ tambita wo la. A mu baadiŋ kanuntewo le ti, sako nte ye. Wo to, a be tambi la baake ite ye nte la le, kaatu i la joŋo le mu, aduŋ i baadiŋo le mu Maariyo kono.
57001017	Wo kamma la, niŋ i ye nte muta ko i kafuñoo, i si a jiyaa ko i be nte jiyaa la ñaameŋ.
57001018	Niŋ a ye kuu-wo-kuu ke i la, meŋ maŋ beteyaa, waraŋ a ye i donto feŋ-wo-feŋ na, a ke nte la kontoo to.
57001019	Nte Pawulu ye ñiŋ safee m faŋo buloo le la: M be i joo la le. M maŋ lafi ka i hakiloo bulandi ko, ite fanaa ye n donto, hani i faŋo la baluwo la le.
57001020	Tooñaa, m baadiŋo, n lafita nafaa doo la i bulu le Maariyo la kuwo kamma la. Dukaree, n jusulandi Kiristu kono.
57001021	Ŋa i safee dankeneyaa le kono ko, i be n na yaamaroo muta la le, aduŋ ŋa a loŋ ne ko, i be meŋ ke la, wo be hani tambi la le, ŋa meŋ fo i ye.
57001022	M be i daani la fanaa ka jiyaadulaa parendi n ye, kaatu n jikita le ko, ali la duwaalu kamma la, m be futa la ali ma naŋ jee le.
57001023	Epafaras meŋ mu m mooñoo bunjawutonkoo ti Kiristu Yeesu kono, be i kontoŋ na.
57001024	N dookuuñoolu Maaka, Aristakus, Demas aniŋ Luka fanaa be i kontoŋ na.
57001025	Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la hiinoo ye tara ali fee.
58001001	Jamaanoolu mennu tambita nuŋ, Alla ka diyaamu m̀ mumuñolu ye waati jamaa niŋ sila jamaa le la, ka bo niŋ annabiyomoolu la.
58001002	Bari ñiŋ luŋ labaŋolu kono, a naata diyaamu ntolu ye ka bo niŋ a Dinkewo le la, a ye alihawaa daa ka bo niŋ meŋ na, aduŋ a ye ate le tomboŋ ka ke feŋo bee keetaalaa ti.
58001003	Alla la kallankeeyaa ka je a Dinkewo le kono, a ye Alla mankutoo soto le, aduŋ a ka alihawaa taamandi ka bo niŋ a la kuma sembemaa le la. A la hadamadiŋolu seneyandiri koolaa ì la junuboolu to, a ye a la siidulaa taa Alla Mansa Tallaa bulubaa karoo la, Arijana kono.
58001004	A la kuwo naata wara baake ka tambi malaayikoolu la. Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, a ye too meŋ fanaa soto, wo le warata ì toolu ti.
58001005	Fo Alla nene ye a fo malaayika jumaa le ye ko: “Ite mu n Dinkewo le ti. Bii luŋo la nte faŋo keta i Faamaa le ti”? Aduŋ Alla nene maŋ a fo malaayikoo la kuwo to ko: “Nte le be ke la a Faamaa ti, aduŋ ate le be ke la n Dinkewo ti.”
58001006	Aduŋ fanaa, kabiriŋ Alla be a Dinkee foloo samba kaŋ naŋ duniyaa kono jaŋ, a ko: “Alla la malaayikoolu bee si a batu.”
58001007	Bari malaayikoolu la kuwo to, a ko le: “A ka a la malaayikoolu ke foñoo ti, a ka a la dookuulaalu ke dimbaa ti.”
58001008	Bari Dinkewo la kuwo to, a ye ñiŋ ne fo ko: “Alla, i la mansasiiraŋo be tu la le fo abadaa, i ka i la mansayaa taamandi niŋ tiliŋo le la.
58001009	I ye tiliŋo kanu le, i ye kuruŋyaa koŋ. Wo le ye a tinna i la Alla ye i toloo niŋ seewoo la ka tambi i mooñoolu la.”
58001010	Aduŋ a ko fanaa ko: “Ite Maariyo, biriŋ foloodulaa to, ite le ye bankoo fondamaŋo laa, saŋ fatoolu mu i buloo la daaroo ti.
58001011	Ì be yeemaŋ na le, bari ite be tu la keriŋ ne. Ì bee le be kotoo la ko funtoo.
58001012	I be ì moromoro la le ko basoo, ì ye faliŋ ko duŋ feŋo. Bari ite ka tu i ñaama le doroŋ, i maŋ dandulaa soto.”
58001013	Bari malaayikoolu la karoo la, Alla nene ye a fo malaayika jumaa le ye ko: “Sii m bulubaa karoo la, fo ŋa i jawoolu ke i siŋo koto”?
58001014	Fo malaayikoolu bee maŋ ke dookuulaalu doroŋ ne ti baŋ? Ì bee mu maakoyirilaa nooroolu le ti, Alla ye mennu kii wo moolu ye, mennu be kiisoo soto la.
58002001	Wo kamma la, ǹ ñanta ǹ hakiloo tu la baake tooñaa kumoo to le, ŋà meŋ moyi, fo feŋ kana m̀ bondi a bala.
58002002	Kiilaariyaa kumoo meŋ bankeeta nuŋ ka bo niŋ malaayikoolu la, kummaayaata le, aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ye wo luwaa tiñaa waraŋ a maŋ a la yaamaroolu muta, kuluuroo be laa la wo maarii kaŋ a ñaama le.
58002003	Wo to, ntolu duŋ? Ǹ si kana noo ñaadii le, niŋ ŋà ǹ ñaa kaasi ñiŋ ñoŋ kiisa baa la? Wo mu Maariyo faŋo le ti, meŋ ye ñiŋ kiisoo la kuwo bankee folooto, aduŋ moolu mennu ye a moyi, wolu ye a futandi m̀ ma le.
58002004	Alla fanaa ye ì la kumoolu tooñaayandi le ka bo niŋ taamanseeroolu la, kaawakuwolu, aniŋ baara sembemaa jamaa, aduŋ a ye seedeyaa ke Noora Kuliŋo la soorifeŋolu fanaa la le, a ye mennu dii a faŋo la lafoo kaŋ.
58002005	Ntolu ka diyaamu wo duniyaa le la kuwo to, meŋ be naa la. A maŋ ke malaayikoolu ti, Alla ye mennu ke maralilaalu ti wo kunto.
58002006	Bari ñiŋ seedeyaa le be safeeriŋ Kitaabu Senuŋo dulaa doo to ko: “Muŋ ne mu moo ti, fo i hakiloo ka bula a la? Muŋ ne mu hadamadiŋo ti, fo i ka a topatoo?
58002007	Hani wo, i ye a la fisamanteeyaa dasandi malaayikoolu la waatindiŋ doroŋ ne la. I ye horomoo niŋ buuñaa dii a la le ka a mansayandi.
