58002008	I ye a ke maralilaa le ti feŋolu bee kunna ka wolu bee ke a siŋo koto.” Ñiŋ kumoo meŋ fota ko, “a ye a ke maralilaa le ti feŋolu bee kunna,” wo ye a yitandi le ko, feŋ te keriŋ, meŋ maŋ tara a la maraloo koto. Bari hani wo, ko a lonta ñaameŋ, m̀ buka feŋolu bee je a la maraloo koto foloo.
58002009	Bari ŋà Yeesu le je, Alla ye meŋ na fisamanteeyaa dasandi malaayikoolu la fo waatindiŋ. Aduŋ ŋà a je a la horomoo niŋ buuñaa kono le, baawo Alla ye a mansayandi a la saayaa tooroo kamma la le. A keta Alla la hiinoo le ti ko, a si saayaa nene moolu bee ye.
58002010	Alla meŋ ye feŋolu bee daa, aduŋ ì daata ate le ye, a ye ñiŋ kuu betoo ke le fo a si a diŋ jamaa samba a la kallankeeyaa to: A ye ì la Kiisandirilaa timmandi ka bo niŋ tooroo le la, fo wo si ke ñaatonka timmariŋo ti ì ye.
58002011	Wo siloo la, Yeesu meŋ ka seneyandiroo ke, aniŋ moolu mennu seneyandita, ì bee ye Faamaa kiliŋ ne soto. Wo kamma la, a te malu la ka ì kumandi a baadiŋolu la.
58002012	Bituŋ a ko Alla ye ko: “M be i too la waroo fo la m baadiŋolu ye le. M be i jayi la baturilaalu la beŋo to le.”
58002013	Aduŋ a ko fanaa ko: “M be n jikoo sembe la a la le.” Aduŋ fanaa a ko: “M fele, n niŋ diŋolu Alla ye mennu dii n na.”
58002014	Baawo ñiŋ diŋolu ye balajaatoo niŋ yeloo soto le, Yeesu faŋo naata ke hadamadiŋo ti ko itolu. Wo keta le, fo ka bo niŋ a la saayaa la, a si Ibiliisa kasaara noo, saayaa semboo be meŋ bulu.
58002015	Ka bo wo siloo la, Yeesu ye moolu firiŋ ne, saayaa silaŋo ye mennu bee joŋyandi ì la baluwo bee kono.
58002016	A koyita le ko, a maŋ naa ka malaayikoolu maakoyi, bari Iburayima koomalankoolu.
58002017	Wo kamma la, a ñanta ke la kuu-wo-kuu to le ko a baadiŋolu, fo a si ke noo piriisi kuntii baa ti ì ye, meŋ ye balafaa niŋ foroyaa soto Alla la dookuwo kono, fo a si junube kafaroo sii moolu ma.
58002018	Baawo toora kuwolu niŋ marisa kuwolu laata a faŋo kaŋ ne, wo to a be moolu maakoyi noo la le, mennu fanaa be marisa kuwo kono.
58003001	Wo to baadiŋolu, Alla ye mennu seneyandi, aniŋ ali ye ali niyo soto a la kumandiroo to: Ali ali la miiroolu deŋ Yeesu la, ǹ ka seedeyaa ke meŋ na kuwo to ko, ate mu kiilaa niŋ piriisi kuntii baa le ti ǹ ye.
58003002	A foroyaata Alla ma le, meŋ ye a tomboŋ, ko Musa fanaa foroyaata Alla ma, Alla la dimbaayaalu kono ñaameŋ.
58003003	Bari hani wo, Yeesu le jarita buuñaa niŋ horomoo la ka tambi Musa la. A be le ko buŋ loolaa ye buuñaa soto ka tambi buŋo faŋo la ñaameŋ.
58003004	Buŋ-wo-buŋ, moo le ka a loo, bari meŋ ye feŋolu bee daa, wo mu Alla le ti.
58003005	Tooñaa, Musa foroyaata a la dookuwo to Alla la dimbaayaalu bee kono le, bari a keta dookuulaa doroŋ ne ti. A la dookuwo ka seedeyaa ke kuwolu le to, Alla be mennu fo la ñaato.
58003006	Bari Kiristu mu Dinkewo le ti, aduŋ a foroyaata Alla ma le, meŋ ye a la dimbaayaalu bee karafa a ma. Ntolu mu a la dimbaayaalu le ti, niŋ ǹ tuta bambandiŋ dankeneyaa niŋ jikoo kono, ǹ ka kibiri meŋ na.
58003007	Wo kamma la, Noora Kuliŋo ye a fo le ko: “Bii luŋo la, niŋ ali ye a kaŋo moyi,
58003008	ali kana ali sondomoolu jandi komeŋ ali la alifaa foloolu mennu balanta m ma, kotoboroo waatoo la, biriŋ ì be keñewuloo kono.
58003009	Ali mumuñolu ye n na muñoo daŋo kotobo jee le to, hani ì ye n na baara kuu baalu je
58003010	fo sanji taŋ naani. Wo le ye a tinna n kamfaata ì la kuwo la, aduŋ n ko, ‘Ì ka tu fili la ì sondomoolu kono le doroŋ, ì nene maŋ n na siloo loŋ.’
58003011	Bituŋ n kamfaariŋo kalita ì ye ko, ì nene te duŋ na n na dahaa kono.”
58003012	Baadiŋolu, ali ali hakiloo tu fo moo-wo-moo kana tara ali kono, meŋ ye jawuyaa niŋ lannabaliyaa soto a sondomoo kono, kaatu wo le ka a tinna, moo ka a koo dii Alla baluuriŋo la.
58003013	Wo noo to, ali si ñoo wakiilindi luŋ-wo-luŋ, fo junuboo la neeneeroo kana siloo soto ka moo-wo-moo sondomoo jandi. Ali kana i dahaa wo la bii, waraŋ siniŋ saama, baawo luŋolu bee be kumandi la bii luŋo le la.
58003014	M̀ be ke la niisotolaalu le ti Kiristu fee, niŋ ǹ loota bambandinke ǹ na dankeneyaa kono fo labandulaa to, ko m̀ be ñaameŋ biriŋ foloodulaa to.
58003015	Wo le ye a tinna a fota Kitaabu Senuŋo kono ko: “Bii luŋo la, niŋ ali ye a kaŋo moyi, ali kana ali sondomoolu jandi komeŋ ali la alifaa foloolu mennu balanta m ma.”
58003016	Jumaalu le mu wo moolu ti, mennu ye Alla kaŋo moyi, bari wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, ì balanta a ma? Fo ì maŋ ke wo moolu le ti baŋ, Musa ye mennu bondi Misira?
58003017	Aduŋ Alla kamfaata jumaalu le la kuwo la fo sanji taŋ naani? Fo a maŋ ke wo moolu le ti baŋ, mennu ye junuboo ke, aduŋ ì furewolu tuta keñewuloo kono?
58003018	Alla ye i kali jumaalu le la kuwo to ko, ì nene te duŋ na a la dahaa kono? A ye a fo wo moolu le ye, mennu maŋ a la yaamaroo muta.
58003019	Wo to, ŋà a je le ko, ì la lannabaliyaa ye ì bali le ka duŋ Alla la dahaa kono.
58004001	Saayiŋ, Alla ye laahidoo meŋ dii ko, m̀ be duŋ na a la dahaa kono le, wo ka tu bambandiŋ ne. Wo to, ali ŋà ǹ hakiloo tu kendeke fo moo-wo-moo ali kono kana foo wo dahaa la.
58004002	Tooñaa, kibaari betoo kawandita ǹ ye le ko a keta wo alifaalu ye ñaameŋ, bari itolu ye kumoo meŋ moyi, wo maŋ nafaa soto ì ye, baawo ì maŋ a muta niŋ lannoo la.
58004003	Bari ntolu mennu laata, m̀ be duŋ na wo dahaa kono le. Tooñaa, Alla ye ñiŋ fo le nuŋ ko, “Bituŋ n kamfaariŋo kalita ì ye ko, ì nene te duŋ na n na dahaa kono.” A naata ñiŋ kumoo le fo, hani a la dookuwo tarata pareeriŋ ne biriŋ duniyaa daa waatoo la.
58004004	Tili woorowulanjaŋo la kuwo to, a be safeeriŋ ne ko: “Alla ye i dahaa tili woorowulanjaŋo la a la dookuwo bee le la.”
58004005	Bari a naata seyinkaŋ jaŋ ko: “Ì nene te duŋ na n na dahaa kono.”
58004006	Wo kamma la, a koyita le ko, moo doolu be duŋ na wo dahaa kono le, bari wo moolu mennu ye kibaari betoo moyi nuŋ, ì maŋ duŋ noo wo dahaa kono yaamari mutabaliyaa kamma la.
58004007	Bituŋ Alla ye luŋ doo londi, meŋ mu bii luŋo ti, biriŋ a ye ñiŋ kumoolu fo ka bo niŋ Mansa Dawuda la, ŋà kumoolu mennu fo fokabaŋ: “Bii luŋo la, niŋ ali ye a kaŋo moyi, ali kana ali sondomoolu jandi.”
58004008	Kaatu niŋ a ye a tara, Yosuwa ye dahaa dii Banisirayilankoolu la nuŋ, Alla te diyaamu la nuŋ wo luŋ doo la kuwo la meŋ ka naa.
58004009	Wo to, hani saayiŋ laahidoo be Alla la moolu ye le ko, ì be dahaa soto la le, Loobula Luŋo ka meŋ taamanseeri.
58004010	Silaŋ, moo-wo-moo meŋ dunta Alla la dahaa kono, wo maarii be i dahaa la a la dookuwo bee la le ko Alla ye i dahaa nuŋ a la dookuwo la ñaameŋ.
58004011	Wo kamma la, ali ŋà a kata baake ka duŋ wo dahaa kono, fo moo-wo-moo kana boyi ñiŋ ñoŋ yaamari mutabaliyaa kono ko Banisirayilankoolu boyita ñaameŋ.
58004012	Alla la kumoo be baluuriŋ ne, a nene buka lamfu. A diyaata le ka tambi hawusari daa fuloo bee la. A ka duŋ konoto le ka sondomoo niŋ nooroo talaa, a ka cokoo niŋ yuwo bondi ñoo bala le, aduŋ a ka miiroolu niŋ feeroolu kiitindi le, mennu be maaboriŋ sondomoo kono.
58004013	Feŋ te keriŋ daaroo kono, meŋ si i maabo noo Alla ma. Kuwolu bee be laariŋ kenebaa le to a ñaatiliŋo la, aduŋ ate le be ǹ na kebaaroolu kontibo la.
58004014	Saayiŋ, ŋà piriisi kuntii baa le soto, Yeesu Alla Dinkewo meŋ tambita saŋ fatoolu dandulaa la ka futa Alla la. Wo to, ali ŋà ǹ na lannoo ñiŋ muta kuu, ǹ ka meŋ na kuwo seedeyaa.
58004015	Ŋà piriisi kuntii baa le soto, meŋ ye balafaa soto noo ǹ ye ǹ na sembentaŋyaa kono, kaatu marisa kuwolu naata a faŋo kaŋ ne sila-wo-sila la ko m̀ be ñaameŋ, bari ate nene maŋ junuboo ke.
58004016	Wo to, ali ŋà fatiyaa ka sutiyaa Alla hiinantewo la mansasiiraŋo ma, fo ǹ si balafaa niŋ hiinoo soto ǹ na maakoyiroo to, ǹ suulata ì la waatoo meŋ na.
58005001	Moo-wo-moo meŋ tombonta piriisi kuntii baa ti, a tombonta le ka loo moolu ye Alla ñaatiliŋo la. A ka ì la beeyaŋ sadaalu niŋ sadaa koteŋolu bondi ì ye junube kafarilaŋolu ti.
58005002	A si muña noo moolu ye, mennu buka kalamutaroo ke, aniŋ mennu ka fili, baawo ate fanaa be sembentaŋyaa kono le.
58005003	Wo le ye a tinna a ñanta beeyaŋ sadaalu bondi la a faŋo fanaa la junuboolu ye, ko a ka a ke moolu ye ñaameŋ.
58005004	Moo buka a faŋo londi ñiŋ horoma dookuwo to, bari a ka ke ka bo niŋ Alla la kumandiroo le la, ko Haaruna la kuwo keta ñaameŋ.
58005005	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, Kiristu maŋ buuñaa dii a faŋo la ka ke piriisi kuntii baa ti, bari Alla le ye a tomboŋ, kabiriŋ a ye ñiŋ kumoolu fo a ye nuŋ ko: “I mu n dinkewo le ti. Bii luŋo la nte faŋo keta i faamaa le ti.”
58005006	Aduŋ aaya doo fanaa to, Alla ko a ye le ko: “Ite keta piriisoo le ti fo abadaa, ko Melikisedeki la piriisiyaa be ñaameŋ.”
58005007	Biriŋ Yeesu be sabatiriŋ duniyaa kono jaŋ ko hadamadiŋo, a ye duwaalu niŋ daaniroolu ke ka bo niŋ kumboo baa niŋ ñaajiyolu la Alla ye, meŋ si a tankandi noo saayaa ma. Aduŋ Alla ye a moyi a la a ñaasilaŋo le kamma la.
58005008	Hani ate mu Alla Dinkewo ti ñaa-wo-ñaa, a ye yaamarimutoo karaŋ ne ka bo niŋ a la toora kuwolu la.
58005009	Ka bo wo siloo le la, a naata timma ka badaa-badaa kiisoo saabu moolu bee ye, mennu ka a la yaamaroolu muta.
58005010	Alla le ye a tomboŋ ka a ke piriisi kuntii baa ti, ko Melikisedeki la piriisiyaa be ñaameŋ.
58005011	Ŋà kuu jamaa le soto, ǹ si mennu fo ñiŋ kuwo to, bari a koleyaata le ka a bondi ñoo to ali ye, kaatu ali buka fahaamuroo ke kotenke.
58005012	Tooñaa, m̀ be temboo meŋ to, ali ñanta ke la karandirilaalu le ti, bari wo noo to ali suulata moolu la le, mennu be ali karandi la kotenke Alla la kumoo simfaa foloolu la. Ali suulata keekewo le la, a maŋ ke domori bambandiŋo ti.
58005013	Moo-wo-moo meŋ na baluwo be dendiŋ keekewo la, wo maarii mu deenaanoo le ti hani saayiŋ, aduŋ a te tiliŋo karandiroo kumoolu fahaamu noo la.
58005014	Bari domori bambandiŋo mu moo mendiŋolu le taa ti. Ka bo niŋ nindiroo le la, wo moolu naata fahaamuroo soto ka kuu betoo niŋ kuu jawoo bo ñoo to.
58006001	Wo to, ali ŋà Kiristu la kuwo karandiroo simfaa foloolu bula ka taa ñaato ko moolu mennu menta. Ali ǹ kana fondamaŋo laa kotenke ka kuwolu bambandi, ŋà mennu soto fokabaŋ, kuwolu mennu be ko ka tuubi baara nafantaŋolu la, aniŋ ka laa Alla la.
58006002	Aduŋ m̀ maŋ suula ka wo yaamaroolu seyinkaŋ, mennu be dendiŋ batiseeroolu la, bulu laa baadiŋolu kaŋ duwaa kono, saayaakoolaa wulindiroo, aniŋ badaa-badaa kiitiyo la kuwo.
58006003	Niŋ Alla sonta, m̀ be a ke la le.
58006004	Kaatu tuubi koteŋ te moolu ye, mennu tarata Alla la maloo kono nuŋ fokabaŋ. Ì naata Arijana soorifeŋolu nene, aniŋ ì ye ì niyo soto Noora Kuliŋo to.
58006005	Ì ye Alla la kumoo la beteyaa nene le, aniŋ semboolu mennu be naa la laakira siniŋ.
58006006	Ñinnu bee koolaa, niŋ ì badalita, tuubi koteŋ te ì maakoyi noo la, baawo ì ye Alla Dinkewo pempeŋ yiribantambiloo kaŋ ì la wo kuwo le la kotenke, aniŋ ì ka a malundi kenebaa to.
58006007	Kaatu samaa ka siyaa bankoo meŋ kaŋ baake, a ka jiyo suusuu le, aniŋ a ka fiifeŋolu falindi moolu ye, a seneta mennu la kuwo kamma la, Alla ka neema wo bankoo ma le.
58006008	Bari bankoo meŋ ka ŋaniŋolu niŋ ñaamoolu falindi, a maŋ jari feŋ na, bari a sutiyaata dankoo le la, aduŋ a labaŋo mu janiroo le ti.
58006009	Ǹ kanuntewolu, hani ǹ ka diyaamu teŋ, bari alitolu la karoo la, ǹ dankeneyaata le ko, alitolu be kuwolu mennu soto la, wolu beteyaata ñinnu ti le, baawo ì be dendiŋ kiisoo le la.
58006010	Kaatu Alla tilinta le, aduŋ a te ñina la ali la dookuwo la, aniŋ kanoo, ali ye meŋ yitandi a too kamma la, ka moo senuŋolu maakoyi, aduŋ ali be looriŋ wo kaŋ ne hani saayiŋ.
58006011	Ǹ lafita le ko, alitolu meŋ-wo-meŋ ye wo hame baa kiliŋo yitandi fo labandulaa to, i si a je ali la jikoo si naa ke tooñaa ti.
58006012	M̀ maŋ lafi alitolu ye ke moo naafariŋolu ti, bari ali si moolu nikiŋ, mennu ka tu looriŋ lannoo niŋ muñoo kaŋ. Wo kamma la ì ka kuwolu keetaa le, mennu laahidita ì ye.
58006013	Kabiriŋ Alla ye Iburayima laahidi, a ye i kali a faŋo le la, kaatu a maŋ kantii soto, meŋ warata ate ti, ka i kali wo maarii la.
58006014	A ko, “Tooñaa, m be neema la i ma neema baa le la, aduŋ m be i koomalankoolu siyandi la le.”
58006015	Baawo Iburayima ye laahidoo batu muñoo niŋ wakiiloo le kono, a naata a soto.
58006016	Hadamadiŋolu ka i kali feŋ ne la, meŋ na kuwo warata ka tambi ì faŋolu la, aduŋ ì la ñoosaboo bee kono, kaloo le ka ì baŋ.
58006017	Wo to, biriŋ Alla lafita ka a koyindi baake wo moolu la, mennu be a la laahidoo soto la, ko a la feeroo te faliŋ na, a ye a bambandi niŋ kaloo le la.
58006018	A ye wo ke le, fo ǹ si sabarindi baa soto ka bo ñiŋ kuu fuloo la, laahidoo niŋ kaloo, mennu buka yelema. Alla la ñiŋ kumoo te ke la noo faniyaa ti. Wo kamma la ntolu mennu naata tankadulaa soto ate fee, ǹ si wakiiloo soto ka wo jikoo muta m̀ bulu fuloo la, a ye meŋ landi ǹ ñaatiliŋo la.
58006019	Ŋà ñiŋ jikoo soto bambandinke ǹ niyolu ye le ko lankaroo, meŋ dunta ridoo kooma, Dulaa Senuŋ Baa to.
58006020	Wo mu dulaa le ti, Yeesu dunta daameŋ ka ke sila ñaatonkoo ti ntolu ye, baawo a naata ke badaa-badaa piriisi kuntii baa ti, ko Melikisedeki la piriisiyaa be ñaameŋ.
58007001	Ñiŋ Melikisedeki mu Salaamu saatewo mansakewo le ti nuŋ, aniŋ Alla Mansa Tallaa la piriisoo. Kabiriŋ Iburayima be muru kaŋ naŋ ka bo keloo la, a ye mansakewolu noo daameŋ, Melikisedeki niŋ a benta, aduŋ a neemata Iburayima ma le.
58007002	Iburayima fanaa ye feŋolu bee jakoo dii a la le. Melikisedeki too kotoo mu Tiliŋo Mansa le ti, aduŋ ate mu Kayiroo Mansa fanaa le ti, kaatu Salaamu kotoo mu kayiroo le ti.
58007003	Melikisedeki faamaa la kuwo maŋ yitandi, waraŋ a baamaa, sako a bonsuŋ saataroo. A la baluwo foloodulaa maŋ safee, sako a labandulaa, bari ate be le ko Alla Dinkewo. A be tu la piriisiyaa le la fo abadaa.
58007004	Ali a juubee, a la kuwo warata ñaameŋ! Hani m̀ mumu Iburayima faŋo ye jakoo dii ñiŋ Melikisedeki la le feŋolu to, a ye mennu soto keloo to.
58007005	Wo Lewi lasiloo moolu, mennu naata ke piriisoolu ti, ì ye yaamaroo soto Luwaa kono le ka jakoolu taa moolu bulu, hani wolu mu ì baadiŋolu ti, baawo ì fanaa bota Iburayima le bala.
58007006	Bari ñiŋ kewo, Melikisedeki, a maŋ bo nuŋ Lewi lasiloo kono, bari a ye jakoo soto Iburayima bulu le. Aduŋ Iburayima ye Alla la laahidoolu soto ñaa-wo-ñaa, bari Melikisedeki neemata a ma le.
58007007	Ñoosaboo te ñiŋ kuwo to ko, meŋ ka neemoo dii, wo le la kuwo warata ka tambi, a neemata meŋ ma.
58007008	Jakoolu ka dii piriisoolu le la, mennu ka faa. Bari ñiŋ kumoo fota Melikisedeki la kuwo le to, meŋ be baluuriŋ, ko a seedeyaata ñaameŋ.
58007009	Moo si hani a fo noo ko, Lewi faŋo meŋ lasiloo moolu ka jakoolu taa, wo ye jakoolu dii Melikisedeki la le ka bo niŋ Iburayima la.
58007010	Kaatu biriŋ Melikisedeki niŋ Lewi mumu Iburayima benta, wo ye a tara le, Lewi maŋ wuluu foloo, bari a be nuŋ wo lasiloo kono le.
58007011	Moolu ye Luwaa soto ka bo niŋ Lewi lasiloo la piriisiyaa le la, bari niŋ ì si timma noo ka bo wo la, muŋ ne duŋ ye a tinna, suuloo tarata piriisi doo la naa to? Muŋ ne ye a tinna ì suulata moo la, meŋ na piriisiyaa be ko Melikisedeki la piriisiyaa be ñaameŋ, a maŋ ke ko Haaruna taa?
58007012	Niŋ falindiroo keta piriisiyaa to, wo to luwaa fanaa ñanta faliŋ na le.
58007013	Kaatu ñiŋ kuwolu fota moo meŋ na kuwo to, a bota lasili doo le to, moo nene maŋ bo meŋ kono ka piriisiyaa dookuwo ke sadaajanidulaa to.
58007014	A koyita le ko, m̀ Maariyo bota Yahuuda lasiloo le kono, aduŋ Musa nene maŋ feŋ fo ñiŋ lasiloo la kuwo to, biriŋ a diyaamuta piriisiyaa la kuwo la.
58007015	Wo kuwo naata seneyaa le set, biriŋ piriisi doo naata, meŋ be ko Melikisedeki.
58007016	A maŋ naa ke piriisoo ti ka bo niŋ luwaa la yaamaroo la, meŋ ye Lewi lasiloo londi wo dookuwo to, bari a naata ke piriisoo ti ka bo niŋ badaa-badaa baluwo semboo la.
58007017	Kaatu a la kuwo seedeyaata le ko: “Ite keta piriisoo le ti fo abadaa, ko Melikisedeki la piriisiyaa be ñaameŋ.”
58007018	Wo to, yaamari kotoo ñanta landi la kara la le, kaatu a maŋ semboo waraŋ nafaa soto.
58007019	Musa la Luwaa maŋ feŋ ne timmandi, bari a ye siloo le parendi jikoo ye, meŋ si ǹ sutiyandi noo Alla la.
58007020	Kabiriŋ Alla ye a la laahidoo dii ñiŋ jikoo la kuwo to, a ye a bambandi niŋ kaloo le la. A nene maŋ i kali piriisi doolu kerekeroo to ì la dookuwo la,
58007021	bari kaloo keta Yeesu dammaa le la kuwo to ko: “Maariyo ye i kali le, aduŋ a te a hakiloo faliŋ na: ‘Ite keta piriisoo le ti fo abadaa.’ ”
58007022	Ñiŋ kaloo ye a tinna le, Yeesu keta sankayaaraŋo ti kambeŋ kutoo ye, meŋ beteyaata kambeŋ kotoo ti.
58007023	Piriisi jamaa le be jee nuŋ, saayaa le ye ì la piriisiyaa dookuwo daŋ.
58007024	Bari Yeesu ye a la piriisiyaa meŋ soto, wo nene te baŋ na, kaatu a be tu la baluuriŋ ne fo abadaa.
58007025	Wo le ye a tinna a ka moolu kiisa noo, mennu ka sutiyaa Alla la ka bo niŋ ate la, baawo a be baluuriŋ ne fo abadaa ka duwaa ì ye.
58007026	Yeesu le mu wo ñoŋ piriisi kuntii baa ti, ǹ suulata meŋ na. A seneyaata le, a nene maŋ junuboo ke, a maŋ sootaari soto. A landita kara la ka bo junubelaalu kono, aduŋ a wulindita horomoo kono le santo, saŋ fatoolu kunto.
58007027	A maŋ ke ko piriisi kuntii baa doolu, mennu suulata ka beeyaŋ sadaalu bondi luŋ-wo-luŋ, ì faŋolu foloo la junuboolu ye, wo koolaa moo doolu. Bari ate ye sadaa bo siiñaa kiliŋ moolu bee ye, biriŋ a ye a faŋo dii sadaa ti.
58007028	Tooñaa, Musa la Luwaa ye hadamadiŋolu tomboŋ ì la sembentaŋyaa kono le, ka ke piriisi kuntii baalu ti. Bari Luwaa koolaa, Alla ye a la kaloo dii ka a Dinkewo le tomboŋ ñiŋ dookuwo to, aduŋ ate timmandita le fo abadaa.
58008001	M̀ be kuu kummaa meŋ fo kaŋ, a fele: Ŋà piriisi kuntii baa le soto, meŋ be siiriŋ Alla Mansa Tallaa la mansasiiraŋo bulubaa karoo la Arijana kono.
58008002	A ka dookuwo ke Dulaa Senuŋ Baa le kono Alla la Tiriliisi Senuŋo to. Ñiŋ mu Tiriliisi tooñaa le ti, hadamadiŋ maŋ meŋ londi, bari Maariyo faŋo.
58008003	Piriisi kuntii baa-wo-kuntii baa tombonta le ka beeyaŋ sadaalu niŋ sadaa koteŋolu bo. Wo kamma la, ñiŋ piriisoo fanaa ñanta feŋ soto la le, a si meŋ bondi sadaa ti.
58008004	Niŋ a ye a tara, a be duniyaa le kono, wo to a te ke noo la piriisoo ti muk, kaatu piriisoolu be duniyaa kono le fokabaŋ, mennu ka sadaalu bondi ko Musa la Luwaa ye a landi ñaameŋ.
58008005	Wo piriisoolu la dookuwo mu taamanseeroo niŋ niiniyo doroŋ ne ti kuwolu to, mennu be Arijana kono. Wo kamma la, biriŋ Musa pareeta ka Tiriliisi Senuŋo loo, Alla ye a yaamari ko, “I si feŋolu bee ke ko, a yitandita i la ñaameŋ konkoo kaŋ.”
58008006	Bari saayiŋ, Yeesu ye piriisiyaa dookuwo meŋ soto, wo le warata ka tambi wo piriisi doolu la dookuwo la. A tambita ì la dookuwo la le ko kambeŋ kutoo, Yeesu keta kanjurilaa ti kambeŋo meŋ ye, wo le beteyaata ka tambi kambeŋ kotoo la, kaatu a kambeŋo loota laahidi betoolu le kaŋ ka tambi wo doolu la.
58008007	Niŋ a ye a tara, kambeŋ kotoo maŋ sootaari soto, wo to suula te tara la kambeŋ kutoo la naa to.
58008008	Bari Alla ye sootaaroo je a la moolu la kuwo to le, wo le ye a tinna a ko: “Luŋolu be naa le, m be kambeŋ kutoo le siti la n niŋ Banisirayila niŋ Yahuuda teema.” Maariyo le ye a fo.
58008009	“A te ke la komeŋ ŋa kambeŋo meŋ siti n niŋ ì mumuñolu teema, kabiriŋ ŋa ì tambindi ka ì bondi naŋ Misira bankoo kaŋ. Ì maŋ tu tilindiŋ n na kambeŋo ye, wo le ye a tinna ŋa n koo dii ì la.” Maariyo le ye a fo.
58008010	“M be kambeŋ kutoo meŋ siti la n niŋ Banisirayila teema, niŋ wo luŋolu tambita, a be ke la ñiŋ ne ti: M be n na yaamaroolu ke la ì hakiloolu kono le, ŋa ì safee ì sondomoolu bala. M be ke la ì la Alla le ti, aduŋ ì be ke la n na moolu le ti.” Maariyo le ye a fo.
58008011	“Moo te a ñoŋ moo doo karandi la kotenke, waraŋ ka a fo a baadiŋo ye ko, ‘Maariyo loŋ!’ kaatu ì bee le be n loŋ na, biriŋ moondiŋ, fo moo baa.
58008012	M be yamfa la ì la kuu kuruŋolu la le, n hakiloo te tara la ì la junuboolu kaŋ kotenke.”
58008013	Kabiriŋ Alla diyaamuta kambeŋ kutoo la kuwo to nuŋ, a ye kambeŋ foloo ke kotoomaa le ti. Aduŋ meŋ be kotoo kaŋ, aniŋ a semboo be bo kaŋ, wo be yeemaŋ kaŋ ne.
58009001	Hani kambeŋ foloo ye yaamaroolu soto le nuŋ Alla batoo ye, aduŋ a ye batudulaa fanaa soto ñiŋ duniyaa kono le.
58009002	Biriŋ ñiŋ tiriliisoo loota, a talaata fannaa fula le ti. A fannaa foloo ka kumandi Dulaa Senuŋo le la. Lampu looraŋo be a kono le, aniŋ taabuloo, mbuuru senuŋo ka tara laariŋ meŋ kaŋ.
58009003	Fannaa fulanjaŋo konoto, meŋ be ridoo kooma, wo ka kumandi Dulaa Senuŋ Baa le la.
58009004	Cuuraayi siisindidulaa be jee le, meŋ dadaata niŋ sanoo la, aniŋ Kambeŋ Kunewo, meŋ konoto niŋ a banta bee muurita niŋ saniforoo la. Wo Kambeŋ Kunewo kono, sani dumboo be jee le, ì ye manna maabo meŋ kono, Haaruna la dokoo meŋ ye soroŋ kutoo fintindi nuŋ, aniŋ kambeŋ berewalaa fuloo.
58009005	Kerubu malaayika fuloo meŋ ka a yitandi ko, Alla be jee le, ye ì dampaŋolu werendende kunewo bitindaŋo santo, meŋ keta junube kafaridulaa ti. Bari waatoo maŋ soto saayiŋ ka ñiŋ kuwolu kiliŋ-kiliŋ naa koyindi.
58009006	Kabiriŋ tiriliisoo niŋ a jooraŋolu bee pareeta, piriisoolu ka tu taa la ì la dookuwo la le tiriliisoo fannaa foloo kono.
58009007	Bari wo fannaa doo to, meŋ be konoto, piriisi kuntii baa doroŋ ne ka taa jee, siiñaa kiliŋ doroŋ saŋo kono. Aduŋ a te duŋ na jee, niŋ a maŋ yeloo samba ñoo la, a ka meŋ bo sadaa ti a faŋo ye, aniŋ moolu la junuboolu ye, ì ye mennu ke lombaliyaa kono.
58009008	Ka bo ñiŋ taamanseeroo la, Noora Kuliŋo ka a yitandi le ko, siloo maŋ yele foloo ka duŋ Dulaa Senuŋ Baa kono, kaatu wo Tiriliisi Senuŋ foloo be looriŋ ne hani saayiŋ.
58009009	Ñiŋ ka saayiŋ jamaanoo le misaali. A ka a yitandi le ko, batulaa sondomoo te tenkundi noo la ka bo niŋ beeyaŋ sadaalu niŋ sadaa koteŋolu la.
58009010	Wo yaamaroolu be dendiŋ hadamadiŋ baloo kuwolu doroŋ ne la. Ì be ko domori feŋolu niŋ miŋ feŋolu, aniŋ seneyandiri siifaa jamaa. Ñiŋ yaamaroolu ye semboo soto le fo janniŋ batuñaa kutoo be naa la.
58009011	Kabiriŋ Kiristu naata finti ǹ ye piriisi kuntii baa ti, kuu betoolu to, mennu naata ǹ ye, a naata niŋ Tiriliisi Senuŋo le la, meŋ na kuwo warata ka tambi wo tiriliisi tambilaa la, aduŋ ñiŋ tiriliisoo le timmata. A maŋ dadaa niŋ hadamadiŋ buloo la, waraŋ ñiŋ duniyaa daaroo la.
58009012	Kiristu dunta Dulaa Senuŋ Baa kono siiñaa kiliŋ doroŋ ne, moolu bee ye. A niŋ baakotoŋolu yeloo niŋ ninsiriŋolu yeloo maŋ duŋ jee, bari a dunta a kono niŋ a faŋo yeloo le la, aduŋ a ye badaa-badaa kiisoo naati ǹ ye.
58009013	Luwaa to nunto, ka baakotoŋolu yeloo, ninsituuraalu yeloo niŋ ninsiriŋolu seebuutoo sariŋ-sariŋ moo seneyaabaloolu kaŋ, wolu le ka moolu seneyandi ka bo ì la seneyaabaliyaa to.
58009014	Wo to, Kiristu yeloo duŋ, meŋ na kuwo warabaata beeyaŋ sadaalu yeloo ti! Ka bo niŋ badaa-badaa Nooroo la, a ye a faŋo dii sadaa ti, sootaari te meŋ na. Wo le ye a tinna a yeloo ka ǹ sondomoolu seneyandi ka bo baara nafantaŋolu kono, fo ǹ si Alla baluuriŋo batu noo.
58009015	Kiristu keta kambeŋ kutoo kanjurilaa le ti moolu ye, mennu kumandita ka badaa-badaa keetaa soto, fo ì si ñiŋ baluwo soto, meŋ laahidita nuŋ. A la saayaa keta kumakaaraŋo le ti moolu ye, mennu ye junuboo ke kambeŋ foloo koto.
58009016	Taalaa la sotofeŋolu talaaroo to, a faŋo ye meŋ talaañaa yaamari, wo talaaroo te ke noo la, niŋ a la saayaa kuwo maŋ koyi foloo.
58009017	Kaatu wo yaamaroo ka semboo soto waatoo doroŋ ne la, niŋ a maarii faata. A buka nafaa soto noo niŋ moo be baluuriŋ, meŋ ye a ke.
58009018	Wo le ye a tinna hani kambeŋ foloo faŋo maŋ semboo soto, niŋ yeloo te jee.
58009019	Biriŋ Musa ye Luwaa la yaamaroolu bee bankee moolu bee ye, a ye ninsiriŋolu yeloo niŋ baakotoŋolu le yeloo taa, a ye ì niŋ jiyo ñaami. Bituŋ a ye a sariŋ-sariŋ Luwaa Kitaaboo kaŋ, aniŋ moolu bee, ka bo niŋ siisiliŋñaama buloo la, boorajulu wuleŋo tarata meŋ bala.
58009020	Kabiriŋ a be a kaŋ, a ko: “Ñiŋ ne mu kambeŋo yeloo ti, Alla ye ali yaamari meŋ na.”
58009021	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, a ye yeloo sariŋ-sariŋ Tiriliisi Senuŋo fanaa kaŋ ne, aniŋ jooraŋolu bee, ì suulata mennu la Alla batoo kono.
58009022	Tooñaa, moo si a fo ko, Luwaa la karoo la, feŋ-wo-feŋ ka seneyandi niŋ yeloo le la, aduŋ niŋ yeloo maŋ boŋ, junube yamfoo te soto la.
58009023	Wo to, ñiŋ feŋolu mennu mu Arijana feŋolu misaaloo ti, a kummaayaata le ka ì seneyandi niŋ sadaalu la. Bari Arijana feŋolu faŋolu suulata le ka seneyandi niŋ sadaalu la, mennu beteyaata ñinnu ti.
58009024	Kaatu Kiristu dunta Dulaa Senuŋ Baa meŋ to, wo maŋ dadaa hadamadiŋo buloo la. Wo Dulaa Senuŋ doo mu ñiŋ tooñaa faŋo le misaaloo ti. Kiristu taata Arijana faŋo le kono, saayiŋ a be looriŋ Alla ñaatiliŋo la ntolu ye jee.
58009025	A maŋ taa Arijana kono ka a faŋo dii sadaa ti waati niŋ waati, ko piriisi kuntii baa ka duŋ Dulaa Senuŋ Baa kono ñaameŋ saŋ-wo-saŋ, a niŋ beeyaŋ yeloo, meŋ maŋ ke a faŋo taa ti.
58009026	Niŋ a keta wo ñaama, Kiristu ñanta toora la nuŋ siiñaa jamaa, biriŋ duniyaa foloodulaa to. Bari ko a keta ñaameŋ, a naata siiñaa kiliŋ doroŋ ne ñiŋ luŋ labaŋolu kono, fo a si junuboo bondi ka bo niŋ a faŋo la saayaa la, biriŋ a ye a faŋo dii sadaa ti.
58009027	Tooñaa le mu, moo-wo-moo ñanta faa la siiñaa kiliŋ ne, wo koolaa kiitiyo si naa.
58009028	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, Kiristu fanaa keta sadaa ti siiñaa kiliŋ ne, ka moo jamaa la junuboolu bondi. A be naa fulanjanke le, bari wo te ke la junuboo la kuwo ti, bari ka moolu kiisa, mennu be i yillaariŋ baake ate ma.
58010001	Musa la Luwaa mu niiniyo doroŋ ne ti kuu betoolu to, mennu be naa la. Wo kamma la, a te wo moolu timmandi noo la, mennu ka sutiyaa Alla la ka bo niŋ beeyaŋ sadaalu la, ì ka tu mennu bondi la saŋ-wo-saŋ.
58010002	Niŋ a ye a tara, wo sadaaboo si ì timmandi noo, fo ì te ñiŋ sadaaboo bula la baŋ? A koyita le ko, niŋ wo moolu seneyandita fokabaŋ, ì sondomoolu te ì tuumi noo la feŋ na kotenke.
58010003	Bari wo sadaalu mu saŋ-wo-saŋ hakili bulandiraŋo le ti junuboo la kuwo to,
58010004	kaatu ninsituuraalu yeloo niŋ baakotoŋolu yeloo te junuboolu bondi noo la.
58010005	Wo kamma la, biriŋ Kiristu naata ñiŋ duniyaa kono, a ko Alla ye ko: “Ite buka seewoo beeyaŋ sadaalu la, aniŋ siimaŋ sadaalu, bari i ye baloo parendi n ye le.
58010006	I maŋ ñiŋ kaniŋ ka jani sadaalu bondi, waraŋ junube kafarilaŋ sadaalu.
58010007	Bituŋ n kumata ko, ‘M fele! N na Alla, n naata le ka i la lafoo taamandi. N naata ka kuwo ke, meŋ safeeta n na kuwo to Luwaa Kitaaboo kono.’ ”
58010008	Kiristu la ñiŋ kumoolu kono Alla ye, a ko folooto ko, “I maŋ ñiŋ kaniŋ, ka beeyaŋ sadaalu bondi, waraŋ siimaŋ sadaalu, jani sadaalu waraŋ junube kafarilaŋ sadaalu, wolu buka i seewondi.” Ali ye a loŋ ne ko, ñinnu bee mu kuwolu le ti, Musa la Luwaa ye mennu londi.
58010009	Wo kumoolu koolaa, Kiristu naata ñiŋ kafu ko, “M fele, n naata le ka i la lafoo taamandi.” Wo siloo la, a ye kuwolu bondi le, mennu be dendiŋ kambeŋ kotoo la, ka ì jooseyi kambeŋ kutoo la.
58010010	Ka bo niŋ Alla la ñiŋ lafoo le la, ntolu naata seneyaa, kaatu Yeesu Kiristu ye a baloo dii sadaa ti moolu bee ye le, siiñaa kiliŋ.
58010011	Piriisi-wo-piriisi ka loo a la dookuwo la le luŋ-wo-luŋ, ka tu sadaalu bondi la, mennu nene te junuboolu bondi noo la.
58010012	Bari biriŋ Kiristu ye a faŋo dii junube kafarilaŋ sadaa ti, a ye a ke siiñaa kiliŋ doroŋ ne la. Bituŋ a siita Alla bulubaa karoo la,
58010013	a be tu la daameŋ, fo a jawoolu ye ke a siŋ looraŋo ti.
58010014	Ka bo niŋ wo sadaa kiliŋo le la, a ye badaa-badaa timmandiroo dii moolu la, mennu seneyandita.
58010015	Noora Kuliŋo fanaa ka ñiŋ kuwo seedeyaa ǹ ye le, Maariyo ye meŋ fo ko:
58010016	“M be kambeŋ kutoo meŋ siti la n niŋ ì teema, niŋ wo luŋolu tambita, a be ke la ñiŋ ne ti: M be n na yaamaroolu ke la ì hakiloolu kono le, ŋa a safee ì sondomoolu bala.”
58010017	Wo to le a ye ñiŋ kafu ko: “N hakiloo te tara la ì la junuboolu niŋ kuu kuruŋolu kaŋ kotenke.”
58010018	Saayiŋ, junube yamfoo sotota daameŋ, ka sadaa bo junube kafarilaŋo ti, wo te soto la jee kotenke.
58010019	Wo to baadiŋolu, ŋà dankeneyaa soto le ka duŋ Dulaa Senuŋ Baa kono ka bo niŋ Yeesu yeloo la.
58010020	A ye sila kutoo yele ǹ ye meŋ ka baluwo dii ka bo niŋ ridoo la, wo le mu a baloo ti.
58010021	Baawo ŋà ñiŋ piriisi kuntii baa le soto, meŋ ka Alla la dimbaayaalu mara,
58010022	wo to ali ŋà sutiyaa Alla la niŋ sondome betoo la, meŋ be faariŋ lannoo la, dankeneyaa kono. A yeloo sariŋ-sariŋo si ǹ sondomoolu seneyandi fo ì kana ǹ tuumi noo feŋ na, aduŋ m̀ balajaatoolu si kuu niŋ jii senuŋo la.
58010023	Ali ŋà mutaroo ke bambandinke jikoo la, ŋà meŋ na kuwo seedeyaa, kaatu meŋ ye laahidoo dii ǹ na, wo foroyaata le.
58010024	Aduŋ ali ŋà m̀ miira, ǹ si ñoo hamendi noo ñaameŋ kanoo la, aniŋ kuu bete kewo.
58010025	Ǹ kana ǹ ñaa kaasi ǹ na beŋo la ñoo kaŋ, ko doolu daajikoo be ñaameŋ, bari ali ŋà ñoo wakiilindi, baawo ali ye a je le, Maariyo la naa luŋo be sutiyaa kaŋ ne.
58010026	Ǹ na tooñaa londiŋ koolaa, niŋ ǹ tawuta ka junuboo ke, junube kafarilaŋ sadaa koteŋ te ǹ ye jee.
58010027	Wo noo to kiitii koleŋ baa doroŋ ne be pareeriŋ ǹ ye, aniŋ dimbaa jawu baa meŋ be balannaalu kasaara la.
58010028	Moo meŋ ye Musa la Luwaa tiñaa, wo ñanta faa la le, niŋ wo kuwo loota seede fula waraŋ seede saba la seedeyaa la. Balafaa te soto la jee.
58010029	Wo to, wo maarii duŋ, meŋ jututa Alla Dinkewo la fo a ye a yeloo dori a siŋo koto, kambeŋ kutoo yeloo meŋ ye a seneyandi? Wo maarii la kuluuroo duŋ, meŋ ye Alla la Nooroo neŋ, Nooroo meŋ ye hiinoo dii a la?
58010030	Ŋà ate loŋ ne, meŋ ye ñiŋ fo ko, “Julujoo mu nte le taa ti, m be a joo la le.” Aduŋ a be safeeriŋ fanaa le ko, “Maariyo be a la moolu le kiitindi la.”
58010031	Ka duŋ Alla baluuriŋo buloo kono, wo mu silaŋ kuu baa le ti.
58010032	Ali ali hakiloo bulandi wo luŋolu la, mennu tambita nuŋ, ali ye muñoo niŋ kata kuu baalu mennu ke tooroolu kono, kabiriŋ Alla la maloo naata mala ali sondomoo kono.
58010033	Waatoo doolu la, ì ka ali neŋ kenebaa to, ì ka ali toorandi. Ali doolu ka kafu moolu ma le, mennu toorandita wo ñaama.
58010034	Ali ka balafaa bunjawutonkoolu ye le, aduŋ ali seewootoo ka soŋ ali la sotofeŋolu buusoo la le, kaatu ali ye a loŋ ne ko, sotofeŋ bete baa be pareeriŋ ali ye, meŋ be tu la fo abadaa.
58010035	Wo to, ali kana ali la jiki baa fayi, meŋ ye tinee baa soto.
58010036	Ali suulata wakiiloo le la, fo ali si Alla la lafoo ke noo, aniŋ ka a la laahidoo soto,
58010037	ko a be safeeriŋ ñaameŋ: “Ñaato domandiŋ, ate meŋ be naa kaŋ, a be naa la le, a te mee la.
58010038	N na moo tilindiŋo be baluu la le, ka bo niŋ lannoo la. Bari niŋ silaŋo ye a badalindi, n niyo te seewoo la a la kuwo la.”
58010039	Bari m̀ maŋ ke wo moolu ti, mennu ka badali, ì ye kasaara. Wo noo to, m̀ mu lannamoolu le ti, mennu be tanka la ka duŋ badaa-badaa baluwo kono.
58011001	Lannoo mu muŋ ne ti? Wo mu ka laa bambandinke kuwo la, i jikita meŋ na, aniŋ ka kuwo muta tooñaa ti, i buka meŋ je.
58011002	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, m̀ mumuñolu ye seedeyaa betoo soto Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
58011003	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, ŋà fahaamuroo soto alihawaa la kuwo to ko, a daata ka bo niŋ Alla la kumoo le la, aduŋ feŋolu mennu ka je, wolu daata ka bo niŋ feŋ jebaloolu la.
58011004	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Haabiila ye sadaa betoo bondi Alla ñaatiliŋo la, ka tambi Kaabiila taa la. Ka bo niŋ wo la, Alla ye a muta moo tilindiŋo ti, aduŋ a ye seedeyaa betoo ke a la kuwo to, biriŋ a sonta a la sadaa la. Haabiila faata ñaa-wo-ñaa, bari a la lannoo kamma la, a la kuwo ka tu fo la le hani saayiŋ.
58011005	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Enoki bota duniyaa kono, a maŋ saayaa nene. Bari “a yeemanta, kaatu Alla le ye a samba.” Janniŋ wo be ke la, a ye seedeyaa soto le ko, a ye Alla kontaanindi le.
58011006	Alla te kontaanindi noo la lannoo kooma, kaatu moo-wo-moo meŋ lafita ka sutiyaa Alla la, wo maarii ñanta laa la le ko, Alla be sotoriŋ ne, aduŋ a ka moolu joo le, mennu ka a ñini baturoo kono.
58011007	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Nuha ye Alla la dandalaaroo muta kuwolu to, mennu maŋ je foloo. A ye kuluŋ baa dadaa ka a la dimbaayaa kiisandi. Ka bo niŋ a la lannoo le la, duniyaa naata halaki, aduŋ Nuha naata wo tiliŋo soto le, meŋ ka naa ka bo niŋ lannoo la.
58011008	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Iburayima ye Alla la yaamaroo muta, kabiriŋ Alla ye a kumandi ka taa bankoo to, a be meŋ soto la keetaa ti. A maŋ a taadulaa loŋ ñaa-wo-ñaa, a ye a la suwo bula.
58011009	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, a tarata tumarankeeyaa kono wandi bankoo kaŋ, a ye laahidoo soto meŋ to. A sabatita tiriliisoolu le koto, a niŋ Isiyaaka niŋ Yaakuba, mennu fanaa keta keetaalaalu ti wo laahidi kiliŋo to.
58011010	A ye ñiŋ ke le, kaatu a be i yillaariŋ saatewo le la, meŋ be looriŋ fondamaŋo kaŋ, a loolaa aniŋ a dadaalaa mu Alla le ti.
58011011	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Saara faŋo meŋ keebaayaata wuluwo ye, naata semboo soto ka diŋo wuluu, kaatu a laata le ko, Alla foroyaata le, meŋ ye laahidoo dii a la.
58011012	Wo le ye a tinna kee kiliŋ meŋ baloo maŋ jamfa saayaa la, a naata ke bonsuŋo ti moolu ye, mennu siyaata ko looloolu saŋo santo. Ì be siyaariŋ ko bankumunkoo, ì buka konti noo.
58011013	Ñiŋ moolu bee faata lannoo le kono. Ì maŋ kuwolu je, mennu laahidita ì ye, bari ì ye ì hayinaŋ dulaa jaŋ ne. Ì sonta le ko, itolu keta tumarankewolu doroŋ ne ti, mennu be manee ñiŋ duniyaa kono.
58011014	Wo to moolu, mennu ka ñiŋ kuu siifaalu fo, ì ka a yitandi le ko, ì be ì fansuŋ bankoo le ñini kaŋ.
58011015	Niŋ ì ka i miira wo bankoo le la, ì bota nuŋ daameŋ, wo to ì be seyi noo la le.
58011016	Bari tooñaa, ì tarata hameriŋ banku betoo doo le la, meŋ beteyaata wo doo ti, kaatu a be Arijana le kono. Wo kamma la, niŋ wo moolu ka Alla kumandi ì la Alla la, Alla maŋ wo muta malu kuwo ti, kaatu a ye saatewo le parendi ì ye.
58011017	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Iburayima ye Isiyaaka bondi sadaa ti, kabiriŋ Alla ye a kotobo. A pareeta le ka a dinkee kiliŋo bo sadaa ti, a ye laahidoo soto meŋ na kuwo to nuŋ,
58011018	biriŋ Alla ko a ye ko, “I koomalankoolu be bo la Isiyaaka le bala.”
58011019	Iburayima laata le ko, Alla si furewolu wulindi noo saayaa kono le. Aduŋ ǹ si a fo noo a la ñiŋ kuwo to ko, Alla ye a diŋo seyindi a ma le ka bo saayaa kono.
58011020	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Isiyaaka ye neemoo daani Yaakuba niŋ Esawu ye kuwolu to, mennu be naa la siniŋ.
58011021	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Yaakuba fanaa ye Alla la neemoo daani Yusufa dinkewolu ye, kabiriŋ saayaa sutiyaata a la. A tintinta a la taamaraŋ dokoo kuŋo le kaŋ, biriŋ a be duwaa la ì kiliŋ-kiliŋ naa ye.
58011022	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Yusufa diyaamuta Banisirayilankoolu ye, janniŋ a be faa la. A ye kuwolu fo ì ye, mennu be ke la ì la fintoo koolaa Misira bankoo kaŋ, aduŋ a ye yaamaroolu dii a furewo la kuwo to.
58011023	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Musa wuluulaalu maŋ sila ka balaŋ Misira mansakewo la yaamaroo la. Deenaanoo wuluuriŋ koolaa, ì ye a maabo fo kari saba, kaatu ì ye a je le ko, a maŋ ke dindiŋ kenseŋ ti.
58011024	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, biriŋ Musa menta, a balanta ka kumandi Firawoona dimmusoo diŋo la.
58011025	A ye tombondiroo ke ka kafu Alla la moolu ma ì la tooroolu kono, diina ka baluu junuboo la niidiyaa kuwolu kono, mennu ka yeemaŋ.
58011026	A laata le ko, malundiroo Alimasiihu la kuwo kamma la, wo le nafaa warata ka tambi Misira bankoo la naafuloolu la, kaatu a ñaa be joo le kaŋ, meŋ ka naa.
58011027	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, a ye Misira bankoo bula. A maŋ sila Misira mansakewo la kamfaa la, bari a tententa niŋ wakiiloo le la, a ye a ñaa loo Alla jebaloo kaŋ ko niŋ a ye a je le.
58011028	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, a ye Maariyo Tambi Tumoo Juuraloo londi, a ye yaamaroo dii ka yeloo sariŋ-sariŋ fo saayaa malaayikoo kana Banisirayilankoolu la konoñaa foloolu maa.
58011029	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Banisirayilankoolu tambita niŋ Kulunjumbe Baa la ko niŋ ì be banku jaaroo le kaŋ. Bari biriŋ Misirankoolu ye ì nooma, jiyo ye ì kunuŋ.
58011030	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Yeriko saatewo tata sansaŋolu boyita, kabiriŋ Banisirayilankoolu muruŋ-murunta a la fo tili woorowula.
58011031	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, Rahabu meŋ mu cakoo ti, ye a niyo tanka, biriŋ a ye kullooñinilaalu jiyaa kayiroo kono. A maŋ faa wo moolu kono, mennu maŋ Alla la yaamaroo muta.
58011032	Nte si muŋ ne fo noo kotenke? Waatoo maŋ soto noo nte ye ka Kideyoni, Baraki, Samuuda, Yefuta, Dawuda, Samuweli, ì niŋ annabiyomoolu la kuwo saata.
58011033	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, ì ye mansoolu la mansayaa buruka, ì ye marali tilindiŋo londi, aduŋ ì naata kuwolu soto, mennu laahidita ì ye. Ì ye jatoolu daa muta,
58011034	ì ye dimbaa jawoolu faa, ì kanata hawusaroo daa ma. Ì naata sembentuŋyaa ì la sembentaŋyaa kono, ì keta kelejawara baalu ti, mennu jawoolu ye bori baa wutu ì ñaato.
58011035	Ka bo niŋ lannoo le la, musu doolu naata ì la moolu soto kotenke ka bo saayaa kono. Moo doolu toorandita le, ì maŋ kanadaa ñini, kaatu ì tarata hameriŋ ne ka saayaakoolaa wulindiri betoo soto.
58011036	Moo doolu be jee, ì ye wolu ñaawali le, aniŋ ì ye ì karawaasi. Ì ye hani neejoloo bula ì doolu la le, aduŋ ì ye doolu soroŋ bunjawoo kono.
58011037	Ì ye ì doolu kurulabuŋ, ì ye doolu fara fula ti, ì ye doolu faa niŋ hawusaroolu la. Ì doolu ka taama ka taa dulaalu to taariŋ, aduŋ ì tarata feetoofatariŋ saajiikuloolu niŋ baakuloolu doroŋ ne la, fuwaareyaa, bataa aniŋ tooroolu kono.
58011038	Ì mu moolu le ti, mennu la kuwo tambita ñiŋ duniyaa la. Ì ka tara yaayi la keñewuloolu le kono taariŋ, aniŋ konkoolu kaŋ. Ì ka tara sabatiriŋ berehuwolu niŋ dinkoolu le kono taariŋ.
58011039	Ñiŋ moolu bee ye seedeyaa betoo le soto ka bo niŋ ì la lannoo la. Bari hani wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, Alla ye laahidoo ke kuwo meŋ to, ì nene maŋ wo soto,
58011040	baawo Alla ye feŋ bete baa parendi ntolu le ye. Wo to, ì te timmandiroo soto noo la ǹ kooma.
58012001	Wo to, baawo ñiŋ seedoolu siyaabaata teŋ ne, ì ye m̀ murubeŋ ko minaayoo, ali ŋà ǹ na dunoo bee landi kara la, sako junuboo meŋ ka lafi m̀ muta la. Ali ŋà bori wakiiloo kono boroo la, meŋ be laariŋ ǹ ñaato.
58012002	Ali ŋà ǹ ñaa loo Yeesu kaŋ, ǹ na lannoo be looriŋ ate le kaŋ, ka bo a foloodulaa ka taa a labandulaa to. A ye yiribantambiloo tooroo muña le, a maŋ a la malu kuwo juubee, kaatu a ñaa be looriŋ seewoo le kaŋ, meŋ parendita a ye, aduŋ a naata sii Alla la mansasiiraŋo bulubaa karoo la.
58012003	Ali i miira ate la, meŋ ye wo ñoŋ kuwolu muña junubelaalu bulu, mennu ye a koŋ. Wo siloo la ali te bataa la, waraŋ ka jikilateyi.
58012004	Ali la balaŋo junuboo la, a keloo maŋ futa wo tunkuŋo to foloo, ali si yeloo boŋ daameŋ.
58012005	Fo ali ñinata wakiilindiri kumoolu la le baŋ, mennu kono Alla ye ali kumandi a diŋolu la? A ko: “N diŋo, kana jutu Maariyo la kuluuroo la, kana jikilateyi, niŋ a ye i jalayi.
58012006	Kaatu Maariyo ye meŋ kanu, a ka wo le kuluu, aduŋ moo-wo-moo, a ka meŋ muta a diŋo ti, a ka wo maarii buutee le.”
58012007	Kuluuroo kamma la, ali si muña ñiŋ koleyaa kuwolu la. Wolu ka a yitandi le ko, Alla ye ali muta a diŋolu le ti. Diŋ jumaa le be keriŋ, meŋ faamaa buka a kuluu?
58012008	Niŋ ali dasata kuluuroo la, meŋ mu diŋolu bee taa ti, wo to ali maŋ ke diŋ foroolu ti, bari jankadiŋolu.
58012009	Ŋà faalu soto ñiŋ duniyaa kono le. Ì ka ǹ kuluu, aduŋ ǹ ka ì horoma le. Wo to, m̀ Faamaa la kuwo duŋ, ŋà meŋ soto Arijana kono? Ka soŋ ate ma, wo le kummaayaata ka tambi ǹ na duniyaa alifaalu bee la, fo ǹ si baluu tooñaa soto noo.
58012010	Wolu ka ǹ kuluu le, fo waatindiŋ, ko a beteyaata ì fee ñaameŋ. Bari Alla ka ǹ kuluu m̀ faŋolu la nafaa le kamma, fo ǹ si ǹ niyo soto a la seneyaa kono.
58012011	Kuluuri-wo-kuluuri ka dimi le a ke tumoo la, aduŋ moo buka kontaani a la. Bari ñaato, moolu mennu kuluuta, a ka ke kayiroo niŋ tiliŋo tinewo le ti wolu ye.
58012012	Wo kamma la, ali ali bulu lamfuriŋolu bambandi, aniŋ ali kumbaliŋolu mennu maŋ semboo soto.
58012013	Ali silandiŋolu tembendi ali siŋolu ye, fo namatoo cokoolu kana bo ñoo daa, bari ì si kendeyaa.
58012014	Ali katoo ke ka kayiroo sabatindi ali niŋ moolu bee teema, aduŋ ali si seneyaa, kaatu moo meŋ maŋ seneyaa, a nene te Maariyo je la.
58012015	Ali ali hakiloo tu, fo moo kana foo Alla la hiinoo la ali kono, i si a je moo te duŋ na ali kono ko yirisulu kunaŋo meŋ si bataa baa saabu aniŋ ka jamaa nondi.
58012016	Ali ali hakiloo tu, fo moo kana ke laañooyaa tulunnaa ti ali kono, waraŋ allantaŋo ko Esawu meŋ ye a la dinkee folooyaa makaamoo waafi domori booli kiliŋ na.
58012017	Ali ye a loŋ ne ko, wo kuwo koolaa, biriŋ a hameta wo neemoo soto la, a faamaa ye a bali wo la le. A maŋ sila soto ka tuubi, hani a ye a daani niŋ ñaajiyolu la.
58012018	Ali naata konkoo meŋ to, a maŋ ke konkoo ti, moo si meŋ maa noo. A maŋ ke ko Sinayi Konkoo, dimbaa jawoo be daameŋ nuŋ, dibi fiŋ baa, aniŋ foño baa.
58012019	Kabiriŋ Banisirayilankoolu futata wo konkoo ma, ì ye footaŋ kumakaŋo moyi, aniŋ kumoolu mennu ye ì silandi. Wo kamma la, ì ye daaniroo ke ko, ì maŋ lafi ì moyi la kotenke.
58012020	Ì maŋ yaamaroo muña noo, meŋ diita ko, “Hani beeyaŋo meŋ ye konkoo maa, a ñanta buŋ na niŋ beroolu le la ka a faa.”
58012021	Tooñaa, wo jewo keta silaŋ kuu baa le ti, fo Musa naata a fo a kuwo to ko, “Nte silata baake le, fo n ka jarajara.”
58012022	Bari alitolu naata Siyoni Konkoo le kaŋ, Alla baluuriŋo la saatewo to. Wo saatewo mu wo Yerusalaamu le ti, meŋ be Arijana kono, malaayika kontibaloolu be bendiŋ juuraloo la daameŋ.
58012023	Ali naata moo senuŋolu la kafoo kono, mennu toolu be safeeriŋ Arijana kono ko, dinkee folooyaa neemoo mu itolu le taa ti. Ali naata Alla le kaŋ, meŋ mu moolu bee kiitindilaa ti, aniŋ moo tilindiŋolu kaŋ, mennu timmandita.
58012024	Ali naata Yeesu le kaŋ, meŋ mu kanjurilaa ti kambeŋ kutoo ye, a niŋ a yeloo meŋ sariŋ-sarinta. Wo le ka hiinoo la kumoolu fo ka tambi Haabiila yeloo la.
58012025	Ali ali hakiloo tu, fo ali kana balaŋ wo maarii ma, meŋ be diyaamu kaŋ ali ye. Moolu mennu balanta Musa ma, meŋ ka ì dandalaa duniyaa kono jaŋ nuŋ, wolu maŋ kanadaa soto. Ntolu be kanadaa soto la ñaadii le, niŋ ŋà ǹ ñaa kaasi ate la, meŋ be ǹ dandalaa kaŋ ka bo Arijana kono?
58012026	Nunto, Alla la kumakaŋo ye bankoo jiijandi le, bari saayiŋ, a laahidita le ko, “Siiñaa kiliŋ koteŋ be naa, n te bankoo dammaa jiijandi la, bari saŋ fatoolu fanaa.”
58012027	Saayiŋ, kumoolu mennu fota ko, “siiñaa kiliŋ koteŋ,” wolu ye a yitandi koyirinke le ko, daaroo bee meŋ jiijandita, a be yeemaŋ na le, fo a si jooseyi noo feŋ na, meŋ te jiijandi noo la, bari a be tu la le fo abadaa.
58012028	Wo kamma la, ali ŋà tenturoo dii Alla la, kaatu ŋà mansayaa le soto, meŋ te jiijandi noo la. Ali ŋà Alla batu a ñaama, horomoo niŋ ñaasilaŋo kono,
58012029	kaatu ǹ na Alla ka muluŋ ne ko dimbaa, meŋ ka kasaaraloo ke.
58013001	Ali tenteŋ ka ñoo kanu, ko ali la baadiŋyaa hakoo be ñaameŋ.
58013002	Ali kana ñina ka luntaŋolu jiyaa. Moo doolu sotota le nuŋ, mennu ka luntaŋolu jiyaa, aduŋ ì ye malaayikoolu jiyaa wo kono le, ì maŋ bo a kalama.
58013003	Ali i miira moolu la, mennu be bunjawoo kono ko niŋ ali niŋ ì be ñoo kaŋ jee le. Aduŋ ali si i miira moolu la, mennu be toora kuwolu kono ko niŋ ali niŋ ì be wo toora kiliŋo le kono.
58013004	Futuwo si buuñaa alitolu bee kono, aduŋ futuu laaraŋo si seneyaa futuuñoomaalu teema. Alla le be laañooyaa tulunnaalu niŋ jeenelaalu kiitindi la.
58013005	Ali si fata kodilandiyaa la ali la baluwo kono, ali ye wasa feŋo to, ali ye meŋ soto. Kaatu Alla la kumoo be safeeriŋ ne ko: “N nene te bo la i koto, sako n si i bula i faŋ ye.”
58013006	Wo kamma la, ǹ si ñiŋ fo noo dankeneyaa kono le ko: “Maariyo le mu n na maakoyirilaa ti, n te sila la. Hadamadiŋolu si muŋ ne ke noo m ma?”
58013007	Ali hakiloo si bula ali la ñaatonkoolu la, mennu ye Alla la kumoo fo ali ye nuŋ. Ali i miira ì la baluwo la, aniŋ ì ye kuu betoolu mennu saabu. Ali ì la lannoo kuwo nikiŋ.
58013008	Yeesu Kiristu mu kiliŋ ne ti kunuŋ, bii, aniŋ fo abadaa.
58013009	Ali kana soŋ karandiri kuta siifaa bee la, kaatu ì jamaa ka ali filindi le. A beteyaata le, ǹ sondomoolu ye bambandi niŋ Alla la hiinoo la, a kana ke yaamaroolu ti domori kuwolu to. Wolu buka nafaa soto moolu ye, mennu ka ì nooma.
58013010	Ŋà sadaabodulaa le soto, moolu mennu ka dookuwo ke tiriliisoo kono, ì maŋ siloo soto ka domoroo ke jee.
58013011	Kaatu wo beeyaŋolu, piriisi kuntii baa ka mennu yeloo samba Dulaa Senuŋ Baa kono junube kafarilaŋo ti, ì ka wolu fintindi daakaa banta le ka ì jani jee.
58013012	Wo kamma la, Yeesu fanaa toorata saatewo banta le, ka moolu seneyandi ka bo niŋ a faŋo yeloo la.
58013013	Wo to, ali ŋà taa a kaŋ daakaa banta, ŋà a la malu kuwo muña.
58013014	M̀ maŋ saatewo soto jaŋ, meŋ be tu la fo abadaa, bari ǹ ñaa be looriŋ saatewo le kaŋ, meŋ be naa la.
58013015	Wo to, ali ŋà tu jayiroo dii la Alla la, ka bo niŋ Yeesu la. Ñiŋ jayiroo le mu ǹ na sadaa ti, meŋ ka a seedeyaa ko, ate le mu Maariyo ti.
58013016	Ali kana ñina kuu bete kewo la. Ali si diiroo ke moolu la, mennu be suuloo kono, kaatu wo le mu sadaa ti, Alla seewoota meŋ na.
58013017	Ali soŋ ali la ñaatonkoolu ma, ali ye ì la yaamaroolu muta. Ì be ali niyolu le kanta kaŋ badaa-badaa baluwo ye, aduŋ ì ñanta ì faŋolu kontibo la le Alla ñaatiliŋo la. Ali siloo dii ì la ka wo dookuwo ke seewoo kono, ali kana ì sunundi, kaatu wo te ali nafaa la.
58013018	Ali duwaa ntolu ye! Ŋà a loŋ ne ko, m̀ be hameriŋ ne ka baluu, buuñaa kono kuwolu bee to, aduŋ saayiŋ, ǹ sondomoolu maŋ ǹ tuumi feŋ na.
58013019	M be ali daani la kendeke le ka duwaa n ye, fo n si muru noo naŋ ali kaŋ tariyaake.
58013020	Alla meŋ ka kayiroo dii, ŋa a daani ali ye le. Ate le ye m̀ Maarii Yeesu wulindi ka bo saayaa kono ka baluu kotenke. Ñiŋ Yeesu naata ke Kantarilaa Baa le ti ntolu ye, a la saajiyolu, ka bo niŋ a faŋo yeloo la, meŋ mu yeloo ti a la badaa-badaa kambeŋo ye.
58013021	Allamaa Alla ye ali parendi niŋ a la soorifeŋ betoolu la, fo ali si a la lafoo ke. A ye ali ke moolu ti, mennu la kuwo si a seewondi. A si a ke ka bo niŋ Yeesu Kiristu la, tenturoo niŋ jayiroo be meŋ ye fo abadaa. Amiin.
58013022	Baadiŋolu, ŋa ali daani ka soŋ ñiŋ yaamaroolu la muñoo kono, baawo ŋa ñiŋ kuma dantaŋo doroŋ ne safee ali ye.
58013023	Ali si a loŋ ko, ì ye m̀ baadiŋ Timoti fintindi bunjawoo kono le. Niŋ a futata juuna, nte niŋ ate be naa la ñoo la le, ka ali kumpabo.
58013024	Ali ali la ñaatonkoolu kontoŋ n ye, aniŋ Alla la moo senuŋolu bee. Baadiŋolu bee mennu bota Italiya tundoo kaŋ, ì be ali kontoŋ na.
58013025	Alla la hiinoo ye tara ali bee fee.
59001001	Nte Yankuba, meŋ mu Alla niŋ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la dookuulaa ti, m be alitolu lasili taŋ niŋ fuloo kontoŋ na, alitolu mennu be janjandiŋ manee.
59001002	M baadiŋolu, niŋ bataa kuu siifaa jamaa ka laa ali kaŋ, ali si ì bee muta seewoo kuwo ti,
59001003	kaatu ali ye a loŋ ne ko, ali la lannoo kotoboroo le ka wakiiloo dii ali la.
59001004	Ali la wakiiloo si yiriwaa ka bo wo siloo la fo ali si ke moolu ti, mennu menta, aduŋ ì timmata. Wo to le ali te dasa la feŋ na.
59001005	Niŋ moo dasata ñaameŋo la ali kono, wo maarii si Alla daani, aduŋ a be ñaameŋo dii la a la le. Ate le ka diiroo ke moolu bee la a ñaama, jalayiribaliyaa kono.
59001006	Bari a ñanta daaniroo ke la lannoo le kono. A kana sika feŋ-wo-feŋ na, kaatu moo meŋ ka sika, wo maarii be le ko jiibaliŋo, foñoo ka meŋ ñori ka a fayi jaŋ waraŋ jana.
59001007	Moo meŋ ka sika wo ñaama, a kana a miira ko, a be feŋ soto la Maariyo bulu le.
59001008	Wo maarii mu hakilifulatiyo le ti, a maŋ bambaŋ a la sila-wo-sila kaŋ.
59001009	Baadiŋ fuwaaroo meŋ na kuwo dooyaata, wo si seewoo fanka tooñaa la, meŋ be a ye.
59001010	Baadiŋ fankamaa si seewoo, niŋ Alla ye a la makaamoo jindi, kaatu fankamaalu la kuwo be daŋ na le ko ñaama firoo.
59001011	Kaatu tiloo niŋ foño kandoo le ka wuli, meŋ ka ñaamoo jandi, a firoo ye joloŋ, a la ñiiñaa ye yeemaŋ. Fankamaa fanaa la kuwo be wo le ñaama: A faŋo be yeemaŋ na le, aduŋ a la kuwolu bee be daŋ na jaŋ ne.
59001012	Barakoo be moo le ye, meŋ ka wakiili kotoboroo la, kaatu wo koolaa a maarii be baluwo kañeerinaafoo soto la le, Alla ye meŋ laahidi moolu ye, mennu ye a kanu.
59001013	Niŋ marisa kuwo laata moo-wo-moo kaŋ, wo maarii kana a fo ko, “Alla le ye nte marisa!” kaatu Alla buka moo-wo-moo le marisa, aduŋ a faŋo buka marisa.
59001014	Bari moo ka marisa ka bo niŋ a fansuŋ hame kuu jawoo la neeneeroo le la.
59001015	Ñiŋ hame kuu jawoo be le ko fiifeŋ kesoo, aduŋ niŋ a ye kenoo soto ka faliŋ, a ka junuboo le wuluu. Aduŋ niŋ junuboo falinta fo a menta, a ka saayaa le diŋ.
59001016	M baadiŋ kanuntewolu, ali kana soŋ, ì ye ali neenee!
59001017	Soorifeŋ-wo-soorifeŋ meŋ beteyaata aniŋ meŋ timmata, ì bota naŋ m̀ Faamaa le yaa, meŋ ye malafeŋolu daa. A buka faliŋ, aduŋ a maloo te ke noo la niiniyo ti.
59001018	A faŋo la lafoo le kaŋ, a ye ǹ wuluu ñiŋ baluu kutoo to, ka bo niŋ tooñaa kumoo la. A ye ǹ tomboŋ ka ke foloo ti a la daaroo bee kono.
59001019	M baadiŋ kanuntewolu, ali ñiŋ loŋ ko, ali moo-wo-moo ñanta tariyaa la le ka lamoyiroo ke, bari ali si naafa ka diyaamu. Ali jusoo kana sutiyaa,
59001020	kaatu hadamadiŋo la kamfaa buka kuu saabu, meŋ tilinta Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
59001021	Wo kamma la, ali fata kuu nooriŋolu bee la, aniŋ kuruŋyaa siifaa bee. Ali soŋ Alla la kumoo ma, sooneeyaa bee kono. Wo mu kumoo le ti, meŋ fiita ali sondomoolu kono, aniŋ meŋ si ali kiisandi noo.
59001022	Ali kana ke kumoo moyilaalu doroŋ ti, meŋ mu faŋ neenewo ti, bari ali si ke a baaralaalu ti.
59001023	Kaatu niŋ moo-wo-moo ka kumoo moyi, bari a buka baara a la, a la kuwo be le ko moo, meŋ ka a ñaadaa juubee famfelendaŋo kono.
59001024	A ye a faŋo je, bari niŋ a taata, wo loo niŋ baroo teema, a ñinata a faŋo muluŋo la.
59001025	Bari a maŋ tara wo ñaama moo fee, meŋ ñaa be looriŋ luwaa timmariŋo kaŋ, baawo a ka luwaa le koroosi, meŋ ka firiŋo dii, aduŋ a ka wakiili a mutoo la le. Barakoo be wo maarii le ye, a la kebaaroolu bee to, baawo a maŋ ke kumoo moyilaa doroŋ ti, meŋ hakiloo buka tu a kaŋ, bari a mu a baaralaa le ti.
59001026	Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye a faŋo muta diina moo ti, bari a buka a neŋo mara noo, a ka a faŋo le neenee, aduŋ a la Alla batoo maŋ jari feŋ na.
59001027	Alla batu senuŋo meŋ maŋ sootaaroo soto m̀ Faamaa Alla ñaatiliŋo la, wo mu ka aliyatiimoolu niŋ furuyaamusu bataariŋolu topatoo ì la suuloolu kono, aniŋ ka fata ñiŋ duniyaa kosoo la.
59002001	M baadiŋolu, baawo ali laata m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la, kallankeeyaa mu meŋ taa ti, wo to ali kana moo-wo-moo faasaa.
59002002	Misaali fee, moo fula naata ali la bendulaa to, kiliŋo niŋ sani konnaalu aniŋ sitifeŋ ñiimaa, bari fulanjaŋo meŋ mu fuwaaroo ti, wo niŋ sitifeŋ faraŋ-farandiŋo naata duŋ jee.
59002003	Niŋ ali naata buuñaa dii wo doo la, meŋ ye sitifeŋ ñiimaa duŋ, ka a fo a ye ko, “Naa, sii ñaato jaŋ!” bari ali ko fuwaaroo ye ko, “Ite ye loo kooma jee, waraŋ sii teroo to, n siŋolu daala!”
59002004	wo to, fo ali maŋ fataŋ-fansoo le naati ali la kafoo kono baŋ? Ali keta kiitiikuntulaalu le ti, mennu ye kiitiyo kuntu ì fansuŋ miira jawoo la.
59002005	M baadiŋ kanuntewolu, ali i lamoyi! Fo Alla le maŋ moolu tomboŋ baŋ, mennu fuwaareyaata ñiŋ duniyaa kono, fo ì si fanka lannoo kono, aniŋ ì ye wo mansabaayaa keetaa, a ye meŋ laahidi moolu ye, mennu ye a kanu?
59002006	Bari alitolu ye fuwaaroo malundi kenebaa to! Fo fankamaalu le buka ali toorandi baŋ, ì ka ali samba kiitiyo to?
59002007	Fo itolu le buka Kiristu too horomariŋo tooñee baŋ, meŋ taa mu ali ti?
59002008	Niŋ ali ka Alla la mansabaayaa luwaa muta a ñaama, ko a yaamaroo be safeeriŋ ñaameŋ ko, “I si i siiñoo kanu ko i faŋo,” wo to ali be kuu betoo le ke kaŋ.
59002009	Bari niŋ ali ka moolu tambindi ñoo la, wo to alitolu ka junube kuwo le ke, aduŋ Luwaa tiñaalaalu la kiitiyo be laa la ali kaŋ ne.
59002010	Kaatu moo-wo-moo ye Luwaa bee muta, bari a naata yaamari kiliŋ tiñaa a kono, wo maarii ye Luwaa bee le tiñaa.
59002011	Kaatu Alla meŋ ko, “Kana jeenoo ke!” ate le fanaa ko, “Kana moofaa ke!” Saayiŋ, hani niŋ ite maŋ jeenoo ke, bari i ye moo faa, wo to ite keta luwaa tiñaalaa le ti.
59002012	Wo to ali diyaamu, aniŋ ali ye maa ko moolu mennu be kiitindi la ka bo niŋ luwaa la, meŋ ka moo firiŋ.
59002013	Kiitiyo le ka naa, meŋ buka balafaa soto moo ye, meŋ maŋ balafaa yitandi. Bari hani wo, balafaa le ye semboo soto kiitiyo ti.
59002014	M baadiŋolu, moo ye muŋ nafaa le soto, niŋ a ko, a ye lannoo soto le, bari a buka baara wo la? Fo a la lannoo si a kiisa noo baŋ?
59002015	Niŋ baadiŋo, musoo waraŋ kewo, maŋ sitifeŋolu soto, a dasata a la domoroo la,
59002016	doo ko a ye ali kono ko, “Taa kayira kono. Allamaa i konoo ye faa, aduŋ sumayaa ye bo i la!” bari a maŋ feŋ dii wo maarii la suuloolu to, wo to, a ye muŋ nafaa le soto wo maarii ye?
59002017	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, lannoo meŋ maŋ kebaaroolu soto, a maŋ nafaa soto, bari a faata le.
59002018	Bari saayiŋ moo doo si a fo noo ko, “Ite ye lannoo le soto, nte ye kebaaroolu le soto.” M be wo maarii jaabi la le ko, “I la lannoo meŋ maŋ kebaaroolu soto, a yitandi n na. Wo koolaa, m fanaa be n na lannoo yitandi la i la le, ka bo niŋ n na kebaaroolu la.”
59002019	I laata le ko, Alla mu kiliŋ ne ti. I nimbaara! Hani seetaani jawoolu fanaa laata wo la le, aduŋ ì ka sila le fo ì ka jarajara.
59002020	Ite moo kalantaŋo! Fo n ñanta a yitandi la i la le ko, lannoo meŋ maŋ kebaaroolu soto, nafaa te wo la?
59002021	Fo m̀ mumu Iburayima maŋ tiliŋo soto ka bo niŋ kebaaroolu le la, biriŋ a ye a dinkewo Isiyaaka bo sadaa ti sadaabodulaa kaŋ?
59002022	Saayiŋ, ali naata a je le ko, lannoo le ye ate duŋ a la wo kebaaroolu to, aduŋ a la lannoo timmandita ka bo niŋ a la kebaaroolu le la.
59002023	Ka bo wo siloo le la, Kitaabu Senuŋo la kumoo timmata meŋ ko, “Iburayima laata Alla la le, aduŋ a la wo lannoo le naata a ke moo tilindiŋo ti Alla ñaa koto.” Bituŋ a naata kumandi “Alla teeroo” la.
59002024	Wo to ali ye a je le ko, moo ka tiliŋo soto ka bo niŋ kebaaroolu le la, a maŋ ke lannoo dammaa ti.
59002025	Fo cakamusoo Rahabu la kuwo fanaa maŋ ke wo ñaa kiliŋo le ñaama baŋ? A ye tiliŋo soto ka bo niŋ a la kebaaroolu le la, biriŋ a ye wo kewolu jiyaa, Banisirayilankoolu ye mennu kii, a ye ì kanandi niŋ sila doo la.
59002026	Baloo meŋ maŋ niyo soto, wo mu furewo le ti. Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, lannoo meŋ maŋ kebaaroolu soto, wo faata le.
59003001	M baadiŋolu, ali moo jamaa kana ke karandirilaalu ti, baawo ali ye a loŋ ne ko, ntolu mennu ka karandiroo ke, ǹ na kiitiyo le be koleyaa la ka tambi moo doolu la.
59003002	Ntolu bee ka boyi kuu jamaa le to. Niŋ moo-wo-moo buka boyi kumoolu kono, a ka mennu fo, wo maarii timmata le, aduŋ a si a baloo bee mara noo le.
59003003	Niŋ ŋà karafewolu bula suwoolu daalu la, fo ì si soŋ m̀ ma, ǹ ka mara ì baloo bee le la.
59003004	Ali kuluŋ baalu fanaa la kuwo juubee! Ì warata baake le, aduŋ foño baa ka ì borindi. Bari wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, baaroo le ka a mara, meŋ dooyaata baake, aduŋ kuluŋo ka taa, a borindilaa lafita a la daameŋ.
59003005	Neŋo la kuwo fanaa be wo le ñaama. Ate le dooyaata balasuufoolu bee ti, bari ate le ka kibiri kuu baalu la. Sutoo si wara ñaa-wo-ñaa, a janoo ka dati niŋ dimbaariŋ ne la.
59003006	Neŋo mu dimbaa le ti, a mu ñiŋ duniyaa tilimbaloo la jooraŋo le ti m̀ balasuufoolu kono. Ate le ka baloo bee nondi, a ka dimbaa mala ka baluwo bee kasaara, aduŋ a la wo dimbaa bota Jahannaba le.
59003007	Daafeŋ siifaa-wo-siifaa, fo wulakono feŋolu le mu baŋ, kunoolu, kuruntu feŋolu waraŋ baakono feŋolu, ì bee ka malayandi noo le, aduŋ hadamadiŋolu ye ì malayandi le.
59003008	Bari neŋo mu feŋ ne ti, moo maŋ meŋ mara noo. A mu feŋ jawoo le ti, meŋ buka i dahaa, aduŋ a be faariŋ saayaa kunoo la le.
59003009	Ǹ ka Maariyo m̀ Faamaa jayi niŋ neŋo le la, aduŋ moolu mennu daata Alla sawuroo la, ǹ ka wolu danka niŋ ate wo neŋ kiliŋo le la.
59003010	Jayiroo niŋ dankaroo ka bo daa kiliŋo kono! M baadiŋolu, wo maŋ ñaŋ na ke la muumeeke.
59003011	Fo woyi kiliŋo ka jiisewo niŋ koojiyo bee bondi ñoo la le baŋ?
59003012	Fo sooto suŋo si olifu diŋolu diŋ noo baŋ, waraŋ fo sooto diŋolu ka kati wayini yiroolu bala le? M baadiŋolu, ali ye ñiŋ loŋ ne ko, koojiyo be daameŋ, jiisewo te bo noo la jee to.
59003013	Jumaa le ye ñaameŋo niŋ fahaamuroo soto alitolu kono? A maarii si a baluuñaa betoo yitandi niŋ a la kebaaroolu la, sooneeyaa kono, meŋ ka soto niŋ ñaameŋo la.
59003014	Bari niŋ kiiliyaa jawoo niŋ kuŋ kiliŋ nafaa be ali sondomoo kono, wo to ali kana kibiri, kaatu wo mu tooñaa nakaroo le ti.
59003015	Wo ñaameŋ siifaa maŋ bo Alla yaa. Wo mu duniyaa kuwo le ti, balajaatoo la kuwo, aniŋ seetaani kuwo.
59003016	Kaatu kiiliyaa niŋ kuŋ kiliŋ nafaa be daameŋ, jakasoo niŋ kuruŋyaa siifaa bee le ka tara jee.
59003017	Bari ñaameŋo meŋ bota Alla yaa, foloo-foloo a seneyaata le. Ate ñaameŋo mu kayiroo le ti, mooyaa aniŋ ŋaniya betoo. A be faariŋ balafaa le la, a ka kebaara betoolu diŋ, aduŋ faasaaroo niŋ bunaafayiyaa te jee.
59003018	Kayiramoolu ye meŋ fii kayiroo kono, wo be tiliŋo diŋ na le.
59004001	Muŋ ne mu keloolu niŋ sonkoolu sababoo ti alitolu teema? Fo ali la hadamadiŋyaa hame kuwolu le maŋ tara keloo la ali balajaatoolu kono baŋ?
59004002	Ali ka hame feŋ na, ali maŋ a soto noo, bituŋ ali ka moo faa. Ali ka ali ñaa loo wandi feŋo kaŋ, ali maŋ a soto noo, bituŋ ali ka sonkoo niŋ keloo ke. Ali te a soto la, kaatu ali buka Alla daani.
59004003	Ali ka daaniroo ke, bari ali buka a soto, kaatu ali la daaniroo maŋ tiliŋ, ali ka a ke ali la niidiyaa kuwolu le kamma.
59004004	Alitolu fisiriwallewolu! Fo ali maŋ a loŋ ko, ñiŋ duniyaa teeriyaa mu Alla konnanteeyaa le ti? Wo to, moo-wo-moo ye a faŋo ke ñiŋ duniyaa teeroo ti, wo maarii ye a faŋo ke Alla konnantewo le ti.
59004005	Fo ali ye a miira, ñiŋ mu kuma kenseŋo le ti, meŋ be safeeriŋ Kitaabu Senuŋo kono ko, “Nooroo, Alla ye meŋ dii ka sabati ǹ kono, wo la kuwo ye a faŋo meeyaa le.”
59004006	Bari Alla ye hiinoo meŋ dii, wo ka tu kafu la le doroŋ. Wo kamma la, a be safeeriŋ ne ko: “Alla ka balaŋ faŋ wara moolu ma le, bari a ka hiina moolu la le, mennu ye i fammajii.”
59004007	Wo kamma la, ali soŋ Alla ma. Ali ye balaŋ Ibiliisa ma, aduŋ a be bori la ali ma le.
59004008	Ali sutiyaa Alla la, aduŋ a fanaa be sutiyaa la ali la le. Alitolu junubelaalu, ali ali buloolu kuu! Hakilifulatiyolu, ali ali sondomoolu seneyandi!
59004009	Ali niyolu si toora ali la junuboolu la, ali ye woosii niŋ kumboo la. Ali la jeloo si yelema woosiyo ti, ali la seewoo ye yelema niikuyaa ti.
59004010	Ali ali fammajii Maariyo ñaatiliŋo la, aduŋ a be ali sikandi la le.
59004011	Baadiŋolu, ali kana kuma jawoo fo ñoo ma. Moo meŋ ka kuma jawoo fo a baadiŋo ma, waraŋ a ka a baadiŋo kiitindi, wo maarii ka kuma jawoo fo Luwaa le ma, aduŋ a ka Luwaa le kiitindi. Bari niŋ meŋ ye Luwaa kiitindi, wo maarii maŋ ke Luwaa mutalaa ti, bari a kiitindilaa.
59004012	Luwaa londilaa kiliŋ doroŋ ne be keriŋ, aduŋ Kiitindirilaa kiliŋ doroŋ ne sotota. Ate doroŋ ne ye kaŋo soto ka moo kiisa, waraŋ ka a kasaara. Saayiŋ, ite mu jumaa le ti ka i siiñoo kiitindi?
59004013	Ali i lamoyi saayiŋ, alitolu mennu ka a fo ko, “Bii waraŋ saama, m̀ be taa saatee doo le to. M̀ be tara la jee le fo sanji kiliŋ, aduŋ m̀ be tinewo soto la le ǹ na safaaroo to jee.”
59004014	Ali maŋ hani kuwo loŋ, meŋ be naa saama! Muŋ ne mu ali la baluwo ti? Ali mu tuutuwo doroŋ ne ti, meŋ ka finti waatindiŋ doroŋ, a ye yeemaŋ.
59004015	Wo noo to, ali ñanta a fo la le ko, “Niŋ Maariyo sonta, m̀ be baluu la le, aduŋ m̀ be ñiŋ waraŋ wo kuwo ke la le.”
59004016	Bari saayiŋ, ali ye ali la faŋ waroo ke kibiri kuwo le ti! Wo kibiri siifaa bee mu kuu jawoo le ti.
59004017	Moo-wo-moo ye kuu betoo loŋ, bari a maŋ baara a la, wo kuwo keta junuboo le ti a maarii ye.
59005001	Alitolu fankamaalu, ali i lamoyi! Ali ye woosii niŋ kumboo baa la maasiiboolu kamma la, mennu ka naa laa ali kaŋ.
59005002	Ali la naafuloolu tolita le, tumboo dunta ali la waramba ñiimaalu la.
59005003	Ali la sanoo niŋ kodiforoo komonta le, aduŋ ì la wo komoŋo le be seedeyaa ke la ka ali tuumi. A be ali baloo domo la le ko dimbaa. Ali ye naafuloo le kafuŋ-kafuŋ luŋ labaŋolu ye.
59005004	A juubee, lebereesoolu mennu ye katiroo ke ali la kunkoolu to, ali ye ì la jooroo meŋ nakari tapaleeyaa kono, wo kumboota baake le, aduŋ lebereesoolu la kumboo kaŋolu futata Alihawaa Maariyo ma le.
59005005	Ali tarata ñiŋ duniyaa kono fankoo niŋ niidiyaa kono! Ali ye ali sondomoolu ke batundoo ti, bari a be pareeriŋ kanateyi luŋo le ye.
59005006	Ali ye moo tilindiŋo kiitindi, ali ye a faa, a maŋ balaŋ noo ali ma.
59005007	Wo to baadiŋolu, ali muña fo Maariyo ye naa. Ali senelaa la kuwo juubee, a ka siimaŋ kese betoolu batu muñoo kono le, a ye mennu fii, fo ì ye samaajii foloo niŋ labaŋo soto.
59005008	Ali fanaa ye i muña! Ali ali sondomoolu bambandi, kaatu Maariyo la naa sutiyaata naŋ ne.
59005009	Baadiŋolu, ali kana ñoo la kuwo ŋunuŋunu, fo ali kana kiitindi. A juubee, kiitiikuntulaa be looriŋ daa to le fokabaŋ.
59005010	Baadiŋolu, ali annabiyomoolu la muñoo niŋ tooroolu ke misaaloo ti, mennu diyaamuta Maariyo too la.
59005011	Moolu mennu wakiilita, ǹ ka wolu le je barakariŋ. Ali ye Yuuba la kuwo moyi le, a keta muñalaa ti ñaameŋ. Aduŋ ali ye Maariyo la balafaa niŋ hiinoo je kuwolu to le, a ye mennu ke Yuuba ye labaŋo la.
59005012	M baadiŋolu, meŋ kummaayaata kuwolu bee ti, ali kana i kali muumeeke. Ali kana i kali Arijana la, duniyaa, waraŋ feŋ-wo-feŋ na. Bari ali la “Haa” si ke “Haa” ti, ali la “Hanii” ye ke “Hanii” ti, fo ali kana bula halakoo kono.
59005013	Niŋ moo be ali kono, meŋ be bataariŋ, a maarii si duwaa. Niŋ moo be ali kono meŋ be seewooriŋ, wo maarii si jayiri suukuwolu laa.
59005014	Niŋ moo be ali kono meŋ be saasaariŋ, a maarii si Yeesu la kafoo alifaalu kumandi, wolu ye duwaa a ye, aniŋ ì ye tuloo maa a la Maariyo too la.
59005015	Duwaa meŋ keta lannoo kono, wo ka saasaatoo kendeyandi le, aduŋ Maariyo be a wulindi la le. Niŋ a ye junube kuwolu ke, a be yamfa la a ye le.
59005016	Wo kamma la, ali i tuubiseyi ali la junuboolu la ñoo ye, aduŋ ali si duwaa ñoo ye, fo ali si kendeyaa. Moo tilindiŋo la duwaa ye sembe baa le soto.
59005017	Annabilayi Eliya mu hadamadiŋo doroŋ ne ti ko ntolu be ñaameŋ, bari kabiriŋ a duwaata kendeke ko, sanjiyo kana ke, sanjiyo maŋ ke bankoo kaŋ fo sanji saba aniŋ kari wooro.
59005018	Wo koolaa a duwaata kotenke, saŋo ye sanjiyo dii, aduŋ bankoo ye fiifeŋolu fintindi fo ì si diŋ.
59005019	M baadiŋolu, niŋ moo-wo-moo filita ali kono ka bo tooñaa siloo kaŋ, moo doo naata a murundi naŋ tooñaa siloo kaŋ,
59005020	wo maarii si a loŋ ko, meŋ ye junubelaa bondi filoo kono, a ye a niyo tankandi badaa-badaa saayaa ma le, aduŋ a be junube jamaa le kafaroo saabu la a ye.
60001001	Nte Pita, Yeesu Kiristu la kiilaa, m be baadiŋolu kontoŋ na, mennu bee be janjandiŋ tundoolu kaŋ taariŋ, tumarankeeyaa kono, Pontus, Kalatiya, Kapadosiya, Asiya aniŋ Bitiniya.
60001002	M̀ Faamaa Alla ye ali tomboŋ ne, a ye ali londi ka ali ke a la moolu ti biriŋ foloodulaa to. A la Nooroo ye ali seneyandi le, fo ali si tu Yeesu Kiristu la yaamaroo mutariŋ, aniŋ a yeloo si ali jankundi. Allamaa Alla la hiinoo niŋ kayiroo ye tu yiriwaa la ali kono.
60001003	Jayiroo niŋ tenturoo be Alla ye, m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu Faamaa! A la hiina baa le ye a tinna, ǹ wuluuta kotenke ka ke moo kutoolu ti, mennu ye jiki baluuriŋo soto, ka bo niŋ Yeesu Kiristu la saayaakoolaa wulindiroo la.
60001004	Ǹ naata keetaa fanaa soto le, meŋ te kasaara la, sako ka kosondi, waraŋ ka yeemaŋ. A be maaboriŋ alitolu le ye Arijana kono.
60001005	Ali be a soto la le, baawo Alla la semboo ka ali tankandi lannoo kono wo kiisoo le ye, meŋ be lankenema la luŋ labaŋolu kono.
60001006	Ali seewoo ñiŋ na, hani ali niyo toorata fo waatindiŋ, jarabi siifaa jamaa kono.
60001007	Ka bo niŋ wo kotoboroo le la, ali la lannoo la foroyaa be je la ko, a nafaa warata ka tambi sanoo la, meŋ na foroyaa fanaa ka loŋ niŋ dimbaa la. Wo to le, ali la kuwo be ke la tenturoo, jayiroo, aniŋ horomoo sababoo ti, Yeesu Kiristu be muru la naŋ waatoo meŋ na.
60001008	Ali nene maŋ a je ñaa-wo-ñaa, bari ali ye a kanu. Hani ali maŋ ate je saayiŋ, ali laata a la, aduŋ ali be faariŋ niŋ seewoo baa la, meŋ warata fo a te misaali noo la.
60001009	Aduŋ ñaato ali la lannoo ye meŋ nata, ali be wo soto la le, meŋ mu ali niyolu la kiisoo ti.
60001010	Annabiyomoolu ye wo kiisoo la kuwo kisikisi le nuŋ, ì ye ñaatokumoolu fo meŋ na kuwo to ko, a be ke la alitolu le taa ti.
60001011	Kiristu la Nooroo meŋ tarata ì kono nuŋ, wo ye a la tooroo le yitandi, aniŋ kallankeeyaa meŋ be wo tooroo nooma la. Ì ye a kata ka a loŋ, ñiŋ kuwo si ke sila meŋ na, aniŋ waati meŋ na.
60001012	A naata lankenema ì ye ko, ì maŋ tara dookuwo la ì faŋolu ye, bari alitolu. Ì ye ñaatokumoolu fo kuwolu to, moo doolu naata mennu kawandi ali ye, ka bo niŋ Noora Kuliŋo la, meŋ jiita ì kaŋ ka bo Arijana kono. Wo mu kuwolu le ti, hani malaayikoolu faŋolu hameta mennu je la.
60001013	Wo to, ali ali hakiloo tu, ali ye ali faŋ mara, aduŋ ali si ali jikoo bee loo hiinoo kaŋ, meŋ be dii la ali la, Yeesu Kiristu be muru la naŋ waatoo meŋ na.
60001014	Alla la yaamarimuta diŋolu, ali kana soŋ niidiyaa kuwolu ye ke ali daajikoo ti, ali tarata baluuriŋ mennu kono nuŋ, lombaliyaa kono.
60001015	Wo noo to, ali si seneyaa ali maañaa bee to ko ate, meŋ ye ali kumandi, seneyaata ñaameŋ.
60001016	Baawo a be safeeriŋ ne ko: “Ali si seneyaa, kaatu nte seneyaata le.”
60001017	Ali ka ate le kumandi ali Faamaa la, meŋ ka moolu bee kiitindi ì la kebaaroolu la, faasaaroo te daameŋ. Wo to, ali baluu a ñaasilaŋo kono waatoo meŋ na, ali mu tumarankewolu ti ñiŋ duniyaa kono.
60001018	Ali ye kumakaaraŋo loŋ ne, meŋ diita ka ali kiisa wo baluuñaa nafantaŋolu kono, ali ye mennu soto nuŋ ali mumuñolu bulu. Ali maŋ kumakaa feŋolu la mennu ka kasaara, komeŋ kodiforoo waraŋ sanoo.
60001019	Bari ali naata kumakaa Kiristu yele jankuriŋo le la. Ate le keta ko saajiiriŋo, meŋ maŋ sootaari soto, waraŋ lanjuuroo.
60001020	Alla ye a tomboŋ ne, janniŋ ñiŋ duniyaa fondamaŋo be laa la, bari a naata lankenema ñiŋ waati labaŋolu kono, alitolu la kuwo le kamma.
60001021	Ka bo niŋ ate le la, ali dankeneyaata Alla la, meŋ ye a wulindi ka bo saayaa kono, aduŋ a ye kallankeeyaa dii a la. Wo kamma la, ali la lannoo niŋ jikoo si tu Alla kaŋ.
60001022	Baawo ali ye tooñaa yaamaroo muta baadiŋ kanoo la kuwo to le, aduŋ wo ye ali sondomoolu seneyandi le, wo to ali ñoo kanu ali sondomoo bee la.
60001023	Ali naata wuluu kotenke ka baluu kutoo soto, aduŋ wo maŋ bo niŋ kesoo la, meŋ ka kasaara, bari a bota Alla la kumoo le la, meŋ be baluuriŋ, aduŋ a be tu la le fo abadaa.
60001024	Wo kamma la, a be safeeriŋ ne ko: “Hadamadiŋolu bee be le ko ñaamoo, ì la ñiiñaa be le ko wulakono firoo. Ñaamoo ka noro le, a firoolu ye joloŋ,
60001025	bari Maariyo la kumoo ka tu looriŋ ne fo abadaa.” Wo kumoo le mu kibaari betoo ti, meŋ kawandita ali ye.
60002001	Wo kamma la, ali kuruŋyaa bee bula, faniyaa foo, bunaafayiyaa, haasidiyaa, aniŋ koomakumaroo.
60002002	Ali tu hameriŋ Alla la kumoo la, ko deenaani wuluu kutoolu ka hame sunju nonoo la ñaameŋ. Alla la kumoo mu ali ye keekee foroo le ti, a ka ali mendi lannoo le kono kiisoo ye.
60002003	Baawo ali ye Maariyo la beteyaa nene le fokabaŋ, ali hame a la kumoo la.
60002004	Ali naa ate kaŋ, meŋ mu bere baluuriŋo ti. Moolu jututa a la le, bari Alla ye ate le tomboŋ, aduŋ bere kummaa baa le mu a ñaatiliŋo la.
60002005	Ali ali faŋolu dii ka ke bere baluuriŋolu ti, fo ali si ke buŋ looraŋolu ti Alla la buŋo ye, meŋ loota a la Nooroo la siloo la. Alitolu si ke piriisi senuŋolu ti, ali ye sadaalu bo Nooroo la siloo la, ka bo niŋ Yeesu Kiristu la, aduŋ Alla be soŋ na wo sadaalu ma le.
60002006	Kaatu a be safeeriŋ Kitaabu Senuŋo kono le ko: “A juubee, ŋa beroo le laa Siyoni Konkoo kaŋ, tonkonna bere buuñaariŋo, ŋa meŋ tomboŋ. Moo meŋ laata ate la, wo te bula la maloo kono.”
60002007	Alitolu mennu laata, a mu ali ye bere kummaa baa le ti. Bari mennu maŋ laa, a be safeeriŋ ne ko: “Beroo meŋ buŋ loolaalu jututa a la, wo le naata ke tonkonna bere kummaa ti.”
60002008	Aduŋ: “A mu beroo le ti, moolu be taki la meŋ na, bere baa meŋ be moolu boyindi la.” Tooñaa, ì ka boyi le, kaatu ì maŋ Alla la kumoo muta. Wo boyoo keta kuwo le ti, Alla ye meŋ londi ì ye.
60002009	Bari alitolu mu moo tombondiŋolu le ti, aniŋ Mansa la moolu, piriisiyaa be mennu bulu. Ali mu nasiyoŋ jankuriŋo le ti, Alla fansuŋ moolu. Ali mu ñinnu bee le ti, fo ali si a la kebaaroolu la waroo bankee, meŋ ye ali kumandi ka bo diboo kono, ka naa a la mala kaawakuuyaariŋo kono.
60002010	Nunto, ali maŋ ke Alla la moolu ti, bari saayiŋ, ali mu a la moolu le ti. Ali maŋ balafaa soto nuŋ Alla bulu, bari saayiŋ, ali ye a soto a bulu le.
60002011	N kanuntewolu, ŋa ali yaamari le ko moolu mennu mu luntaŋolu niŋ tumarankewolu ti ñiŋ duniyaa kono, ali fata ali balajaatoo la hame kuu jawoolu la, mennu ka ali niyolu kele.
60002012	Ali tu daajika betoo yitandi la Alla lombaloolu kono. Ì ka ali tuumi le ko, ali mu kuu kuruŋ kelaalu le ti, bari niŋ ì ye ali la kebaara betoolu je, ì fanaa si Alla jayi a la naa luŋo la.
60002013	Maariyo la kuwo kamma la, ali soŋ kantiyolu bee la, fo ñiŋ banku baa mansa le mu baŋ,
60002014	waraŋ fo a la maralilaa doo, a ye mennu kii ka kuluuroo laa kuu kuruŋ kelaalu kaŋ, aniŋ ka moolu jayi, mennu ye kuu betoo ke.
60002015	A mu Alla la lafoo le ti ko, ka bo niŋ kuu bete kewo la, ali si wo moo fuuriŋolu daa suki, mennu ka tuumiri kalantaŋolu fo ali ma.
60002016	Ali mu foroolu le ti, wo to ali si baluu ko foroolu. Wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, ali kana ali la wo firiŋo ke lanjuuroo ti ka kuu jawoo baara. Wo noo to, ali si baluu ko Alla la dookuulaalu ñanta baluu la ñaameŋ.
60002017	Ali horomoo dii moolu bee la. Ali ye ali baadiŋ Yeesu noomalankoolu kanu. Ali sila Alla la. Ali ye ñiŋ banku baa mansa horoma.
60002018	Joŋolu, ali soŋ ali la kuntiyolu ma buuñaa bee kono. Ali kana a ke kuntiyolu doroŋ ye, mennu hadamayaata aniŋ ì mooyaata ali fee, bari ali si soŋ kuntiyolu fanaa ma, mennu saŋarata.
60002019	Kaatu moo meŋ ka muña Alla la kuwo kamma la, niŋ ì ye a toorandi tilimbaliyaa kono, a be ke la wo maarii ye hiinoo le ti.
60002020	Niŋ ali ye i muña buuteeroo la, meŋ keta kuluuroo ti ali la kebaara jawoolu kamma la, fo wo mu kibiri kuu le ti baŋ? Bari niŋ ali ye kuu tilindiŋo ke, aduŋ ì ye ali toorandi, wo be Alla la hiinoo le saabu la ali ma.
60002021	Alla ye ali kumandi ñiŋ daliiloo le kaŋ, kaatu Kiristu fanaa toorata ali ye le. A ye misaaloo tu ali ye le, fo ali si a la simfaalu nooma.
60002022	A maŋ junuboo ke, aduŋ neeneeri kuma kenseŋo nene maŋ bo a daa kono.
60002023	Kabiriŋ ì ka a neŋ, a maŋ ì joo niŋ nendiroolu la. Biriŋ a toorata, a maŋ silandiri ke, bari a ye a la kuwo tu Alla le bulu, meŋ ka kiitiyo ke tiliŋo kono.
60002024	Kiristu faŋo le ye ǹ na junuboolu dunoo taa, ka bo niŋ a baloo la, a ye ì samba yiribantambiloo kaŋ, fo ǹ si faa junuboo la karoo la, aduŋ ǹ si baluu tiliŋo ye. Ka bo niŋ a la baramoolu le la, ali kendeyaata.
60002025	Kaatu ali bee ye ali fansuŋ siloo taa le nuŋ ko saajii filiriŋolu, bari saayiŋ, ali muruta Kantarilaa kaŋ ne, ali niyolu tankandilaa.
60003001	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, alitolu musoolu, ali soŋ ali keemaañolu ma. Wo to le, ì doolu mennu maŋ laa Alla la kumoo la, hani ali maŋ diyaamu ì ye, ì si naa laa, ka bo niŋ ali la daajika betoo la,
60003002	ì ye meŋ je, a be seneyaariŋ Alla ñaasilaŋo kono.
60003003	Ali la ñiiñaa maŋ ñaŋ na ke la ñiiñaa ti, meŋ ka je banta ko deberi ñarandi feŋolu, sani ñaroolu, waraŋ sitifeŋ ñiimaalu,
60003004	bari ali la ñiiñaa si bo niŋ ñarandi kuwolu la, mennu be maaboriŋ ali sondomoo kono, aduŋ ì te kasaara la. Tenkuŋo niŋ mooyaa le mu naafuloo ti, meŋ kummaayaata Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
60003005	Musu senuŋolu mennu jikita Alla la, ì ka ì faŋ ñarandi nuŋ wo le ñaama, aduŋ ì ka soŋ ì keemaañolu ma le.
60003006	Saara fanaa ye wo le ke, a ye Iburayima la yaamaroolu muta, aduŋ a ka a kumandi a maarii le la. Alitolu mu Saara dimmusoolu le ti, niŋ ali tententa kuu bete kewo la, ali kana sila feŋ-wo-feŋ na.
60003007	Alitolu kewolu fanaa, ali hakilimaayaa ali la musoolu fee, baawo ì semboo niŋ ali semboo maŋ kaañaŋ. Ali ì buuñaa, kaatu ali niŋ ì denta badaa-badaa baluwo hiinoo la le. Ali ñiŋ ke, fo feŋ kana ali bali ali la duwaalu la.
60003008	Labaŋo la, ali bee si ke kaŋ kiliŋ ti, aniŋ ŋaniya kiliŋ. Ali baadiŋyaa kanoo soto ñoo ye, balafaa, aniŋ fammajiyo.
60003009	Ali kana kuu jawoo joo niŋ kuu jawoo la, waraŋ ka nendiroo joo nendiroo la, bari wo noo to, ali Alla daani barakoo la wo maarii ye. Wo le mu kuwo ti, Alla ye ali kumandi meŋ to, fo ali fanaa si barakoo soto.
60003010	Kaatu a be safeeriŋ ne ko: “Jumaa le ye baluwo kanu ali kono? Jumaa le ka tara ñaaniriŋ baluu diimaa la? Wo maarii si a neŋo fatandi kuma jawoo ma, a ye fata faniyaa foo ma.
60003011	A ye bo kuu jawoo to, a ye kuu kendoo baara. A ye kayiroo ñini, a ye a ke a hame kuwo ti.
60003012	Kaatu Maariyo ñaa ka tara looriŋ moo tilindiŋolu kaŋ ne, aduŋ a tuloo ka ì la duwaa moyi le, bari a ka kuu jawu kelaalu kiitindi le.”
60003013	Jumaa le si kuu jawoo ke noo alitolu la, niŋ ali be hameriŋ kuu bete kewo la?
60003014	Bari hani niŋ kuu bete kewo le ka a tinna, ali ka toora, a be ke la ali ye barakoo le ti. Ali kana sila ì la, aduŋ ali niyolu kana toora,
60003015	bari ali Kiristu horoma ali sondomoolu kono ko Maariyo. Ali si tu pareeriŋ waati-wo-waati ka jaabiroo dii moo-wo-moo la, meŋ ye ali ñininkaa jikoo la kuwo la, ali ye meŋ soto ali sondomoo kono.
60003016	Bari ali ñiŋ jaabiroo ke mooyaa niŋ Alla ñaasilaŋo la. Ali kana feŋ ke, ali sondomoo si ali tuumi noo meŋ na, fo wo moolu si malu, mennu ye faniyaa laa ali kaŋ, aniŋ mennu ye kuma jawoo fo ali ma, kaatu ali ye Yeesu noomalankoolu la daajika betoo soto le.
60003017	A beteyaata le ka toora kuu betoo ye, ka tambi kuu jawoo la, niŋ wo tooroo mu Alla la lafoo le ti.
60003018	Kaatu tooñaa, Kiristu faata junuboolu le ye, siiñaa kiliŋ moo bee ye. Moo tilindiŋo faata moo tilimbaloolu ye, fo a si ǹ samba naŋ Alla yaa. Ì ye a baloo le faa, bari Alla la Nooroo ye a wulindi ka baluu.
60003019	Ka bo niŋ wo Nooroo la, a taata ka kawandoo ke dulaa to, furewolu niyolu be sitiriŋ mutoo kono daameŋ.
60003020	Wolu mu moolu le ti, mennu maŋ Alla la yaamaroo muta nuŋ, Nuha la luŋolu la. Wo waatoo la, Alla ye ì batu muñoo kono fo Nuha pareeta kuluŋ dadaa la. Wo kuluŋo kono, moo dantaŋ doroŋ, mennu mu moo seyi ti, wolu le naata kiisa ka bo niŋ jiyo la.
60003021	Ñiŋ mu taamanseeroo le ti batisewo la kuwo to, meŋ ka ali kiisa saayiŋ, ka bo niŋ Yeesu Kiristu la saayaakoolaa wulindiroo la. Batisewo maŋ ke ka noo bondi baloo bala, bari ka Alla daani ka ali sondomoolu kuu, fo ali sondomoolu kana ali tuumi feŋ na.
60003022	Ate Yeesu taata Arijana kono le, aduŋ a be Alla bulubaa karoo le la. Malaayikoolu, kantiyolu niŋ sembetiyolu bee be a la maraloo le koto.
60004001	Wo kamma la, baawo Kiristu toorata a balajaatoo kono le, alitolu fanaa si i muña wolu la, kaatu moo meŋ toorata a balajaatoo kono, wo maarii fatata junuboo la le.
60004002	Wo to, ka bo saayiŋ na, waatoo meŋ tuta ali la baluwo to duniyaa kono jaŋ, ali kana tu baluuriŋ kotenke balajaatoo la hame kuu jawoolu la, bari ali si Alla la lafoo nooma.
60004003	Waatoo meŋ tambita, wo si kaañaŋ alitolu fee kuwolu to, Alla lombaloolu ka baara mennu la. Wo kuwolu le mu malubaliyaa ti, hame kuu jawoolu, siiroo, bumbaayoo, bidaŋo, aniŋ jalambatoo, meŋ niŋ hani luwaa faŋo maŋ taa ñoo la.
60004004	Ì jaakalita alitolu la kuwo la le ko, saayiŋ ali maŋ kafu ì ma kotenke wo baluuñaa jawoo kono, ì be tunendiŋ meŋ kono. Wo le ye a tinna ì ka kuma jawoolu fo ali ma.
60004005	Bari ali kana ñina ko, labaŋo la ì be ì faŋolu kontibo la ate le ñaatiliŋo la, meŋ be pareeriŋ ka kendoolu niŋ furewolu kiitindi.
60004006	Ñiŋ daliiloo le ye a tinna, kibaari betoo kawandita hani moolu fanaa ye, mennu faata fokabaŋ. Ì la saayaa keta kiitiyo le ti, meŋ ka ke hadamadiŋolu baloo la, bari ì naata baluu nooroo kono le, ko Alla be ñaameŋ.
60004007	Ñiŋ duniyaa feŋolu bee ka naa baŋ ne. Wo kamma la, ali ali faŋ muta kuu, ali ye tara ali ñaa la ka duwaa a ñaama.
60004008	Aduŋ meŋ kummaayaata kuwolu bee ti, ali ñoo kanu, ali ye tu looriŋ wo kaŋ, baawo kanoo le ka a tinna, yamfoo ka ke junube jamaa la.
60004009	Ali ali ŋaniyoo yele, ali ye ñoo jiyaa, aduŋ ali kana a ke ŋunuŋunoo kono.
60004010	Alla ye soorifeŋo dii alitolu meŋ-wo-meŋ na le, ka bo a la soorifeŋ jamaa kono, mennu maŋ kiliŋ. Ali ì dookundi ì ñaama, baawo ali mu Alla la dookuulaalu le ti, a ye a la soorifeŋolu karafa mennu ma.
60004011	Moo meŋ ka kawandoo ke, a si a ke ko, a ka Alla faŋo la kumoolu le kawandi. Meŋ ka maakoyiri dookuwo ke, a si a ke niŋ semboo bee la, Alla ye meŋ dii a la, fo Alla si horoma kuu-wo-kuu to, ka bo niŋ Yeesu Kiristu la. Semboo niŋ waroo aniŋ maraloo bee be ate le ye, fo abadaa. Amiin.
60004012	N kanuntewolu, ali kana jaakali toora koleŋo la, meŋ be ali kotobo kaŋ ko dimbaa. A kana ke feŋ ti ali fee, meŋ maneeta.
60004013	Bari wo noo to, ali si seewoo, kaatu ali be ali niyo le soto kaŋ Kiristu la tooroo kono. Bituŋ ali si i yillaa kontaanoo niŋ jusulaa baa la, niŋ a la kallankeeyaa lankenemata.
60004014	Niŋ moolu ye ali neŋ Kiristu too kamma la, ali barakata le, kaatu Alla la Nooroo be ali kaŋ ne, meŋ kallankeeyaata.
60004015	Bari ali moo-wo-moo la tooroo sababoo kana ke moofaa ti, suuñaaroo, kuu kuruŋ kewo, waraŋ naafikiyaa.
60004016	Hani niŋ moo toorata ali kono, kaatu a mu Kiristu noomalankoo le ti, a maarii kana malu, bari a si Alla horomandi niŋ wo too la.
60004017	Waatoo siita le ka kiitiyo dati Alla la dimbaayaalu la. Wo to, niŋ a datita ntolu la, muŋ ne be ke la wo moolu labaŋo ti, mennu maŋ Alla la kibaari betoo yaamaroolu muta?
60004018	“Niŋ moo tilindiŋo la kiisoo maŋ ke kuu feemaa ti, wo to moo kuruŋo niŋ junubekelaa taa be ke la ñaadii le?”
60004019	Wo to, moolu mennu ka toora Alla la lafoo kaŋ, ì si tu baara betoo kaŋ, ì ye ì niyolu karafa ì Daamansoo la, meŋ foroyaata.
60005001	Moolu mennu mu alifaalu ti ali kono, m be ì wakiilindi la, baawo nte fanaa mu alifaa le ti, aniŋ seedoo Kiristu la tooroolu kono. Nte fanaa mu niisotolaa le ti kallankeeyaa to, meŋ be lankenema la.
60005002	Ali Alla la saajii koorewo topatoo, a ye meŋ karafa ali ma. Ali kana a ke niŋ ŋunuŋunoo la, bari ali duña a kewo la. Ali kana a ke naafulu ñiniraŋo ti, bari ali a ke niŋ ŋaniya betoo la.
60005003	Ali kana ali la maramoolu mara niŋ maraliñaa koleŋo la, bari ali faŋolu si ke misaaloo ti ñiŋ koorewo ye.
60005004	Aduŋ niŋ Kantarilaa Kuntii Baa fintita naŋ, ali be kañeerinaafoo le soto la soorifeŋo ti, meŋ na kallankeeyaa nene te yeemaŋ na.
60005005	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, alitolu fondinkewolu, ali soŋ alifaalu ma. Ali ye i fammajii ñoo ye. Ali bee si wo fammajiyo duŋ ali la feetoofatoo ti, kaatu “Alla ka balaŋ faŋ wara moolu ma le, bari moolu mennu ye i fammajii, a ka hiina wolu ma le.”
60005006	Ali ali fammajii Alla sembemaa baa ye, fo a si ali sikandi a waatoo la.
60005007	Ali ali la bataa dunoo bee landi ate kaŋ, kaatu ate le ka tu looriŋ ali topatoo la.
60005008	Ali tu ali ñaa la, ali ye koroosiroo ke. Ali jawoo Ibiliisa ka tu yaayi kaŋ ne ko jata konkoriŋo ka moo ñini, a be a daa faa la meŋ na.
60005009	Ali balaŋ a ma! Ali loo bambandinke ali la lannoo kaŋ, kaatu ali ye a loŋ ne ko, wo toora kiliŋo le be ali baadiŋolu kaŋ, ñiŋ duniyaa bee kono.
60005010	Alitolu toorata le fo waatindiŋ, bari Alla be ali la kuwo seyindi la a ñaama le. Ate meŋ ka hiinoo bee dii, aduŋ a ye ali kumandi a la badaa-badaa kallankeeyaa to Kiristu kono, ate le be ali fatiyandi la, a ye ali sembentuŋyaa, aniŋ a ye ali londi fondamaŋ bambandiŋo kaŋ.
60005011	Semboo be ate le ye fo abadaa. Amiin.
60005012	Ŋa ñiŋ leetari sutuŋo safee ali ye niŋ Silas buloo le la. Ŋa ate je le ko, a mu baadiŋ foroo le ti. M be ali wakiilindi la, aduŋ ŋa ñiŋ seedeyaa le ko, ŋa ñiŋ meŋ safee, a mu Alla la hiina tooñaa le ti. Ali loo bambandinke wo hiinoo kaŋ!
60005013	Yeesu la kafoo meŋ be Babiloni, ì fanaa mu moo tombondiŋolu le ti ko alitolu, ì bee be ali kontoŋ na. N dinkewo Maaka fanaa be ali kontoŋ na.
60005014	Ali ñoo kontoŋ sumburu senuŋo la, meŋ mu baadiŋyaa kanoo taamanseeroo ti. Alla la kayiroo ye tara ali bee fee, alitolu mennu mu Kiristu taa ti.
61001001	Nte Simoni Pita, Yeesu Kiristu la dookuulaa niŋ a la kiilaa, m be ali kontoŋ na, alitolu mennu ye lanna kiliŋo soto Yeesu Kiristu kono ko ntolu. Ate le mu ǹ na Alla ti aniŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa. Ŋà wo lannoo soto ka bo niŋ ate le la tiliŋo la.
61001002	Allamaa hiinoo niŋ kayiroo ye tu kafu la ali kaŋ, Alla loŋo kamma la, aniŋ Yeesu, m̀ Maariyo.
61001003	A la sembe kaawakuuyaariŋo ka bo Alla le bulu, wo le ye feŋ-wo-feŋ dii ǹ na, ǹ suulata meŋ na ka baluu Alla la siloo kaŋ. Ŋà wo bee soto le, kaatu ŋà ate loŋ ne, meŋ ye ǹ kumandi ka niyo soto a la kallankeeyaa to, a niŋ baluu senuŋo.
61001004	Ka bo wo siloo le la, a ye laahidi kummaa baalu dii ǹ na, mennu maŋ ñoŋo soto. Ñiŋ laahidoolu ye a tinna le, ali ye siloo soto ka kana ñiŋ duniyaa jenkeriŋo la kuruŋyaa ma, niidiyaa kuwolu ka meŋ saabu, bituŋ ali si ke niisotolaalu ti Alla mankutoo to.
61001005	Wo to, ali katoo bee ke ka daajika betoo kafu ali la lannoo ma, ali ye londoo kafu daajika betoo ma.
61001006	Ali faŋ mutoo kafu londoo ma, ali ye wakiiloo kafu faŋ mutoo ma. Ali Alla mutoo kafu wakiiloo ma,
61001007	ali ye baadiŋyaa kanoo kafu Alla mutoo ma. Kanoo, Alla ye meŋ dii, ali a kafu baadiŋyaa kanoo ma.
