61001008	Niŋ ali ye ñiŋ kuwolu soto siyaarinke, ali te ke noo la nafantaŋolu ti, waraŋ mennu la fahaamuroo maŋ yiriwaa Maarii Yeesu Kiristu loŋo to.
61001009	Bari moo meŋ dasata ñinnu la, wo maarii finkita le. A la jeroo sutiyaata, aduŋ a ñinata le ko, a seneyandita le fokabaŋ ka bo a la junuboolu kono, a ye mennu ke nuŋ.
61001010	Wo to baadiŋolu, ali hame baa soto ali la kumandiroo niŋ tombondiroo to ka wolu bambandi. Niŋ ali ye wo ke, ali nene te boyi la,
61001011	aduŋ siloo si fanu ali ye ka duŋ m̀ Maariyo aniŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa Yeesu Kiristu la badaa-badaa mansabaayaa to.
61001012	Wo le ye a tinna n lafita ka ali hakiloo bulandi ñiŋ kuwolu la, hani ali ye ì loŋ ñaa-wo-ñaa, aduŋ ì be bambandiŋ tooñaa le kaŋ, meŋ be ali bulu.
61001013	N na miiroo to, a beteyaata le ka ali hakiloo bulandi ñinnu la, baawo m be baluuriŋ ne hani ka bii.
61001014	Ŋa a loŋ ne ko, a te mee la, nte be ñiŋ balajaatoo bula la, ko m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu ye a yitandi n na ñaameŋ.
61001015	M be n na katoo bee ke la le ka a je ko, ali hakiloo si tu ñiŋ kuwolu kaŋ, hani n na saayaa koolaa.
61001016	Biriŋ m̀ be Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la murunaŋo la semboo seedeyaa la ali ye, m̀ maŋ taaliŋ kenseŋolu nooma, mennu mu hadamadiŋ feeroo niŋ ñaameŋo ti. Ŋà a la kallankeeyaa meŋ bankee ali ye, ŋà wo je m̀ fansuŋ ñaalu le la.
61001017	Wo keta le, biriŋ a ye horomoo niŋ kallankeeyaa soto ka bo a Faamaa Alla bulu, biriŋ kumakaŋo bota naŋ Mansa Kallankee Baa bulu ko, “Ñiŋ ne mu n Kanu Dinkewo ti, n jusoo laata meŋ na kuwo la baake.”
61001018	Ntolu faŋolu ye ñiŋ kumakaŋo moyi le ka bo naŋ saŋo santo, biriŋ ǹ niŋ a be wo konko senuŋo kaŋ.
61001019	Wo ye annabiyomoolu la kumoo le bambandi, ì ye meŋ fo a la kuwo to. Niŋ ali ye wo kumoo muta, wo mu kuu kendoo le ti ali ye. A si ke ali ye lampoo ti, meŋ si tu siloo bitaa la ali ye, diboo kono fo subaa waatoo, Subaalooloo be finti la waatoo meŋ na ka maloo dii ali sondomoo kono.
61001020	Bari ali si ñiŋ fahaamu ko, kuma-wo-kuma be Kitaabu Senuŋo kono, moo te a fasari noo la a fansuŋ miiroo la.
61001021	Kaatu hadamadiŋo ye kiilaariyaa kuma-wo-kuma fo, wo maŋ bo niŋ a faŋo la miiroo la, bari Noora Kuliŋo le ka mara a la ka Alla la kumoo fo.
61002001	Bari faniyaa annabiyomoolu naata wuli moolu kono le nuŋ, wo ñaa kiliŋo la faniyaa karandirilaalu be tara la ali fanaa kono le. Ì be faniyaa karandiroolu kullootoo naati la ali kono le, mennu ka tiñaaroo saabu. Aduŋ ì be paree la le hani ka balaŋ Kuntiyo ma, meŋ ye ì kumakaa a faŋo ye. Ka bo wo siloo la, ì ye kasaaroo le boyi ì faŋolu kaŋ.
61002002	Baadiŋ jamaa be bula la ì la malubaliyaa kuwolu nooma le. Ì la wo karandiroo be a tinna le, moo koteŋolu be kuma jawoo fo la ñiŋ tooñaa siloo ma.
61002003	Ì la hadumoo kamma la, ì be ali la naafuloolu buusi la ali bulu niŋ faniyaa kumoolu la. Bari ì la yankankatoo be pareeriŋ ne kabiriŋ waati jaŋ koomanto, aduŋ ì la kasaaroo be ì batu kaŋ ne.
61002004	Alla maŋ yamfa hani malaayikoolu ye daameŋ, biriŋ ì ye junuboo ke nuŋ, bari a ye ì fayi dinka dambaloo kono, ì be tu la sitiriŋ dibi baa kataŋo kono daameŋ fo kiitiiluŋo la.
61002005	Aduŋ Nuha la waatoo la, Alla ye duniyaa kiitindi nuŋ wo le ñaama. A maŋ allantaŋolu kaari, bari a ye Tuufaani Waamoo bula ì kaŋ. A ye Nuha doroŋ ne tanka, meŋ keta sila tilindiŋo kawandilaa ti, a niŋ moo woorowula koteŋ.
61002006	A ye Sodomu niŋ Komora saatewolu fanaa halaki le ka ì kasaara, a ye ì ke seebuutoo ti. A ye wo ke taamanseeroo le ti kuwo to, meŋ be ke la allantaŋolu la.
61002007	Bari a ye Luuti kanandi, meŋ keta nuŋ moo tilindiŋo ti, aniŋ meŋ niyo toorata moolu la malubaliyaa kuwolu jewo kamma la.
61002008	Kaatu wo moo tilindiŋo meŋ tarata moo luwaantaŋolu kono, a ka ì la kebaaroolu mennu je luŋ-wo-luŋ, aniŋ a ka mennu moyi, wolu le keta toora baa ti a sondome tilindiŋo ye.
61002009	Wo to, a koyita le ko, Maariyo ye a loŋ ne, a ka a ñaasilannaalu kanandi marisa kuwolu kono ñaameŋ, aniŋ a ka tilimbaloolu tu yankankatiriŋ ñaameŋ fo kiitiiluŋo la.
61002010	Ñiŋ mu yankankatoo le ti, meŋ jawuyaata sako moolu ye, mennu ka ì balajaatoo la hame kuu kosoriŋolu nooma, aduŋ ì ka jutu kantiyolu la. Ñiŋ faniyaa karandirilaalu ka tu fatiyaariŋ ì fansuŋ siloolu le kaŋ. Ì buka sila hani ka sembetii kallankeeyaariŋolu tooñee.
61002011	Hani malaayikoolu mennu ye semboo niŋ waroo soto ka tambi ì la, wolu buka ñiŋ sembetiyolu tuumi niŋ tooñeeri kumoolu la, Maariyo ñaatiliŋo la.
61002012	Bari ñiŋ karandirilaalu ka munta le ko daafeŋ hakilintaŋolu, mennu ka ì la lafinna kuwolu nooma. Wo daafeŋolu wuluuta wo le ñaama, fo moolu si ì muta ka ì faa. Ñiŋ faniyaa karandirilaalu ka sembetiyolu le neŋ, ì maŋ mennu loŋ, aduŋ ì niŋ wolu bee be kasaara la kasaarali kiliŋo le la.
61002013	Ì baarata kuu jawoo meŋ na, wo ñoŋ kuu jawoo le be ke la ì la joo ti. A ka ke ì ye jusulaa le ti, ka bidaŋ jawoo ke hani tiloo waatoo la. Ì la kuwo mu malu kuu baa le ti aniŋ dooyaa kuu baa ali la domori feetoolu to, kaatu hani jeelu to ì ka jusulaa ì la neeneeri siloolu le la.
61002014	Ì ñaalu loota musu-wo-musu kaŋ, ì hakiloo ka tu laañooyaa tuluŋo doroŋ ne kaŋ. Ì buka wasa junube kewo la. Ì ka moolu feeretoo muta le, mennu lamfuta ì la lannoo kono. Ì sondomoolu dalita hadumoo le la. Kooroo be wo dindiŋ dankariŋolu ye!
61002015	Ì ye sila tilindiŋo bula le, ì naata fili. Ì ye Balaamu la siloo le nooma, Bewori dinkewo, meŋ ye a la kuu jawoo ke tinewo kanoo kamma la.
61002016	Bari a naata jalayiroo soto ka bo a la faloo le bulu, meŋ mu mumuna feŋo ti. Wo diyaamuta a ye niŋ hadamadiŋ kaŋo le la, a la junuboo kamma la. A ye annabiyomoo ñiŋ bali kuu fuuriŋ kewo la wo le ñaama.
61002017	Wo faniyaa karandirilaalu la kuwo be le ko woyoolu, mennu maŋ jiyo soto, waraŋ komboo, foñoo ka meŋ janjaŋ. Dibi baa kataŋo le be pareeriŋ ì ye fokabaŋ.
61002018	Ì ka kuma kenseŋolu le fo niŋ ì la kibiri kuma baalu la. Ì ka ñiŋ moolu muta ka bo niŋ balajaatoo la hame kuu jawoolu le la, mennu be kana kaŋ wo neeneerilaalu la sila filiriŋo ma saayiŋ.
61002019	Ì ka wolu laahidi firiŋo la, bari ì faŋolu mu nakaroo la joŋolu le ti. Kaatu feŋ-wo-feŋ ye moo mara, a maarii mu joŋo le ti wo ye.
61002020	Ì ye m̀ Maarii niŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa Yeesu Kiristu la kuwo loŋ ne fokabaŋ, meŋ ye a tinna ì kanata ñiŋ duniyaa la kuu nooriŋolu ma. Bari niŋ ì naata ì daa bula wo kuu nooriŋolu kono kotenke, fo wolu ye ì mara, wo to ì labaŋo le jawuyaata ì foloo ti.
61002021	A be fisiyaa la ì ye le, niŋ a ye a tara, ì nene maŋ ñiŋ sila tilindiŋo loŋ nuŋ muumeeke. Kaatu saayiŋ a keta le ko, ì la ñiŋ siloo londiŋ koolaa, ì naata ì koo dii yaamari senuŋolu la, ì ye mennu soto fokabaŋ.
61002022	Kuwo meŋ keta ì ye, kuma kotoomaa ye wo yitandi le ko: “Wuloo ka muru a faŋo la foonoo kaŋ ne ka a domo, aduŋ seewu kuuriŋo ka muru le ka i birimintiŋ potoo kono.”
61003001	N kanuntewolu, ñiŋ mu n na leetari fulanjaŋo le ti ali ye, aduŋ ì fuloo bee daliiloo mu ka ke hakilibulandiraŋo ti. N lafita le, ì si ali sondome senuŋolu maa,
61003002	fo ali kana ñina ñaatokumoolu la, annabiyomu senuŋolu ye mennu fo nuŋ, aniŋ m̀ Maarii niŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa ye yaamaroo meŋ dii ka bo niŋ ali la kiilaalu la.
61003003	A kummaayaata ali ye le ka ñiŋ fahaamu ko, luŋ labaŋolu kono, ñaawalilaalu be naa la le, mennu be ñiŋ tooñaa siloo ke la jelefeŋo ti, aduŋ ì be ì fansuŋ hame kuu jawoolu nooma la le.
61003004	Ì be a fo la ko, “A la murunaŋo meŋ laahidita, a lee? Kabiriŋ m̀ mumuñolu faa tumoo la, kuwolu bee be ì ñaama le, feŋ maŋ faliŋ biriŋ daaroo foloodulaa to.”
61003005	Ì ye ì ñaa laa ñiŋ tooñaa kaŋ tawunteeyaa kono ko, jamaani jaŋ koomanto, saŋ fatoolu sotota ka bo niŋ Alla la kumoo le la, aniŋ duniyaa daata jiyo le la, bankoo bota jiyo le kono.
61003006	Aduŋ duniyaa meŋ sotota nuŋ, wo kasaarata le ka bo niŋ waamoo la.
61003007	Bari saŋ fatoolu niŋ ñiŋ duniyaa, mennu be sotoriŋ saayiŋ, ì be sotoriŋ Alla la wo yaamari kiliŋo le kaŋ, fo ì si kasaara dimbaa la. Ì be tara la keriŋ ne fo kiitiiluŋo la, aniŋ allantaŋolu la kasaara luŋo.
61003008	N kanuntewolu, ali kana ali ñaa laa ñiŋ tooñaa kaŋ ko, Maariyo fee, tili kiliŋo be le ko sanji wuli kiliŋ, aduŋ sanji wuli kiliŋo be le ko tili kiliŋ.
61003009	A maŋ ke ko, Maariyo naafata a la laahidoo timmandoo la le, ko moo doolu ka a miira ñaameŋ. Wo noo to, a ka muña alitolu ye le, kaatu a maŋ lafi, moo-wo-moo le ye kasaara, bari moolu bee ye tuubi ka ì koo dii ì la junuboolu la.
61003010	Bari Maariyo la Luŋo be naa la le ko suŋo. Bituŋ saŋ fatoolu ye yeemaŋ, ì niŋ maakaŋ baa. Feŋolu mennu bee be alihawaa kono, ì be kasaara la niŋ dimbaa le la, aduŋ duniyaa fanaa aniŋ feŋolu bee mennu be a kono, be jani la le.
61003011	Baawo ñiŋ feŋolu bee be labaŋ na kasaara la teŋ ne, wo to, alitolu ñanta ke la muŋ moo siifaalu le ti? Ali ñanta baluu la seneyaa niŋ Alla ñaasilaŋo le kono,
61003012	alitolu mennu be Alla la luŋ baa batu kaŋ, aduŋ ali la wakiiloo le ka a tariyandi naa la. Wo luŋo le, dimbaa be saŋ fatoolu kasaara la le, a be alihawaa feŋolu yelundi la.
61003013	Bari ntolu mennu ye Alla la laahidoo soto, m̀ be saŋ kutoo niŋ banku kutoo le batu kaŋ, tiliŋo be sabati la daameŋ.
61003014	Wo kamma la, n kanuntewolu, baawo ali ka wolu le batu, ali hame, a ye ali tara seneyaariŋ. Ali kana sootaari soto Alla ñaatiliŋo la, bari ali niŋ a ye tara kayiroo kono.
61003015	Ali hakiloo si bula ko, m̀ Maariyo mu muñalaa le ti ǹ na kiisoo ye. M̀ baadiŋ kanuntewo Pawulu fanaa ye ñiŋ kuwolu safee ali ye le ka bo niŋ ñaameŋo la, Alla ye meŋ dii a la.
61003016	A diyaamuta ñiŋ kuwolu la, a la leetaroolu bee le kono. Kuu doolu be a la wo leetaroolu kono le, mennu fahaamoo maŋ sooneeyaa, aduŋ kalamutabaloolu niŋ hakilifulatiyolu ye wolu yelemandi. Wo mu kuwo le ti, ì ka meŋ ke hani Kitaabu Senuŋo dulaa doolu to, aduŋ a labaŋo be ke la ì la kasaaroo le ti.
61003017	N kanuntewolu, baawo ali ye ñiŋ kuwolu loŋ ne fokabaŋ, wo to ali si ali hakiloo tu, fo wo luwaantaŋolu la filoo kana alitolu fanaa fatandi tooñaa ma. Ali kana soŋ, ali ye foo wo dulaa bambandiŋo la, ali be looriŋ meŋ kaŋ.
61003018	Wo noo to, ali si yiriwaa m̀ Maarii niŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa Yeesu Kiristu la hiinoo niŋ a loŋo kono. Tenturoo niŋ jayiroo be ate le ye, saayiŋ aniŋ fo abadaa. Amiin.
62001001	Ntolu ye meŋ bankee ali ye, wo mu Baluwo Kumoo le ti, meŋ be sotoriŋ kabiriŋ foloodulaa to. Ŋà a moyi le, ŋà a je ǹ ñaalu la, ŋà a juubee, aduŋ ŋà a maa m̀ buloolu la.
62001002	Ñiŋ baluwo lankenemata ǹ ye le. Ŋà a je le, aduŋ m̀ be a la kuwo seedeyaa kaŋ ne, aniŋ ǹ ka badaa-badaa baluwo bankee ali ye le ko, ate be a Faamaa le yaa nuŋ, a naata lankenema ntolu ye.
62001003	Ŋà meŋ je, aniŋ ŋà a moyi, m̀ be wo le bankee kaŋ ali ye, fo ali niŋ ntolu si kafuñooyaa soto. Ntolu niŋ m̀ Faamaa ye kafuñooyaa soto le, a niŋ a Dinkewo Yeesu Kiristu.
62001004	Aduŋ ntolu be ñiŋ safee kaŋ ne fo ǹ na seewoo si timma.
62001005	Ñiŋ mu kibaaroo le ti, ntolu ye meŋ soto a Dinkewo bulu, aduŋ ŋà a bankee ali ye le ko, Alla mu maloo le ti, aduŋ diboo te a kono muumeeke.
62001006	Niŋ ǹ ko, ǹ niŋ ate ye kafuñooyaa soto le, bari ǹ ka taama diboo kono, wo to ŋà faniyaa le fo, aduŋ m̀ maŋ tara tooñaa kaŋ.
62001007	Bari niŋ ǹ ka taama maloo kono, ko ate be maloo kono ñaameŋ, wo to ŋà kafuñooyaa soto ñoo ye le, aduŋ a Dinkewo Yeesu yeloo ka ǹ seneyandi le ka bo ǹ na junuboo bee la.
62001008	Niŋ ǹ ko, m̀ maŋ junuboo soto, wo to ǹ ka m̀ faŋolu le neenee, aduŋ tooñaa maŋ tara ǹ kono.
62001009	Niŋ ǹ ka tuubiseyi ǹ na junuboolu la, Alla foroyaata le, aduŋ a tilinta. A be yamfa la ǹ na junuboolu la le, aduŋ a be ǹ seneyandi la le ka bo ǹ na tilimbaliyaa bee kono.
62001010	Niŋ ǹ ko, ǹ nene maŋ junuboo ke, wo to ŋà Alla ke faniyaa folaa le ti, aduŋ a la kumoo maŋ tara ǹ kono.
62002001	N na dindiŋolu, m be ñiŋ safee kaŋ ali ye le, fo ali kana junuboo ke. Bari niŋ meŋ ye junuboo ke, ŋà maakoyirilaa soto m̀ Faamaa yaa le. Wo le mu Yeesu Kiristu ti, meŋ tilinta.
62002002	Ate le keta junube kafarilaŋ sadaa ti ntolu ye, aduŋ a maŋ daŋ ntolu dammaa la, bari ǹ niŋ duniyaa moolu bee.
62002003	Niŋ ŋà a la yaamaroolu muta, wo to ǹ dankeneyaata le ko, ŋà ate loŋ ne.
62002004	Moo meŋ ko, ate ye a loŋ ne, bari a ka a la yaamaroolu soosoo, wo mu faniyaa folaa le ti, aduŋ tooñaa te a kono.
62002005	Bari moo meŋ ye a la kumoo muta, Alla la kanoo timmata tooñaake wo maarii kono le. Ka bo niŋ wo la ǹ dankeneyaata le ko, ntolu niŋ Alla ye kafuñooyaa soto le.
62002006	Moo meŋ ko, a niŋ Alla ye kafuñooyaa soto le, wo maarii ñanta taama la siloo le la, Yeesu Kiristu taamata meŋ na.
62002007	N kanuntewolu, m maŋ tara yaamari kutoo safee kaŋ ali ye, bari yaamari kotoo, ali ye meŋ soto kabiriŋ foloodulaa to. Yaamari kotoo mu kumoo le ti, ali ye meŋ moyi nuŋ.
62002008	Bari kara doo la, m be yaamari kutoo le safee kaŋ ali ye, ate naata meŋ yitandi tooñaa ti, aduŋ a mu tooñaa ti alitolu fanaa fee. Diboo be bo kaŋ ne, aduŋ mala tooñaa be mala kaŋ ne fokabaŋ.
62002009	Moo meŋ ko, ate be maloo kono le, aduŋ a ye a baadiŋo koŋ, wo maarii be diboo le kono hani saayiŋ.
62002010	Moo meŋ ye a baadiŋo kanu, wo maarii ka tu maloo le kono, aduŋ feŋ te tara la a kono, meŋ si a boyindi noo.
62002011	Bari meŋ ye a baadiŋo koŋ, wo maarii be diboo le kono, aduŋ a ka taama diboo le kono. A maŋ a loŋ, a ka taa daameŋ, kaatu diboo ye a ñaalu finkindi le.
62002012	Dindiŋolu, m be ñiŋ safee kaŋ ali ye le, kaatu ali la junuboolu yamfata Yeesu too kamma la le.
62002013	Faalu, m be ñiŋ safee kaŋ ali ye le, kaatu ali ye ate le loŋ, meŋ be sotoriŋ kabiriŋ foloodulaa to. Fondinkewolu, m be ñiŋ safee kaŋ ali ye le, kaatu ali ye Seetaanoo noo le.
62002014	Dindiŋolu, ŋa a safee ali ye le, kaatu ali ye m̀ Faamaa loŋ ne. Faalu, ŋa a safee ali ye le, kaatu ali ye ate le loŋ, meŋ sotota kabiriŋ foloodulaa to. Fondinkewolu, ŋa a safee ali ye le, kaatu alitolu bambanta le, aduŋ Alla la kumoo ka sabati ali kono le, aduŋ ali ye Seetaanoo noo le.
62002015	Ali kana duniyaa kanu, sako feŋolu mennu be a kono. Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye duniyaa kanu, m̀ Faamaa la kanoo te wo maarii kono.
62002016	Kaatu feŋolu bee mennu be duniyaa kono, ko meŋ balajaatoo la hame kuu jawoolu, ñaa la hame kuu jawoolu, aniŋ faŋ waroo, sotoo kamma la, wolu bee bota duniyaa le kono, ì maŋ bo m̀ Faamaa yaa.
62002017	Duniyaa ka baŋ ne, a niŋ a la hame kuu jawoolu, bari moo meŋ ka Alla la lafoo ke, wo maarii be tu la baluuriŋ ne fo abadaa.
62002018	N na dindiŋolu, ñiŋ ne mu waati labaŋo ti. Ali ye a moyi le fokabaŋ ko, Kiristu Konnantewo be naa kaŋ ne. Bari hani saayiŋ, Kiristu konnantee jamaa le naata. Wo kamma la, ŋà a loŋ ne ko, ñiŋ ne mu waati labaŋo ti.
62002019	Ì bota ǹ na kafoo le kono, bari ì niŋ m̀ maŋ ke kiliŋ ti. Kaatu niŋ ì niŋ m̀ mu kiliŋ ti, wo to ì be tu la m̀ fee le. Bari ì bota ǹ kono le fo a si koyi ko, ì niŋ m̀ maŋ ke kiliŋ ti.
62002020	Kiristu meŋ mu Senuŋ Baa ti, ye Nooroo dii ali la, wo kamma la ali bee ye tooñaa loŋ ne.
62002021	M maŋ ñiŋ safee ali ye ko ali maŋ tooñaa loŋ, bari ko ali ye tooñaa loŋ ne, aduŋ ali ye a loŋ ko, faniyaa buka bo tooñaa kono.
62002022	Jumaa le mu faniyaa folaa ti? Wo le mu moo ti, meŋ balanta ko, Yeesu le mu Alimasiihu ti. Wo mu Kiristu konnantewo le ti, meŋ balanta Faamaa niŋ a Dinkewo la kuwo la.
62002023	Moo meŋ balanta Dinkewo la kuwo la, wo maŋ a Faamaa soto. Bari moo meŋ sonta Dinkewo la kuwo la, wo maarii ye a Faamaa fanaa soto le.
62002024	Ali ye kumoo meŋ moyi kabiriŋ foloodulaa to, wo ye tu sabatiriŋ ali kono. Niŋ wo kumoo sabatita ali kono, wo to ali niŋ Dinkewo be kafuñooyaa soto la le, a niŋ a Faamaa.
62002025	Aduŋ kuwo, a ye meŋ laahidi ǹ ye, wo mu badaa-badaa baluwo le ti.
62002026	Ŋa ñiŋ safee ali ye wo moolu le la kuwo kamma, mennu lafita ali filindi la.
62002027	Bari Nooroo, ali ye meŋ soto ka bo Alla bulu, a sabatita ali kono le. Wo kamma la, ali maŋ suula moo-wo-moo ye ali karandi, kaatu Alla la Nooroo ye ali karandi kuwolu bee le la. Ñiŋ karandiroo mu tooñaa le ti, a maŋ ke faniyaa ti. Baawo a ye ali karandi le, wo to ali sabati Kiristu kono.
62002028	Saayiŋ, n na dindiŋolu, ali sabati Yeesu Kiristu kono. Wo to le, niŋ a muruta naŋ, ǹ si dankeneyaa soto ka loo a ñaatiliŋo la, aduŋ ǹ te malu la.
62002029	Niŋ ali ye a loŋ ko, ate tilinta le, ali si a loŋ fanaa ko, moo-wo-moo meŋ ka kuu tilindiŋo ke, wo maarii wuluuta Alla le la.
62003001	Ali ñiŋ kanu baa juubee, m̀ Faamaa ye meŋ yitandi ǹ na ko, ǹ si kumandi Alla diŋolu la. Aduŋ m̀ mu wolu le ti! Bari duniyaa moolu maŋ Kiristu loŋ, wo kamma la, ì maŋ ntolu loŋ.
62003002	N kanuntewolu, saayiŋ m̀ mu Alla diŋolu le ti, bari a maŋ koyi m̀ ma foloo, m̀ be ke la meŋ ti. Bari ŋà a loŋ ne ko, niŋ Kiristu lankenemata, m̀ be ke la le ko ate, kaatu m̀ be a je la le, a be ñaameŋ.
62003003	Aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ye ñiŋ jikoo soto a kono, wo ye a faŋ seneyandi le ko ate seneyaata ñaameŋ.
62003004	Moo-wo-moo meŋ ka junuboo ke, wo maarii ye luwaa tiñaa le, kaatu junuboo mu luwaa tiñaa le ti.
62003005	Ali ye a loŋ ne ko, a naata le fo a si junuboolu bondi. Aduŋ ate kono, junube te jee.
62003006	Moo meŋ sabatita a la kafuñooyaa kono, wo buka tenteŋ junube kewo la. Bari moo, meŋ ka junuboo ke, wo nene maŋ ate je, sako ka a loŋ.
62003007	N na dindiŋolu, moo-wo-moo kana ali neenee. Moo meŋ ka kuu tilindiŋo ke, wo tilinta le, ko Kiristu tilinta ñaameŋ.
62003008	Moo meŋ ka junuboo ke, wo bota Ibiliisa le bala, kaatu Ibiliisa ye junuboo ke le kabiriŋ foloodulaa to. Alla Dinkewo naata ñiŋ daliiloo le kamma, fo a si Ibiliisa la dookuwo tiñaa.
62003009	Moo meŋ wuluuta Alla la, wo buka tenteŋ junube kewo la, kaatu Alla mankutoo ka tu sabatiriŋ a kono le. Wo kamma la, a te tu la junube kewo la, kaatu a wuluuta Alla le la.
62003010	Ka Ibiliisa diŋolu niŋ Alla diŋolu bondi ñoo to, ŋa wo loŋ ka bo niŋ ñiŋ ne la ko, moo meŋ buka kuu tilindiŋo ke, aniŋ a maŋ a baadiŋo kanu, wo maarii maŋ ke Alla diŋo ti.
62003011	Kabiriŋ foloodulaa to ali ye kiilaariyaa kumoo moyi le ko, ǹ ñanta ñoo kanu la le.
62003012	M̀ maŋ ñaŋ na ke la ko Kaabiila meŋ bota Seetaanoo bala, a ye a doomaa faa. Aduŋ muŋ ne ye a tinna a ye a faa? Kaatu a la kebaaroolu le jawuyaata, a doomaa la kebaaroolu tilinta.
62003013	M baadiŋolu, ali kana jaakali, niŋ duniyaa moolu ye ali koŋ.
62003014	Ŋà a loŋ ne ko, ǹ tambita saayaa la le ka taa baluwo kono, kaatu ŋà m̀ baadiŋolu kanu le. Moo meŋ maŋ kanoo soto, wo tuta saayaa le kono.
62003015	Moo meŋ ye a baadiŋo koŋ, wo mu moofaalaa le ti. Aduŋ ali ye a loŋ ne ko, moofaalaa-wo-moofaalaa te badaa-badaa baluwo soto la a faŋo kono.
62003016	Ŋà kanoo loŋ ka bo ñiŋ ne la ko, Yeesu Kiristu ye a niyo le laa ntolu ye. Wo to m̀ fanaa ñanta ǹ niyo laa la m̀ baadiŋolu ye le.
62003017	Moo meŋ ye a la suulafeŋolu soto ñiŋ duniyaa kono, aduŋ a ye a baadiŋo je suuloo kono, bari a maŋ balafaa soto a ye, Alla la kanoo be sabati la wo maarii kono ñaadii le?
62003018	N na dindiŋolu, ali ǹ kana kanoo ke niŋ ǹ neŋ koloma kenseŋolu la, bari ali ŋà a ke niŋ kebaaroolu la, tooñaa kono.
62003019	Ka bo wo la ǹ si a loŋ ko, ǹ tarata tooñaa le kono, aniŋ ǹ sondomoolu be kayiroo le kono Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
62003020	Wo kamma la, niŋ ǹ sondomoolu ye ǹ tuumi, ǹ si a loŋ ko, Alla le warata ǹ sondomoolu ti, aduŋ ate ye kuwolu bee le loŋ.
62003021	N kanuntewolu, niŋ ǹ sondomoolu maŋ ǹ tuumi, wo to ŋà dankeneyaa soto Alla ñaatiliŋo la le.
62003022	Aduŋ ŋà feŋ-wo-feŋ daani a bulu, m̀ be wo soto la le, kaatu ǹ ka a la yaamaroolu muta le, aniŋ ǹ ka kuwolu le ke, mennu ka a seewondi.
62003023	Aduŋ ñiŋ ne mu a la yaamaroo ti ko, ŋà laa a Dinkewo Yeesu Kiristu too la, aniŋ ŋà ñoo kanu, ko a ye ǹ yaamari ñaameŋ.
62003024	Moolu mennu ka a la yaamaroolu muta, wolu sabatita a kono le, aduŋ a fanaa sabatita wolu kono le. Aduŋ ka bo a la Nooroo la, a ye meŋ dii ǹ na, ŋà a loŋ wo le la ko, Alla be ǹ kono le.
62004001	N kanuntewolu, ali kana laa nooroolu bee la, bari ali si nooroolu kotobo, fo ì bota Alla le yaa, kaatu faniyaa annabiyomu jamaa le be ñiŋ duniyaa kono.
62004002	Ali be Alla la Nooroo suutee la ka bo niŋ ñiŋ ne la: Noora-wo-noora meŋ ye a seedeyaa ko, Yeesu Kiristu keta hadamadiŋo ti, wo nooroo bota Alla le yaa.
62004003	Bari noora-wo-noora meŋ maŋ soŋ Yeesu ma, wo maŋ bo Alla yaa. Wo mu Kiristu Konnantewo la nooroo le ti, ali ye meŋ moyi ko, a be naa la. Aduŋ saayiŋ, a be duniyaa kono le fokabaŋ.
62004004	N na dindiŋolu, alitolu mu Alla le taa ti. Wo kamma la, ali ye ì noo le, kaatu meŋ be ali kono, wo le warata ka tambi meŋ be duniyaa kono.
62004005	Ì mu duniyaa le taa ti. Wo kamma la, ì ka duniyaa kuwolu le fo, aduŋ duniyaa moolu le ka ì lamoyi.
62004006	Ntolu mu Alla le taa ti. Moo-wo-moo meŋ ye Alla loŋ, wo ka i lamoyi ntolu la le. Bari moo meŋ maŋ ke Alla taa ti, wo buka i lamoyi ntolu la. Ka bo niŋ wo la, ǹ ka tooñaa nooroo niŋ faniyaa nooroo bo ñoo to le.
62004007	N kanuntewolu, ali ŋà ñoo kanu, baawo kanoo bota Alla le yaa. Moo meŋ ye kanoo soto, wo maarii wuluuta Alla le la, aduŋ a ye Alla loŋ ne.
62004008	Moo meŋ maŋ kanoo soto, wo maarii maŋ Alla loŋ, baawo Alla mu kanoo le ti.
62004009	Alla ye a la kanoo yitandi ǹ na teŋ ne: A ye a Dinkee kiliŋo kii naŋ ñiŋ duniyaa kono, fo ntolu si baluu ka bo niŋ a la.
62004010	Ñiŋ ne mu kanoo ti: A maŋ ke ko, ntolu le ye Alla kanu, bari ate le ye ntolu kanu, a ye a Dinkewo kii naŋ ka ke ǹ ye junube kafarilaŋ sadaa ti.
62004011	N kanuntewolu, baawo Alla ye ǹ kanu teŋ ne, wo to m̀ fanaa ñanta ñoo kanu la wo le ñaama.
62004012	Moo nene maŋ Alla je, bari niŋ ŋà ñoo kanu, Alla ka sabati ǹ kono le, aduŋ a la kanoo ka timma ǹ kono le.
62004013	Ǹ ka tu sabatiriŋ ate kono le, aduŋ ate fanaa ka tu sabatiriŋ ntolu kono le. Ŋà wo loŋ ne, kaatu a ye a faŋo la Nooroo le dii ǹ na.
62004014	Ŋà a je le, aduŋ m̀ be a seedeyaa kaŋ ko, m̀ Faamaa ye a Dinkewo kii naŋ ne ka ke duniyaa moolu la Kiisandirilaa ti.
62004015	Moo-wo-moo meŋ ka a seedeyaa ko, Yeesu mu Alla Dinkewo le ti, Alla ka sabati wo maarii kono le, aduŋ wo maarii fanaa ka sabati Alla kono le.
62004016	Wo to ŋà kanoo loŋ ne, Alla ye meŋ soto ǹ ye, aduŋ ǹ laata wo le la. Alla mu kanoo le ti. Moo meŋ sabatita kanoo kono, wo maarii sabatita Alla le kono, aduŋ Alla sabatita wo maarii kono le.
62004017	Kanoo timmata ǹ kono wo le ñaama, fo ǹ si dankeneyaa soto kiitiiluŋo la, kaatu m̀ be ñiŋ duniyaa kono le ko Kiristu.
62004018	Silaŋo maŋ tara kanoo kono, kaatu kanu timmariŋo ka silaŋo bayi le. Silaŋo niŋ kuluuroo le mu, aduŋ moo meŋ silata, wo maarii maŋ timma kanoo kono.
62004019	Ŋà kanoo soto le, kaatu ate foloo le ye ǹ kanu.
62004020	Niŋ moo meŋ ko, ate ye Alla kanu le, bari a ye a baadiŋo koŋ, wo mu faniyaa folaa le ti. Kaatu moo meŋ maŋ a baadiŋo kanu, a ye meŋ je, wo maarii te Alla kanu noo la, a nene maŋ meŋ je.
62004021	Aduŋ ñiŋ mu yaamaroo le ti, ŋà meŋ soto a bulu ko, moo meŋ ye Alla kanu, wo maarii ñanta a baadiŋo fanaa kanu la le.
62005001	Moo-wo-moo meŋ laata ko, Yeesu le mu Alimasiihu ti, wo maarii wuluuta Alla le la. Aduŋ moo-wo-moo meŋ ye wuluulaa kanu, wo maarii be diŋo kanu la le, wo ye meŋ wuluu.
62005002	Niŋ ŋà Alla kanu, aniŋ ǹ ka a la yaamaroolu muta, ka bo niŋ wo siloo la m̀ be a loŋ na le ko, ŋà Alla diŋolu kanu le.
62005003	Ka Alla kanu, wo mu ka a la yaamaroolu muta, aduŋ a la yaamaroolu maŋ koleyaa.
62005004	Meŋ wuluuta Alla la, wo ka duniyaa noo le. Ǹ na lannoo le mu kañeeroo ti, meŋ ye duniyaa noo.
62005005	Jumaa le mu wo moo ti, meŋ ye duniyaa noo? Wo maarii le mu moo ti, meŋ laata ko, Yeesu mu Alla Dinkewo le ti.
62005006	Yeesu Kiristu le mu wo ti, meŋ naata ka bo jiyo niŋ yeloo la. A maŋ naa jiyo doroŋ na, bari a naata jiyo niŋ yeloo le la. Aduŋ Nooroo le ye a la kuwo seedeyaa, kaatu Nooroo mu tooñaa le ti.
62005007	Seede saba le be jee:
62005008	Nooroo, jiyo aniŋ yeloo, aduŋ ñiŋ seede saboo ka taa ñoo la le.
62005009	Ǹ ka soŋ seedeyaa le la, meŋ ka bo moolu bulu, bari seedeyaa meŋ ka bo Alla bulu, wo le warata ka tambi moolu taa ti. Ñiŋ ne mu Alla la seedeyaa ti ko, a ye a Dinkewo la kuwo le seedeyaa.
62005010	Moo meŋ laata Alla Dinkewo la, wo maarii ye seedeyaa soto a sondomoo kono le. Bari moo meŋ maŋ laa Alla la, wo maarii ye a ke faniyaa folaa le ti, kaatu wo maarii maŋ laa Alla la seedeyaa la, a ye meŋ fo a Dinkewo la kuwo to.
62005011	Aduŋ ñiŋ ne mu seedeyaa ti ko, Alla ye badaa-badaa baluwo le dii ǹ na, aduŋ ñiŋ baluwo be a Dinkewo le kono.
62005012	Wo to moo meŋ ye Dinkewo soto, wo maarii ye ñiŋ baluwo soto le. Moo meŋ maŋ Alla Dinkewo soto, wo maarii maŋ ñiŋ baluwo soto.
62005013	Ŋa ñiŋ kuwolu safee alitolu le ye, mennu laata Alla Dinkewo too la, fo ali si a loŋ ko, ali ye badaa-badaa baluwo soto le.
62005014	Aduŋ ŋà ñiŋ dankeneyaa le soto ate kono ko, niŋ ŋà feŋ-wo-feŋ daani ka bo a la lafoo la, a ka m̀ moyi le.
62005015	Aduŋ niŋ ŋà a loŋ ko, a ka m̀ moyi le, wo to ŋà a loŋ ne fanaa ko, kuwolu ǹ ka mennu daani, ŋà wolu soto le.
62005016	Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye a baadiŋo je junuboo ke la, meŋ maŋ ke saayaa junuboo ti, a ñanta duwaa la a ye le, aduŋ Alla be baluwo dii la a la le. M be moolu le la, mennu la junuboo maŋ ke saayaa junuboo ti. Saayaa junuboo be jee le, m maŋ a fo, a ye duwaa wo la.
62005017	Baara kuu-wo-baara kuu meŋ maŋ tiliŋ, wo mu junuboo le ti. Bari junuboo doo be jee le, meŋ maŋ ke saayaa junuboo ti.
62005018	Ŋà a loŋ ne ko, moo-wo-moo meŋ wuluuta Alla la, wo buka tenteŋ junuboo ke la. Alla Dinkewo ka a tanka le, aduŋ Seetaanoo buka a buloo laa noo a kaŋ.
62005019	Ŋà a loŋ ne ko, m̀ bota Alla le yaa, aduŋ ñiŋ duniyaa be Seetaani le la maraloo koto.
62005020	Aduŋ ŋà a loŋ ne fanaa ko, Alla Dinkewo naata le, a ye fahaamuroo dii ǹ na fo ǹ si ate loŋ, meŋ mu tooñaa ti. M̀ be ate kono le, meŋ mu tooñaa ti, Yeesu Kiristu, Alla Dinkewo. Ate le mu Alla tooñaa ti, aniŋ badaa-badaa baluwo.
62005021	N na dindiŋolu, ali fata jalaŋolu la.
63001001	Nte alifaa, m be ite musu tombondiŋo kontoŋ na. Ŋa i niŋ i la dindiŋolu kanu tooñaa kono le, aduŋ a maŋ ke nte dammaa ti, bari moolu bee mennu ye tooñaa loŋ.
63001002	Ŋa i kanu tooñaa le kamma, meŋ tarata ntolu kono, aduŋ a be tara la ntolu fee le fo abadaa.
63001003	Hiinoo, balafaa aniŋ kayiroo si tara m̀ fee ka bo Alla yaa, m̀ Faamaa, aniŋ Yeesu Kiristu, a Dinkewo, tooñaa niŋ kanoo kono.
63001004	Nte seewoota baake le ka ali la dindiŋolu doolu tara taama kaŋ tooñaa kono, ko m̀ Faamaa ye ǹ yaamari ñaameŋ.
63001005	Musu buuñaariŋo, ŋa i daani saayiŋ, ali ŋà ñoo kanu. Nte maŋ yaamari kuta safee i ye, bari yaamari kiliŋo, ŋà meŋ soto kabiriŋ foloodulaa to, ŋa wo le safee i ye.
63001006	Aduŋ ñiŋ ne mu kanoo ti ko, ŋà m̀ Faamaa la yaamaroolu muta. Yaamaroo, ali ye meŋ moyi kabiriŋ foloodulaa to, wo le mu ka taama kanoo kono.
63001007	Kaatu neeneerilaa jamaa le be duniyaa kono. Wolu le mu moolu ti, mennu maŋ soŋ ko, Yeesu Kiristu keta hadamadiŋo le ti. Ñiŋ moo siifaa le mu neeneerilaa ti, aniŋ Kiristu Konnantewo.
63001008	Ali ali faŋ koroosi, fo ali kana foo feŋolu la, ntolu ye mennu dookuu, bari fo ali si baraaji timmariŋo soto.
63001009	Moo meŋ maŋ sabati Kiristu la karandiroo kono, bari a jenketa wo la, wo maarii maŋ Alla soto. Moo meŋ tarata Kiristu la karandiroo kono, wo maarii ye Faamaa niŋ a Dinkewo bee le soto.
63001010	Niŋ moo-wo-moo naata ali yaa, a maŋ ñiŋ karandiroo naati, ali kana soŋ wo maarii ye duŋ ali la buŋolu kono, sako ali si a kontoŋ.
63001011	Kaatu moo meŋ ye wo maarii danku, a niŋ a denta a la kebaara jawoolu la le.
63001012	Ŋa kuu jamaa le soto ka ì safee ali ye, bari m maŋ lafi ka a safee duwaa la kayitoo bala. N jikita ko, m be naa la ali kumpabo la le. Wo to le ǹ si diyaamu ñaa niŋ ñaa la fo ǹ na seewoo si timma.
63001013	Ali baarimmusu tombondiŋo la dindiŋolu ye ali kontoŋ.
64001001	Nte alifaa, be n kanuntewo Kayus kontoŋ na, ŋa meŋ kanu tooñaa kono.
64001002	N kanuntewo, n jikita ko, kuwolu bee be beteyaariŋ i fee le, aduŋ i be kendeyaariŋ ne. I niyo la kuwo to, ŋa a kalamuta ko, a be bambandiŋ baake le.
64001003	N seewoota baake le, kabiriŋ baadiŋolu doolu naata, ì ye i la tiliŋo seedeyaa, i be taama kaŋ tooñaa kono ñaameŋ.
64001004	Nte maŋ seewoo soto, meŋ warata ka tambi ñiŋ na, ka a moyi ko, n na dindiŋolu be taama kaŋ tooñaa le kono.
64001005	N kanuntewo, i tilinta dookuwo kono le, i ka meŋ ke baadiŋolu ye, hani niŋ ì mu luntaŋolu ti, i maŋ mennu loŋ.
64001006	Wolu ye ite la kanoo fo Yeesu noomalankoolu la kafoo ye le. A be beteyaa la le, niŋ i ye maakoyiroo dii ì la ka tenteŋ ì la taamasiloo kaŋ. I si a ke niŋ siloo la, meŋ jarita Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
64001007	Kaatu ì be taamoo ke kaŋ Yeesu Kiristu too le kamma, aduŋ ì buka feŋ taa moolu bulu, mennu maŋ ke a noomalankoolu ti.
64001008	Wo kamma la, ǹ ñanta wo moo siifaalu maakoyi la le, fo ǹ si naa ke ì dookuuñoolu ti tooñaa kono.
64001009	Ŋa feŋ ne safee Yeesu noomalankoolu la kafoo ye, bari Diyoterefes, meŋ lafita ka a faŋo ke ñaatonkoo ti, a balanta ntolu ma le.
64001010	Wo kamma la, niŋ n naata, m be a la kuwolu fo la le, a be mennu ke kaŋ. A ka ǹ koomakuma jawuke le. Aduŋ wo maŋ a wasa, bari a ka balaŋ ka baadiŋolu jiyaa. A ka moolu fanaa bali, mennu lafita wolu jiyaa la, aduŋ a ka ì bayi Yeesu la kafoo kono.
64001011	N kanuntewo, kana kuu jawoo nikiŋ, bari kuu betoo. Moo meŋ ka kuu betoo ke, wo bota Alla le yaa. Bari moo meŋ ka kuu jawoo ke, wo maarii nene maŋ Alla je.
64001012	Demetiriyus ye seedeyaa betoo le soto, moolu bee ka meŋ fo, hani tooñaa faŋo sonta meŋ na. Ntolu fanaa ye a la kuu betoo fo le, aduŋ ite ye a loŋ ne ko, ǹ na seedeyaa mu tooñaa le ti.
64001013	Ŋa kuu jamaa le soto ka ì safee ite ye, bari m maŋ lafi ka a ke duwaa niŋ kalaa la.
64001014	N jikita ko, a te mee la, m be i je la, wo to le ǹ si diyaamu ñaa niŋ ñaa la.
64001015	Kayiroo be i fee. I teeroolu ye i kontoŋ. I si n teeroolu kiliŋ-kiliŋ naa kontoŋ n ye, ì toolu la.
65001001	Nte Yuuda, meŋ mu Yeesu Kiristu la dookuulaa ti, Yankuba dookewo, m be ali kontoŋ na, alitolu mennu bee kumandita ka sabati Alla, m̀ Faamaa la kanoo kono, meŋ ye ali kanda Yeesu Kiristu ye.
65001002	Allamaa Alla la balafaa, kayiroo aniŋ kanoo ye tu yiriwaa la ali kono.
65001003	N kanuntewolu, a keta n ye hame kuwo le ti, ka ali safee ǹ na kiisoo la kuwo to, m̀ bee denta meŋ na. Bari saayiŋ, n naata a je le ko, a kummaayaata le ka ali wakiilindi fo ali si tu looriŋ bambandinke wo lannoo kaŋ, Alla ye meŋ dii a la moo senuŋolu la, siiñaa kiliŋ waatoolu bee ye.
65001004	Moo doolu mennu la halakoo be looriŋ biriŋ jamaani jaŋ koomanto, ì feeretoo dunta ali la kafoo kono le. Ì mu allantaŋolu le ti, mennu ka Alla la hiinoo faliŋ ka a ke lanjuuroo ti malubaliyaa kuwolu kamma la. Aduŋ ì balanta Yeesu Kiristu ma, meŋ dammaa mu ǹ na Kuntiyo niŋ Maariyo ti.
65001005	Saayiŋ, n lafita le ka ali hakiloo bulandi kuwo la, ali ye meŋ loŋ fokabaŋ ko, Maariyo ye a la moolu kanandi Misira bankoo kaŋ ne nuŋ, wo koolaa a naata moolu kasaara ì kono, mennu maŋ tu foroyaariŋ a ma.
65001006	Aduŋ malaayikoolu fanaa mennu maŋ tu ì loodulaa to nuŋ, bari ì bota jee, wolu be tu la sitiriŋ badaa-badaa neejoloolu le la dibi baa kataŋo kono, fo Kiitiiluŋ baa ye naa.
65001007	Sodomu niŋ Komora, ì niŋ ì dandanna saatewolu fanaa la kuwo keta nuŋ wo le ñaama. Ì la moolu tarata laañooyaa kuu jawoolu le la, ka ì daa duŋ malu kuu jawu kewo to. Ì la badaa-badaa yankankatoo dimbaa kono keta dandalaaroo le ti moolu bee ye.
65001008	Bari ñiŋ allantaŋolu buka wo dandalaaroo muta. Ì la siiboolu kono ì ka jeri kalantaŋolu le soto. Wo jeroolu kaŋ, ì ka ì faŋolu balajaatoo kosondi wo ñaa kiliŋo la. Ì ka balaŋ kantiyo ma, aduŋ ì ka sembetii kallankeeyaariŋolu tooñee.
65001009	Hani Malaayika Kuntii Mikayeli faŋo maŋ haañi ka Ibiliisa tuumi niŋ tooñeeri kumoolu la, biriŋ ì dunta ñoo la Annabilayi Musa furewo la kuwo la. Wo noo to, a ko a ye le ko, “Maariyo ye i jalayi le!”
65001010	Bari ñiŋ moolu ka feŋolu le tooñee, ì maŋ mennu loŋ. Ì naata kuwolu mennu loŋ ka bo niŋ ì la lafinna kuwolu la ko daafeŋ hakilintaŋolu, wolu le keta ì la kasaaroo sababoo ti.
65001011	Kooroo be itolu ye le, kaatu ì bulata Kaabiila la siloo le nooma. Ì ye ì faŋ dii kodilandiyaa la, meŋ keta Balaamu fanaa la boyoo ti nuŋ. Ì keta balannaalu ti ko Kora, aduŋ ì be kasaara la wo le ñaama.
65001012	Ì mu moo kosoriŋolu le ti ali la kafoo la domori bendoolu to. Ì ka tara ñaaniriŋ ì faŋolu doroŋ ne la. Ì be le ko saŋ tawaloolu, foñoo ka mennu tambindi, ì buka jii dii. Ì be ko yiri dimbaloolu, tinee te mennu la katiri waatoo la. Ì wututa le, aduŋ ì faata ko siiñaa fula.
65001013	Ì be le ko fankaasoo jiibaliŋ saŋarariŋolu, ì ka malu kuwolu fintindi ko jiibaliŋolu la kankaŋo ka fuusa banta ñaameŋ. Ì be le ko looloo taamalaalu, dibi baa kataŋo mu ì taa le ti fo abadaa.
65001014	Enoki meŋ be jamaani woorowulanjaŋo kono ka bo naŋ Adama la, wo fanaa ye Alla la kiilaariyaa kumoo fo ñiŋ moolu la kuwo to le ko, “Maariyo ka naa le, a niŋ a la malaayika senuŋ wuliwuloolu,
65001015	a be moolu bee kiitindi la le. A be allantaŋolu bee halaki la ì la kebaara kuruŋolu la le, ì ye mennu ke ì la allantaŋyaa kono. A be halakoo laa la ì kaŋ kuma jawoolu kamma la, itolu junubelaa allantaŋolu ye mennu fo a ma.”
65001016	Ñiŋ moolu mu ŋunuŋunulaalu le ti, mennu ka tu doolu tuumi la. Ì ka ì fansuŋ niidiyaa kuwolu le nooma. Ì buka i dahaa kibiroo la ì faŋolu la kuwo to, aduŋ niŋ ì ye moo doolu jayi, ì ka a ke ì faŋolu la nafaa le kamma.
65001017	N kanuntewolu, alitolu maŋ ñaŋ na ñina la kiilaariyaa kumoolu la, m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la kiilaalu
65001018	ye mennu fo ali ye ko, “Luŋ labaŋolu kono, ñaawalilaalu be naa la le, mennu be tara la ì balajaatoolu la hame kuu jawoolu nooma la, ì la allantaŋyaa kono.”
65001019	Ñinnu le mu moolu ti, mennu ka talaaroo saabu. Ì ka ñiŋ duniyaa siloolu le nooma, ì maŋ Alla la Nooroo soto.
65001020	Bari alitolu mennu mu n kanuntewolu ti, alitolu si tu yiriwaa la ali la lannoo fondamaŋ senuŋo kaŋ, ali ye tu duwaa la Noora Kuliŋo kono.
65001021	Ali si tu Alla la kanoo kono, baawo ali be m̀ Maarii Yeesu Kiristu la balafaa le batu kaŋ, meŋ be badaa-badaa baluwo dii la ali la.
65001022	Ali si balafaa soto moolu ye, mennu ye hakili fuloo soto.
65001023	Ali doolu kanandi, ali ì cansu naŋ ka bo dimbaa kono. Ali balafaa soto doolu ye niŋ hakilituwo la. Ali ye hani ì la sitifeŋolu koŋ, mennu be kosoriŋ niŋ junube baaroolu la.
65001024	Tenturoo niŋ jayiroo be ate le ye, meŋ si ali tanka noo boyoo ma, ka ali sootaaribaloolu samba a la kallankeeyaa kono, ali be seewoo soto la a ñaatiliŋo la daameŋ.
65001025	Jayiroo be ate le ye, meŋ dammaa mu Alla ti, aniŋ ǹ na Kiisandirilaa. Jayiroo be ate le ye, ka bo niŋ Yeesu Kiristu la, m̀ Maarii. Semboo niŋ waroo, mansayaa, maraloo niŋ kantiiyaa bee be ate le ye, janniŋ duniyaa daa waatoo la, ka naa bula saayiŋ na, fo abadaa. Amiin.
66001001	Ñiŋ ne mu Yeesu Kiristu la lankenemoo ti, Alla ye meŋ dii a la ka a yitandi a la dookuulaalu la, kuwolu mennu be naa ke la, a te mee la. A ye wo yitandi ka bo niŋ a la malaayikoo le la, a ye meŋ kii a la dookuulaa Yohana kaŋ.
66001002	Ate Yohana le ye seedeyaa ke ñiŋ kuwolu to, a ye mennu bee je, ka a yitandi ko, Alla la kumoo le mu, aniŋ Yeesu Kiristu faŋo la seedeyaa.
66001003	Barakoo be moo le ye, meŋ ka ñiŋ kiilaariyaa kumoo karaŋ santo, barakoo be moolu le fanaa ye, mennu ka a moyi aduŋ ì ka a muta, kaatu ñiŋ kuwolu la timma waatoo maŋ jamfa.
66001004	Nte Yohana be Yeesu la kafu woorowuloo kontoŋ na, mennu be Asiya tundoo kaŋ taariŋ. Hiinoo niŋ kayiroo be ali fee ka bo Alla bulu, meŋ be keriŋ, meŋ be keriŋ nuŋ, aniŋ meŋ be naa la. Hiinoo niŋ kayiroo be ali fee ka bo noora woorowuloo bulu, mennu be a la mansasiiraŋo ñaatiliŋo la,
66001005	aniŋ Yeesu Kiristu fanaa bulu, meŋ mu seede foroo ti. A foloo le wulita ka bo saayaa kono, aduŋ ate le mu maralilaa ti duniyaa mansoolu bee kunto. Jayiroo be ate le ye, meŋ ye ǹ kanu, aduŋ a ye m̀ firiŋ ǹ na junuboolu kono, ka bo niŋ a yeloo la.
66001006	A ye ǹ ke mansariŋolu le ti, a Faamaa la piriisiyaa be mennu bulu. Semboo niŋ waroo aniŋ maraloo bee be ate le ye, fo abadaa. Amiin.
66001007	A fele, a ka naa minaayoolu kono, aduŋ ñaalu bee le be a je la, hani wo moolu mennu ye a baloo soo. Aduŋ siyolu mennu bee be ñiŋ duniyaa kono, ì be woosii la a la kuwo la le. Wo be ke la le! Amiin.
66001008	Maarii Alla ko, “Nte le mu Alifa niŋ Omeka ti, Foloo niŋ Labaŋo.” Maarii Alla le ye wo fo, ate meŋ be keriŋ, meŋ be keriŋ nuŋ, aniŋ meŋ be naa la, ate meŋ mu Mansa Tallaa ti.
66001009	Nte Yohana mu ali baadiŋo le ti, meŋ niŋ ali mu kiliŋ ti Yeesu kono, tooroo, mansabaayaa aniŋ wakiiloo muñoo kono. M be nuŋ mutoo kono baajooyoo to le, ì ka a fo daameŋ ye Patimos. Wo sunta n na Alla la kumoo kawandoo le la, aniŋ Yeesu la kuwo seedeyaa.
66001010	A naata ke Maariyo la Luŋo le la, biriŋ Alla la Nooroo ye m muta jee nuŋ, ŋa kumakaŋo moyi n kooma, meŋ warata ko footaŋ kumakaŋo.
66001011	A ko, “I ye meŋ je, a safee kitaabu moromororiŋo kono, i ye a kii Yeesu la kafu woorowuloo ye, mennu be ñiŋ saatewolu to: Efesus, Simirina, Perikamu, Tiyatira, Saridis, Filadelifiya, aniŋ Lawodiseya.”
66001012	Bituŋ ŋa n ñaa muru ka juubeeroo ke, meŋ ka diyaamu n ye. N na wo ñaa muroo, ŋa sani lampu looraŋ woorowula je.
66001013	N naata meŋ je wo lampu looraŋolu teema, ka munta ko hadamadiŋo. A ye waramba jaŋo duŋ, meŋ be sitiriŋ a sisoo la, wo mu sanoo le ti.
66001014	A kuntiñoo be koyiriŋ ne ko perekaanoo, a koyita le fer. A ñaakesoolu be ko dimbaa maloo.
66001015	A siŋolu be malamala kaŋ ko jaawaloo meŋ kuloorita dimbaa la, aduŋ a kumakaŋo be le ko jiibaliŋ baalu.
66001016	A ye looloo woorowula le muta a bulubaa buloo kono. Hawusari daa fuloo fintita naŋ a daa kono, aduŋ a ñaadaa be malamala kaŋ ne ko tilikuntee baa.
66001017	Kabiriŋ ŋa a je, ŋa m faŋo fayi a siŋolu to ko furewo, bari a ye a bulubaa buloo laa n kaŋ, a ko, “Kana sila! Nte le mu Foloo niŋ Labaŋo ti,
66001018	nte meŋ be baluuriŋ. M faata le nuŋ, bari a fele, m be baluuriŋ fo abadaa. Saayaa niŋ a la maralidulaa caaboolu be nte le bulu.
66001019	Wo to, kuwolu safee i ye mennu je, mennu be keriŋ, aniŋ mennu be naa ke la ñinnu koolaa.
66001020	Wo looloo woorowuloo, i ye mennu je m bulubaa buloo kono, aniŋ sani lampu looraŋ woorowuloo, wolu kotoo fele: Wo looloo woorowuloo mu nte Yeesu la kafu woorowuloo malaayikoolu le ti, aduŋ wo lampu looraŋ woorowuloo mu Yeesu la kafu woorowuloo le ti.”
66002001	“A safee nte Yeesu la kafoo malaayikoo ye, meŋ be Efesus saatewo kono: “Nte la kumoo fele, nte meŋ ye wo looloo woorowuloo muta m bulubaa buloo kono, ka taama wo sani lampu looraŋ woorowuloo teema:
66002002	“Ŋa ite la kebaaroolu loŋ ne, i la dookuwo aniŋ i la wakiiloo muñoo kono, aniŋ i ka balaŋ moo jawoolu la ñaameŋ. Ŋa a loŋ ne fanaa ko, i ye moolu kotobo le, mennu ka ì faŋolu kumandi Kiristu la kiilaalu la, bari ì maŋ ke wolu ti, aduŋ i naata ì la wo faniyaa waañaari.
66002003	Ŋa i la wakiiloo loŋ ne, aniŋ muñoo, i ye meŋ soto tooroo kono n too kamma la. Wolu be laariŋ i kaŋ ñaa-wo-ñaa, i maŋ pasi.
66002004	Bari ŋa ñiŋ tuumiroo soto i la kuwo to le ko, i ye kanoo bula le, ì ye meŋ soto folooto nuŋ.
66002005	Wo to, i hakiloo bulandi i la boyoo la. Tuubiseyi, i ye muru wo kebaaroolu kaŋ, i ye mennu ke folooto. Niŋ wo nte, m be naa la i kaŋ ne, aduŋ m be i la lampu looraŋo bondi la a noo to le.
66002006	Bari i ye ñiŋ kuu betoo le ke, i ye Nikola noomalankoolu la kebaaroolu koŋ ne, nte fanaa ye mennu koŋ.
66002007	“Meŋ ye tuloo soto ka moyiroo ke, a si a moyi, Nooroo be meŋ fo kaŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye. Meŋ keta noorilaa ti, m be siloo dii la wo la le ka domoroo ke ka bo yiroo to, meŋ ka baluwo dii. Wo yiroo be Alla la naakoo le kono.
66002008	“A safee n na kafoo malaayikoo ye, meŋ be Simirina saatewo kono: “Nte la kumoo fele, nte meŋ mu Foloo niŋ Labaŋo ti, nte meŋ faata, n naata baluu kotenke:
66002009	“Ŋa ite la tooroo loŋ ne, aniŋ i la fuwaareyaa, bari tooñaa, ite fankata le. Ŋa nendiri kumoolu loŋ ne, moo doolu ye mennu fo i ma. Wo moolu ka ì faŋ kumandi Yahuudoolu le la, bari ì maŋ ke wolu ti. Ì mu Seetaanoo la kafoo le ti.
66002010	Kana sila tooroo la, meŋ be naa laa la i kaŋ. Seetaanoo be alitolu doolu fayi la bunjawoo kono le, fo ali si kotobo. Ali be toora kuwo soto la fo tili taŋ. I si foroyaa, hani niŋ i be saayaa je la, aduŋ wo to le m be kañeerinaafoo dii la i la, meŋ mu badaa-badaa baluwo ti.
66002011	“Meŋ ye tuloo soto ka moyiroo ke, a si a moyi, Nooroo be meŋ fo kaŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye. Meŋ keta noorilaa ti, saayaa fulanjaŋo te wo maa la muk!
66002012	“A safee n na kafoo malaayikoo ye, meŋ be Perikamu saatewo kono: “Nte la kumoo fele, hawusari daa fula diimaa be nte meŋ bulu.
66002013	“Nte ye a loŋ ne, ite be sabatiriŋ daameŋ, Seetaanoo la mansasiiraŋo be jee le to. Bari wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, i tuta foroyaariŋ m ma le. Lannoo i ye meŋ soto n too la, i maŋ balaŋ wo ma, hani Antipas faata waatoo meŋ na. Ate mu n seede foroo le ti, ì ye meŋ faa ali kono, Seetaanoo sabatidulaa to.
66002014	Bari nte ye kuu dantaŋ ne soto ka i tuumi. Moo doolu le be ali kono jee, mennu be Balaamu la karandiroo nooma kaŋ. Ate le ye Balaki karandi ka Banisirayilankoolu dundi marisa kuwo kono ka ì boyindi. A ye ì duŋ feŋolu domoo to, mennu bota jalaŋolu ye sadaa ti, aniŋ ka laañooyaa tuluŋo ke.
66002015	Wo ñaa kiliŋo la, moo doolu be i fee jee le, mennu ka Nikola noomalankoolu la karandiroo nooma.
66002016	Wo kamma la, tuubi, i ye i koo dii i la junuboolu la! Niŋ wo nte, a te mee la, m be naa la i kaŋ, ka keloo boyi wo moolu kaŋ niŋ hawusari daa fuloo la, meŋ be n daa kono.
66002017	“Meŋ ye tuloo soto ka moyiroo ke, a si a moyi, Nooroo be meŋ fo kaŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye. Meŋ keta noorilaa ti, m be manna maaboriŋo doo dii la a la le, aduŋ m be bere koyoo fanaa dii la a la le. Too kutoo be tara la safeeriŋ wo beroo bala le, moo-wo-moo te meŋ loŋ na, fo meŋ ye a soto.
66002018	“A safee n na kafoo malaayikoo ye, meŋ be Tiyatira saatewo kono: “Nte Alla Dinkewo la kumoo fele, nte meŋ ñaakesoolu be ko dimbaa maloo, aduŋ n siŋolu be malamala kaŋ ko jaawaloo meŋ kuloorita dimbaa la.
66002019	“Ŋa ite la kebaaroolu loŋ ne, i la kanoo, i la lannoo, i la dookuwo, aniŋ i la wakiiloo. I ka baara kuwolu mennu la saayiŋ, wolu le warata foloolu ti.
66002020	Bari wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, kuu kiliŋ, ŋa i tuumi wo la le. Ite ka wo musoo Yesebeli bula le, meŋ ka a faŋ kumandi annabiyomu musoo la, a be n na dookuulaalu filindi kaŋ ka bo niŋ a la karandiroo la. A ka wolu duŋ laañooyaa tuluŋo to, aniŋ ka feŋolu domo, mennu bota jalaŋolu ye sadaa ti.
66002021	Ŋa waatoo dii a la le ka tuubi, bari a maŋ soŋ ka a la laañooyaa tuluŋolu bula.
66002022	A fele, m be kuuraŋo le laa la a kaŋ, a ye tu a la laaraŋo kaŋ. Aduŋ m be a mooñoo jeenelaalu fayi la toora baa le kono, fo niŋ ì tuubita kuu kuruŋolu la, ì niŋ ñiŋ musoo ye mennu ke.
66002023	M be a diŋolu faa la le. Wo to le, n na kafoolu bee be a loŋ na ko, nte le mu wo ti, meŋ ka sondomoolu niŋ hakiloolu kisikisi, aduŋ m be alitolu meŋ-wo-meŋ joo la a la kebaaroolu la le, a jarita meŋ na.
66002024	Bari m maŋ wo tuumiroo fo alitolu moo koteŋolu ma Tiyatira jee, alitolu mennu maŋ wo karandiroo nooma, aduŋ ali maŋ kuwolu karaŋ, ì ka mennu kumandi Seetaanoo la kulloo dinkariŋolu la. M be a fo kaŋ alitolu ye ko, nte maŋ duni koteŋ laa ali kaŋ.
66002025	Bari kuwolu ali ye mennu soto fokabaŋ, ali wolu muta bambandinke, fo ŋa naa.
66002026	Meŋ keta noorilaa ti, aduŋ a ye n na kumoo muta fo labandulaa to, m be semboo dii la wo la nasiyoŋolu kunto le.
66002027	A si ì mara niŋ needokoo la, a be ì teyiŋ-teyiŋ na le ko daandiŋolu. M be kaŋo dii la a la le ko m fanaa ye a soto m Faamaa bulu ñaameŋ.
66002028	M be Subaalooloo dii la a la le.
66002029	“Meŋ ye tuloo soto ka moyiroo ke, a si a moyi, Nooroo be meŋ fo kaŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye.”
66003001	“A safee n na kafoo malaayikoo ye, meŋ be Saridis saatewo kono: “Nte la kumoo fele, nte meŋ ye Alla la noora woorowuloo soto, aniŋ looloo woorowuloo. “Ŋa ite la kebaaroolu loŋ ne. Moolu ka a miira ko, i be baluuriŋ ne, bari i faata le.
66003002	Wuli, i ye i ñaalu yele! Feŋolu mennu tuta i bulu saayaa daa to, wolu bambandi, kaatu nte maŋ i la kebaaroolu je timmariŋ n na Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
66003003	Wo to, i hakiloo bulandi kuwo la, i ye meŋ moyi nuŋ, aduŋ i naata a muta. Wo muta kuu, i ye tuubi ka i koo dii i la junuboolu la. Niŋ i maŋ wuli ka tu i ñaa la, m be naa la le ko suŋo, i te waatoo loŋ na, m be i ñapinkaŋ na meŋ na.
66003004	Wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, i ye moo dantaŋ ne soto Saridis jee, mennu maŋ ì la waramboolu kosondi. Wolu niŋ nte be taama la ñoo la waramba koyoolu kono le, kaatu ì jarita a la le.
66003005	Meŋ keta noorilaa ti, wo be feetoofata la waramba koyoo le la, aduŋ n te a too tuutuu la muumeeke baluwo kitaaboo kono. M be a too seedeyaa la m Faamaa ñaatiliŋo la le, aniŋ a la malaayikoolu ñaatiliŋo la.
66003006	“Meŋ ye tuloo soto ka moyiroo ke, a si a moyi, Nooroo be meŋ fo kaŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye.
66003007	“A safee n na kafoo malaayikoo ye, meŋ be Filadelifiya saatewo kono: “Nte la kumoo fele, nte meŋ jankuta, aduŋ m mu tooñaa ti, Mansa Dawuda la caaboo be nte le bulu. Ŋa meŋ yele, moo-wo-moo te a soroŋ noo la, aduŋ ŋa meŋ soroŋ, moo le te wo yele noo la.
66003008	“Ŋa i la kebaaroolu loŋ ne. A fele, ŋa bundaa yele i ñaa to, moo te meŋ soroŋ noo la. Ŋa a loŋ ne ko, i semboo dooyaata le, bari wo ñaa-wo-ñaa, i ye nte la kumoo muta le, aduŋ i maŋ balaŋ n too ma.
66003009	A juubee, m be kuwo meŋ laa la wo moolu kaŋ, mennu mu Seetaanoo la kafoo ti. Ñiŋ faniyaa folaalu ka ì faŋolu kumandi Yahuudoolu le la, bari ì maŋ ke wolu ti. M be a tinna le, fo wo moolu ye naa ka sujudi i siŋolu to, aduŋ ì be a loŋ na le ko, nte ye i kanu le.
66003010	Baawo i ye n na yaamaroo muta niŋ wakiiloo le la muñoo kono, m be ite tanka la wo kotoboroo waatoo la le, meŋ be naa la duniyaa bee kaŋ. A be naa la le ka moolu kotobo, mennu be baluuriŋ ñiŋ duniyaa kono.
66003011	“Nte be naa le, a te mee la. I ye meŋ soto, wo muta niŋ i bulu fuloo la, fo moo-wo-moo kana i la kañeerinaafoo buusi i la.
66003012	Meŋ keta noorilaa ti, m be wo ke la samasiŋo le ti n na Alla Batudulaa Buŋo kono, a nene te finti la jee to. M be n na Alla too niŋ n na Alla la saatewo too safee la wo bala le. Wo le mu Yerusalaamu kutoo ti, meŋ be jii la naŋ ka bo n na Alla yaa, Arijana kono. Aduŋ m be n too kutoo fanaa safee la a maarii bala le.
66003013	“Meŋ ye tuloo soto ka moyiroo ke, a si a moyi, Nooroo be meŋ fo kaŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye.
66003014	“A safee Yeesu la kafoo malaayikoo ye, meŋ be Lawodiseya saatewo kono: “Nte la kumoo fele, nte meŋ mu Amiin ti. Nte le mu foroo ti, aniŋ seede tooñaa. Alla ye feŋolu bee daa ka bo niŋ nte le la.
66003015	“Ŋa ite la kebaaroolu loŋ ne. Ite maŋ sumayaa, sako ka kandi. N na hamoo mu, i ye ke kiliŋ ti ñiŋ feŋ fuloo kono!
66003016	Baawo ite be sumayaa niŋ kandoo le teema, aduŋ i maŋ sumayaa waraŋ ka kandi, m be i tupi la banta le ka bo n daa kono.
66003017	Ite ko, i fankata le, i ye ñaatotaa soto, aduŋ i maŋ suula feŋ na. Ite moo mantoorariŋo, i maŋ a loŋ ko, i mu balafaa moo le ti. Ite fuwaarediŋ, i mu finkintewo le ti, i kenseŋo tuta.
66003018	Wo kamma la, ŋa i yaamari ka sanoo saŋ nte bulu, meŋ kuloorita dimbaa la, fo i si ke fankamaa ti. Waramba koyoo saŋ nte bulu ka i faŋ sutura, fo moolu kana i ŋayiboo je, meŋ mu malu kuwo ti. Booroo saŋ ì ñaalu ye, i ye a moosi ì bala, fo i si jeroo ke noo.
66003019	Ŋa moolu mennu kanu, n ka wolu le jalayi, aniŋ n ka ì kuluu. Wo kamma la, hame baa soto, i ye tuubi ka i koo dii i la junuboolu la.
66003020	“A fele, m be looriŋ bundaa to le ka a konkoŋ. Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye n kumandiri kaŋo moyi, aduŋ a ye bundaa yele n ye, m be duŋ na le. N niŋ wo maarii be domoroo ke la le, aduŋ ate niŋ nte fanaa be a ke la le.
66003021	Meŋ keta noorilaa ti, nte be siidulaa dii la wo le la n na mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, ko m faŋo keta noorilaa ti ñaameŋ, n niŋ m Faamaa siita a la mansasiiraŋo kaŋ.
66003022	“Meŋ ye tuloo soto ka moyiroo ke, a si a moyi, Nooroo be meŋ fo kaŋ Yeesu la kafoolu ye.”
66004001	Ñiŋ kuwolu koolaa ŋa juubeeroo ke, a fele, n naata Arijana je, a bundaa be yeleriŋ! Bituŋ ŋa kumakaŋ foloo meŋ moyi nuŋ diyaamu la n ye, a be ko footaŋ kumakaŋo, n naata a moyi kotenke. A ko n ye ko, “Naa santo jaŋ! M be a yitandi la i la le, meŋ be ke la ñiŋ kuwolu koolaa.”
66004002	Wo loo niŋ baroo teema, Nooroo ye m muta, bituŋ ŋa mansasiiraŋo je looriŋ Arijana kono. A maarii be siiriŋ a kaŋ.
66004003	Meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, a la ñiiñaa la kallankeeyaa be le ko bere ñiimaalu, a malamaloo kulooroo be le ko jasipa beroo niŋ kaneliyani beroo. Malamaloo meŋ ye a la mansasiiraŋo murubeŋ be le ko kullimaaroo, a kulooroo be le ko emeradi beroo.
66004004	Mansasiiraŋ muwaŋ niŋ naani le ye ñiŋ mansasiiraŋo muruŋ-muruŋ, ì ye a bula teema, aduŋ alifaa muwaŋ niŋ naani le be siiriŋ wo mansasiiraŋolu kaŋ. Ì bee ye waramba koyoolu le duŋ, aniŋ mansanaafoolu mennu dadaata niŋ sanoo la, be ì kuŋolu to.
66004005	Saŋ ŋalasoolu ka bo mansasiiraŋo bala, wolu niŋ saŋ feteŋolu niŋ kumakaŋ baa. Dimbaa pacama woorowula be a ñaato, mennu mu Alla la noora woorowuloo ti.
66004006	Mansasiiraŋo ñaatiliŋo la, kenoo meŋ be jee to, wo ka munta le ko baajiyo meŋ dadaata niŋ weeri faramansariŋo la. Daafeŋ baluuriŋ naani le ye mansasiiraŋo ñiŋ bula teema. A kara-wo-kara la, kiliŋ ne be jee. Ì naanoo bee baloolu be faariŋ ñaalu le la, ñaalu be ì bala ì kooma niŋ ì ñaato.
66004007	Daafeŋ baluuriŋ foloo muluŋo be le ko jatoo, fulanjaŋo be ko ninsituuraa, sabanjaŋo ñaadaa be le ko hadamadiŋo ñaadaa, aduŋ daafeŋ naaninjaŋo be le ko seeliŋo tiitoo.
66004008	Wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo, ì meŋ-wo-meŋ ye dampaŋ wooro le soto. Wo dampaŋolu be faariŋ ñaalu le la, ì kara fuloo bee. Suuto tili, ì nene maŋ i dahaa ñiŋ jayiroo la ko: “Seneyaa, seneyaa, seneyaa be Maarii Alla Tallaa le fee, ate meŋ be keriŋ nuŋ, meŋ be keriŋ, aniŋ meŋ be naa la.”
66004009	Wo daafeŋ baluuriŋolu ka jayiroo, horomoo aniŋ tenturoo dii ate le la, meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, aduŋ a be tu la baluuriŋ ne fo abadaa. Niŋ ì ye wo fo waati-wo-waati,
66004010	wo alifaa muwaŋ niŋ naanoo ka sujudi ate le ñaatiliŋo la, meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, ka a batu. Ì ka ì la mansanaafoolu wura mansasiiraŋo ñaatiliŋo la le, ka ì landi. Ì ka ñiŋ fo ko:
66004011	“M̀ Maarii, ite le jarita tenturoo niŋ jayiroo la. Ǹ na Alla, horomoo niŋ semboo be ite le ye. Kaatu ite le ye feŋolu bee daa, daaroo bee naata soto i la lafoo le kaŋ.”
66005001	Bituŋ ŋa kitaabu moromororiŋo je a bulubaa buloo kono, ate meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ. Safeeroolu be a kara fuloo bee la, aduŋ a be notoriŋ noto woorowula le la.
66005002	Ŋa malaayika sembemaa je, meŋ be kankulaaroo kaŋ niŋ sari baa la ko, “Jumaa le jarita ka ñiŋ kitaabu moromororiŋo notoolu teyi, aniŋ ka a yele?”
66005003	Bari hani moo kiliŋ te jee, Arijana kono waraŋ bankoo kaŋ waraŋ bankoo koto duuma, meŋ si ñiŋ kitaabu moromororiŋo yele noo, waraŋ ka a kono juubee.
66005004	N kumboota baake, kaatu moo maŋ soto, meŋ jarita ka wo kitaabu moromororiŋo yele, waraŋ ka a kono juubee.
66005005	Wo to le alifaa kiliŋo ko n ye ko, “Kana kumboo! A juubee, Yahuuda lasiloo la jatoo meŋ bota Dawuda bala, a ye nooroo ke le. Wo kamma la, ate le si kitaabu moromororiŋo la noto woorowuloo teyi noo ka a yele.”
66005006	Bituŋ ŋa Saajiiriŋo je looriŋ mansasiiraŋo niŋ wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo teema, wo alifaalu ye ì muruŋ-muruŋ. Saajiiriŋo ñiŋ be le ko meŋ kanateyita. Bina woorowula le be a la, aniŋ ñaa woorowula. Wolu mu Alla la noora woorowuloo le ti, a ye mennu kii duniyaa bee kono.
66005007	Saajiiriŋo ñiŋ naata wo kaŋ, meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, a ye kitaabu moromororiŋo taa a bulubaa buloo kono.
66005008	Kabiriŋ Saajiiriŋo ye a taa, wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo niŋ wo alifaa muwaŋ niŋ naanoo sujudita a ñaatiliŋo la, ì meŋ-wo-meŋ niŋ kontiŋo aniŋ sani booloolu, mennu be faariŋ cuuraayoo la. Wo cuuraayoo mu Alla la moo senuŋolu la duwaa le ti.
66005009	Bituŋ ì ye suukuu kutoo laa ko: “Ite le jarita ka kitaabu moromororiŋo taa, aniŋ ka a notoolu teyi. Kaatu ite le kanateyita, i ye moolu kumakaa Alla ye. Ite le yeloo keta kumakaaraŋo ti moolu bee ye, ka bo siyolu bee kono, kaŋolu, bankoolu, aniŋ nasiyoŋolu bee.
66005010	I ye wolu ke mansariŋolu le ti, piriisiyaa be mennu bulu, ka ǹ na Alla batu. Ì be maraloo ke la duniyaa kono le.”
66005011	Wo to le ŋa malaayikoolu jamaa je, ì ye mansasiiraŋo niŋ daafeŋ baluuriŋolu niŋ alifaalu murubeŋ. Ì mu malaayika wuliwuloolu le ti, aniŋ miliyoŋ-miliyoŋolu. Aduŋ ŋa ì la kumakaŋolu moyi le,
66005012	ì be a fo kaŋ niŋ sari baa la ko: “Saajiiriŋo meŋ kanateyita nuŋ, ate le jarita semboo niŋ fankoo bee la, aniŋ ñaameŋo, waroo niŋ horomoo, kallankeeyaa niŋ jayiroo!”
66005013	Bituŋ n naata daafeŋolu bee moyi, mennu be Arijana kono, bankoo kaŋ, bankoo koto duuma, fankaasoo kono aniŋ dulaalu bee to. Ì kumata ka a fo ko: “Jayiroo niŋ horomoo be ate le ye, meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, a niŋ Saajiiriŋo! Kallankeeyaa niŋ waroo be itolu le ye, fo abadaa!”
66005014	Wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo ko, “Amiin!” aduŋ alifaalu sujudita, ì ye ì batu.
66006001	Bituŋ ŋa Saajiiriŋo je, a ye noto foloo teyi wo noto woorowuloo kono. Ŋa daafeŋ baluuriŋ kiliŋo moyi wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo kono, a kaŋo ka munta le ko saŋ kumakaŋo, a ko, “Naa!”
66006002	Bituŋ ŋa suu koyoo je, a borindilaa ye kalabeñoo muta. Kañeerinaafoo diita a la le. A fintita ko noorilaa ka nooroo ke kotenke.
66006003	Kabiriŋ Saajiiriŋo ye noto fulanjaŋo teyi, ŋa daafeŋ baluuriŋ fulanjaŋo moyi, a ko, “Naa!”
66006004	Suu doo fanaa fintita naŋ, meŋ be wuleeriŋ. A borindilaa ye kaŋo soto le ka kayiroo bondi duniyaa kono fo moolu si ñoo faa, aduŋ hawusari baa le diita a la.
66006005	Kabiriŋ Saajiiriŋo ye noto sabanjaŋo teyi, ŋa daafeŋ baluuriŋ sabanjaŋo moyi, a ko, “Naa!” A fele, ŋa suu fiŋo je. A borindilaa ye peesarilaŋo le soto a buloo kono.
66006006	Bituŋ ŋa feŋ moyi, meŋ ka munta ko moo kumakaŋo, a bota naŋ wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo kono. A be a fo kaŋ ko, “Wiiti fariñoo, a pooti kiliŋ, denaari kiliŋ. Baali fariñoo, a pooti saba, denaari kiliŋ. Bari kana olifu yiroolu waraŋ wayini yiroolu maa.”
66006007	Kabiriŋ Saajiiriŋo ye noto naaninjaŋo teyi, ŋa daafeŋ baluuriŋ naaninjaŋo moyi, a ko, “Naa!”
66006008	Bituŋ ŋa suu mampatabaloo je. A borindilaa too mu Saayaa le ti, aduŋ Kaburoo bulata a nooma. Semboo diita itolu la le ka duniyaa talaadaa naaninjaŋo bee faa niŋ hawusaroo la, konko jawoo, alibalaa kuuraŋo, aniŋ daafeŋ saŋarariŋolu.
66006009	Kabiriŋ Saajiiriŋo ye noto luulunjaŋo teyi, ŋa niyolu le je sadaajanidulaa koto. Ì mu moolu niyolu le ti, ì ye mennu faa Alla la kumoo aniŋ ì la seedeyaa kamma la.
66006010	Ì sarita niŋ sari baa la ko: “M̀ Maarii Mansa Tallaa! Ite meŋ jankuta, ite meŋ mu tooñaa ti, fo i la kiitiyo be mee la le hani saayiŋ? Waati jumaa le i be moolu joo la, mennu ye ntolu faa?”
66006011	Bituŋ waramba koyoo diita ì meŋ-wo-meŋ na. Ì sabarindita ko, ì ye dahaa fo waatindiŋ, fo ì dookuuñoolu niŋ ì baadiŋolu la hapoo ye timmandi, mennu fanaa ñanta faa la wo ñaa kiliŋo ñaama.
66006012	Ŋa Saajiiriŋo je, a ye noto wooronjaŋo teyi. Wo keta banku jarajara baa ti. Tiloo naata fiŋ ko fintoŋo, aniŋ karoo bee naata wulee ko yeloo.
66006013	Saŋo looloolu boyita naŋ bankoo kaŋ ko sooto diŋ nororiŋolu, turubaadoo ka mennu joloŋ duuma, niŋ a feeta.
66006014	Ŋa saŋ fatoolu je yeemaŋ na ko kayitoo, ì ye meŋ moromoro, aduŋ konkoolu niŋ baajooyoolu bee bota ì noolu to.
66006015	Wo to le duniyaa mansoolu, kantiyolu niŋ kelejawaroolu, fankamaalu niŋ sembetiyolu, ì bee borita ka maabo berehuwolu kono, aniŋ konko bere baalu kono taariŋ. Moolu bee borita, fo joŋolu le mu, waraŋ foroolu.
66006016	Ì be a fo la konkoolu niŋ bere baalu ye ko, “Ali boyi ǹ kaŋ, ali ye m̀ maabo wo maarii ñaadaa ma, meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, aniŋ Saajiiriŋo la kamfaa baa ma.
66006017	Ì la kamfaa luŋ baa naata le, jumaa le si loo noo a ñaato?”
66007001	Wo koolaa, ŋa malaayika naani je looriŋ duniyaa tonkoŋ naanoo to. Ì ye foño naanoo muta, mennu ka fee ka bo naŋ duniyaa tonkoŋ naanoo to. Ì ye wolu muta le fo foño kana fee fankaasoo, bankoo waraŋ yiri-wo-yiri kaŋ.
66007002	Bituŋ ŋa malaayika doo je, a ka bo naŋ santo tilibo karoo la, a niŋ Alla baluuriŋo la tampuraŋo. A sarita santo ka wo malaayika naanoo kumandi, semboo diita mennu la ka kasaaroo ke bankoo niŋ fankaasoo kono.
66007003	A ko ì ye ko, “Ali kana bankoo, fankaasoo waraŋ yiroolu tiñaa, fo niŋ ŋà tampoo ke Alla la moolu foŋolu to foloo.”
66007004	Wo to le ŋa moolu yaatewo moyi, ì ye mennu tampu. Moo wuli keme wuli taŋ naani niŋ naani le tamputa ka bo Banisirayilankoolu bee kono. Lasili-wo-lasili niŋ moo wuli taŋ niŋ fula le tamputa:
66007005	Ka bo Yahuuda lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, ka bo Rubeni lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, ka bo Kadu lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula,
66007006	ka bo Aseri lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, ka bo Nafutali lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, ka bo Manase lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula,
66007007	ka bo Simeyoni lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, ka bo Lewi lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, ka bo Isakari lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula,
66007008	ka bo Sebuluni lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, ka bo Yusufa lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula, aniŋ ka bo Benjamini lasiloo to, wuli taŋ niŋ fula.
66007009	Wo koolaa, ŋa juubeeroo ke, aduŋ n naata kafu baa le je, moo te meŋ yaatee noo la. Ì bota nasiyoŋolu bee le kono, siyolu bee, bankoolu bee, aniŋ kaŋolu bee. Ì be looriŋ mansasiiraŋo niŋ Saajiiriŋo ñaatiliŋo la. Waramba koyoolu be ì la, aduŋ ì ye tamaree buloolu muta ì buloolu kono.
66007010	Ì be sari kaŋ santo ko: “Kiisoo bota naŋ ǹ na Alla le bulu, meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, a niŋ Saajiiriŋo bulu.”
66007011	Bituŋ malaayikoolu mennu bee be looriŋ jee, ì ye mansasiiraŋo murubeŋ, ì niŋ alifaalu niŋ wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo bee sujudita mansasiiraŋo ñaatiliŋo la, ì ye Alla batu.
66007012	Ì be a fo kaŋ ko: “Amiin! Jayiroo niŋ tenturoo, ñaameŋo, kallankeeyaa niŋ horomoo, semboo niŋ waroo bee be ǹ na Alla le ye, fo abadaa. Amiin!”
66007013	Wo to le, wo alifaalu kono, moo kiliŋ naata diyaamu n ye. A ye n ñininkaa ko, “Jumaa le mu wo moolu ti, waramba koyoolu be mennu la, aniŋ ì bota mintoo le?”
66007014	Ŋa a jaabi ko, “Alifaa, ite le ye a loŋ.” A ko n ye ko, “Ñinnu le mu moolu ti, mennu bota naŋ toora baa kono. Ì ye ì la waramboolu kuu le, ì ye ì koyindi niŋ Saajiiriŋo yeloo la.
66007015	Wo le ye a tinna ì be Alla la mansasiiraŋo ñaatiliŋo la. Ì ka a batu a Batudulaa Buŋo kono suuto, tili. Ate meŋ be siiriŋ mansasiiraŋo kaŋ, a be tara la ì fee le ka ì tanka.
66007016	Ì te konko la kotenke, sako mindoo si ì muta. Tiloo te ì jani la, sako foño kandoo,
66007017	kaatu Saajiiriŋo meŋ be mansasiiraŋo ñaatiliŋo la, ate le be ke la ì la kantarilaa ti. A be ì kenkeŋ na jii woyoolu le to, mennu ka baluwo dii, aduŋ Alla be ñaajiyo bee fita la ì ñaalu to le.”
66008001	Kabiriŋ Saajiiriŋo ye noto woorowulanjaŋo teyi, maakaŋolu tenkunta tek Arijana kono fo montoroo waati talantee ñoŋ na.
66008002	N naata wo malaayika woorowuloo je, mennu ka loo Alla ñaatiliŋo la, aduŋ footaŋ woorowula diita ì la.
66008003	Bituŋ malaayika doo naata loo sadaajanidulaa daala, sani cuuraayi siisindiraŋo be a bulu. Cuuraayi jamaa diita a la, ka a kafu Alla la moo senuŋolu bee la duwaa ma sani sadaabodulaa kaŋ, mansasiiraŋo ñaatiliŋo la.
66008004	Wo to le, cuuraayi siisiyo niŋ Alla la moo senuŋolu la duwaa wulita santo, Alla ñaatiliŋo la, ka bo malaayikoo ñiŋ bulu.
66008005	Bituŋ a naata cuuraayi siisindiraŋo taa, a ye a fandi niŋ dimbaa la, ka bo sadaajanidulaa to, bituŋ a ye a fayi duniyaa kono. Saŋ feteŋolu keta, aniŋ kumakaŋ baalu niŋ saŋ ŋalasoolu niŋ banku jarajaroo.
66008006	Wo malaayika woorowuloo mennu ye footaŋ woorowuloo soto, ì pareeta ka ì fee.
66008007	Malaayika foloo ye a la footaŋo fee, bituŋ saŋ beroolu niŋ dimbaa fintita, meŋ niŋ yeloo be ñaamiriŋ. Ì boyita duniyaa kono duuma. Bituŋ bankoo la talaadaa sabanjaŋo janita, yiroolu la talaadaa sabanjaŋo janita, aniŋ ñaama kitiŋolu bee.
66008008	Malaayika fulanjaŋo ye a la footaŋo fee, bituŋ feŋ fintita, meŋ ka munta ko konko baa, a be jani kaŋ niŋ dimbaa la. A fayita fankaasoo kono, aduŋ fankaasoo la talaadaa sabanjaŋo naata yelema yeloo ti.
66008009	Wo ye a tinna, daafeŋolu mennu be baluuriŋ jiyo kono, wolu la talaadaa sabanjaŋo faata. Baakono kuluŋolu fanaa la talaadaa sabanjaŋo bee tiñaata.
66008010	Malaayika sabanjaŋo ye a la footaŋo fee, bituŋ looloo baa jolonta naŋ duuma ka bo saŋo santo. A be mala kaŋ ko pacamoo. A jolonta boloŋolu la talaadaa sabanjaŋo kono, aniŋ woyoolu.
66008011	A looloo too mu Jamba Kunaŋo le ti. A ye a tinna le, jiyo la talaadaa sabanjaŋo naata yelema jii kunaŋo ti. Moo jamaa faata ka bo niŋ wo jiyo la, kaatu a kuniyaata le.
66008012	Malaayika naaninjaŋo ye a la footaŋo fee. Wo ye tiloo la talaadaa sabanjaŋo maa, a niŋ karoo niŋ looloolu fanaa la talaadaa sabanjaŋo, fo ì la maloo la talaadaa sabanjaŋo naata dibi. Wo naata a tinna, tiloo niŋ suutoo la talaadaa sabanjaŋo keta diboo ti.
66008013	Bituŋ ŋa juubeeroo ke, ŋa seeliŋo moyi kuma la niŋ kumakaŋ baa la, a be tii kaŋ n kunto santo. A ka a fo ko: “Kooroo, kooroo, kooroo be wo moolu ye, mennu be sabatiriŋ duniyaa kono, kaatu malaayika saba doo pareeta le ka ì la footaŋolu fee.”
66009001	Bituŋ malaayika luulunjaŋo ye a la footaŋo fee. Ŋa looloo je, a jolonta duniyaa kono, ka bo saŋo santo. Dinka dambaloo bundaa caaboo diita looloo ñiŋ na.
66009002	Tumoo meŋ na a ye dinka dambaloo ñiŋ bundaa yele, siisii baa bota naŋ jee ko fuuri baa ka siisiyo bo ñaameŋ. Wo siisiyo ye tiloo niŋ foñoo dibindi kut.
66009003	Bituŋ kuntiŋolu fintita naŋ wo siisiyo ñiŋ kono ka naa duniyaa kono. Semboo diita ì la, meŋ be ko duniyaa buntaloolu semboo.
66009004	Ì ye yaamaroo soto ko, ì kana ñaamoolu tiñaa, fiifeŋolu waraŋ yiri-wo-yiri, bari ì si wo hadamadiŋolu doroŋ mantoora, mennu maŋ Alla la tampoo soto ì foŋolu to.
66009005	Kaŋo maŋ dii ì la ka wo moolu faa, bari ka ì mantoora fo kari luulu. Ì la toorandiroo la dimiŋo be le ko buntali bundiroo.
66009006	Wo luŋolu kono, hadamadiŋolu be saayaa ñini la le, bari ì te a je la. Ì be hame la le ka faa, bari saayaa be bori la ì la le.
66009007	Wo kuntiŋolu be le ko suwoolu mennu parendita keloo ye. Feŋolu be ì kuŋolu to, mennu ka munta ko sani mansanaafoolu. Ì ñaadaalu be ko hadamadiŋ ñaadaa.
66009008	Ì kuntiñoolu be le ko musu kuntiñoo, aduŋ ì ñiŋolu be le ko jata ñiŋolu.
66009009	Fatoolu mennu be ì bala, wolu be le ko nee koteeroolu. Ì dampaŋolu la maakaŋo be le ko suu sareeti jamaa, mennu be bori kaŋ keloo kono.
66009010	Ì ye feñoolu niŋ beñoolu soto le ko buntaloolu, aduŋ ì ye semboo meŋ soto ka moolu toorandi fo kari luulu, wo be ì feñoo le to.
66009011	Ì ye mansoo le soto, meŋ be marariŋ ì la, aduŋ wo mu wo dinka dambaloo le malaayikoo ti. Hiburu kaŋo to, a too mu Abadoni le ti, Jirisi kaŋo to, a mu Apolliyoni le ti.
66009012	Kooroo foloo tambita, bari hani saayiŋ, kooroo fula be kooma le, mennu be naa la.
66009013	Bituŋ malaayika wooronjaŋo ye a la footaŋo fee. N naata kumakaŋo moyi, meŋ bota bina muluŋ naanoo kono, mennu be looriŋ sani sadaabodulaa tonkoŋ naanoo to, Alla ñaatiliŋo la.
66009014	Wo kumakaŋo be a fo kaŋ malaayika wooronjaŋo ye, footaŋo be meŋ bulu ko, “Wo malaayika naanoo firiŋ, mennu be sitiriŋ Yufurati Boloŋo to.”
66009015	Bituŋ malaayika naanoo ñiŋ naata firiŋ, mennu parendita ñiŋ waatoo faŋo kamma la, a luŋo, a karoo aniŋ a saŋo, ka hadamadiŋolu talaadaa sabanjaŋo bee faa.
66009016	Kelediŋolu mennu mu suuborindilaalu ti, wolu yaatewo mu miliyoŋ keme fula le ti. Nte ye ì yaatewo moyi le.
66009017	Aduŋ ŋa jeroo ke jaharaŋo ñaama teŋ ne: Ŋa suwoolu je, ì borindilaalu ye sisi tankandiraŋolu mennu duŋ, wolu be wuleeriŋ ne ko dimbaa, aduŋ ì be buluuriŋ ne ko safiiri beroo, ì be netemunkuriŋ ko solifa munkoo. Ì la suwoolu kuŋolu be le ko jatakuŋolu, aduŋ dimbaa, siisiyo aniŋ solifa munkoo le ka bo ì daalu kono.
66009018	Hadamadiŋolu la talaadaa sabanjaŋo bee faata ka bo wo mantoora saboo le la, mennu mu dimbaa ti, siisiyo aniŋ solifa munkoo, mennu ka bo suwoolu daalu kono.
66009019	Ñiŋ suwoolu la semboo be ì daalu le kono, aniŋ ì feñoolu to. Ì feñoolu be le ko saalu mennu ye kuŋolu soto, aduŋ ì ka moolu barama niŋ wolu le la.
66009020	Hani ñiŋ mantooroolu koolaa, moo koteŋolu mennu tuta baluuriŋ, wolu maŋ soŋ ka batufeŋolu bula, ì ye mennu dadaa ì fansuŋ buloolu la. Ì maŋ i foño seetaani jawoolu batoo la, aniŋ jalaŋolu, mennu dadaata sanoo niŋ kodiforoo la, jaawaloo, beroo aniŋ babaroo. Ì tuta ñiŋ feŋolu le batu kaŋ, mennu buka jeroo ke, sako moyiroo waraŋ ka taama.
66009021	Ì maŋ tuubi ì la moofaalu fanaa la, ì la batuutaayaalu, laañooyaa tuluŋolu aniŋ ì la suuñaaroolu.
66010001	Bituŋ ŋa malaayika sembemaa baa doo je jii kaŋ ka bo saŋo santo. Minaayoo le ye a baloo muuri, kullimaaroo be a kunto. A ñaadaa be ko tiloo, a siŋolu be ko samasiŋ dimbaamaalu.
66010002	Kitaabundiŋ moromororiŋo be yeleriŋ a buloo kono. A ye a bulubaa siŋo loo fankaasoo kono, bituŋ a ye a maraa siŋo loo tintoo kaŋ.
66010003	A sarita santo, a kumakaŋo be ko jatoo meŋ ka bumbuŋ. Kabiriŋ a ye kumandiroo ke, saŋ kumakaŋ woorowula ye a danku.
66010004	Biriŋ saŋ kumakaŋ woorowuloo kumata, m pareeta ka a safee, bari n naata kumakaŋo moyi ka bo naŋ saŋo santo. A ko n ye ko, “Kuwolu tu kulloo kono, saŋ kumakaŋ woorowuloo ye mennu fo, ì kana ì safee.”
66010005	Ŋa malaayikoo meŋ je looriŋ fankaasoo kono aniŋ tintoo kaŋ, a naata a bulubaa buloo wulindi santo.
66010006	Bituŋ a kalita niŋ wo la, meŋ be baluuriŋ fo abadaa, meŋ ye saŋo daa, aniŋ feŋolu mennu be a kono, bankoo aniŋ feŋolu mennu be a kono, fankaasoo aniŋ feŋolu mennu be a kono. Aduŋ a ko, “Waati koteŋ te jee, ka kuwolu mendi.
66010007	Bari wo luŋolu la, malaayika woorowulanjaŋo be a la footaŋo fee la waatoo meŋ na, Alla la feeroo be timmandi la le, meŋ be kulloo kono. Wo be ke la le ko a ye a bankee a la annabiyomoolu ye ñaameŋ, mennu mu a la dookuulaalu ti.
66010008	Bituŋ ŋa kumakaŋo meŋ moyi nuŋ ka bo naŋ saŋo santo, wo naata diyaamu n ye kotenke ko, “Taa, kitaabundiŋ moromororiŋo taa, meŋ be yeleriŋ wo malaayikoo buloo kono, meŋ be looriŋ fankaasoo kono aniŋ tintoo kaŋ.”
66010009	Wo to le n taata malaayikoo ñiŋ kaŋ. N ko a ye ko, “Kitaabundiŋ moromororiŋo dii n na.” Bituŋ a ko n ye ko, “A taa, i ye a domo. A be diyaa la i daa kono le ko liyo, bari niŋ a futata i konoo kono, a be kuniyaa la le.”
66010010	Ŋa kitaabundiŋ moromororiŋo taa malaayikoo ñiŋ bulu wo le ñaama, ŋa a domo. A diyaata n daa kono le ko liyo, bari kabiriŋ ŋa a domo, n konoo kono naata kuniyaa.
66010011	Wo to le ŋa yaamaroo soto ko, n ñanta kiilaariyaa kumoo fo la le kotenke, bankoolu la kuwo to, nasiyoŋolu, kaŋolu aniŋ mansoolu.
66011001	Wo to le sumandirilaŋ dokoo diita n na, aduŋ ŋa yaamaroo soto ko, “Wuli, i ye taa Alla Batudulaa Buŋo niŋ sadaajanidulaa sumaŋ, i ye moolu konti, mennu ka baturoo ke jee.
66011002	Bari luwo meŋ be Alla Batudulaa ñiŋ banta la, kana wo sumaŋ, kaatu a diita Alla lombaloolu le la. Ì be doriŋ-doriŋ na saatee senuŋo kaŋ ne fo kari taŋ naani niŋ fula.
66011003	Nte be semboo dii la n na seede fuloo la le ka kiilaariyaa kumoo fo, fo tili wuli kiliŋ keme fula aniŋ taŋ wooro, booto funtoolu le be tara la dundiŋ ì la.”
66011004	Ñinnu le mu wo olifu yiri fuloo niŋ wo lampu looraŋ fuloo ti, mennu be looriŋ duniyaa la Maariyo ñaatiliŋo la.
66011005	Niŋ moo-wo-moo lafita ka ì mantoora, dimbaa ka bo naŋ ì daalu kono le, ka ì jawoolu kasaara. Niŋ moo-wo-moo lafita ka ì mantoora, a maarii ñanta faa la wo le ñaama.
66011006	Ì ye semboo soto le ka saŋo soroŋ fo sanjiyo kana ke ì la kiilaariyaa kumafoo luŋolu la. Ì ye semboo soto baajiyo kaŋ ne ka a yelemandi yeloo ti, aniŋ ka duniyaa mantoora niŋ mantoora siifaa bee la, waatoo bee la meŋ diyaata ì ye.
66011007	Niŋ ì ye ì la wo seedeyaa baŋ, daafeŋ saŋarariŋo meŋ ka sele naŋ ka bo dinka dambaloo kono, wo le be keloo boyi la ì kaŋ, aduŋ a be ì noo la, a ye ì faa.
66011008	Ì furewolu be tara la laariŋ saatee baa mbeedoolu kaŋ ne, ì ka meŋ misaali Sodomu niŋ Misira la. Wo le mu saatewo faŋo ti, ì Maariyo pempenta yiribantambiloo kaŋ daameŋ.
66011009	Bituŋ moolu, ka bo bankoolu bee to, siyolu bee to, kaŋolu aniŋ nasiyoŋolu be tara la ì furewolu fele la le fo tili saba niŋ talaa, ì te soŋ na ka ì baadee.
66011010	Moolu mennu be sabatiriŋ duniyaa kono taariŋ, wolu be seewoo la ì la saayaa kamma la le, ì be feetoo ke la, aduŋ ì be soorifeŋolu dii la ñoo la. Ì be seewoo la le saayiŋ, kaatu ñiŋ annabiyomu fuloo la kuwo ye ì toorandi le nuŋ.
66011011	Bari n naata a je le ko, wo tili saba niŋ talaa koolaa, baluwo niijiyo meŋ ka bo naŋ Alla yaa, dunta ì kono, aduŋ ì loota ì siŋolu la. Silaŋ baa boyita moolu kaŋ, mennu ye wo je.
66011012	Bituŋ seede fuloo ñiŋ ye kumakaŋ baa moyi ka bo saŋo santo, meŋ ko ì ye ko, “Ali naa jaŋ!” Ì seleta santo minaayoo kono, ì jawoolu ñaa la, ka taa Arijana.
66011013	Jee niŋ jee, banku jarajara baa keta, aduŋ saatewo la talaadaa tanjaŋo bee kasaarata. Moo wuli woorowula le faata wo banku jarajaroo kono. Bituŋ moo toomaalu mennu tuta baluuriŋ, ì silata baake, aduŋ ì ye Arijana Maariyo la semboo niŋ waroo jayi.
66011014	Kooroo fulanjaŋo tambita le, bari kooroo sabanjaŋo be naa kaŋ ne.
66011015	Bituŋ malaayika woorowulanjaŋo ye a la footaŋo fee, aduŋ kumakaŋ baalu be Arijana kono, ì be a fo la ko, “Duniyaa mansayaa bee naata ke m̀ Maariyo niŋ a la Alimasiihu la mansayaa le ti, aduŋ a si maraloo ke fo abadaa!”
66011016	Bituŋ wo alifaa muwaŋ niŋ naanoo mennu be siiriŋ ì la mansasiiraŋolu kaŋ Alla ñaatiliŋo la, ì sujudita ka Alla batu.
66011017	Ì be a fo la ko: “M̀ Maarii Alla Mansa Tallaa, ŋà tenturoo dii i la, ite meŋ be keriŋ, aniŋ ite meŋ be keriŋ nuŋ. Ŋà i tentu, kaatu i ye i la sembe baa yitandi le, i ye a dati le ka maraloo ke.
66011018	Nasiyoŋolu kamfaata le, bari ite la kamfaa baa, wo ye dandulaa ke ì la le. Waatoo siita le ka furewolu kiitindi. Waatoo siita le ka i la dookuulaalu joo, i la annabiyomoolu aniŋ i la moo senuŋolu. Waatoo siita le ka moolu joo, mennu ka i too buuñaa, biriŋ moondiŋ fo moo baa, aniŋ ka moolu kasaara mennu ye kasaaraloo ke duniyaa kono.”
66011019	Bituŋ Alla Batudulaa Buŋo yeleta Arijana kono, aduŋ Kambeŋ Kunewo jeta, meŋ be a kono. Saŋ ŋalasoolu, saŋ feteŋolu, saŋ kumakaŋolu, aniŋ banku jarajaroo keta, saŋ bere baalu naata boyi duniyaa kono.
66012001	Taamanseeri kaawakuuyaariŋo fintita saŋo santo. Ŋa musoo le je, meŋ be pareeriŋ niŋ tiloo la, karoo be a siŋolu koto, aduŋ looloo taŋ niŋ fula be a kuŋo to ko mansanaafoo.
66012002	A mu musukonomaa le ti, bituŋ a ŋuntanta tiŋo la dimoo kamma la, kaatu a be fitiiriŋ a la wuluwo la le.
66012003	Bituŋ taamanseeri kaawakuuyaariŋ doo fanaa fintita saŋo santo. Ŋa ninkinanka baa le je, meŋ be wuleeriŋ ko dimbaa. Kuŋ woorowula le be a la, aniŋ bina taŋ. Mansanaafa woorowula le be a kuŋolu to.
66012004	A ye looloolu la talaadaa sabanjaŋo bee fita saŋo santo niŋ a feñoo la, a ye ì fayi duniyaa kono. Bituŋ ninkinankoo ñiŋ naata loo musoo ñiŋ ñaato, meŋ pareeta ka wuluu, fo a si musoo diŋo kunuŋ, niŋ a wuluuta.
66012005	Musoo naata dinkewo le wuluu, meŋ be nasiyoŋolu bee mara la niŋ needokoo la. Bari musoo wuluuta doroŋ, a diŋo buusita a la ka taa Alla yaa, Alla la mansasiiraŋo to.
66012006	Musoo ñiŋ borita ka taa keñewuloo kono, Alla ye tankandiridulaa parendi a ye daameŋ. A naata a la daañinoo soto jee fo tili wuli kiliŋ keme fula aniŋ taŋ wooro.
66012007	Bituŋ keloo wulita Arijana kono, malaayika kuntii Mikayeli niŋ a la malaayikoolu be ninkinankoo kelendi kaŋ, aduŋ ninkinankoo niŋ a la malaayikoolu fanaa ye ì kele.
66012008	Bari Mikayeli niŋ a la malaayikoolu ye ì noo le, aduŋ dulaa maŋ soto itolu ye kotenke Arijana kono.
66012009	Bituŋ ninkinanka baa fayita naŋ duuma. Ate le mu wo saa kotoo ti, ì ka meŋ kumandi Ibiliisa niŋ Seetaanoo la, duniyaa moolu bee neeneelaa. A fayita naŋ duuma duniyaa kono, a niŋ a la malaayikoolu.
66012010	Ŋa kumakaŋ baa moyi Arijana kono, meŋ ko, “N na Alla la kiisoo, a la semboo niŋ mansabaayaa, aniŋ a la Alimasiihu la kantiiyaa naata le, kaatu m̀ baadiŋolu tuumilaa fayita duuma le. Ate le be ì tuumi kaŋ nuŋ, ǹ na Alla ñaatiliŋo la, suutoo niŋ tiloo la.
66012011	M̀ baadiŋolu naata a noo ka bo niŋ Saajiiriŋo yeloo le la, aniŋ ì la seedeyaa kumoo la. Ì maŋ ì la baluwo kanu, bari ì pareeta le hani ka faa.
66012012	Arijana niŋ feŋolu bee mennu be a kono, ali seewoo! Bari kooroo be alitolu bankoo niŋ fankaasoo ye! Ibiliisa niŋ kamfaa baa le naata ali kaŋ, kaatu a ye a loŋ ne ko, a la waatoo maŋ jamfa.”
66012013	Kabiriŋ ninkinankoo ye a kalamuta ko, a fayita duniyaa le kono, a ye a dati ka musoo ñini, meŋ ye wo dinkewo wuluu.
66012014	Bari dampaŋ fula le diita musoo ñiŋ na, mennu be ko seeliŋ baa dampaŋolu, fo a si tii noo ka bori wo saa la, ka taa keñewuloo kono. A la tankandiridulaa be jee le to, a be a la daañinoo soto la daameŋ fo sanji saba niŋ talaa.
66012015	Bituŋ saa ye jiyo puusa musoo nooma, ka bo a daa kono ko boloŋo, fo jiiboroo si musoo ñiŋ koora ñoo la.
66012016	Bari bankoo naata musoo ñiŋ deemaa. Bankoo ye a daa yele, a ye boloŋo kunuŋ, ninkinankoo ye meŋ puusa ka bo a daa kono.
66012017	Wo to le ninkinankoo kamfaata musoo ñiŋ kamma. Bituŋ a taata keloo boyi musoo koomalanka toomaalu kaŋ, mennu ka Alla la yaamaroolu muta, aniŋ ì ka Yeesu Kiristu la kuwo seedeyaa.
66012018	Ninkinankoo ñiŋ taata loo baatintoo la keñoo kaŋ.
66013001	Bituŋ ŋa daafeŋ saŋarariŋo je finti kaŋ naŋ fankaasoo kono. A ye bina taŋ ne soto, aniŋ kuŋ woorowula. Mansanaafa taŋ ne be a kuŋolu to, aduŋ toolu be safeeriŋ a kuŋ-wo-kuŋ bala le mennu mu tooñeeri kumoolu ti.
66013002	Nte ye daafeŋ saŋarariŋo meŋ je, a mulunta le ko soloo, aduŋ a siŋolu be ko wulakono daafeŋ saŋarariŋ doo. A daa be le ko jatoo daa. Wo ninkinankoo ye semboo dii ate le la, a la mansayaa, aniŋ a la kantiiyaa baa.
66013003	Ate daafeŋ saŋarariŋo kuŋ kiliŋo ka munta le ko niŋ a ye barama jaarabaloo le soto, bari wo barama jawoo naata kendeyaa le. Bituŋ duniyaa moolu bee jaakalita, ì bulata daafeŋ saŋarariŋo ñiŋ nooma.
66013004	Moolu ka ninkinankoo batu, kaatu ate le ye a la kantiiyaa dii daafeŋ saŋarariŋo la. Bituŋ ì ye daafeŋ saŋarariŋo fanaa batu ka a fo ko, “Jumaa le be ko ñiŋ daafeŋ saŋarariŋo? Jumaa le be a kelendi noo la?”
66013005	Daa diita wo daafeŋ saŋarariŋo la le ka kibiri kumoolu niŋ tooñeeri kumoolu fo, aduŋ kantiiyaa diita a la le fo kari taŋ naani niŋ fula.
66013006	A naata tooñeeri kumoo fo Alla ma. A ye Alla too niŋ a la taradulaa tooñee, biriŋ a ye feŋolu bee neŋ, mennu be sabatiriŋ Arijana kono.
66013007	Siloo diita a la le ka keloo boyi Alla la moo senuŋolu kaŋ, aniŋ ka ì noo. Aduŋ kantiiyaa diita a la sii-wo-sii kaŋ ne, bankoolu, kaŋolu aniŋ nasiyoŋolu bee, ka ì mara.
66013008	Moolu mennu bee be baluuriŋ duniyaa kono, ì be a batu la le fo moolu doroŋ, mennu toolu safeeta baluwo kitaaboo kono biriŋ duniyaa fondamaŋo be laa la. Wo le mu Saajiiriŋo la kitaaboo ti, meŋ kanateyita.
66013009	Niŋ moo meŋ ye tuloo soto, a si a moyi:
66013010	“Niŋ meŋ ñanta taa la mutoo kono, a be taa la mutoo kono le. Niŋ meŋ ñanta faa la niŋ hawusaroo la, a be faa la niŋ wo le la.” Wo mu wakiilindiri kumoo le ti Alla la moo senuŋolu ye, fo ì si wakiili ì la lannoo kono.
66013011	Bituŋ ŋa daafeŋ saŋarariŋo doo je, a bota bankoo kono. A ye bina fula le soto ko saajiiriŋo, bari a diyaamuta le ko ninkinankoo.
66013012	A ye maraloo ke kantiiyaa bee le la ko wo daafeŋ saŋarariŋ foloo, aduŋ a ye duniyaa moolu bee duŋ ka wo daafeŋ saŋarariŋ foloo batu, meŋ na barama jawoo naata kendeyaa.
66013013	Ate wo daafeŋ saŋarariŋ doo ye kaawakuu baalu le ke, hani a ka a kendi le, dimbaa ka bo naŋ saŋo santo ka jii duniyaa kono moo bee ñaa la.
66013014	Ka bo niŋ a la wo kuwolu la, a ye duniyaa moolu neenee fo ì ye wo daafeŋ saŋarariŋ foloo muluŋo dadaa, meŋ baramata jawuke niŋ hawusaroo la, bari hani wo, a be baluuriŋ hani bii.
66013015	Semboo diita a la le, ka niyo dii wo daafeŋ saŋarariŋo muluŋo la, fo wo si diyaamu noo aniŋ ka a tinna, moolu ye faa, mennu maŋ soŋ ka wo batu.
66013016	Aduŋ ate le fanaa ye yaamaroo dii ko, moo-wo-moo ñanta a la taamanseeroo soto la a bulubaa buloo bala le waraŋ a foŋo to, biriŋ moondiŋ fo moo baa, naafulutii waraŋ fuwaaroo le mu, joŋo waraŋ foroo.
66013017	Moo-wo-moo le te waafiroo waraŋ sandiroo ke noo la, niŋ a maŋ wo taamanseeroo soto a bala. Wo taamanseeroo mu daafeŋ saŋarariŋo ñiŋ too le ti, waraŋ a la niimaroo meŋ ka a too yitandi.
66013018	Ñiŋ ye ñaameŋo le kaniŋ, bari meŋ ye kalamutaroo soto, a si wo daafeŋ saŋarariŋo la niimaroo kotoo loŋ, baawo a mu hadamadiŋo la niimaroo le ti. Wo niimaroo mu keme wooro taŋ wooro aniŋ wooro le ti.
66014001	Bituŋ ŋa juubeeroo ke, ŋa Saajiiriŋo je looriŋ Siyoni Konkoo kaŋ, aduŋ moo wuli keme wuli taŋ naani niŋ naani be a fee. A too niŋ a Faamaa too le be safeeriŋ wolu foŋolu to.
66014002	Wo to le ŋa kumakaŋo moyi naŋ Arijana kono, meŋ be ko jiibaliŋ baalu aniŋ saŋ kumakaŋ baa. A be le ko, kontiŋ kosilaalu la kontiŋ kumakaŋo.
66014003	Ŋa a moyi, ì ye suukuu kutoo laa mansasiiraŋo niŋ wo daafeŋ baluuriŋ naanoo ñaatiliŋo la, aniŋ alifaalu. Moo-wo-moo le maŋ wo suukuwo laa noo, fo wo moo wuli keme wuli taŋ naani niŋ naanoo doroŋ, mennu kumakaata ka bo duniyaa kono.
66014004	Wolu le mu moolu ti, mennu maŋ ì faŋolu kosondi niŋ musoolu la, bari ì tuta foroyaariŋ. Ì ka Saajiiriŋo nooma le, a taata daa-wo-daa. Ì kumakaata le ka bo hadamadiŋolu kono Alla niŋ Saajiiriŋo ye, ì keta ko siimaŋ kuŋ foloolu katiri waatoo la.
66014005	Faniyaa nene maŋ bo ì daa kono, ì maŋ sootaari soto.
66014006	Bituŋ ŋa malaayika doo je, a be tii kaŋ n kunto santo, a niŋ badaa-badaa kibaari betoo, a si meŋ kankulaa moolu ye, mennu be baluuriŋ duniyaa kono. A be a ke la nasiyoŋ-wo-nasiyoŋ ye, sii-wo-sii, kaŋ-wo-kaŋ aniŋ banku-wo-banku.
66014007	A sarita niŋ sari baa la ko, “Ali sila Alla la, aniŋ ali ye a horoma, a la kiitiyo waatoo siita le. Ali ate batu, meŋ ye saŋo niŋ bankoo daa, fankaasoo aniŋ woyoolu.”
66014008	Bituŋ malaayika fulanjaŋo ye a nooma, a be a fo kaŋ ko, “A boyita le, Babiloni saatee baa boyita! Ate le ye duniyaa nasiyoŋolu bee siirandi a la laañooyaa tuluŋo doloo la.”
66014009	Malaayika doo naata ì nooma. Ñiŋ sabanjaŋo be sari kaŋ niŋ sari baa la ko, “Niŋ moo-wo-moo ye daafeŋ saŋarariŋo niŋ a muluŋo batu, aduŋ a ye taamanseeroo soto a foŋo bala waraŋ a buloo to,
66014010	wo maarii fanaa be Alla la kamfaa baa doloo miŋ na le, meŋ niŋ semboo bee yelemata Alla la kamfaa baa mindaŋo kono. Wo maarii be toorandi la dimbaa niŋ solifa munkoo le la, malaayika senuŋolu niŋ Saajiiriŋo ñaatiliŋo la.
66014011	Ì be tooroo dimbaa meŋ kono, wo siisiyo ka taa santo le, fo abadaa. Moolu mennu ka ñiŋ daafeŋ saŋarariŋo muluŋo batu, aniŋ mennu ye a too taamanseeroo soto, wolu nene te dahaa soto la, suutoo la waraŋ tiloo la.”
66014012	Wo mu wakiilindiri kumoo le ti Alla la moo senuŋolu ye, ka Alla la yaamaroolu muta, aniŋ ì la lannoo Yeesu la.
66014013	Bituŋ ŋa kumakaŋo moyi naŋ saŋo santo, meŋ ye n yaamari ko, “Ñiŋ safee: ‘Barakoo be moolu le ye, mennu be faa la Maariyo noomalankayaa kono ka bo saayiŋ na.’ Noora Kuliŋo ye a tooñaayandi le ko, ‘Barakoo be itolu ye le, kaatu ì be dahaa soto la ì la kata kuu koleŋolu to le, aduŋ ì la kebaaroolu be ì nooma la le.’ ”
66014014	Bituŋ ŋa juubeeroo ke, ŋa minaayi koyoo je. N naata meŋ je siiriŋ wo minaayoo kaŋ, ka munta ko hadamadiŋo. Sani mansanaafoo be a kuŋo to, woroto daa diimaa be mutariŋ a buloo kono.
66014015	Malaayika doo naata finti Alla Batudulaa Buŋo kono. A sarita niŋ sari baa la ka wo kumandi, meŋ be siiriŋ minaayoo kaŋ. A ko a ye ko, “I la worotoo taa, i ye katiroo ke. Katiri waatoo siita le, kaatu duniyaa moota katiroo ye le.”
66014016	Bituŋ wo meŋ be siiriŋ minaayoo kaŋ, a ye a la worotoo finjaŋ duniyaa kunto, aduŋ a bee katita.
66014017	Malaayika doo fanaa naata finti Alla Batudulaa Buŋo kono, Arijana. Woroto daa diimaa be ate fanaa buloo kono.
66014018	Wo to le malaayika doo naata ka bo sadaajanidulaa to. Dimbaa semboo karafata wo le ma. Bituŋ a sarita niŋ sari baa la ka wo doo kumandi, meŋ ye woroto daa diimaa soto. A ko a ye ko, “I la worotoo taa, i ye duniyaa wo wayini yiridiŋ ñatoolu kafu ñoo ma, kaatu ì diŋolu moota katiroo ye le.”
66014019	Bituŋ malaayikoo ye a la worotoo finjaŋ duniyaa kunto. A ye wayini yiridiŋ ñatoolu kafu ñoo ma, a ye ì fayi yiridinjii bitidulaa kono, meŋ mu Alla la kamfaa baa ti.
66014020	Aduŋ ì dorita wo yiridinjii bitidulaa kono, saatewo banta la. Bituŋ yeloo naata woyi ka bo yiridinjii bitidulaa to. A jamfata santo ka futa fo suwoolu la karafewolu to, aduŋ a la karajamfoo niŋ kilomeetari keme saba si kaañaŋ.
66015001	Bituŋ ŋa taamanseeri kaawakuuyaariŋ baa doo je Arijana kono. Wo mu malaayika woorowula le ti ì niŋ mantoora woorowula, mennu mu mantoora labaŋolu ti, kaatu Alla la kamfaa danta itolu le la.
66015002	Bituŋ ŋa kenoo je, a ka munta ko baajiyo meŋ dadaata niŋ weeroo la, a niŋ dimbaa be ñaamiriŋ. N naata wo moolu je, mennu ye nooroo ke daafeŋ saŋarariŋo la, a muluŋo aniŋ a too la niimaroo. Ì be looriŋ wo kenoo daala, meŋ ka munta ko baajiyo meŋ dadaata weeroo la. Kontiŋolu be ì bulu, Alla ye mennu dii ì la.
